translated: [' Mpo na MERS, na kotalela bolukiluki ya motango ya bato oyo esalemaki na sanza ya motoba 2012, bato oyo bakufaki bazalaki 37% na kati ya bato 2 494 oyo bazalaki na yango. ']

sourceString: An earlier study reported that the R0 of SARS-CoV-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the R0 of SARS-CoV only ranged from 2 to 4.
targetString: Bolukiluki ya liboso emonisaki ete R0 ya SARS-CoV-2 ezalaki 6,47 mpe 95% interval ya confiance (CI) ya 5,71-7,23, kasi R0 ya SARS-CoV ezalaki kaka banda 2 kino 4.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko ya liboso elobaki ete R0 ya SARS-CoV-2 ezalaki mingi na 6,47 mpe 95% interval ya confiance (CI) ya 5,71-7,23, kasi R0 ya SARS-CoV ezalaki kaka banda na 2 kino 4. ']

sourceString: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table ​Table1.1.
targetString: Kokokanisa SARS-CoV-2 na MERS-CoV mpe SARA-CoV na oyo etali bilembo, motango ya bakufi, mpe R0 emonisami na Tablo​Tablo 1.1.
translated: [' Bokokanisi ya SARS-CoV-2 na MERS-CoV mpe SARA-CoV na oyo etali bilembo na yango, motango ya bakufi, mpe R0 emonisami na Tablo Tablo1.1. ']

sourceString: The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
targetString: Mitango oyo eza likolo emonisi ete SARS-CoV-2 eza na makoki mingi ya kopanzana koleka MERS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV, kasi ezoboma bato moke koleka mibale oyo ya nsuka.
translated: [' Mitango oyo eza likolo emonisi ete SARS-CoV-2 eza na makoki mingi ya kopanzana koleka MERS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV, kasi ezoboma bato mingi te soki tokokanisi yango na mibale oyo ya nsuka. ']

sourceString: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Yango wana, eza mpasi mingi na kobundisa maladi mabe ya SARS-CoV-2 koleka oyo ya MERS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Yango wana, eza mpasi mingi na kobundisa maladi mabe ya SARS-CoV-2 koleka oyo ya MERS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV. ']

sourceString: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
targetString: Mbala mingi maboke ebimaka na libota moko to na esika moko to eyaki neti masuwa.
translated: [' Clustered onset esalemaka mbala mingi na libota moko to na bokutani moko to na motuka moko na ndakisa masuwa ya bisengo. ']

sourceString: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
targetString: Mbala mingi bato ya maladi eza bato oyo basalaki mobembo na to bafandaka kuna to bisika mosusu oyo maladi yango ekotaki to bazwaki yango na bato na bamposo mibale liboso ete ebanda.
translated: [' Mbala mingi bato ya maladi bazalaka na istware ya mobembo to ya kofanda na Wuhan to bisika mosusu oyo maladi ezali to kokutana na bato to bato ya maladi na mposo mibale oyo euti koleka liboso ebanda. ']

sourceString: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
targetString: Kasi, emonani ete bato bakoki komema virisi wana kozanga kozala na bilembo na eleko eleki mposo mibale mpe bato oyo babikaki oyo babimaki na lopitalo bakoki kozala lisusu na virisi wana, yango wana esengeli kobakisa mikolo ya quarantaine.
translated: [' Kasi, balobi ete bato bakoki komema virisi wana kozanga bilembo ya maladi koleka mposo mibale mpe kobikisa bato ya maladi oyo babimaki na balopitalo bakoki lisusu komema virisi wana, oyo etindaka alarme mpo na kobakisa ngonga ya konfinema. ']

sourceString: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
targetString: Bato ya maladi oyo baza na motango ya baselile ya mpembe ya makila ya normal to moke (mingimingi balymphocyte) na ebandeli mpenza ya maladi.
translated: [' Bato ya maladi baza na motango ya malamu to ya kokita ya baselile ya mpɛmbɛ ya peripherique (mingimingi lymphocytes) na ebandeli mpenza. ']

sourceString: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ndakisa, lymphopenia na selile ya mpembe ya makila count < 4×109/L elongo na lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, mpe motango mingi ya aspartate aminotransferase mpe viremia emonanaki na bato ya maladi 1 099 ya COVID-19.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, lymphopenia na motango ya baselile ya mpembe ya makila < 4×109/L ata mpe lymphocyte motango < 1×109/L, mpe komata ya aspartate aminotransferase mpe viremia emonanaki na bato 1 099 oyo babelaki COVID-19. ']

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: Nivo ya foie mpe ya misisa ya ba-enzyme mpe myoglobine ezalaki komata na makila ya bato mosusu ya maladi, mpe baproteine C na erythrocyte emataki na makila ya bato mingi ya maladi.
translated: [' Nivo ya ba enzyme ya foie mpe ya misisa mpe myoglobine emataki na makila ya bato mosusu ya maladi, mpe baproteine C mpe erythrocyte sedimentation emataki na makila ya bato mingi ya maladi. ']

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: Na bato oyo bazalaki kobela makasi, nivo ya dimer D, kolemba ya mosisa moko oyo ezalaka na makila, emataka, mpe lymphocyte ebandaki kokita malembemalembe.
translated: [' Na bato ya maladi oyo bazalaki na maladi ya makasi, nivo ya D-dimer, eloko ya kobeba ya fibrin oyo ezalaki na makila, ematisamaki, mpe lymphocyte ezalaki kokita mokemoke. ']

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: Bampasi na ntolo emonanaki na bato mingi oyo babelaki COVID-19 mpe emonisaki bisika ya molili ya ndenge moko te to bisika ya molili na bapoumon.
translated: [' Mabe na radiographie ya tolo emonanaka na bato mingi oyo bazobela COVID-19 mpe ezalaka na elili ya biteni mibale to opacity ya talatala ya mabele na bapoumon. ']

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Mbala mingi bato ya maladi bazalaki na maladi ya mpema, kozoka makasi na poumon, mpe mpasi makasi ya kopema (ARDS).
translated: [' Mbala mingi bato ya maladi bakobela pneumonia atyty, kozoka makasi na poumon, mpe mpasi makasi ya kopema (ARDS). ']

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: Soki ARDS esalemi, mpasi ya makasi, komata ya mai, mpe kobeba ya fibrose esalaka ete mopepe eleka na mpasi.
translated: [' Soki ARDS esalemi, kovimba kozanga kolandela, kokota ya mai, mpe fibrose oyo ezokende liboso ebebisaka makasi esika ya kobongola gaze. ']

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: Kosala malamu te ya lolenge I mpe II ya pneumocytes ekitisaka nivo ya surfactant mpe ematisaka esika ya mpasi, yango wana ekitisaka makoki ya bapoumon ya kofungwama mpe esalaka ete likama ya kopanza poumon ekoma mingi.
translated: [' Kosala malamu te ya lolenge I mpe ya lolenge II ya pneumocytes ekitisaka nivo ya surfactant mpe ematisaka tension ya likolo, yango wana ekitisaka makoki ya bapoumon ya kokóma monene mpe koyeisa likama ya kokwea ya poumon. ']

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: Yango wana, maladi makasi ya bapoumon oyo bazwaki ezalaki mbala mingi na boyokani na mpasi makasi ya maladi wana.
translated: [' Yango wana, makambo ya mabe koleka oyo bamonaki na radio ya ntolo mbala mingi ekokani na bonene ya makasi ya maladi wana. ']

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya mibale 2020, analyse ya liboso ya COVID-19 emonisaki kobeba ya ba pneumocyte, biteni ya hyaline, mpe kotoboka ya kati ya lymphocyte, mpe mwa bambuma na selile na bapoumon ya bato oyo bakufaki na maladi yango; eyokani na pathologie ya virisi yango mpe ARDS mpe ekokani na oyo ya bato oyo babelaki SARS mpe MERS.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya mibale 2020, botaleli ya liboso ya pathologie ya COVID-19 emonisaki kokita ya pneumocyte, ndenge membrane ya hyaline esalaka, mpe infiltration ya lymphocyte interstitiale, mpe baselile ya syncytial multinucleé na bapoumon ya moto ya maladi oyo akufaki na maladi, eyokani na pathologie ya maladi ya virisi mpe ARDS mpe ndenge moko na oyo ya bato oyo babelaki SARS mpe MERS. ']

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: Koyeba SARS-CoV-2 RNA na nzela ya makambo oyo esalemaka mpe ememaka na (RT-PCR) esalelamaki neti elembo ya ntina mingi mpo na koyeba COVID-19.
translated: [' Komona SARS-CoV-2 RNA na nzela ya reaction ya chaine ya polymerase (RT-PCR) esalelamaki lokola makambo ya minene mpo na koyeba COVID-19. ']

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: Kasi, mpo na nivo ya makasi ya makambo ya lokuta, oyo ekoki kosala ete maladi mabe ekoma makasi mingi, babandaki kosalela bilembo ya maladi mpo na koyeba yango (bazalaki kosuka kaka te na RT-PCR) na Chine na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya mibale 2020.
translated: [' Kasi, mpo na taux ya likolo ya false-negatif oyo ekoki kosala ete maladi mabe ebima noki, ba manifestation ya cliniki ebandaki kosalelama mpona koyeba yango (oyo ezalaki lisusu kotalela RT-PCR te) na Chine na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya mibale 2020. ']

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: Likambo ya ndenge moko esalemaki mpo na koyeba SARS.
translated: [' Likambo ya ndenge moko esalemaki mpe ntango bamonaki SARS. ']

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: Yango wana, kosangisa masolo ya maladi oyo, ndenge ebimaki, baekzame ya laboratoire, mpe makambo bamonaki na radiographie eza ntina mingi mpe ekosalisa mpo na koyeba makasi diagnostique.
translated: [' Yango wana, bosangani ya lisolo ya maladi, ba manifestation ya cliniki, ba ekzame ya laboratoire, mpe bokundoli ya radiologie eza ntina mingi mpe eza ntina mingi mpo na kosala diagnostiki ya malamu. ']

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale 2020, lisanga Feng Zhang balimbolaki mayele moko na kosalelaka mayele esimbami na CRISPR SHERLOCK mayele ya koyeba SARS-CoV-2, mpo na koyeba SARS-CoV-2 RNA na 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (motango 10-100 na microlitre moko) basalelaki jauge na nse ya ngonga moko kozanga basala makambo ya mindondomindondo.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale 2020, etuluku Feng Zhang balimbolaki protocole ya kosalela mayele ya CRISPR SHERLOCK mpo na komona SARS-CoV-2, oyo emonaka biteni ya SARS-CoV-2 RNA ya synthétique na 20 × 10-18 mol/L kino 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 bakopi na microlitre moko ya kokota) na kosalela dipstick na nse ya ngonga moko kozanga kosenga bisaleli ya mindondo. ']

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: Tozolikya ete, mayele oyo ya sika ekoki kobongola makasi sensibilite mpe lolenge malamu ya kosalela yango, soki endimami nsima ya kotalela yango.
translated: [' Na elikya nyonso, mayele ya sika ekoki kokolisa makasi sensitivité mpe bolamu soki verifié na ba echantillon ya cliniki. ']

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: Mpo bayebi malamu te CoV ya sika, minganga bakoki kaka kosalisa mwa moke bato oyo bazobela COVID-19, ntango bazozela bankisi mingi oyo basi basalela to oyo bazalaki kokanisa liboso kosalela mpo na kobikisa bato ya CoVs mosusu na ndakisa SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV mpe maladi euti na virisi (Tablo ​(Tablo2).2).
translated: [' Na ntina ya kozanga eksperianse na CoV ya sika, minganga bakoki kopesa lisungi mingi na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19, ntango bazali komeka bankisi ndenge na ndenge oyo basi basalela to balobaki liboso mpo na kobikisa ba CoVs mosusu na ndakisa SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV mpe maladi mosusu ya virisi (Tablo (Tablo2).2). ']

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: Bankisi yango eza bankisi ya sika mpe oyo bakoki kosalela oyo eza na nkisi ya bambuma, immunosuppresseurs, basteroide, plazma euti na bato ya maladi, nkisi ya bokoko ya Chine, mpe lisalisi ya minganga.
translated: [' Bankisi yango ezali bankisi ya sika mpe oyo ekoki kosalisa na bakisi oyo ebundisaka virisi, immunosuppresseur, basteroide, plazma oyo euti na bato oyo babikaki, bakisi ya Chine, mpe lisalisi ya psychologie. ']

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: Balobaki bakoki kosalela ata plazma oyo euti na moto ya maladi lokola nkisi.
translated: [' Ata plazma ya bato ya maladi oyo babiki ezalaki likanisi ya kosalela yango mpo na kozwa lisalisi. ']

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: Bakompani oyo esalaka bankisi bazosala makasi mpo na kosala bankisi mpe mangwele ya virisi oyo.
translated: [' Bakompani oyo esalaka bankisi bazali kowela kosala ba anticorps mpe mangwele mpo na kobundisa virisi. ']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ebundisaka mingimingi bapoumon na ebandeli mpe mbala mosusu ebundisaka mwa moke binama mosusu ya nzoto oyo ezalaka na ACE2, na ndakisa estoma na misopo mpe bangeyi.
translated: [' SARS-CoV-2 ebundisaka mingimingi bapoumon na ebandeli mpe mbala mosusu ebundisaka mpe yango, na meko ya moke, binama mosusu oyo emonisaka ACE2, na ndakisa systeme ya estoma mpe bangeyi. ']

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: Atako bongo, mpasi ya kopema mpe kobungisa makanisi eza makama minene mpo na bato mingi ya maladi mpe yango nde ezoboma mingi.
translated: [' Atako bongo, kozanga kopema mpe kozanga kokoka ezali likama monene mpo na bato ya maladi mpe ntina monene ya liwa. ']

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: Yango wana, kosalisa na kopema eza ntina mingi mpo na kolembisa bilembo ya maladi mpe kobikisa bato mpe yango etaleli kopesa oxygene lokola nkisi, kopesa oxygene mingi, kokotisa mopepe kozanga kokotisa eloko na nzoto ya moto, mpe kokotisa na nzoto eloko ezokotisa mopepe na kotalela makasi ya maladi.
translated: [' Yango wana, kosalisa na kopema eza ntina mingi mpo na kosilisa bilembo mpe kobikisa bomoi ya bato mpe etaleli mpe therapi ya oxygene nyonso, oxygène oyo etambolaka mingi, mopepe oyo ebundisaka te, mpe mopepe ya masini oyo ebundisaka maladi na kotalela makasi ya maladi. ']

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: Bato ya maladi oyo baza na mpasi ya makasi ya kopema, basalisaki bango na eleko moko oyo ekotisaka oxygene (ECMO), mayele moko ya sika ya kokotisa eloko na motema oyo basalelaki mpo na kobikisa maladi makasi ya motema to bato oyo mpema ekatanaki.
translated: [' Bato ya maladi oyo baza na bilembo ya makasi ya mpema basengeli kosalisama na extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), mayele ya kobongola ya cardiopulmonary bypass oyo basalelaka mpo na kobikisa maladi ya motema to ya mpema oyo ekoki koboma bato. ']

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: Lisusu, kobatela equilibre ya electrolyte, kobundisa mpe kobikisa maladi ya mibale mpe maladi makasi, mpe kobatela binama ya bomoi eza ntina mingi mpo na bato oyo bazobela SARS-CoV-2.
translated: [' Lisusu, kobatela equilibre ya electrolyte, kobundisa mpe kobikisa maladi ya mibale mpe choque septique, mpe kobatela misala ya binama ya ntina ezali mpe ntina mingi mpo na bato oyo bazobela SARS-CoV-2. ']

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Eyebani ete komata ya cytokine na reaction ya koleka ndelo ya mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi ya bato oyo bazobela SARS mpe MERS.
translated: [' Eyebani ete mopepe moko ya cytokine euti na reaction ya koleka ndelo ya mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi ya SARS mpe MERS. ']

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: Cytokine eza lolenge moko ya mpasi oyo ebimaka na ba cytokine mingi na ndakisa TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, mpe MCP-1.
translated: [' Mopepe makasi ya cytokine eza lolenge moko ya reaction ya inflammatoire systemiki oyo emonisami na kobima ya ba cytokine mingi na ndakisa TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, mpe MCP-1. ']

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: Ba cytokine epusaka baselile oyo ebundisaka maladi na kobimisa ba radicale mingi oyo ekeseni oyo ebimisaka mbala mingi ARDS mpe kobebisa binama.
translated: [' Ba cytokine oyo etindaka baselile oyo ebundisaka maladi ebimisa ebele ya ba radicale ya bonsomi oyo ezali ntina monene ya ARDS mpe kobeba ya binama mingi. ']

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: Immunosuppresseur eza ntina mingi mpo na kobikisa cytokine, mingimingi na bato oyo bazobela makasi.
translated: [' Immunosuppresseur eza ntina mingi mpo na kosalisa maladi ya cytokine, mingimingi na bato ya maladi ya makasi. ']

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: Corticosteroide mpe tocilizumabe, IL6 moko oyo ebundisaka maladi, basalelaki yango mpo na kobikisa cytokine.
translated: [' Corticosteroides mpe tocilizumab, anti-IL6 ya anticorps monoclonale, basalelaki yango mpona kobikisa mopepe ya cytokine. ']

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: Bankisi mosusu ya immunosuppresseur mpo na cytokine ezali kosalela selile T oyo eza na boyokani na mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi; blockade ya IFN-γ, IL-1, mpe TNF; JAK inhibation; blinatumomabe; suppresseur ya cytokine oyo ezolakisa 4; mpe HDAC ba inhibateur.
translated: [' Bankisi mosusu ya immunosuppresseur mpo na mopepe ya cytokine ezali modulation ya mikrobe oyo etambwisami na selile T; bokangami ya IFN-γ, IL-1, mpe TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor ya cytokine signaling 4; Et les yeux HDP. ']

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Ba steroide, lokola ba immunosuppresseur, basalelaki yango mingi lokola nkisi ya SARS mpo na kokitisa mpasi oyo esalemi.
translated: [' Steroide, lokola biloko oyo ebundisaka maladi, basalelaki yango mingi mpo na kosalisa SARS mpo na kokitisa makasi ya kobeba ya inflammatoire. ']

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Kasi, basteroide oyo ezalaka na doze mingi ezalaki ntina te mpo na mpota ya poumon na bato oyo babelaki SARS mpe COVID-19.
translated: [' Kasi, basteroide na dose ya makasi ezalaki malamu te mpo na kozoka makasi ya poumon na bato oyo babelaki SARS mpe COVID-19. ']

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: Kasi, ekoki komema bampasi mosusu, mingimingi na baselile ya makila, mpe ebebisaki mingi pronostique.
translated: [' Na esika ya kosala bongo, ekoki kobimisa mikakatano makasi, mingimingi osteonecrose ya avasculaire, ebebisaka pronostique ya pronostique. ']

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Atako bongo, badoze ya moke ya corticosteroide, basengaki kopesa yango na mayele mpo na bato ya maladi ya COVID-19 oyo bazalaki kobela makasi.
translated: [' Atako bongo, ba cours ya mikuse ya corticosteroide na doze ya moke esengeli kosalelama na mayele mpona bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 oyo bazalaki kobela makasi. ']

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: Na ntango tozokoma, eza nanu te na nkisi oyo eyebani mpo na virisi oyo.
translated: [' Na ntango tozokoma lisolo oyo, kisi moko te ya malamu mpo na kobundisa virisi endimisami. ']

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: Kasi, kopesa na misisa remdesivir, analogue ya nucleotide, emonanaki ete ezosalisa mingi bato ya Amerika oyo bazobela COVID-19.
translated: [' Kasi, kopesa misisa na misisa na remdesivir, analogue ya nucleotide, emonani ete ezali makasi na moto ya Amerika oyo aza na COVID-19. ']

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: Remdesivir eza nkisi ya kobundisa virisi oyo esalemaki na ebandeli na Gileadi mpo na kosalisaka bato oyo bazalaki kobela Ebola mpe Marlburg.
translated: [' Remdesivir eza kisi ya sika ya kobundisa virisi oyo esalemaki na Gileadi na ebandeli mpona kosalisa maladi euti na bavirisi ya Ebola mpe ya Marlburg. ']

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: Na nsima, remdesivir mpe emonisaki ete ekoki kosalisa mpo na bavirisi mosusu ya RNA ata mpe virisi MERS na SARS.
translated: [' Na nsima, remdesivir emonisaki mpe ete ekoki kopekisa bavirisi mosusu ya RNA moko oyo ekangamaki ata mpe virisi MERS mpe SARS. ']

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: Na kotalela makambo wana, Gilead epesi biloko wana na Chine mpo na komeka yango na bato oyo bazobela SARS-CoV-2, mpe bato bazozela mpenza resultat na yango.
translated: [' Na kotalela makambo oyo, Gilead epesaki eloko wana na Chine mpo na komeka bato mibale oyo baza na SARS-CoV-2, mpe tozozela mpenza resultat na yango. ']

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: Lisusu, bato balobaki ete baricitinbe, interferone-α, lopinavire/ritonavire, mpe ribavirin, ekoki kosalisa bato oyo baza na mpasi makasi ya kopema.
translated: [' Lisusu, baricitinbe, interferon-α, lopinvir/ritonavir, mpe ribavirin balobi ete ekoki kosalisa bato oyo baza na bilembo makasi ya mpema. ']

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: Pulupulu, mposa ya kosanza, kosanza, kobeba ya foie, mpe ba reaction mosusu ya mabe ekoki komonana soki basangisi nkisi wana na lopinavire/ritonavire.
translated: [' Pulupulu, mposa ya kosanza, kosanza, kobeba ya foie, mpe ba reaction mosusu ya mabe ekoki kosalema nsima ya kosangisa nkisi na lopinavir/ritonavir. ']

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: Kosangisa bankisi oyo na bankisi mosusu oyo basalelaki mpo na bato mosusu ya maladi, esengeli kokengela yango malamu mpenza.
translated: [' Boyokani ya bankisi yango na bakisi mosusu oyo basalelaka na bato ya maladi esengeli kolandelama malamu. ']

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: Plazma ya bato oyo babikaki mpe biloko ebundisaka maladi
translated: [' Plasma ya bato ya maladi oyo babiki mpe ba anticorps ']

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: Kosangisa makila ya bato oyo babikaki na maladi mabe mpo na kosalisa bato mosusu oyo bazobela maladi wana moko to mpo na kobatela bato oyo baza nzoto kolongono mpo bazwa te maladi wana ebanda kala.
translated: [' Kozwa makila ya bato ya maladi oyo babikaki na maladi moko oyo epanzanaka mpo na kosalisa bato mosusu oyo bazobela maladi moko wana to mpo na kobatela bato oyo baza nzoto kolongono mpo bazwa maladi yango te ebandá kala. ']

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: Ya solo, mbala mingi bato oyo babika baza na ba-anti corps ya makasi mpo na kobundisa mikrobe na makila na bango.
translated: [' Ya solo, mbala mingi bato ya maladi oyo babiki bazalaka na mwa mingi ya ba anticorps oyo ebundisaka mikrobe oyo epesaka maladi na makila na bango. ']

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: Ba anticorps eza immunoglobuline (Ig) oyo euti na ba lymphocytes B mpo na kobundisa mikrobe mpe biloko mosusu ya mabe mpe eyebaka bamolekile oyo eza na mikrobe mpe na nsima koboma yango.
translated: [' Ba anticorps eza immunoglobuline (Ig) oyo ebimaka na ba lymphocytes B mpona kobundisa mikrobe mpe biloko mosusu ya bapaya mpe eyebaka bamolekile ya ndenge mosusu na biloko oyo epesaka maladi mpe ebomaka yango mbala moko. ']

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: Na kotalela makambo oyo, bazwaka mbala mingi plazma na makila ya bato oyo babelaki kasi babika na COVID-19 mpe botiubaki yango na bato 10 oyo bazalaki kobela makasi.
translated: [' Na kotalela likambo oyo, bazwaki plazma na makila ya etuluku moko ya bato ya maladi oyo babikaki na COVID-19 mpe batyaki yango na kati ya bato 10 oyo bazalaki kobela makasi. ']

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: Bayokaki malamu nsima ya bangonga 24; mpasi na virisi ekitaki mpe esalaki ete oxygene ekita te na makila.
translated: [' Basymptomi na bango ekomaki malamu nsima ya bangonga 24, elongo na kovimba moke mpe kilo ya virisi mpe kovimba ya malamu ya oxygène na makila. ']

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: Kasi, verification mpe clarification eza ntina mingi mpo na topesa likanisi ya kosalela metode wana mpo na kosalela yango liboso babimisa nkisi ya solo.
translated: [' Kasi, verification mpe clarification eza ntina mpo na kopesa likanisi ya kosalela metode wana mpona kosalela yango mingi liboso bankisi ya sikisiki esalema naino te. ']

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: Lisusu, mpo na mabe oyo nkisi ememaka, esengeli kotalela malamumalamu makama mosusu ya plazma.
translated: [' Lisusu, na kotalela ndenge oyo maladi yango ebimisaka, esengeli kotalela malamu mabe mosusu oyo eutaka na plasma. ']

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: Na ndakisa, anticorps ekoki kolendisa mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi mpe ekoki kosala ete cytokine ebima; oyo eza mabe mingi mpo na bomoi.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, ba anticorps ekoki kolendisa mingi mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi mpe kopesa syndrome ya kobima ya cytokine, oyo ekoki kozala pwazɔ oyo ekoki koboma moto. ']

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: Kosangisa ba anticorps na makila ezalaka mbala mingi na nse, mpe bosengi ya plazma eza mingi mpo na kosalisa bato bazobela.
translated: [' Kosangisa ba anticorps na makila ezalaka mbala mingi na nse, mpe mposa ya plazma eza monene mpona kosalisa bato oyo bazobela makasi. ']

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: Eza mpasi na kosala mpe kobimisa ba anticorps ya sikisiki mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe ya monene.
translated: [' Eza mpasi na kosala mpe kobimisa ba anticorps ya sikisiki noki mpenza mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe ya mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: Yango wana, eza ntina mingi mpe ebongi na kokabola baselile B ya bato oyo babiki mpe koyeba bokasi ya ba anticorps wana to komema yango mpo na koyeba soki ba anticorps wana ekoki kobundisa baproteine ya virisi.
translated: [' Yango wana, eza ntina mingi mpe esalisaka mingi na kokabola baselile B ya bato oyo babiki mpe koyeba bakode ya ba gene oyo ebombaka ba anticorps ya malamu to ecran mpo na ba anticorps ya malamu oyo ebundisaka baproteine ya ntina ya virisi. ']

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: Na ndenge wana, tokokoka nde kosala noki ba anticorps.
translated: [' Na ndenge yango, tokoki kobakisa mbala moko biloko oyo ebundisaka maladi. ']

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: Babanda kosalela TCM mpo na kosalisa maladi mingi na Chine banda bambula mingi.
translated: [' TCM basalelaka yango mpona kosalisa maladi ndenge na ndenge na Chine banda bankoto ya bambula. ']

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: Kasi, makama na yango eutaka na ndenge basangisaka biloko mingi na ndenge ekeseni na kotalela lolenge maladi ezali na kolandaka makanisi ya TCM.
translated: [' Kasi, bopusi na yango esalelaka mingimingi bosangani ya biloko mingi na formula moko oyo ekeseni na kotalela ndenge ya koyeba maladi moko na kolanda mateya ya TCM. ']

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: Biloko mingi oyo esalisaka eyebani nanu te to eyebani bongobongo mpo eza mpasi na kobimisa mpe ko verifier biloko yango mpe ndenge malamu ya kosangisa yango.
translated: [' Biloko mingi ya malamu eza kaka koyebana te to eza polele te mpo eza mpasi na kobimisa mpe kondimisa biloko ya ndenge wana to bosangani na yango ya malamu. ']

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: Sikoyo, mpo tozangi nkisi ya makasi mpe ya sikisiki mpo na COVID-19, TCM ekomi moko ya bankisi mpo na bato oyo baza na bilembo ya mike to ya pete to baoyo babiki na maladi makasi.
translated: [' Sikoyo, mpo tozangi nkisi ya malamu mpe ya sikisiki mpo na COVID-19, TCM ekomi moko ya bankisi mosusu ya minene mpo na bato oyo baza na bilembo ya pole to ya mwa bilembo ya pete to mpo na bato oyo babikaki na bileko ya makasi. ']

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Na ndakisa, bato bamonaki ete nkisi ya capsule Shu Feng Jie Du mpe Lian Hua Qing Wen ezosalisa mingi na kobikisa bokono ya COVID-19.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, bamonaki ete capsules Shu Feng Jie Du mpe capsules Lian Hua Qing Wen ezalaki makasi mpona kozwa nkisi ya COVID-19. ']

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: Bato mingi oyo babikaki na kozwaka nkisi ya COVID-19, emonanaki na bituka mingi ya Chine oyo basalelaka TCM na bato ya maladi 87%, na ndakisa Gansu (63,7%), Ningxia (50%), mpe Hunan (50%), kasi na etuka ya Hubei, oyo esalelaki TCM kaka na bato pene ya 30% oyo bazalaki kobela COVID-19, bato moko nde babikaki (13%).
translated: [' Taux ya liboso ya kobikisa bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 emonanaki na bituka mingi na Chine oyo basalelaki TCM na bato 87% ya bato na bango, na ndakisa Gansu (63,7%), Ningxia (50%), mpe Hunan (50%), kasi na etuka ya Hubei, oyo esalelaki TCM kaka na bato pene ya 30% oyo bazalaki kobela COVID-19, ezalaki na bato oyo babikaki mingi te (13%). ']

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: Kasi, bokokanisi oyo eza mpasi mpo makambo mosusu na ndakisa motango ya bato ya maladi mpe makasi ya maladi esengeli kotalelama mpe ntango ya botaleli wana.
translated: [' Kasi, yango eza mpenza bokokanisi ya mabe mpo makambo mingi mosusu oyo esalaka bopusi na ndakisa motango mpe makasi ya bato ya maladi esengeli kotyama na botaleli. ']

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya mibale 2020, Boli Zhang mpe baninga na ye babimisaki bolukiluki moko mpo na kokokanisa kimonganga ya eropa (WM) yango moko na nkisi ya WM mpe TCM.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya mibale 2020, Boli Zhang na baninga ya mosala babimisaki bolukiluki moko mpo na kokokanisa nkisi ya western medicine (WM) kaka na lisalisi ya WM mpe TCM. ']

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: Bamonaki ete ntango oyo baza na yango mposa mpo chaleur ekita na nzoto, mpo bilembo esila, mpe na lopitalo ezalaki moke na etuluku WM+TCM koleka na etuluku WM mpamba.
translated: [' Bamonaki ete bantango oyo esengeli mpo na kobongisa temperature ya nzoto, kolimwa ya bilembo, mpe kokota lopitalo ezalaki mokuse mpenza na etuluku WM+TCM koleka na etuluku WM mpamba. ']

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: Eloko ezokamwisa mingi eza ete ndenge bilembo ezokoma makasi (banda na moke kino na makasi) ezalaki na nse mingi mpo na etuluku WM+TCM koleka na etuluku WM mpamba (7,4% kontre 46,2%) mpe bato oyo bakufaki bazalaki moke na etuluku WM+TCM koleka na etuluku WM mpamba (8,8% kontre 39%).
translated: [' Likambo ya kokamwa mingi, taux ya kobeba ya basymptomi (banda na pole kino na pole makasi) ezalaki na nse ya kokamwa mpona etuluku WM+TCM koleka mpo na etuluku WM kaka (7,4% kontre 46,2%) mpe bato oyo bakufaki bazalaki moke na etuluku WM+TCM koleka etuluku WM mpamba (8,8% kontre 39%). ']

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: Atako bongo, bokasi mpe bolamu ya TCM ezozela kaka endimisama nsima ya komeka yango na bato mingi mpe na bisika mingi.
translated: [' Atako bongo, bokasi mpe libateli ya TCM eza kaka kozela komeka mingi na kolandela yango malamu na ba échelle ya minene mpe na bisika mingi. ']

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: Ezobenda mpe likebi na koyeba ndenge makambo esalemaka mpe kolimbola makasi ya biloko oyo eza na bankisi ya TCM to ndenge basangisaka yango soki likoki ezali.
translated: [' Ekozala mpe kobenda likebi na komonisa ndenge misala esalaka mpe kolimbola polele biloko ya malamu oyo ezali na nkisi ya TCM to ndenge basangisaka yango soki likoki ezali. ']

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Bato oyo bakanisi bakoki kozala na COVID-19 to oyo baza na yango, mbala mingi babangaka mingi maladi oyo ebomaka, mpe bato oyo batye na quarantaine bamitungisaka mingi, bamiyokaka bango moko mpe bazalaka na nkanda.
translated: [' Bato ya maladi oyo bakoki kozala na COVID-19 to oyo baza na yango, mingi bazalaka na bobangi makasi ya maladi oyo epanzanaka mingi mpe kutu ebomaka, mpe bato oyo batye bango na quarantaine bakutanaka mpe na boredom, bamiyokaka bango moko, mpe nkanda. ']

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Lisusu, bilembo ya kozwa maladi na ndakisa fievre, kozanga oxygene, mpe kosukosu mpe bampasi mosusu eutaka na nkisi na ndakisa kozanga mpongi oyo corticoseroide ebimisaka ekoki komema basusi mingi mpe kotungisama na makanisi.
translated: [' Lisusu, bilembo ya maladi lokola fievre, hypoxia, mpe kosukosu mpe makambo mabe oyo eutaka na nkisi lokola kozanga mpɔngi oyo corticosteroide ebimisaka ekoki kosala ete moto amitungisa mingi mpe azala na mpasi na makanisi. ']

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: Na ebandeli ntango SARS ebimaki, balobaki ete bato yango bamonisaki bizaleli mingi na ndakisa kotungisama mingi na makanisi, basusi, kosutuka, kosala makambo bisalasala, kobosana makambo, kobungisa makanisi, mpe nkutu koluka komiboma.
translated: [' Na ebandeli ya kobima ya SARS, ndenge mingi ya maladi ya motó na ndakisa konyokwama makasi na makanisi, mitungisi, kobanga, esengo ya psychomotor, bilembo ya psychotic, delirium, ata mpe komiboma. ']

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: Koluka bato oyo moto azobela akutanaki na bango mpe kotya bato na quarantaine mpo na kobatela bango na COVID-19, ekoki kosala ete bato bamitungisa mingi mpe bazala na ngambo mpo bapesi bato mosusu maladi, kozala na quarantaine, mpe mpasi bamemi na mabota mpe baninga.
translated: [' Esengeli kolandela bato oyo bakutanaki na bango mpe batya konfinema, na kati ya makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto mpo na kobundisa maladi ya COVID-19, ekoki kosala ete bato bamitungisaka mingi mpe bazala na ngambo mpo na makama oyo maladi wana ekoki kobimisa, konfinema, mpe nsɔni na mabota mpe baninga na bango. ']

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Yango wana, basengeli kopesa lisalisi ya maladi ya moto na bato oyo baza na COVID-19, baoyo bakanisi bakoki kozala na yango, mpe na bato nyonso oyo baza na mposa na yango.
translated: [' Yango wana, esengeli kopesa lisalisi ya maladi ya motó na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19, bato oyo bakanisi ete baza bato, mpe bato oyo baza na contact na bango mpe na bato nyonso oyo baza na bosɛnga. ']

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: Lisalisi ya maladi ya moto esengeli kotalela kopona ekipi ya bato mingi oyo basalisaka bato ya maladi ya moto, kosolola mbala na mbala na polele nyonso mpe kopesa bansango ya sika ya solo mpo na kobima ya SARS-CoV-2 mpe bankisi bazokana kobimisa mpe kosalela ba-apareyi mpe baprograme mpo na koboya kozala pembeni na bato mosusu.
translated: [' Lisungi ya psychologie esengeli kozala na ndakisa kosala baekipe ya kolongono ya bato mingi ya maladi ya motó, kosolola ya polele na bansango ya sika mbala na mbala mpe ya sikisiki etali kobima ya SARS-CoV-2 mpe myango ya kosalisa yango mpe kosalela baaparɛyi ya elektroniki ya minganga mpe ba-application mpo na koboya kozala pene ya moko na mosusu. ']

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: Mangwele ya solo eza na ntina mingi mpo na kosukisa kopanzana ya virisi na banyama mpe na bato oyo baza na yango mpe na biloko mosusu mpe mbala mingi eyokanaka na nkisi ya virisi mpo na kobundisa maladi makasi oyo euti na bavirisi ya sika.
translated: [' Mangwele ya malamu eza ntina mingi mpo na kokata ndenge ya kopanza maladi banda na bisika oyo ebombaka banyama mpe bato oyo baza na maladi kino na bisika oyo efandaka mpe mbala mingi ebakisaka nkisi ya virisi mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe oyo euti na bavirisi oyo ezali kobima sika. ']

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: Milende ezosalema mpo na kobimisa mangwele uta na proteine S mpo na kobimisa ba anticorps ya ntango molai mpe oyo ekoki koboma mpe/to kobatela bato na SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Milende esalemaki mpo na kosala bavaccin oyo euti na baproteine S mpo na kobimisa ba anticorps oyo ebundisaka maladi mpe ya makasi mpo na ntango molai mpe / to kobatela nzoto mpo na kobundisa SARS-CoV. ']

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: Basi bameki mangwele oyo ezosalisa bomoi na bambisi mpo na SARS.
translated: [' Bavaccin oyo eza na bomoi emekamaki na bamodele ya banyama mpo na SARS. ']

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: Kasi, bokasi ya solo ya mangwele wana na mibange mpe na bato oyo baza na maladi makasi mpe libateli na bango na bavirisi euti na banyama eyebani nanu te liboso bolukiluki ya solo ebanda na nzoto ya bato.
translated: [' Kasi, bokasi ya in vivo ya bavaccin oyo na mibange mpe na bamodele ya koboma bato mpe libateli na bango na maladi ya virisi ya banyama eyebani naino te liboso ete bolukiluki ya cliniki ebanda. ']

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: Eza mbala mosusu mpo SARS eisilaki mibu 17 ekoki mpe moto mosusu te abela maladi yango banda na ntango wana.
translated: [' Eza mbala mosusu mpo SARS ekufaki esili koleka mibu 17 mpe moto moko te ya sika azwaki yango banda wana. ']

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: Na bokeseni, bato mokomoko mpe mwa bituluku ya bato bazokoba kozwa virisi MERS na moyen orient mpe ezopanzana na bisika mosusu mpo eutaka na banyama.
translated: [' Na bokeseni, ba cas ya ba sporadique mpe bituluku ya MERS ezolanda kosalema na moyen orient mpe ezopanzana na bisika misusu mpo bompikiliki ya biloko euti na banyama na bisika ya suka. ']

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: Basi basali mayele ya kotobola mangwele ya MERS na kobomaka virisi wana, DNA ya baselile, biloko oyo ememaka bavirisi, na biloko ya mike mpenza, biloko oyo eza neti virisi mpe biteni ya proteine ya virisi mpe bameka mosusu na banyama.
translated: [' Mayele ya mangwele esalemi mpo na MERS na kosalelaka virisi oyo esalaka te, plasmids ya DNA, bavector ya virisi, biloko babengi nanoparticule, biloko oyo eza lokola virisi mpe ba sous-unité ya proteine recombinant mpe misusu batalelaki yango na bamodele ya banyama. ']

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: Kosala mangwele ebongi mpe ya makasi mpo na kobundisa SARS-CoV-2 mpo na bato oyo baza na mangwele na yango te eza ntina mingi mpe mosala makasi mpo maladi mabe oyo ekende mosika te.
translated: [' Kosala mangwele ya malamu mpe ya makasi mpo na kobundisa SARS-CoV-2 mpo na bato oyo bazali kobundisa yango te ezali mosala ya lombangu mpe ya ntina mingi mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe oyo ezali kosila te. ']

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: Kasi, eza mpasi na kolonga mikakatano mpo esengaka ntango mingi (pene ya basanza 18 ) mpo na kosala mangwele mpe mpo lolenge mingi ya CoVs.
translated: [' Kasi, eza mpasi na kolonga mokakatano mpo na ntango molai (na mwayene ya sanza 18) oyo esengeli mpo na kosala mangwele mpe ndenge CoVs ebongwanaka mingi. ']

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: Mpo eza maladi ya sika, COVID-19 ebandi kaka komonisa bokasi na yango na bato mwa mingi.
translated: [' Lokola maladi ya sika, COVID-19 euti kobanda komonisa mateya na yango nyonso ya cliniki na bankoto ya bato ya maladi. ']

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: Na bandakisa mingi, bato oyo babeli yango bakoki kobika malembemalembe kozanga kotikala na bilembo na yango.
translated: [' Mbala mingi, bato ya maladi bakoki kobika mokemoke kozanga sequelae. ']

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: Kasi, ndenge ezalaki mpo na SARS mpe MERS, COVID-19 ezobangisa bato oyo bazobela yango mpe ezoboma bato oyo bazobela yango makasi.
translated: [' Kasi, ndenge moko na SARS mpe MERS, COVID-19 eza mpe na boyokani na liwa ya mingi mpe ezoboma bato oyo bazobela yango makasi. ']

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: Yango wana, kosala modele mpo na koyeba maladi oyo eza ntina mingi mpo na minganga mpo batya na esika ya liboso mosala na bango, mingimingi na bisika oyo makoki eza mingi te.
translated: [' Yango wana, kotonga modele ya pronostique mpo na maladi wana eza ntina mingi mpo ba agence ya kolongono ya nzoto batya misala na bango na esika ya liboso, mingimingi na bisika oyo eza na makoki ya kozwa mbongo. ']

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: Na kotalela bolukiluki oyo basi basali na nzoto ya bato, makambo oyo ekoki kozala na bopusi to na boyokani na ndenge ya koyebela bato oyo baza na COVID-19 (Tablo ​(Tablo33):
translated: [' Na kotalela bolukiluki ya minganga oyo balobi kino sikoyo, makambo oyo ekoki kozala na bopusi to na boyokani na pronostique ya bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 (Tablo (Tablo33): ']

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: Mbula: Mbula eza likambo ya ntina mingi mpo na koyeba pronostique ya SARS, oyo eza mpe solo mpo na COVID-19.
translated: [' Mbula: Mbula ezalaki likambo ya ntina mingi mpo na pronostique ya SARS, oyo eza mpe solo mpo na COVID-19. ']

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: COVID-19 ebimaki mingimingi na bato ya mibu 30-65 mpo 47,7% ya bato oyo babelaka bazalaki na mibu koleka 50 na bolukiluki oyo basalaki na bato 8 866 ndenge balimboli yango likolo.
translated: [' COVID-19 esalemaki mingimingi na mibu 30-65 mpe 47,7% ya bato ya maladi bazalaki na mibu koleka 50 na bolukiluki oyo basalaki na bato 8 866 oyo bazalaki kobela ndenge balimboli likolo. ']

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Bato ya maladi oyo baza na mposa ya soins intensifs bamonisaki bilembo mosusu ya mabe mpe mpasi mpe bazalaki mikolo mingi koleka baoyo bamonisaki yango te (soki tokokanisi mibu 66 mpe 51), emonisi ete mbula eza moko ya makambo oyo ekosalisa koyeba soki moto oyo azobela COVID-19 akobika to te.
translated: [' Bato ya maladi oyo bazalaki na mposa ya soins intensifs bazalaki na makoki mingi ya kozala na comorbidité mpe mikakatano ya kala mpe bazalaki mikolo mingi koleka baoyo bazalaki na mbula ya kati (na mibu 66 kontre 51), balobaki ete mbula eza likambo ya pronostique mpo na resultat ya bato oyo bazobela COVID-19. ']

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: Sexe: SARS-CoV-2 ezozwa mibali mingi koleka basi (0,31/100 000 kontre 0,27/100 000), ndenge balimboli likolo.
translated: [' Kosangisa nzoto: SARS-CoV-2 ezwi mibali mingi koleka basi (0,31/100 000 kontre 0,27/100 000), ndenge balimboli likolo. ']

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: Bilembo mosusu mpe bampasi: Bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 oyo baza na mposa ya soins intensifs bakonyokwama mingi na mpasi ya mpema mpe motema ekobeta malamu te.
translated: [' Bakode mpe bampasi: Bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 oyo baza na mposa ya soins intensifs baza na likama mingi ya kobela maladi ya motema mpe ya arrhythmie. ']

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: Maladi ya motema ezalaki mpe ntina makasi ya liwa na bato oyo babelaki SARS.
translated: [' Makambo ya motema ezalaki mpe ntina ya liboso ya liwa na bato oyo babelaki SARS. ']

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Balobi ete SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kozala ndenge moko na ACE2 cholangiocytes, oyo ekoki kosala ete foie esala malamu te na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19.
translated: [' Elobami ete SARS-CoV-2 ekoki mpe kokangama na ba cholangiocyte ya ACE2-positone, oyo ekoki kosala ete foie esala malamu te na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19. ']

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: Ebongi koyeba ete mbula mpe maladi ya kala eza na boyokani makasi mpe ekoki kosangana.
translated: [' Esengeli koyeba ete mbula mpe maladi ya kala ezali na boyokani makasi mpe ekoki kobebisa moko na mosusu. ']

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: Mbeba oyo emonani na laboratoire: Nivo ya proteine C (CRP) na makila emonisaka bonene ya mpasi to mpasi eza na misisa mpe balobi ete eza moko ya makambo ezomema maladi oyo, oyo ezosalisa mpo na kozwa nkisi, mpe nsukansuka mpo na kobika.
translated: [' Bokundoli ya laboratoire ya mabe: Nivo ya proteine C (CRP) na makila emonisaka makasi ya kovimba to kozoka ya misisa mpe balobi ete eza eloko oyo ekoki kosalisa na maladi ya pronostique, kobundisa nkisi, mpe kobika ya nsuka. ']

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: Boyokani ya nivo ya bokasi ya CRP mpe pronostique ya COVID-19 elobelamaki mpe.
translated: [' Boyokani ya nivo ya CRP na makasi mpe pronostique ya COVID-19 epesami mpe. ']

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: Lisusu, lactate dehydrogenase ya likolo (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), mpe creatine kinase (CK) ekoki kosalisa na koyeba soki moto akobika to te.
translated: [' Lisusu, lactate dehydrogenase ya likolo (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), mpe creatine kinase (CK) ekoki mpe kosalisa na koyeba ndenge makambo ekosuka. ']

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: Ba-enzyme wana ebimaki mingi na binama mingi, mingimingi na motema mpe na foie, mpe ebimaka ntango tissue ebebaka.
translated: [' Ba enzyme oyo emonanaka mingi na binama mingi, mingimingi na motema mpe na foie, mpe ebimaka na ntango ya kobeba ya misisa. ']

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: Yango wana, mbala mingi yango nde esalaka ete motema to foie esala malamu te.
translated: [' Na yango, ezali bilembo ya bonkɔ́kɔ mpo na kosala ete motema to libale esalaka malamu te. ']

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: Bilembo minene ya maladi: Radiographie ya ntolo mpe bokoli ya moke ya bilembo ya maladi esengeli kotalelama elongo na makambo mosusu mpo na koyeba soki moto akobika na COVID-19 mpe soki ekotungisa ye mingi.
translated: [' Bilembo minene ya maladi: Radiographie ya ntolo mpe bokoli ya ntango ya bilembo ya maladi esengeli kotalelama elongo na makambo mosusu mpo na koyeba makambo oyo ekosuka mpe mikakatano ya COVID-19. ']

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Kosalela basteroide: Ndenge tolimboli yango na likolo, basteroide eza ba immunosuppresseur oyo tosalelaka mbala mingi lokola nkisi mpo na maladi euti na virisi mpo na kolembisa bokasi ya mpasi.
translated: [' Kosalela basteroide: Ndenge tolimboli yango likolo, basteroide eza immunosuppresseur oyo basalelaka mbala mingi lokola nkisi ya adjunctive mpona maladi oyo epanzanaka mpona kokitisa makasi ya kobeba ya inflammatoire. ']

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: Mpo basalelaki bacorticosteroide mingi na bato oyo babelaki SARS ya makasi, bato mingi oyo babikaki babelaki maladi ya kozanga baselile ya makila mpe bazalaki na bambeba na nzoto bomoi mobimba mpe bomoi ya malamu te.
translated: [' Lokola doze ya corticosteroide mingi esalelamaki mingi na bato oyo babelaki SARS ya makasi, bato mingi oyo babikaki babelaki maladi ya osteonecrose avasculaire oyo bazalaki bibɔsɔnɔ na bomoi na bango mpe bomoi ezalaki malamu te. ']

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Yango wana, soki esengeli, basengeli kosalela doze moke ya basteroide mpe mpo na ntango mokuse na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19.
translated: [' Yango wana, soki esengeli, basengeli kosalela doze ya basteroide na dose moke mpe mpo na ntango mokuse na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19. ']

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: Kotungisama na makanisi: Ndenge tolimboli likolo, ntango COVID-19 ebimaki, bato mingi babelaki maladi ya komitungisa na makanisi mpo balekisaki mikolo mingi na quarantaine mpe bazalaki motema likololikolo mpe bamonaki liwa ya bato ya libota na bango mpe ya bato mosusu oyo bazalaki kobela.
translated: [' Mitungisi ya makanisi: Ndenge tolimboli likolo, na ntango ya kobima ya COVID-19 bato mingi ya maladi banyokwamaki na mitungisi ya kokamwa ndenge mbala mingi bayikaki mpiko na boumeli ya ntango molai ya quarantaine mpe kozanga koyeba mpenza mpe bamonaki liwa ya bato ya pene ya libota na bango mpe baninga na bango ya maladi. ']

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: Eza ntina mingi na kopesa batoli ya minganga mpe lisalisi ya ntango molai mpo na kosunga bato oyo ya maladi mpo babika na mitungisi wana mpe bazongela bomoi na bango ndenge bamesana.
translated: [' Eza ntina mingi kopesa toli na makambo ya pisikoloji mpe lisalisi ya ntango molai mpo na kosalisa bato wana ya maladi na kobika na mitungisi mpe kozonga na bomoi ya malamu. ']

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: Na kotalela bolukiluki oyo basi basali, ezomonana ete COVID-19 eza na makambo mosusu oyo ekeseni na SARS.
translated: [' Na kotalela bolukiluki ya motango ya bato kino sikoyo, emonani ete COVID-19 eza na makambo ekeseni ya epidemiologie oyo euti na SARS. ']

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: Longola ndenge ezokoma mingi na nzela ya kopema ya nse, SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kobotama na nzela ya kopema ya likolo mpe kobimisa bilembo ya pete to nkutu elembo moko te ntango maladi ebandi sika, ndenge moko na ba CoVs mosusu oyo epesaka malili.
translated: [' Longola replicating na nzela ya kopema ya nse, SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kobotama malamu na nzela ya kopema ya likolo mpe ebimisaka bilembo ya pete to ata moke te na ebandeli ya maladi, ndenge moko na ba CoVs mosusu oyo epesaka malili ya bato mingi. ']

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: Yango wana, bato oyo baza na yango na ebandeli to na eleko oyo esalaka liboso ya kobima bakoki kobimisa bavirisi mingi na mosala ya mokolo na mokolo, ebongo esala ete ezala mpasi na kobundisa maladi mabe oyo.
translated: [' Yango wana, bato ya maladi oyo baza na maladi na eleko ya ebandeli to na eleko ya incubation bakoki kobimisa virisi mingi na ntango ya misala ya mokolo na mokolo, mpe ezopesa mpasi mingi mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe oyo. ']

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: Kasi, emonani ete SARS-CoV ezopesama ntango moto azobela mpenza makasi, kasi kopesama mingi esalemaki te na ebandeli.
translated: [' Kasi, kopesama ya SARS-CoV emonanaki ete esalemaka ntango bato ya maladi bazali kobela makasi, kasi kopesama mingi esalemaki te na ebandeli ya ebandeli. ']

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Yango wana, kobima ya sikoyo ya COVID-19 eza makasi mingi mpe mpasi mingi na kobundisa koleka oyo ya SARS.
translated: [' Yango wana, kobima ya sikoyo ya COVID-19 eza makasi mingi mpe eza mpasi mingi na kobundisa yango koleka kobima ya SARS. ']

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Milende makasi ezosalema na Chine ndakisa kopekisa bato batambola na Wuhan mpe na bingumba ya zingazinga mpe kokoba kotya mboka mobimba na quarantaine na elikya ya kokanga SARS-CoV-2 nzela mpo ezwa te bato mosusu.
translated: [' Milende makasi ezali kosalema sikoyo na Chine, ata mpe konfinema ya Wuhan mpe ya bingumba ya zingazinga mpe kokoba konfinema ya pene ya bato nyonso na elikya ya kokanga SARS-CoV-2 nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: Ata milende wana ya makasi ebebisi mpenza makambo ya mbongo mpe makambo mosusu ya mboka, motango ya bato ya maladi ya sika ezokita, ezomonisa ete maladi mabe ezolemba.
translated: [' Atako makambo yango ezalaki kobebisa mpenza nkita mpe makambo mosusu ya mboka, motango ya bato ya sika ya maladi ezali kokita, yango emonisi ete maladi mabe ezali kokita. ']

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: Estimation ya malamu mpenza eza ete kobima wana ekosuka na sanza ya misato mpe eleko ya kolembisa yango ekozwa basanza 3-4.
translated: [' Likanisi ya malamu koleka ezali ete maladi ekosuka na sanza ya misato mpe eteni ya kokita ekozala na basanza 3-4. ']

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: Atako bongo, bato mosusu ya mayele bandimi likambo wana te.
translated: [' Kasi, bato mosusu ya mayele mosusu bazali na elikya wana te. ']

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter, mpe baninga na ye, bakanisi ete COVID-19, oyo bamoni ete ezozwa bato mingi koleka SARS, ekosuka te na 2020.
translated: [' Paul Hunter, mpe baninga na ye, balobaki ete COVID-19, oyo emonani ete ezozwa bato mingi koleka SARS, ekosuka te na 2020. ']

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longini, na baninga na ye, basalaki modele moko mpo na koyeba resultat ya maladi mabe mpe balobi ete SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kozwa bato mibale na kati ya bato misato na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Ira Longini, na baninga na ye, basalaki modele moko mpo na koyeba ndenge maladi mabe ekosuka mpe balobaki ete SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kozwa bato mibale na kati ya bato misato na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: Etuluku moko ya Canada elobi ete SARS-CoV-2 bamonaki ndambo ya turbinate mpe nsoyi ya mongongo ya bato ya maladi oyo babikaki mpe babimaki na lopitalo mposo 2 liboso; yango emonisi ete virisi oyo ya sika ekoki kokoma maladi oyo ebimaka mbala na mbala neti grippe.
translated: [' Etuluku moko ya Canada elobaki ete SARS-CoV-2 emonanaki na kati ya katikati mpe na mongongo ya bato ya maladi oyo babikaki mpe babimaki na lopitalo mposo 2 liboso, oyo emonisi ete virisi ya sika oyo bamoni ekoki kokoma likambo ya mabe oyo ekokani na grippe. ']

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: Kasi, bilembo ya malamu emonanaki na Chine ndenge motango ya bato ya maladi ya sika ezokita, yango emonisi ete mayele ya sikoyo ezobota mbuma.
translated: [' Kasi, bilembo ya malamu esalemaki na Chine na kotalela kokita ya motango ya bato ya sika oyo baza na maladi, yango emonisi mbala mosusu mayele ya sikoyo ezalaki kosala. ']

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: Na ebandeli balobaki ete Ebola ekoboma bato pene ya milio moko mpe katikati ya milio bakokufa.
translated: [' Na ebandeli, balobaki ete Ebola ekosala ete bato milio moko bazwa yango mpe ndambo ya milio moko bakufaki. ']

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: Kasi, na nzela ya mibeko ya makasi ya quarantaine mpe kotya bato na isolement, nsukansuka balonga maladi wana.
translated: [' Kasi, na nzela ya konfinema ya makasi mpe komitangola na bato mosusu, nsukansuka bakangi maladi yango. ']

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: Ekoki kosalema mpe, ndenge esalemaki na SARS-CoV, ete makasi ya SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kolemba mpe nsukansuka kosila to kokoma virisi ya makasi te mpo na bato.
translated: [' Ekoki kosalema, ndenge moko na SARS-CoV, ete SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kokoma makasi te na kati ya bato mpe nsukansuka kokufa to kokóma virisi oyo epesaka maladi mingi te esika moko na bato. ']

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: Bokokanisi na kati ya maladi ya COVID-19 na oyo ya SARS mpe MERS ezali na nse (Mot. ​(Mot.55).
translated: [' Bokokanisi ya maladi mabe ya COVID-19 na oyo ya SARS mpe MERS epesami na nse (Moteyi. (Etape 55) ']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ezopesama makasi na nzela ya kosukosu to etye, mpe mbala mosusu na nzela ya biloko oyo esi ezwi virisi.
translated: [' SARS-CoV-2 epanzanaka mingi na nzela ya kokosola to kosala itche, mpe mbala mosusu mpe soki ekutani mbala moko na biloko oyo ezali na mikrobe na virisi. ']

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: Bamonaki mpe virisi na nyei, yango emonisi ete likoki ezali ete eutaki na nyei mpe ekotaki na monoko.
translated: [' Bamonaki mpe virisi yango na nyei, oyo ezali kobimisa likoki ya sika ya kopesa nyei na monoko. ']

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: Bolukiluki basala kala te na bato 138 emonisi ete 41% ya bato ya maladi bazwaki yango te na maladi euti na lopitalo, na ndakisa bato 17 ya maladi oyo bazalaki na maladi mosusu mpe minganga to ba infirmier 40.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko ya sika na bato 138 oyo bazalaki na maladi emonisi ete mbala mosusu 41% ya bato oyo babelaki bazalaki na maladi ya nosocomial oyo ezalaki na maladi wana, mpe bato 17 oyo bazalaki na maladi mosusu ya liboso mpe bato 40 oyo basalisaka bato ya maladi. ']

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: Yango wana, tosengeli kosalela mayele ya makasi mpo na kobatela bato, mingimingi minganga, bato oyo basalisaka bato, bato ya libota, baninga, mpe nkutu bato ya pembeni oyo bakutanaki na bato oyo baza na maladi wana.
translated: [' Yango wana, esengeli kokeba mingi mpo na kobatela bato, mingimingi bato oyo basalisaka bato ya maladi, bato oyo basalisaka bato, bato ya libota, baninga ya mosala, ata mpe bato oyo bazali wana mpo na kokutana na bato ya maladi to bato oyo baza na maladi. ']

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: Eloko ya liboso ya kobundisa oyo ekoki kosalisa na kokitsa likama ya kozwa maladi eza kolata eloko ya kozipa zolo mpe monoko; kosalela masque ya minganga mpe masque ya kopemela N95 (nimero# 1860s) ezosalisa mpo na kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te.
translated: [' Molongo ya liboso ya libateli oyo ekoki kosalelama mpo na kokitisa likama ya kozwa maladi ezali na nzela ya kolata bamask ya elongi; Kosalela bamask ya minganga mpe bamask ya kopema N95 (serie # 1860s) esalisaka na kolandela kopalangana ya virisi. ']

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: Masque ya minganga ekangaka nzela mpo mai oyo euti na moto oyo aza na maladi wana elongwa te na nzoto na ye mpo ekende na mopepe to ekangama na biloko, esika ekoki kopesama na bato mosusu.
translated: [' Bamask ya elongi ya minganga epekisaka matanga ya mai oyo euti na moto oyo akoki kozala na maladi na kotambola na mopepe to ekangama na bisika oyo biloko ezali, esika bakokaki kopesa yango na bato mosusu. ']

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Kasi, kaka ba masque N95 (nimero # 1860s) nde ekoki kobatela na virisi ata ya moke ya 10 kino 80 nm, mpe 5% mpamba ya virisi ekoki kokota mobimba; SARS-CoV-2 eza ndenge moko na SARS-CoV na monene mpe nyonso mibale eza pene ya 85 nm.
translated: [' Kasi, kaka bamasque N95 (serie # 1860s) nde ekoki kobatela na koboma ba virions ya mike na 10 kino 80 nm, mpe kaka 5% ya ba virions nde ekoki kokota mpenza; SARS-CoV-2 ekokani na monene ya SARS-CoV mpe nyonso mibale ezali pene ya 85 nm. ']

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Mpo biteni na yango ekoki kokota soki tosangisa ba masque ya minganga mitano elongo, minganga oyo bazokutana na bato ya maladi basengeli kolata ba masque N95 (nimero# 1860s) kasi ba masque ya minganga te.
translated: [' Mpo biloko mikemike ekoki kokota ata na bamask mitano ya minganga oyo esangisami esika moko, minganga oyo baza na boyokani ya libela na bato ya maladi basengeli kolata bamask N95 (serie # 1860s) kasi bamask ya minganga te. ']

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Longola ba masque, minganga basengeli kolata bagan ya malamu mpo bazala te na mabaku mingi ya kosimba bavirisi.
translated: [' Longola bamask, minganga basengeli kolata bilamba ya isolement oyo ebongi mpo na kokitisa lisusu bokutani na bavirisi. ']

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Bavirisi ekoki kokotela mpe moto na miso.
translated: [' Bavirisi mpe ekoki kopesa moto moko maladi na nzela ya miso. ']

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya yambo 2020, monganga moko azwaki maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 ata soki alataki masque N95; mbala mosusu virisi ekotaki na nzoto na ye na nzela miso na ye oyo ezalaki kosala mpasi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya yambo 2020, monganga moko azalaki na SARS-CoV-2 ata alataki masque N95; Mbala mosusu virisi yango ekɔtaki na nzoto na ye na nzela ya miso na ye ya kovimbisa nzoto. ']

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: Yango wana, minganga basengeli kolata biloko mosusu ya mpembe ya kozipa miso to maneti ntango bazosalisa bato ya maladi.
translated: [' Yango wana, bato oyo basalisaka kolongono ya nzoto basengeli mpe kolata biloko ya kobatela elongi to maneti ya kobatela elongi oyo emonanaka polele ntango bazali kosala elongo na bato ya maladi. ']

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: Mpo na bato nyonso oyo baza na bisika oyo eza na virisi to ekoki kozala na yango, eza ntina mingi ete bango nyonso basokola maboko na savon oyo ebomaka mikrobe mbala mingi koleka ndenge basalaka, batikala na ndako na komitya na quarantaine na ndenge na bango moko mpe na kokutana na bato oyo mbala mosusu baza na maladi wana.
translated: [' Mpo na bato nyonso na bisika oyo maladi ezali to oyo ekoki kozala na maladi, balobi mingi ete moto nyonso asokolaka maboko na sabuni ya koboma mikrobe mbala mingi koleka ndenge ezalaka, meka kotikala na ndako mpo na komitia na quarantaine mpe kokutana mingi te na bato oyo bakoki kozala na maladi. ']

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: Bametre mibale eza distance elongobani oyo bato basengeli kozala mosika na moto ya maladi.
translated: [' Makolo misato etalelamaka lokola ntaka ebongi mpona bato bazala mosika na moto ya maladi. ']

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Kosala makambo oyo eza lolenge ya malamu ya kokitisa likama ya kozwa maladi mpe kokanga virisi nzela mpo epanzana te.
translated: [' Misala oyo ezali bametode ya malamu mpona kokitisa likama ya kozwa maladi mpe kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: Ata soki SARS-CoV-2 ebimaki neti virisi ya sika na mokili ya bato, ekokani mingi na SARS-CoV ndenge balobaki yango na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya yambo 2020, esengelaki ekebisa bato mingi na Chine mpo bayebi malamu ndenge SARS ebimaki na 2003.
translated: [' Ata soki SARS-CoV-2 eyaki lokola virisi ya sika mpo na mokili ya bato, ndenge ezalaki kokumisa SARS-CoV ndenge balobaki yango na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya liboso 2020 esengelaki ekelela Chine na kotalela makanisi na ye ya mozindo na ndenge SARS ebimaki na 2003. ']

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
