targetString: Kasi, kino na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya yambo 2020 diretere ya centre ya kobundisa maladi ya Wuhan akitisaki bato motema ndenge alobaki ete virisi oyo ya sika ezopesama mpenza te na bato mpe ezobotama mingi te na bato mpe ete eza mpasi na kokanga yango mpe kosukisa yango.
translated: [' Kasi, tii na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya liboso 2020 diretere ya centre ya kobundisa maladi ya Wuhan abɔndisaki bana-mboka na koloba ete virisi ya sika eza na maladi moke mpe ezobotana mingi te banda na bato kino na bato mpe eza mokakatano te mpo na kokanga maladi nzela mpe kokanga yango nzela. ']

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: Nsango wana etindaki bato bakipe na bango te, mingimingi ntango mboka mobimba ezalaki kobongisa fete ya printemps, mpe babungisaki ntango wana ya ntina mingi mpo na kokanga maladi wana nzela na Wuhan mpo epanzana te.
translated: [' Nsango oyo na ndenge ya kokamwa ekitisaki alarme ya bato, mingimingi ntango mboka mobimba ezalaki komibongisa mpo na feti ya printemps, mpe ntango ya mpasi ezalaki te mpo na kokanga maladi nzela na ndenge ezalaki moke na Wuhan. ']

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: Lisanga ya kobundisa maladi na Chine ekoki kozwa liteya wana ya mabe mpe kosala mbongwana ebongi na mikolo ezoya.
translated: [' Ba agence ya kobundisa maladi na Chine ekoki kozwa liteya makasi wana mpe kosala mbongwana ya makasi na mikolo ezoya. ']

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: Na ndakisa, masanga oyo esengeli (1) kotya likebi mingi ntango bazoloba liboso ya bato mpo bato ya mboka bandimelaka bango mpe ekoki kobongola bizaleli mpe bikateli na bango; (2) kokeba mpe kokanga maboko te na bansango ezouta na balopitalo na esika ya kozela barapore ezouta na minganga to bakonzi; (3) kozwa bikateli ya makasi mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe na ebandeli na yango na esika ya koluka kokotisa bato motema; mpe (4) kobimisa mayele ya ntina mpe ya malamu mpo na kosalisa bato bayeba malamu makambo etali maladi mabe mpe baekzame mpe kobongisa makambo ya kosala soki mpasi ya ndenge wana ebimi.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, bibongiseli wana esengeli (1) kokeba mingi ntango bazali kosala liyebisi ya bato nyonso ndenge liloba nyonso ezali na ntina mpo na bana-mboka mpe ekoki kobongola bizaleli mpe bikateli na bango; (2) koyeba makambo mingi mpe kozongela bansango ya kokamwa oyo euti na ba cliniques na esika ya kozela balapolo ya malamu ya minganga to ya bakonzi; (3) mibeko makasi mpo na kokanga maladi mabe oyo ekoki kobima na ebandeli na yango na esika ya komeka kobɔndisa bato; mpe (4) mbala mingi mpo na kobimisa ba drill ya mikano mpe ya malamu mpona kobakisa boyebi ya bato na oyo etali maladi mabe mpe komeka mpe kobongisa systeme ya kobundisa bato mbala na mbala. ']

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: Kobima ya COVID-19 oyo na virisi SARS-CoV-2 ya sika ebandaki na nsuka ya sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019.
translated: [' Kobima ya COVID-19 oyo euti na virisi ya sika SARS-CoV-2 ebandaki na nsuka ya sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019. ']

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: Na eleko oyo na nse ya basanza mibale, epanzanaki na Chine mobimba mpe na pene ya mikili 50 mosusu na mokili mobimba ntango tozokoma makambo oyo.
translated: [' Na nse ya basanza mibale, epanzani na Chine mobimba mpe pene ya mikili 50 mosusu na mokili mobimba na ntango bakomaki makambo oyo. ']

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: Mpo virisi yango ekokani mingi na SARS-CoV mpe billembo na yango eza na bokokani na kati ya COVID-19 mpe SARS, kobima ya COVID-19 esali neti eza nde SARS ezongi lisusu.
translated: [' Mpo virisi yango ekokani mingi na SARS-CoV mpe bilembo na yango eza mpe ndenge moko na kati ya COVID-19 mpe SARS, kobima ya COVID-19 ebimisi likanisi ya SARS ezongaka lisusu. ']

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: Kasi, eza mpe na bokeseni ya monene na kati ya COVID-19 mpe SARS, oyo eza ntina mpo na kokanga maladi oyo nzela mpe kobikisa bato oyo bazobela yango.
translated: [' Kasi, eza na mwa bokeseni ya kokamwa na kati ya COVID-19 mpe SARS, oyo eza ntina mingi mpo na kokanga maladi mabe nzela epanzana te mpe kosalisa bato oyo bazobela yango. ']

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: COVID-19 ezozwa mingi mibange koleka bilenge mpe mibali koleka basi, mpe eza mpasi mingi mpe ezoboma mingi mibange koleka bilenge.
translated: [' COVID-19 ezozwa mibange mingi koleka bilenge mpe mibali mingi koleka basi, mpe makasi mpe liwa eza mpe mingi na mibange mokomoko kasi na bilenge. ']

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS ezoboma bato mingi koleka COVID-19 (10,91% kontre 1,44%).
translated: [' SARS eza na bato mingi oyo bakufaki koleka COVID-19 (10,91% kontre 1,44%). ']

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: Bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 bapesaki virisi nkutu ata ntango bazalaki na bilembo ya maladi te kasi bato oyo babelaki SARS bapesaka basusu virisi kaka soki bazobela makasi, yango wana eza mpasi mingi na kokanga COVID-19 nzela mpo epanzana te koleka SARS.
translated: [' Bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 bapesaka virisi ata ntango bazali na bilembo te kasi bato oyo bazobela SARS basalaka yango mbala mingi soki bazali kobela makasi, yango nde esalaka ete mpasi mingi mpo na kokanga COVID-19 nzela epanzana te koleka SARS. ']

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: Yango ezolimbola mwa moke mpo na nini SARS-CoV-2 ezopanzana mingi mpe bisika mingi koleka SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Yango ezali kolimbola mwa moke mpo na nini SARS-CoV-2 epanzanaki noki mpe na monene koleka SARS-CoV. ']

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Soki tosali ekzame ya normal ya RNA ya SARS-CoV-2, mbala mosusu ekozala te na bato mosusu oyo bazobela COVID-19.
translated: [' Ekzame ya RNA ya ordinaire mpo na SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kozala mabe na bato mosusu oyo bazobela COVID-19. ']

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: Kasi, bato oyo babiki bakoki lisusu kozwa virisi wana.
translated: [' Na ndambo mosusu, bato ya maladi oyo babiki bakoki kozala na virisi yango lisusu. ']

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: Makambo oyo ezomatisa mpenza likama ya kopanza virisi bisika mingi.
translated: [' Makambo oyo ezali kobakisa mpenza likama ya kopalangana ya virisi. ']

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: Mpo bolukiluki ya COVID-19 ezokende liboso noki mpenza, eza na makambo mingi ya ntina oyo esengeli kobongisa, na ndakisa:
translated: [' Na kotalela bokoli ya noki boye na bolukiluki ya COVID-19, makambo mingi ya ntina ezali naino, ndenge elandi: ']

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 eutaki na wapi?
translated: [' SARS-CoV-2 eutaki wapi? ']

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
targetString: Ata soki makambo ya ndenge moko 96% emonani na kati ya SARS-CoV-2 mpe bavirisi mibale SARS CoVs oyo euti na ngembo, tokoki nanu te koloba ete SARS-CoV-2 eutaki na bangembo.
translated: [' Ata soki 96% ya homolog ya genetiki emonanaki na kati ya SARS-CoV-2 mpe CoVs mibale oyo ekokani na SARS, tokoki koloba kaka te ete SARS-CoV-2 euti na bangembo. ']

sourceString: What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans?
targetString: Virisi elekaki na banyama nini ntango elongwaki na esika efandaka, toloba eza bangembo, kino na bato?
translated: [' Nyama nini ezalaki lolenge ya katikati ya kopesa virisi longwa na esika ya liboso, toloba bangembo, kino na bato? ']

sourceString: Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time.
targetString: Kozanga koyeba biyano na motuna ya #1 mpe 2, tokoki te kosukisa yango mpo epanzana te, mpe ekoki kobima lisusu na ntango nyonso.
translated: [' Kozanga koyeba biyano na #1 mpe 2, tokoki te kokata maladi yango na ndenge ya malamu, mpe maladi ekoki kozonga lisusu na ntango nyonso. ']

sourceString: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes?
targetString: Atako kobongisa bamolekile mpe baekzame ya biochimie emonisaki ete SARS-CoV-2 eza na boyokani na ACE2, toyebi te na bosolo ndenge virisi ekotaka na baselile ya likolo ya kopema mpe esalaka ete mbongwana esalema?
translated: [' Ata soki kosala modele ya bamolekile mpe baekzame ya biochimie emonisi ete SARS-CoV-2 eza na boyokani na ACE2, ndenge nini mpenza virisi ekotaka mpenza na baselile ya nzela ya kopema mpe ebimisaka mbongwana ya pathologie na nsima? ']

sourceString: Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs?
targetString: Virisi eza mpe na boyokani na ACE2- na baselile ya binama mosusu?
translated: [' Virisi ekangaka mpe baselile ya ACE2-expressing na binama mosusu? ']

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: Kozanga koyeba biyano ya polele na mituna wana, tokoki te koyeba nkisi ya makasi mpe ebongi mpo na yango.
translated: [' Kozanga biyano ya polele na mituna oyo, tokoki te kozwa mayele ya noki mpe ya sikisiki mpe kozwa nkisi ya malamu. ']

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: Maladi oyo ekosala mbula boni?
translated: [' Maladi yango ekoumela ntango boni? ']

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: Ndenge nini virisi ekolaka na makila na nzoto ya bato?
translated: [' Ndenge nini virisi ezali kobongwana na ba gene na ntango ezopanzana na kati ya bato? ']

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: Ekokoma maladi mabe na mokili mobimba, ekosuka libela neti SARS to ekobimaka mbala na mbala neti grippe?
translated: [' Ekokoma maladi mabe na mokili mobimba, ekokufa ndenge SARS to ezongaka mbala na mbala lokola grippe? ']

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: Eza ntina mingi kasi ekoki kozwa ntango mingi mpo na kozwa biyano na mituna oyo eza likolo mpe na mituna mingi mosusu.
translated: [' Ezali na ntina mingi kasi ekoki kozwa mwa ntango mpo na koluka biyano na mituna oyo tolobeli awa na likoló mpe na mituna mosusu mingi. ']

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: Kasi, ata soki ekosenga tobungisa nini, eloko tosengeli kosala eza kaka kokanga maladi mabe nzela noki mpe bomoi na biso ezonga ndenge ezalaki.
translated: [' Kasi, na mbongo nyonso oyo yango ekoki kosɛnga, tozali na likambo mosusu ya kosala te longola kaka kosukisa maladi mabe noki mpe kozongisa bomoi na biso na ndenge ezalaki liboso. ']

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: Coronavirisi ya bato eutaki na banyama
translated: [' Esika ba coronavirusi ya bato eutaka na ba coronavirusi ya bato ']

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: Ndenge ebongwanaka mpe emesanaka esala ete bacoronavirisi (CoVs) ekola mpe biloko oyo ebombaka yango, ata mpe bato, banda mibu mingi.
translated: [' Kobongwana mpe komesana na yango esalaki ete bacoronavirisi (CoVs) ekola elongo mpe bisika oyo efandaka, ata mpe bato, banda bankóto ya bambula. ']

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: Liboso ya 2003, eyebanaki ete mibale ya ba CoVs (HCoVs) ya bato epesaka maladi ya makasi te, na ndakisa malili.
translated: [' Liboso ya 2003, eyebanaki ete mibale ya ba CoVs (HCoVs) ya bato epesaka maladi ya makasi te, na ndakisa malili. ']

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: Kobima ya maladi makasi ya mpema (SARS) mpe maladi ya mpema ya moyen orient (MERS) emonisi ndenge maladi ya HCoV ekoki konyokola bato mpe koboma bango.
translated: [' Kobima ya maladi makasi ya mpema (SARS) mpe maladi ya mpema ya moyen orient (MERS) ebalusaki mbongo yango mpo na komonisa ndenge maladi ya HCoV ekoki kobebisa mpe bomoi na bango. ']

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kobima ya SARS-CoV-2 na katikati ya Chine na nsuka ya 2019 etye CoVs na esika ya liboso mpe ekamwisi biso na ndenge ezopanzana noki kasi ekiti ndenge ezobelisa bato koleka ndeko na yango SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Kobima ya SARS-CoV-2 na kati-kati ya Chine na nsuka ya 2019 etindi lisusu CoVs na esika ya liboso mpe ekamwisi biso na ndenge ezopanzana mingi kasi ekiti maladi soki tokokanisi yango na ndeko na yango SARS-CoV. ']

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: Maladi HCoV eutaka na banyama mpe koyeba banyama oyo ebimisaki HCoVs ekosalisa biso mpe.
translated: [' Maladi ya HCoV ezalaka banyama mpe koyeba soki HCoVs euta na banyama ekosunga biso malamu. ']

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: Ba HCoVs mingi eutaki na bangembo kasi ebimisaka maladi te.
translated: [' Ba HCoVs mingi eutaki na bangembo esika oyo epesaka maladi te. ']

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: Biloko ya katikati oyo ememaka ba HCoVs misusu eyabani mpe.
translated: [' Esika ya mibale oyo ebombaka ba HCoVs mosusu eyebani mpe. ']

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: Koyeba banyama oyo ememaka yango eza na bopusi mingi na kobundisa maladi oyo bato bazali kobela.
translated: [' Koyeba banyama oyo efandaka ezali na bopusi mbala moko na ndenge ya komibatela na maladi ya bato. ']

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: Koluka koyeba boyokani na kati ya biloko oyo ememaka CoV na banyama ekoki mpe kosalisa mingi na koyeba maladi ya CoV kati na bato.
translated: [' Koluka koyeba boyokani oyo CoV-eutaka na banyama ekoki mpe kozwa bososoli ya ntina na maladi ya CoV oyo epesaka bato. ']

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Na lisolo oyo, tokolobela na mokuse makambo toyebi mpo na ba HCoVs nsambo, mpe tokotya likebi na lisolo ya bokundoli na yango mpe ndenge eutaka na banyama mpe biloko oyo esalisaka na kopanza yango.
translated: [' Na botaleli oyo, tozolakisa na mokuse boyebi oyo esi esi esalama mpo na ba HCoVs nsambo, mpe totye likebi mingi na lisolo ya bokundoli na yango mpe ndenge eutaka na banyama mpe ndenge eutaka na ekelamu moko mpe ndenge ezalaki kouta na ekelamu mosusu. ']

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: Likambo ya ntina eza ete tokokanisaka mpe tokesenisaka ba HCoVs mingi na kotalela ndenge virisi ekolaka mpe ndenge genoma esanganaka.
translated: [' Likambo ya ntina, tokokanisaka mpe tokesenisaka ba HCoVs ekeseni na likanisi ya ndenge virisi ekolaka mpe ndenge genome esanganaka. ']

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: Maladi ya CoV ya sikoyo ya 2019 (COVID-19) elobelami na lisolo oyo.
translated: [' Maladi mabe ya sikoyo ya CoV 2019 (COVID-19) elobelami na likambo oyo. ']

sourceString: In addition, the requirements for successful host switches and the implications of virus evolution on disease severity are also highlighted.
targetString: Lisusu, ezolobela mpe masengami mpo na kolonga kobongola biloko ememaka maladi mpe ekweli na yango na ndenge virisi ekolaka mpe ekomaka makasi.
translated: [' Lisusu, masengami mpo na ba switch ya malamu ya bisika oyo efandaka mpe makambo oyo ekoki kobima na ndenge virisi ekolaka na bokasi ya maladi elobelami mpe mingi. ']

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: Bacoronavirisi (CoVs) eza na libota ya Coronaviridae, oyo eza na etuluku moko ya bavirisi ya makasi ya RNA.
translated: [' Ba coronavirusi (CoVs) eza na libota ya Coronaviridae, oyo eza na etuluku moko ya ba virusi envelope, ya sense-sense, moko-ekangani moko. ']

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: Bavirisi oyo ezalaka na ba genome ya minene ya 26 kino 32 kilobases na kati ya bavirisi RNA, babengaki yango “CoVs” mpo ezalaki neti na motole na microscope ya electronique.
translated: [' Bavirisi oyo ezali konyokola genome ya monene koleka ya bakilobase 26 kino 32 na kati ya bavirisi RNA, babengaki yango "CoVs" mpo morphologie na yango ekokani na motole na microscope electronique. ']

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: Na nzoto na yango, CoVs ezalaka te na ba genome ekatana oyo esalema ndenge moko.
translated: [' Na kotalela makambo, CoVs eza na ba genome oyo ekabwani te oyo eza na lisanga moko ya ndenge moko. ']

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: Pene ya ba genome mibale na kati ya misato ezali na etandi ya polele mibale (ORF1a mpe ORF1b), oyo ebongolami kati ya pp1 mpe pp1ab ekelamu na baproteine.
translated: [' Pene ya mibale na kati ya misato ya genome eza na ba cadre mibale ya minene ya kotanga oyo eza polele (ORF1a mpe ORF1b), oyo ebongolamaka na polyproteine pp1a mpe pp1ab replicase. ']

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: Baproteine mingi esalelamaka lisusu mpo na kobimisa baproteine 16 ezanga nzoto, ebengami nsp1~16.
translated: [' Ba polyproteine ebongisami lisusu mingi mpo na kobimisa baproteine 16 oyo eza te na structural, oyo baponaki nsp1~16. ']

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: Eteni etikali ya genome eza na ORFs mpo na nzoto ya baproteine, ata mpe nsonge (S), loposo (E), membrane (M) mpe nucleoproteine (N).
translated: [' Eteni etikali ya genome eza na ORFs mpo na baproteine ya structurale, ata mpe nsonge (S), anvelopi (E), membrane (M) mpe nucleoproteine (N). ']

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: Mwa baproteine ya sikisiki eza mpe na bakode na milongo ekeseni ya CoVs.
translated: [' Baproteine mingi ya lineage-specifiki ya accessoire ezali mpe kodede na milongo ekeseni ya CoVs. ']

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: Na kotalela bokeseni na molongo ya proteine, batyaka ba CoVs na milongo minei ya minene (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV mpe delta-CoV), mpe beta-CoV ezalaka na ba HCoVs mingi mpe ekabwanaka na milongo minei (A, B, C mpe D).
translated: [' Na kotalela bokeseni na milongo ya proteine, batyaka CoVs na molongo ya ba gene minei (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV mpe delta-CoV), na kati na yango genera ya beta-CoV ezalaka na HCoVs mingi mpe ekabwanaka na milongo minei (A, B, C mpe D). ']

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: Bilembeteli ya bagene emonisi ete bangembo mpe bampuku bazali eutelo ya gene ya ebandeli ya bamikrobe mingi ya alpha-CoVs mpe beta-CoVs, kasi bandeke bazali nde esika monene oyo gamma-CoVs mpe delta-CoVs eutaka.
translated: [' Bilembeteli ya phylogenetique emonisi ete bangembo mpe ba rodents ezalaka esika oyo ba gene eutaka na ba alpha-CoVs mingi mpe beta-CoVs, kasi bandeke bazali esika ya liboso oyo gamma-CoVs mpe delta-CoVs ebombaka. ']

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: Na bankoto ya bambula, CoVs ekutanaka mbala mingi na bandelo ya midele mpe misusu ekoma bavirisi ya makasi ya bato.
translated: [' Na bankoto ya bambula, CoVs ekutanaka ntango nyonso na bipekiseli ya bikelamu ya bomoi mpe misusu ebimaki lokola biloko oyo epesaka bato maladi mingi. ']

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: Kino lelo, bavirisi CoVs (HCoVs) nsambo ya bato eyebani.
translated: [' Kino lelo, bavirisi CoVs (HCoVs) nsambo ya bato eyebani. ']

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: Na kati na yango HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-NL63 bazali alpha-CoVs.
translated: [' Na kati na yango, HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-NL63 ezali alpha-CoVs. ']

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Mitano oyo etikali beta-CoVs eza na HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, maladi makasi ya mpema ya coronavirisi (SARS-CoV), maladi ya mpema ya coronavirisi ya moyen orient (MERS-CoV) mpe SARS-CoV-2.
translated: [' Mitano mosusu beta-CoVs ezali HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, maladi makasi ya mpema ya coronavirisi (SARS-CoV), maladi ya mpema ya coronavirisi ya moyen orient (MERS-CoV) mpe SARS-CoV-2. ']

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: Mbala mingi HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 mpe HCoV-NL63 bazali na bilembo ya pete, neti malili mpe/to pulupulu.
translated: [' Mbala mingi HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 mpe HCoV-NL63 mbala mingi epesaka bilembo ya pete, ndenge malili mpe/to pulupulu ezalaka. ']

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: Na bokeseni, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV-2 oyo ebimi sika ezali makasi mingi, ezokanga makasi nzela ya kopema ya nse na bato mingi ya maladi oyo bazali na chance mingi ya kobela maladi ya mpema euti na basusi (ARDS) mpe bampasi mosusu na poumon.
translated: [' Na bokeseni, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV-2 oyo bamoni sika epesaka maladi mingi, epesaka maladi makasi ya nzela ya kopema ya nse na bato ya mwa mingi koleka mpe baza na libaku mingi ya kobela maladi ya songe ya mpema (ARDS) mpe ba manifestation extrapulmonaire. ']

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: Elembo ya liboso ya HCoV-229E, B814, bazwaki yango na biloko ebimaka na zolo ya bato ya maladi oyo bazalaki na malili na katikati ya mibu 1960.
translated: [' Elembo ya liboso ya HCoV-229E, B814, bazwaki yango na kobima na zolo ya bato oyo bazalaki na malili na katikati ya mibu 1960. ']

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: Banda ntango wana, bolukiluki ya mingi esalisaka na koyeba malamu HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-OC43, oyo nyonso mibale ebimisaka bilembo mingi te.
translated: [' Banda ntango wana, boyebi mingi esalemaki na nzela ya bolukiluki ya mozindo ya HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-OC43, oyo nyonso mibale epesaka bilembo oyo ekoki kosukisa yango moko. ']

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Ya solo, bato mingi bandimaki likanisi wana ete maladi ya HCoVs esalaka mabe te kino ntangu SARS ebimaki.
translated: [' Ya solo, bato mingi bandimaki likanisi wana ete mbala mingi kozwa maladi ya HCoVs ezalaka mabe te tii ntango SARS ebimaki. ']

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: Kobima ya SARS na 2003 ezali moko ya maladi mabe makasi ya mikolo na biso, ezwaki bato koleka 8,000 mpe bato pene ya 10% bakufaki.
translated: [' Kobima ya SARS oyo esalemaki na 2003 eza moko ya makambo oyo ebebisaki mingi na lisolo ya lelo, ezwi bato koleka 8,000 oyo eza pene ya 10% ya mabe oyo ezalaki koboma bato ya maladi yango. ']

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: Nsima ya bambula zomi, maladi ya mpema ya moyen orient (MERS) ekomaki maladi ya makasi na péninsule ya Arabie mpe epanzanaki mwa moke na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Mbula zomi na nsima, maladi ya mpema ya moyen orient (MERS) ebimisaki maladi moko oyo esilaka te na péninsule ya Arabie mpe maladi ya makasi oyo epanzanaki na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: HCoV (2019-nCoV) ya sika ya 2019, oyo bapesi yango nkombo SARS-CoV-2, yango nde ebimisa maladi ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19), oyo esi ebomi bato koleka 3 120 mpe ezwi bato koleka 91 000 kino na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato 2020.
translated: [' HCoV ya sika ya 2019 (2019-nCoV), oyo na nsima bapesaki yango nkombo mosusu SARS-CoV-2, ezali eloko ya causative ya maladi mabe ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19), oyo ebomi bato koleka 3 120 mpe ezwi bato koleka 91 000 na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato 2020. ']

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Likebisi epesami mpe mokili mobimba ezali komilengela mpo na pandemi ya SARS-CoV-2.
translated: [' Alarme ebandi kobeta mpe mokili esengeli komibongisa mpo na pandemi oyo ezali koya ya SARS-CoV-2. ']

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: Ba HCoVs nyonso nsambo euti na banyama, elingi koloba bangembo, bampuku, to banyama mosusu ya ndako.
translated: [' Ba HCoVs nyonso nsambo eza na banyama euti na bangembo, bampuku to banyama ya ndako. ']

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: Bilembeteli mingi ezomonisa ete ba HCoVs nyonso euta na bangembo, esika bavirisi elingaka kofanda mpe esalaka eloko te kasi ezalaka na balolenge mingi mpenza.
translated: [' Ba lignes mingi ya bilembeteli endimi esika HCoVs nyonso euta na bangembo, esika bavirisi emesana malamu mpe epesaka maladi te kasi emonisaka bokeseni mingi na ba genetiki. ']

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: Pandemi ya COVID-19 eza mpasi mingi mpo na minganga, bato ya siansi, mpo na bomoi mpe mimeseno ya bato ya Chine mpe ya mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Maladi mabe ya COVID-19 epesi mikakatano minene ya minganga, ya siansi, ya bomoi mpe ya bizaleli malamu na Chine mpe na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: Kolandela banyama esika oyo HCoVs euta ezali kosalisa na koyeba lisolo ya bozalisi, nguya ya botambwisi mpe makambo oyo ekangaka bikelamu oyo epumbwaka nzela.
translated: [' Kolandela banyama esika HCoVs euta epesaka ebongiseli moko mpo na koyeba istware ya mokili, nguya oyo ezali kopusa mpe kopekisa makambo oyo esalaka ete biloko epumbwa mingi. ']

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: Ekoki mpe kokamba to kosalisa na bolukiluki ya koyeba esika efandaka, esika elekaka mpe kobongisa ba(nyama) oyo ebombaka maladi yango ya SARS-CoV-2, mpe milende oyo esengeli kosalema mpo na kokanga yango nzela epanzana te na mikolo oyo ezali koyaka.
translated: [' Yango ekoki mpe kotambwisa to kosalisa na koluka bisika oyo ebombaka yango, esika ya katikati mpe ya makasi(ba)(ba) ya SARS-CoV-2, mpe makambo ya ntina mpo na kokanga nzela mpo mai esopana na mikolo ezali koya. ']

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: Na lisolo oyo tozali kolobela na mokuse esika banyama yango bauti, ndenge ezali kopesama na bikelamu mosusu mpe bavirisi ya HCoVs.
translated: [' Na botaleli oyo tozali kolakisa na mokuse esika banyama eutaka, ndenge HCoVs elekaka na ekelamu moko mpe ndenge oyo HCoVs epesaka maladi. ']

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: Mingimingi, tozali kobeta nsete mpe tozali kolobela moto ya likambo ya ntina ete bavirisi minene ya HCoVs epesaka te maladi na esika oyo yango efandaka kasi ekomaka kopesa maladi soki euti na ekelamu moko mpe ekomi kofanda na esika ya sika.
translated: [' Mingimingi, tozolobela mpe tolobelaka motó ya likambo oyo emonanaka mingi ete bavirisi ya baboti ya HCoVs epesaka maladi te na esika oyo ebombaka yango kasi ekomaka kopesa maladi nsima ya kokota na ekelamu moko na esika ya sika oyo ebombaka yango. ']

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: Tolobeli mpe ndenge HCoV ezokola mpe ndenge mbala mingi ntango epesamaka na bikelamu mosusu esalaka ete epesa maladi mingi te.
translated: [' Tozozongela mpe ndenge HCoV ekolaka ntango bokoli ya kopanzana ya bato eyaka mbala mingi na kokita ya maladi oyo epesaka maladi. ']

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: Resultat ya kobima ya SARS-CoV-2 elobelami mpe na lisolo oyo.
translated: [' Resultat ya kobima ya SARS-CoV-2 oyo ezali kokoba elobelami mpe na likambo oyo. ']

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: CoVs ya banyama eyebana banda nsuka ya mibu 1930.
translated: [' CoVs ya banyama eyebana banda suka ya mibu 1930. ']

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: Liboso ya kozwa elembo ya liboso ya HCoV-229E, B814, na miyoyo ya zolo ya bato oyo babelaki malili, bazwaki deja CoVs na banyama mingi, na ndakisa dindon, mpuku, ngombe, ngulu, nyau mpe mbwa.
translated: [' Liboso ya kotyama ya liboso ya HCoV-229E ya lolenge B814 na zolo ya bato ya maladi oyo bazwaki malili ya bato nyonso, batiaki CoVs ekeseni na banyama ndenge na ndenge oyo ezalaki na maladi, na ndakisa dindon, mpuku, ngombe, ngulu, nyau mpe mbwa. ']

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: Na bambula eleki, bato bamona ba HCoVs nsambo.
translated: [' Na bambula oyo eleki, bato bamona ba HCoVs nsambo. ']

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: Lisolo ya mokuse ya bokundoli ya HCoV na molongo oyo esalemaki (Tablo ​1) ekozala ntina mingi mpe ekoteya makambo mingi.
translated: [' Bokuse ya mokuse ya lisolo ya bokundoli ya HCoV na kolandana ya kolandana ya ntango (Tablo 1) ekozala ya koteya mpe ya koteya. ']

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: Babimisaki elembo ya liboso ya HCoV-229E na nzela ya kopema ya bato oyo bazalaki na maladi ya nzela ya kopema ya lokolo na mobu 1966, mpe na nsima ekolaki na baselile ya lipulupulu WI-38.
translated: [' Babimisaki lolenge ya liboso ya HCoV-229E na nzela ya kopema ya bato oyo bazalaki na maladi ya nzela ya kopema ya likolo na mobu ya 1966, mpe na nsima babongisaki yango mpo ekola na bansinga ya baselile ya lipulupulu WI-38. ']

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: Bato ya maladi oyo bazalaki na HCoV-229E bazalaki na bilembo mingi ya malili na moto mpasi, etye, mingai mpe mongongo mpasi na fievre mpe kosukosu emonanaki na bato 10~20%.
translated: [' Bato ya maladi oyo bazalaki na HCoV-229E balakisaki bango basymptome ya malili oyo emonanaka mingi, na ndakisa motó mpasi, kosala itche, malaise mpe mongongo mpasi, na fievre mpe kosukosu emonanaki na bato 10~20%. ']

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: Na nsima na 1967, HCoV-OC43 ebimaki na mimeseno ya binama mpe elekaki na boongo ya mpuku oyo ezomela mabele.
translated: [' Na nsima na 1967, bazwaki HCoV-OC43 na mimeseno ya binama mpe na nsima babimisaki yango na bɔɔngɔ ya mpuku oyo ezalaki komela mai. ']

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: Emonani ete bilembo ya maladi ya HCoV-OC43 ekokani na oyo ya HCoV-229E, oyo eza mpenza ndenge moko na maladi oyo esalaka ete nzela ya mpema ebela, na ndakisa bavirisi ya grippe A mpe ya ba rhinovirus.
translated: [' Emonani ete makambo ya cliniki ya maladi ya HCoV-OC43 ekokani na oyo euti na HCoV-229E, oyo ekoki kokesenisa bilembo te na maladi na biloko mosusu oyo epesaka maladi na nzela ya kopema na ndakisa bavirisi ya grippe A mpe ba rhinovirusi. ']

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-OC43 epanzani na mokili mobimba, mpe mbala mingi epesamaka na eleko ya malili.
translated: [' HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-OC43 ekabolamaka na mokili mobimba, mpe mbala mingi epesamaka na eleko ya eleko ya mpio makasi na klima ya malili. ']

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: Mbala mingi, mikolo oyo bavirisi mibale oyo esalaka mpo emonana ezalaka na nse ya mposo moko, na nsima moto abelaka na eleko ya pene ya mposo 2.
translated: [' Mbala mingi, ngonga ya incubation ya bavirisi mibale oyo eza na nse ya mposo moko, na nsima moto abɛlaka pene ya mposo 2. ']

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: Na kotalela bolukiluki ya ofele oyo bato basalaki, bato ya nzoto kolongono oyo bazwi HCoV-229E bayokaka malili mbala mingi.
translated: [' Na kotalela bolukiluki ya bolingo malamu ya bato, bato ya nzoto kolongono oyo bazwaki HCoV-229E bakómaki na mwa malili moke. ']

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: Kaka bato ya maladi moke ba oyo kolongono ya nzoto ezali ya kolemba nde babelaki makasi maladi ya nse ya kopema.
translated: [' Kaka bato moke ya maladi oyo ebundisaka maladi nde bamonisaki maladi makasi ya nse ya nzela ya kopema. ']

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: SARS, oyo ebengami mpe “maladi ya mimpulupulu”, ezalaki HCoV ya mikanda ya byekoli ya liboso oyo esalaki pandemi katin na lisolo ya bomoi ya bato mpe eutaki na SARS-CoV, HCoV ya misato oyo bato bamonaki.
translated: [" SARS, oyo babengaka mpe ''maladi ya mimpulupulu'', ezalaki maladi mabe ya liboso oyo ebimaki na HCoV na lisolo ya bomoi ya bato mpe eloko oyo esalaka ete etioloji ezali SARS-CoV, HCoV ya misato emona. "]

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: Moto ya liboso oyo azwaki SARS ekoki kozala ete ezalaki na mobu 2002 na Guangdong, etuka moko ya Chine.
translated: [' Moto ya liboso oyo aza na SARS akoki kolanda ye na suka ya 2002 na etuka ya Guangdong na Chine. ']

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: Maladi ya SARS ezwaki bato 8,096 mpe bato 774 bakufaki, epanzanaki na mikili mingi mpe na bakontina mingi.
translated: [' Maladi mabe ya SARS esalaki ete bato 8,096 oyo bazalaki na maladi yango mpe bato 774 bakufaki, epanzanaki na mikili mingi mpe na bakontina mingi. ']

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: Longola biloko oyo ememaka yango, emonanaki ete moto nyonso oyo azwi yango akoki kopesa yango na bato pene ya mibale; mikolo oyo esalaka mpo emonana ezali 4-7 mpe kokoma makasi na mokolo ya 10 nsima ya kozwa yango.
translated: [' Longola ba-super-spreaders, emonanaki ete moto nyonso oyo aza na maladi ekoki kopesa bato pene ya mibale ya mibale, mpe eleko ya incubation ya mikolo 4 kino 7 mpe makasi ya bozito ya virisi ekomonana na mokolo ya 10 ya kobela. ']

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: Bato oyo bazwi SARS-CoV, na ebandeli bazalaka na mpasi na misisa, moto mpasi, fefele, mingai, mpe bayokaka malili, na nsima bayokaka neti mpema ezokatana, kosukosu mpe mitungisi ya kopema.
translated: [' Bato ya maladi oyo bazwaki SARS-CoV na ebandeli bazalaki na myalgie, moto mpasi, fefele, malaise mpe malili, na nsima bayokaka dyspnee, kosukosu mpe mpasi ya kopema ntango bilembo ya nsuka. ']

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: Kokita ya baselile ebengami lymphocyte, kobebisama ya misala ya mabale, mpe komata ya creatine kinase ezali na kati ya bambeba ya SARS oyo emonanaka mingi.
translated: [' Lymphopenia, ba ekzame ya mosala ya foie oyo ekufaka, mpe komata ya creatine kinase eza mabe na laboratoire ya SARS. ']

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: Kobeba ya ba alveolaire, kobima ya noki ya baselile epitheliale mpe komata ya ba macrophage emonanaka mpe na bato oyo babeli SARS.
translated: [' Kobeba ya alveole diffuse, kobima ya baselile epithelial mpe kobakisama ya ba macrophage emonanaka mpe na bato oyo bazobela SARS. ']

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: Pene ya bato 20-30% oyo bazwi yango bakotaka na esika oyo batyaka bato ya kobela makasi mpe bakozala na mposa ya lisalisi ya mopepe.
translated: [' Pene ya 20-30% ya bato ya maladi na nsima basengaka lisalisi ya makasi mpe mopepe ya ventilateur ya mekaniki. ']

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: Lisusu nse ya nzela ya kopema, binama mingi na ndakisa mosopo ya bilei, mabale mpe bangeyi ekoki kobeba soki maladi eza makasi, mbala mingi esalaka ete ba cytokine ekoma mingi, nde yango ekoki koboma bato oyo kolongono ya nzoto elemba.
translated: [' Longola nzela ya kopema ya nse, binama mingi ata mpe nzela ya libumu, foie mpe bangeyi ekoki mpe kozwa maladi na bandakisa wana ya makasi, mbala mingi ezalaka elongo na mopepe ya cytokine, oyo ekoki koboma mingimingi na bato ya maladi oyo ebundisaka maladi. ']

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: Bamonaki virisi yango mbala ya liboso na ekzame ya mosuni ya lipulupulu ya ndeko ya moto oyo azalaki kobela yango oyo alongwaki na Guangzhou mpe akendaki na Hong Kong.
translated: [' Babimisaki virisi yango liboso na ekzame ya biopsie ya lipulupulu oyo ezalaki polele na ndeko ya moto oyo azalaki kobela index mpe asalaki mobembo na Hong Kong banda na Guangzhou. ']

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: Banda ntango wana, bato basala milende mingi mpo na kosala bolukiluki ya HCoV.
translated: [' Banda ntango wana, milende makasi esalemi mpo na bolukiluki ya HCoV. ']

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: Bazwaki HCoV-NL63 na mwana moko ya basanza 7 na pays-bas na nsuka ya mobu 2004.
translated: [' Bazwaki HCoV-NL63 na mwana moko ya sanza 7 na Pays-Bas na suka ya 2004. ']

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: Emonanaki liboso ete ezalaki mingi na bilenge, na mibange mpe na bato ya maladi oyo kolongono ya nzoto elemba mpe oyo bazalaka na maladi ya mpema.
translated: [' Emonanaki liboso ete ezalaki mingi na bana mike, mibange mpe bato oyo maladi oyo ebundisaka maladi ya mpema ezalaki mingi te. ']

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Bilembo na zolo, conjonctivite, fefele, mpe maladi ya mpema emonanaka mingi na maladi oyo euti na HCoV-NL63.
translated: [' Kolakisa coryza, conjunctivite, fefele, mpe bronchiolite emonanaka mingi na maladi oyo HCoV-NL63 epesaki. ']

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: Bolukiluki mosusu elobelaki ete babimisaki virisi moko wana na biloko oyo eutaki na zolo ya mwana-mobali moko ya basanza 8 oyo azalaki kobela maladi ya mimpulupulu na pays-bas.
translated: [' Bolukiluki mosusu ya lipanda elobelaki komitangola ya virisi moko wana na echantillon ya zolo ya mwana mobali moko ya basanza 8 oyo azalaki kobela maladi ya mimpulupulu na Pays-Bas. ']

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: Ata bamonaki yango na pays-bas, epanzanaki na bato nyonso.
translated: [' Atako eyebanaki na Pays - Bas, kasi ekabolami mpenza na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: Emonani ete HCoV-NL63 esalaka ete bato pene ya 4,7% babela maladi ya mpema, mpe bato mingi bazwaki yango na ebandeli ya eleko ya moyi makasi, eleko ya mbula, mpe eleko ya mpio makasi.
translated: [' Emonani ete HCoV-NL63 esalaka pene ya 4.7% ya maladi ya mpema oyo bato mingi babelaka, mpe motango na yango ya makasi esalemaka na ebandeli ya eleko ya molunge, eleko ya prɛnta mpe ya eleko ya mpio makasi. ']

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 ememaka mpe maladi ya mpema oyo ekangaka laryngite, oyo babengaka mpe croupe.
translated: [' HCoV-NL63 eza na boyokani na laryngite oyo ekangaka maladi, oyo babengaka mpe croupe. ']

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: Na mbula moko wana, bazwaki HCoV-HKU1 na mobali moko ya mibu 71 oyo akotaki lopitalo mpo na maladi ya mimpulupulu mpe bronchiolite na Hong Kong.
translated: [' Na mbula moko wana, bazwaki HCoV-HKU1 na mobali moko ya mibu 71 oyo bakotaki lopitalo mpo na maladi ya mimpulupulu mpe bronchiolite na Hong Kong. ']

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: Longola maladi ya mimpulupulu mpe bronchiolite, emonani ete HCoV-HKU1 ezali mpe na boyokani na asthme ya makasi mpenza.
translated: [' Longola maladi ya mimpulupulu mpe bronchiolite oyo bato bazwaka, balobaki ete HCoV-HKU1 ezalaki na boyokani na maladi makasi ya asthme. ']

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: Ndenge ezalaki mpo na HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-OC43, bamonaki HCoV-HKU1 na mokili mobimba, mpe esalaki ete bato babela maladi ya mpema.
translated: [' Ndenge moko na HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E mpe HCoV-OC43, bamonaki HCoV-HKU1 na mokili mobimba, mpe epesaki maladi ya mpema ya pete. ']

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: Ba HCoVs minei nyonso oyo emesanaka malamu na bato mpe mbala mingi ezalaka mpasi mpo ebimisaka maladi ya makasi mingi te, ata soki aksida esalemaki mpo na bantina eyebani te mpe na bandakisa oyo esalemaka mingi te mpo na lolenge moko ya HCoV-NL63 ya makasi mingi, oyo balobaki kala mingi te ete ezopesa mwa moke maladi ya nse ya nzela ya kopema na Chine.
translated: [' Ba HCoVs oyo nyonso minei oyo ezalaka na bato emeseni malamu na nzoto ya bato mpe mbala mingi ezalaka makasi te na kobongwana mpo na kopesa maladi makasi oyo epesaka maladi makasi, kasi baaksida esalemaki mpo na bantina eyebani te lokola na cas oyo emonanaka mingi te ya lolenge moke ya HCoV-NL63, oyo euti kolobama kala mingi te ete epesaka maladi makasi ya nse ya nzela ya kopema na Chine. ']

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: Mbala mingi, ntango ete ba HCoVs oyo bakoki kopesama malamu mpenza kati na bato mpe kozala ntango nyonso na nzoto ya bato, bakomaka makasi mingi te to babelisaka mpenza te.
translated: [' Mbala mingi, ntango HCoVs wana ezwaka makoki ya kotinda yango malamu mpe kobatela yango moko ntango nyonso na kati ya bato, ekomaka mpe makasi mingi te to epesaka maladi. ']

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Babimisaki MERS-CoV na mbala ya liboso na 2012 na lipulupulu ya moto moko ya maladi ya mibu 60 oyo azalaki na mpasi makasi na mimpulupulu mpe bangeyi ebebaki na Aradie Saudite.
translated: [' Babimisaki MERS-CoV na mbala ya liboso na 2012 na limpulupulu ya moto moko ya maladi ya mibu 60 oyo abɛlaki maladi makasi ya mimpulupulu mpe kobeba ya bangeyi na eboyami na Arabie Saudite. ']

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: Ata mingi ya bato ya maladi yango bautaki na moyen orient, epanzanaki na bato misusu mpo bantango mosusu na bazalaka na bokutani makasi na mikili mingi ya Eropa mpe na Tunisie.
translated: [' Ata soki bato mingi oyo baza na maladi oyo laboratoire bandimami bauti na Moyen-Orient, bato ya maladi oyo bauti na bamboka mosusu oyo ezalaki na bantango mosusu na bisika ya mibale oyo epanzanaka mpo na bato oyo bakutanaki na bango pene bayebisamaki na mikili ndenge na ndenge ya Eropa mpe na Tunisie. ']

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: Kobima mosusu ya moke esalemaki na Coree du sud na 2015 mpe ezwaki bato 186.
translated: [' Maladi mosusu ya mibale ebimaki na Core ya Sud na 2015 na bato 186 oyo bazalaki na maladi. ']

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: Bilembo ya MERS ekokani na oyo ya SARS, emonanaka mingi na maladi makasi ya mimpulupulu.
translated: [' Ba manifestation ya MERS na cliniki ekokani na oyo ya SARS, emonisami na panzi ya makasi mokemoke. ']

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: Na bokeseni na SARS, bato mingi oyo babelaki MERS babelaki mpe maladi makasi ya bangeyi, oyo lolenge moko te na maladi ya MERS kati ya bamaladi misusu ya HCoV.
translated: [' Na bokeseni na SARS, bato mingi oyo babelaki MERS babelaki mpe maladi makasi ya bangeyi, yango wana ekeseni mpenza na MERS na kati ya maladi oyo euti na HCoV. ']

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: Bato ya maladi koleka 30 bazalaki na bilembo na maladi eutaka na misopo, ndakisa pulupulu mpe kosanza.
translated: [' Koleka 30% ya bato ya maladi oyo bazalaki na bilembo ya libumu, na ndakisa pulupulu mpe kosanza. ']

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale 2020, balobaki ete ezali na bato koleka 2500 oyo bazali mpenza na maladi wana mpe bato 34,4% bakufaki; yango esali ete MERS-CoV ezala moko ya bavirisi oyo ebomaka bato mingi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale 2020, bato koleka 2500 bazalaki na maladi na laboratoire bazalaki kobela bango na 34,4%, yango esali ete MERS-CoV ezala moko ya bavirisi ya mabe mingi oyo eyebani na bato. ']

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: Pene ya nsuka ya sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, bato oyo bazalaki na maladi ya mpema oyo eyebanaki kala ete baza na maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 bamonanaki na Wuhan, na etuka ya Hubei, na Chine.
translated: [' Na katikati kino na nsuka ya sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, bituluku ya bato ya maladi ya pneumonia oyo eyebani na mbala ete ezalaki na boyokani na maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 emonanaki na Wuhan, na etuka ya Hubei, na Chine. ']

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: Organisation Mondial ya Sante elobaki ete maladi wana ya nzela ya nse ya kopema oyo euti na SARS-CoV-2 ezali likambo ya mbalakaka ya kolongono ya nzoto oyo ezali kotungisa mokili mobimba mpe epesaki yango nkombo COVID-19.
translated: [' Organisation Mondial ya Sante elobaki ete maladi oyo ezali kosalema ntango nyonso euti na nzela ya kopema ya nse oyo euti na SARS-CoV-2, likambo ya mbalakaka ya kolongono ya nzoto oyo ezali kotungisa mokili mobimba mpe epesaki mpe nkombo ya maladi COVID-19. ']

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato 2020, bato 90,053 bazalaki kobela yango na mokili mobimba, mpe bato oyo bakufaki bazalaki 3,4%.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato 2020, bato 90,053 bazwaki maladi yango na mokili mobimba, mpe bato oyo babelaki crude ezalaki 3,4%. ']

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: Likambo ya ntina, motango ya bato bakufaki na Hubei, na Chine ezali 4,2%, kasi oyo ya libanda na yango ezali 1,2%.
translated: [' Likambo ya kokamwa, bato ya kobela na Hubei, na Chine eza 4,2%, kasi oyo ya libanda na yango eza 1,2%. ']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ebimisaka maladi ya makasi ya mpema neti SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV; emonisaka yango na nzela ya fefele, kosukosu mpe mpasi ya kopema.
translated: [' SARS-CoV-2 epesaka maladi makasi ya kopema lokola SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV, epesami lokola fievre, kosukosu mpe dyspnee. ']

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: Bato misusu ya maladi bazalaki mpe na pulupulu.
translated: [' Pulupulu emonanaka mpe epai ya bato mosusu ya maladi. ']

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Maladi ya poumon ezali moko ya bilembo makasi mpe ekoki kokoma noki maladi makasi ya mpema.
translated: [' Pneumonie eza moko ya bilembo ya makasi mpenza mpe ekoki kokoma noki syndrome ya mpasi ya kopema. ']

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: Ata soki SARS-CoV na SARS-CoV-2 ekokani mingi mpo ebimisaka ba nucleotide mingi 82%, ekabwani na biteni mingi na bituluku ya bamaladi.
translated: [' Ata soki SARS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV-2 ekokani mingi mpo na ndenge ya ba nucleotide mingi ya ndenge moko na 82%, ekataka na bitape ekeseni na nzete ya phylogenetique. ']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: Emonani ete SARS-CoV-2 eza makasi mingi te kasi epanzanaka na bato mingi soki tososoli yango pene ya SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV.
translated: [' Emonani ete SARS-CoV-2 epesaka maladi mingi te kasi epanzanaka mingi soki tokokanisi yango na SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV. ']

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 emonanaki mpe na bato oyo bazalaki na bilembo na yango te mpe mbala mosusu esalaki ete yango epanzana noki na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Bato oyo baza na bilembo te oyo bazwi SARS-CoV-2 balobi mpe ekoki kosala ete epanzana noki na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: Koyokanisa mpe kokokanisa SARS-CoV-2 na ba HCoVs motoba mosusu emonisi makambo ya ndenge moko mpe oyo ekeseni oyo ezali kobenda mpenza likebi.
translated: [' Kokokanisa mpe kokesenisa SARS-CoV-2 na ba HCoVs motoba mosusu emonisi bokokani mpe bokeseni ya bosepeli mingi. ']

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: Ya liboso, mikolo oyo maladi esalaka liboso ya kobima mpe mikolo oyo maladi yango eumelaka eza mpenza ndenge moko.
translated: [' Ya liboso, eleko oyo maladi esalaka mpo emonana mpe mikolo oyo maladi ya HCoV eumelaka ekokani mingi. ']

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: Na likambo oyo, SARS-CoV-2 eza ndenge moko na makambo minene na ba HCoVs motoba misusu.
translated: [' Na likambo oyo, SARS-CoV-2 elandi ndenge ba HCoVs motoba mosusu esalemaka. ']

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: Ya mibale, makasi ya bilembo ya COVID-19 ezali na kati ya SARS-CoV mpe ba HCoVs minei mosusu (na ndakisa, HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 mpe HCoV-NL63).
translated: [' Ya mibale, makasi ya bilembo ya COVID-19 ezali na kati ya SARS-CoV mpe HCoVs minei oyo bato bazwaka (elingi koloba HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 mpe HCoV-NL63). ']

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: Na ndambo moko, maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 esalaka bilembo oyo emonanaka mbala mingi na ntango ya maladi ya HCoVs oyo ezwami kati na bato, ata mpe kobimisa bilembo oyo eyebani te, ya moke, to nkutu ata elembo moko te.
translated: [' Na ngambo moko, maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 ezali na biloko oyo emonanaka mingi na ntango ya maladi ya HCoVs oyo ezalaka na bato, ata mpe kolakisa bilembo ya sikisiki te, ya pete to nkutu ata elembo moko te. ']

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: Na ndambo mosusu, mwa bato moke oyo babelaki COVID-19 ya makasi bakoki komonana mpe lekola na maladi ya SARS-CoV, ata motango eza na mwa nse.
translated: [' Na ndambo mosusu, mwa ndambo moke ya bato oyo bazobela makasi COVID-19 ekoki komonana mpe ndenge esalemaki na maladi ya SARS-CoV, ata ratio eza mwa moke. ']

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ya misato, kopesama ya SARS-CoV-2 emonisi mpe mimeseno ya ndenge moko na HCoVs oyo ezalaka na bato mpe SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Ya misato, kopesama ya SARS-CoV-2 emonisi mpe makambo ya kosepelisa oyo ezalaka na HCoVs mpe SARS-CoV oyo ezalaka na bato. ']

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Lisusu, kopesama ya SARS-CoV-2 ezali likolo mingi koleka oyo ya HCoVs oyo ezalaka na bato.
translated: [' Na ndambo moko, kopesama ya SARS-CoV-2 eza ata moke mingi koleka oyo ya HCoVs oyo ezalaka na bato. ']

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: Na ndambo mosusu, esengeli totalela lisusu soki kopesama ya maladi SARS-CoV-2 ezali kokita nsima ya kozwa bato ndenge esalemaki na SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV.
translated: [' Na ndambo mosusu, tokoyeba soki kopesama ya SARS-CoV-2 ekiti nsima ya banzela na kati ya bato ndenge esalemaki na SARS-CoV mpe MERS-CoV. ']

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: Na nsuka, ndenge moko na ba HCoVs mosusu, SARS-CoV-2 ekoki komonana na nyei.
translated: [' Na nsuka, ndenge moko na ba HCoVs mosusu, SARS-CoV-2 ekoki komonana na nyei. ']

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: Atako virisi SARS-CoV-2 epesaki bato maladi na nzela ya nyei ezali na ntina mingi ndenge esalemaki mpo na SARS-CoV esengeli bolukiluki mosusu elimbola yango malamu na mikolo oyo ezali koyaka.
translated: [' Soki virisi SARS-CoV-2 epesamaka na nzela ya nyei ezali na ntina mingi ndenge esalemaki mpo na SARS-CoV ata na nse ya circumstance moko esengeli kolimbolama te na bolukiluki oyo ekolanda. ']

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: Ezali kobenda mpenza likebi na koyeba soki SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kobima na bileko ndenge esalemaka mpo na HCoVs oyo ezalaka na bato.
translated: [' Eza mpe likambo ya ntina mingi ya komona soki SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kolakisa bileko ndenge ezalaka na bandakisa ya HCoVs oyo ezalaka na bato. ']

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: Atako bongo, makambo mosusu ya SARS-CoV-2 mpe ndenge epesamaka, ndenge ebimaka mpe ndenge epanzanaka na nsima ya kokoma na nzoto ya bato ekozala na bopusi na kopanzana ya COVID-19.
translated: [' Atako bongo, makambo ya SARS-CoV-2 ata mpe ndenge ezopesama, epesaka maladi mpe kopanzana ya malamu nsima ya banzela na kati ya bato ekozala na bopusi na nsuka ya kobima ya maladi ya COVID-19 oyo ezali kokoba. ']

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: Ba HCoVs nyonso oyo ezalaka na bato ebimisaka bilembo ya mike oyo emesana na nzoto ya bato.
translated: [' Ba HCoVs nyonso minei oyo ezalaka na bato oyo epesaka bilembo ya mike emesana malamu na bato. ']

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: Na ndenge mosusu, ekoki kozala mpe solo ete bato basi bamesana na ba HCoVs minei oyo.
translated: [' Na likanisi mosusu, ekoki mpe kozala solo ete bato bamesanaki mpenza na ba HCoVs minei oyo. ']

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: Na koloba mosusu, nyonso mibale ekoki kozala bauta na pandemi ya HCoV kala mpe ebika.
translated: [' Na koloba mosusu, nyonso mibale ekoki kozala bato babikaki na maladi mabe ya HCoV ya kala. ']

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.
targetString: HCoVs oyo ebelisaki bato maladi makasi mpe bato oyo babelaki maladi makasi ya HCoV, balongolaki bango maladi yango.
translated: [' HCoVs oyo epesaka maladi makasi na bato mpe bato oyo babelaki maladi makasi ya HCoV, balongoli bango. ']

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.
targetString: Mpona esalema, esengeli HCoVs ebotama na nzoto ya bato ya kokoka mpo ba oyo ya sika babima mpona kobundisa bipekiseli ya esika oyo ezali.
translated: [' Mpo esalema, esengeli HCoVs ebotama na kati ya bato na meko ekoki mpo epesa nzela na konduka ya mbongwana ya adaptif oyo ezali kobundisa makambo ya restriction host ressources de réstriction. ']

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.
targetString: Na ndenge wana, soki SARS-CoV-2 eumeli mingi mpe soki bato mingi babeli yango, libaku na yango yakomesana na nzoto ya bato ezali ebele.
translated: [' Na ndimbola oyo, soki maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 eumeli mingi mpe soki bato mingi babeli yango, libaku monene ete emesana mpenza na nzoto ya bato. ']

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.
targetString: Soki emeseni malamu, ekozala mpasi bato bakanga kolekisama na yango na nzela ya konfinema to banzela misusu ya kosimba maladi.
translated: [' Soki emesani malamu, kopesama na yango na kati ya bato ekozala mpasi mpo na kosukisa yango na quarantaine to na mibeko mosusu ya kobundisa maladi. ']

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.
targetString: Na boumeli ya bambula mingi, ba CoVs minei oyo ezwaka bato ezali kotambola na kati ya bato, mpe ezali kopesa malili na bato oyo makasi ya nzoto ya kobumdela elemba.
translated: [' Na boumeli ya bambula mingi, ba CoVs minei oyo ezwaka bato etambolaka na kati ya bato na bato, mpe yango nde ebimisaka malili ya bato oyo ebundisaka maladi. ']

sourceString: These viruses do not need an animal reservoir.
targetString: Bavirisi oyo bazali na mposa ya kobatama kati na banyama te.
translated: [' Bavirisi yango ezali na mposa ya ebombelo ya banyama te. ']

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.
targetString: Na bokeseni, SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV oyo ebelisaka mingi emesana te na nzoto ya bato mpe ndenge moko te ezali mpona kokanga kopanzana na yango na kati ya bato.
translated: [' Na bokeseni, SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV oyo ebelisaka mingi emesana te na nzoto ya bato malamu mpe kopesama na yango na kati ya nzoto ya bato ekoki kosimba yango te. ']

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.
targetString: Ekosenga etikala mpe epanzana kaka na kati ya banyama mpe koluka libaku ya kokota na bato, mingimingi na nzela ya eloko moko to biloko mingi mpe ya malamu oyo ekoki komema yango.
translated: [' Basengeli kobatela mpe kopanza yango na bisika na bango ya kobomba banyama mpe koluka libaku ya kosopana na bisika oyo bato bakoki kozwa yango, mbala mosusu na nzela ya esika moko to bisika mingi ya katikati mpe oyo ebakisaka makasi. ']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 eza na bilembo oyo ekokani na oyo ya SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV mpe HCoVs minei mosusu oyo bato bazwaka.
translated: [' SARS-CoV-2 eza na biloko oyo ekokani na nyonso mibale SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV mpe HCoVs minei oyo bato bazwaka. ']

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.
targetString: Epanzanaka makasi lokola ba HCoVs oyo bato bazwaka, ata kaka mpo na sikoyo.
translated: [' Epanzanaka makasi lokola HCoVs oyo bato bazwaka, ata mpo na sikoyo. ']

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.
targetString: Kasi, ebelisaka makasi koleka HCoVs oyo bato bazwaka kasi ebelisaka makasi te lokola SARS-CoV to MERS-CoV.
translated: [' Kasi, epesaka maladi mingi koleka HCoVs oyo bato bazwaka mpe epesaka maladi moke koleka SARS-CoV to MERS-CoV. ']

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: Tokozela na koyeba soki ekomesana mpenza na bato mpe ekotambola na kati ya bato kozanga biloko oyo ememaka yango to banyama oyo ememaka yango.
translated: [' Eyebani naino te soki ekomesana mpenza na bato mpe ekotambola na kati ya bato oyo ezangi reservoir to eloko ya mibale oyo ebombaka banyama. ']

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: Liboso ya kolobela esika HCoVs eutaka, ekozala malamu tolobela bandimbola na yango mpe ndenge ekolaka, bozalisi, esika efandaka, bisika elekaka mpe biloko oyo ekomisaka yango HCoVs makasi.
translated: [' Liboso ya kolobela esika HCoVs eutaka, ekosalisa biso malamu mpo na kolobela bandimbola mpe bizaleli ya evolisyo, ya bozalisi, ya kobomba yango, ya katikati mpe ya makasi oyo HCoVs efandaka. ']

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Nyama nde eza esika HCoV ekolaka soki efandi nkoko moko oyo eza na boyakani makasi na kokola ya nucleotide.
translated: [' Nyama moko esalaka lokola esika HCoV ekolaka soki ebombi nkoko moko oyo ekokani mpenza na yango, ndenge moko mpe epesaka lokumu mingi na nivo ya nucleotide. ']

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: Nkoko ya virisi emesana makasi mpe epesaka maladi te na eloko oyo, oyo ebombaka bango.
translated: [' Mbala mingi virisi ya bankɔkɔ emesanaka malamu mpe epesaka maladi te na esika oyo. ']

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: Ndenge moko, eloko moko oyo ememaka HCoV ekomaka kobomba yango na eleko ya molai.
translated: [' Ndenge moko, esika oyo ebombaka biloko oyo ebombaka HCoV ekangaka ntango nyonso mpe mpo na ntango molai. ']

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.
targetString: Na bandakisa nyonso mibale, biloko oyo ebombaka yango ezwaka maladi mpe esika ebongi mpo na kobomba HCoV to na virisi oyo ebota yango.
translated: [' Na bandakisa nyonso mibale, biloko oyo efandaka ezwaka yango moko na nzoto mpe eza biloko oyo HCoV efandaka to virisi oyo ebotaka yango. ']

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: Kasi, soki HCoV ekoti sika na esika ya malamu oyo ebombaka yango liboso to pene ya kokota na nzoto ya bato, emesanaka malamu te na esika ya sika mpe mbala mingi epesaka maladi.
translated: [' Na bokeseni, soki HCoV euti kobima sika na esika ya mibale oyo efandaka liboso mpenza to zingazinga ya kobanda yango na bato, emesana malamu te na esika ya sika oyo efandaka mpe mbala mingi epesaka maladi. ']

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: Esika oyo ya mibale oyo efandaka ekoki kozala banyama oyo epesaka maladi na bato mpe esalisaka mingi na kokomisa yango makasi ndenge epesaka virisi nzela ya kobota mpe na nsima kokota na nzoto ya bato mpe kopusa likolo ndenge ezali kobelisa bato mingi.
translated: [' Esika oyo ya mibale oyo efandaka ekoki kozala esika ya kozwa maladi ya bato na banyama mpe kosala mosala ya moto oyo akolisaka yango na ndenge epesaka virisi nzela ya kobotama lisusu mpe na nsima kopesa yango na bato mpo na kokolisa bonene ya maladi ya bato. ']

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: HCoV ekoki kopesa maladi oyo ebomaka soki bakoki kokanga yango te nzela ya kopanzana kati ya eloko ya mibale oyo ebombaka yango.
translated: [' HCoV ekoki kozwa maladi ya liwa soki ekoki te kobatela nguya na yango na kati ya ekelamu ya mibale oyo ebombaka yango. ']

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: Kasi, HCoVs ekoki mpe komesana na esika ya mibale oyo efandi mpe nkutu eumela na bisika efandaka.
translated: [' Na ndaksisa, HCoVs ekoki mpe komesana na esika ya mibale oyo efandaka mpe ata kotya endemicity na ntango molai. ']

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: Na ndakisa oyo, esika ya mibale oyo efandaka ekomaka esika na yango ya malamu ya kofanda.
translated: [' Na likambo oyo, esika ya mibale oyo efandaka ekómaka esika oyo ebombaka biloko ya mokili. ']

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: Bansango ya maladi mabe emonisaki ete bato oyo babelaki SARS bazalaka na lisolo ya boyokani banda kala na banyama ya kosakana.
translated: [' Bansango ya epidemiologie emonisaki na ndenge ya kala ete cas ya index ya SARS ezalaki na istware ya bokutani na banyama ya lisano. ']

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: Bolukiluki basalaki na maladi oyo yango epesaka emonisi ete bato batekaka banyama baza na likoki makasi ya kobundisa SARS-CoV IgG soki tokokanisi yango na bato nyonso.
translated: [' Bolukiluki ya seroprevalence nsima emonisaki ete bato oyo batɛkaka banyama bazalaki na bato mingi oyo bazalaki kobundisa SARS-CoV IgG soki tokokanisi yango na oyo ya bato nyonso. ']

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: Banyama ebengami civette palmée masquée (Paguma larvata) mpe mbwa moko ya vivverin na bazando ya banyama ya bomoi, bamonaki na mbala ya liboso ete ezalaka na bavirisi oyo ekokani na SARS-CoV oyo eza mpenza ndenge moko na SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Banyama babengi civette palmée masquée (Paguma larvata) mpe mbwa moko ya racoon na bazando ya banyama ya bomoi, bamonaki liboso ete eza na bavirisi oyo ekokani na SARS-CoV oyo eza mpenza ndenge moko na SARS-CoV. ']

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: Basungaki yango mpo bamonaki ete ba SARS misusu emonanaki nsima ya koboma ba civette nyonso na bazando.
translated: [' Yango esimbamaki na ndenge ya polele te mpo balobaki ete SARS mosusu te nsima ya koboma ba civet nyonso na bazando. ']

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kasi, balobi ete ba civette palmée masquée oyo euti na zamba to na bilanga kozanga ete batya yango na bazando ya banyama ya bomoi ata mokok te ezalaki SARS-CoV, yango emonisi ete mbala mosusu ba civette wana ezalaka kaka esika ya mibale virisi SARS-CoV efandaka kasi ezali esika na yango ya libosoliboso te.
translated: [' Kasi, balobi ete ba civette palmée masquée oyo euti na zamba to na bilanga kozanga ete bakutana na bazando ya banyama ya bomoi ezalaki mpenza mabe mpo na SARS-CoV, yango emonisi ete civette ya mbila masquée mée ekoki kozala kaka esika ya mibale oyo bato bakolisaka yango kasi te esika oyo SARS-CoV ebombaka yango. ']

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: Likambo ezali kobenda likebi, mpo 80% banyama oyo bazalaka na bazando ya Guangzhou bazali na ba anticorps oyo ebundisaka SARS-CoV, tokoki kokanisa mpe ete banyama mosusu ya mike bazali esika ya mibale oyo bavirisi ya SARS-CoV efandaka.
translated: [' Likambo ya kokamwa, mpo 80% ya banyama ya ndenge na ndenge na bazando ya Guangzhou baza na ba anticorps oyo ebundisaka SARS-CoV, makoki oyo mitindo mingi ya banyama ya mike ekoki mpe kozala esika ya mibale oyo SARS-CoV efandaka ekoki kolongolama te. ']

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Nyonso wana ezali bisika ya suka oyo SARS-CoV efandaka.
translated: [' Emonani ete nyonso wana ezali bisika oyo SARS-CoV efandaka na nsuka ya liwa. ']

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: Bolukiluki mosusi na banyama oyo ebombaka SARS-CoV emonisaki boyokani makasi na ngembo ya CoV, oyo babengi SARS Rhinolophus ya ngembo CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), oyo ezalaka na ngembo ya libende ya mpunda oyo ezalaka na Chine.
translated: [' Na nsima bolukiluki ya nyama oyo ezali esika oyo SARS-CoV efandaka emonisaki ngembo ya ngembo oyo ekokani mpenza na yango, esukisaki SARS ngembo ya Rhinolophus CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), oyo eza na ngembo ya libende ya mpunda na Chine. ']
