translated: [' Atako bangembo bazali na makambo mingi oyo esepelisaka bavirisi epalangana, libaku mpo bato bakutana na bangembo mpe banyama mosusu ya zamba ekoki kozala moke soki bato bateyami mpo na kofanda mosika na bango. ']

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: Kolanda kokengela bamamifere ezali ntina mingi mpo na koyeba ndenge CoVs ezalaka mpe bisika oyo yango efandaka, ebongo ekosalisa na kokanga nzela mpo banyama epesa te bato bavirisi wana mpe ebima lisusu te na mikolo ezali kooya.
translated: [' Kolanda kokengela bamamifere ezali ntina mpo na koyeba malamu écologie ya CoVs mpe bisika oyo yango ezali, oyo ekosalisa na kokanga nzela ete banyama epesa bato mosusu te mpe kobima ya maladi na mikolo ezali koya. ']

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: Mpo na kosukisa, lolenge eleki malamu ya kokanga nzela na bavirisi oyo eutaka na banyama ezali ete bato bazala mosika na bisika oyo banyama wana ya zamba oyo ezalaka na bavirisi wana efandaka.
translated: [' Mpo na kosukisa, lolenge ya malamu koleka ya kokanga nzela na zoonostique ya virisi ezali ete bato bazala mosika na ba niches ya ecologie ya bisika oyo bavirisi ya banyama ebombaka yango. ']

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: Kino sikoyo toyebi nanu malamu te makambo mosusu etali esika oyo SARS-CoV-2 ya banyama eutaka.
translated: [' Biteni mingi na puzzle ya esika SARS-CoV-2 ya banyama euta ezangi kino lelo. ']

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: Ya liboso, soki bangembo epesaki bapangolin virisi ya kala ya SARS-CoV-2, ekozala malamu na koyeba na ndenge nini bangembo na bapangolin bafandaka esika moko.
translated: [' Ya liboso, soki bangembo bapesi bapangolin virisi moko ya bankɔkɔ ya SARS-CoV-2, ekozala na ntina ya komona na makambo nini bangembo mpe bapangolin bakoki kozala na niche moko ya ekoloji. ']

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: Ya mibale, soki bangembo nde bato bapesaki mbala moko virisi wana na bato, esengeli toyeba ndenge nini bato bakutanaki na bangembo.
translated: [' Ya mibale, soki bangembo bazali na mokumba ya mbala moko na ndenge bato bapesaka yango na ndenge ya kopesa maladi, esengeli koyeba ndenge bato bakutanaka na ngembo. ']

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: Ya misato, soki mamifere ya misato nde azali esika ya mibale ya solo oyo virisi efandaka, esengeli kolimbola malamu ndenge nini ekutanaka na bikelamu mosusu ata mpe bato, bangembo mpe bapangolin.
translated: [' Ya misato, soki mamifere ya misato esalaka lokola esika ya mibale ya solo, ndenge nini esalaka na balolenge ekeseni ata mpe bato, bangembo mpe bapangolin esengeli kolimbolama polele. ']

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: Ya nsuka, mpo bamamifere mingi ata mpe banyama ya ndako ekoki kozala na SARS-CoV-2, esengeli mpe koluka kokengela yango mpe koluka koyeba soki ezalaka na maladi wana.
translated: [' Ya nsuka, mpo bamamifere mingi ata mpe banyama ya ndako ekoki kozwa SARS-CoV-2, esengeli kokengela mpe maladi oyo emekamaki. ']

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: Ezali nde ngembo, pangolin to mamifere mosusu, esegami ete tozela SARS-CoV-2 to bavirisi mosusu oyo ebimisaka yango oyo ekokani mpenza na yango, ekoyebana na bisika oyo efandaka na mikolo ezali koya.
translated: [' Esengeli kozala ngembo, pangolin to mamifere mosusu, tozozela ete SARS-CoV-2 to bavirisi ya baboti na yango oyo eza mpenza ndenge moko ekomonana na biloko oyo efandaka na yango na mikolo ezoya. ']

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: Kokoba kolandela makambo wana ekoki kosalisa na koyeba ndenge SARS-CoV-2 ekolaka na banyama, mpe yango eza na bopusi mingi na kobundisa mpe kobatela bato na COVID-19.
translated: [' Kokoba kosala bolukiluki na esika oyo ekokima nzela ya bokoli ya SARS-CoV-2 na banyama, mpe makambo ya ntina mingi na kobundisa mpe kobundisa COVID-19 na bato. ']

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: Mis-à-jour ya boyebeli “cas bakaniseli” eza na bokono ya COVID-19 na “cas endimami” eza na ntina penza
translated: [' Kobongisa ba critere ya diagnostiki ya COVID-19 "cas ekaniseli" pe "cas endimami" eza ntina ']

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Na 6 Février 2020, lisanga nabiso epubliaki lisungi ya toli ya bombango pona koyebela pe kobelisa bokono ya kpokoso ya coronavirus yasika 2019 (2019-nCoV), bongo lisungi yango epesaki lolenge ya biso toyebeli na bobelesi pona kobundisa pandemi oyo ya mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Na 6 Février 2020, lisanga na biso ebimisaki lisungi ya noki ya toli mpóna koyebela pe kobikisa bokono ya kpokoso ya coronavirusi ya sika 2019 (2019-nCoV), mpe lisungi oyo epesaki biso eksperianse pe elobeli malamu mpóna kobundisa pandemie oyo na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Kasi, bokono ya coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) eza yasika, boyebi na bwania bwabiso mpona yango ezo mata moke-moke na botali makundoli mazo monana pe bisaleli ya cliniki bizo yebana; bongo wana nde eza bastrategie ya diaginositiki pe bobelesi ezo landama kotiama à jour.
translated: [' Kasi, maladi ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19) ezali maladi ya sika, koyeba mpe boyebi na biso ezali kobakisama mokemoke na kotalela bolukiluki oyo ezali kosalema mpe ndenge minganga bazali komona yango; Yango wana, mayele ya koyeba maladi mpe kosalisa yango ezali mpe ntango nyonso ya sika. ']

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: Na mokanda oyo, topesaki eyano na commentaire moko na lisungi nabiso pe topesi critere ya boyebeli yasika-sika pona “cas bakaniseli” pe “cas endimami” na bolandi Diagnostiki ya suka penza lisungi ya kobelesa pona COVID-19 (version ya sambo) oyo ebimisami na bakonzi ya Comite National ya Sante ya Republika Populaire ya Chine.
translated: [' Na mokanda oyo, toyanolaki na komantere moko na oyo etali litambwisi na biso mpe topesi critere ya sika ya diagnostiki ya "cas bakaniseli" mpe "cas endimami" na kolanda malako ya sika ya Diagnostiki mpe ya kobikisa COVID-19 (version ya nsambo) oyo ebimisami na Comite National ya Sante ya Republika Populaire ya Chine. ']

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Na Decemba 2019, coronavirus yasika 2019, (2019-nCoV) ebimisi kpokoso, oyo ezo bengama na loyalo bokono ya coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) ebongo virus yango eye kobengama syndrome respiratoire acute coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: [' Na Decemba 2019, coronavirusi ya sika ya 2019 (2019-nCoV) ebimisi kpokoso, oyo ezo bengama na loyalo bokono ya coronavirusi 2019 (COVID-19) pe virusi yango ebengami syndrome ya pasi makasi ya pema coronavirusi 2 (SARS-CoV-2). ']

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: Na 11 Mars 2020, WHO elimboli COVID-19 mpo ebengama pandemie.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato 2020, OMS emonisaki COVID-19 lokola maladi mabe. ']

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: Mpona kobunda na bokono ya SARS-CoV-2, lisanga nabiso ekolisi lisungi ya toli ya bombango bongo yango nde ezali publie na molongo ya Interneti na Bokundoli ya Medical ya Basoda ya 06 Fefrier 2020.
translated: [' Mpo na kobundisa maladi ya SARS-CoV-2, ekipe na biso esali toli ya noki mpo na kopesa toli mpe oyo esi ebimi na internet na Etid ya minganga ya basoda na mokolo ya 06 sanza ya mibale 2020. ']

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: Ebendi batangi mingi banda publication na yango.
translated: [' Banda ebimi, ebendi likebi ya bato mingi. ']

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Kasi nde yeba ete COVID-19 eza yasika, boyebi na bwania bwabiso mpona yango ezo mata moke-moke na botali makundoli mazo monana pe bisaleli ya cliniki bizo yebana; bongo wana nde eza bastrategie ya diaginosiitiki pe bobelesi ezo landama kotiama à jour.
translated: [' Kasi, yeba ete COVID-19 eza maladi ya sika, boyebi na biso mpe boyebi na biso ezomata mokemoke na kotalela makambo oyo bolukiluki ezali kosalema mpe ndenge minganga bazali kosala yango; Yango wana, mayele ya koyeba maladi mpe kosalisa yango ezali mpe ntango nyonso ya sika. ']

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: Ndakisa masungi ya Diagnositiki na Bobelesi pona COVID-19 ebimisamaki na Comite National ya Sante ya Republika Populaire ya Chine (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), kati-kati ya 16 Janvier 2020 tii 3 Mars 2020, esi ebimisi ba edition sambo bongo nde bacontexte mosusu ezali kobongwana makasi.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, na ndakisa Diagnostiki mpe Bosalisa Masungi mpo na COVID-19 ebimisami na Comite National ya Sante ya Republika Populaire ya Chine (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), kati ya 16 Janvier 2020 kino 3 sanza ya misato 2020, epesi ba edition sambo mobimba mpe ba contexte mosusu ebongwana mosika. ']

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: Sik’oyo lisungi nabiso ezwaki commentaire moko na Zhou et al., bakotisaki lolenge ya pete-pete ya kopesa bapoint na bolandi ya experience nabango ya cliniki.
translated: [' Sikoyo guide na biso ezwaki commentaire ya Zhou et al., bakotisaki likanisi ya pete ya kozwa ba point na kotalela makambo bakutanaki na yango na cliniki. ']

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Mosala nabango ebakisi bilembo yasika mpo na lisungi pe esali botindi ya ntina pona pandemie mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Mosala na bango ebakisaki bilembeteli ya sika mpo na litambwisi na biso mpe lisusu ezali kolobela mingi maladi mabe oyo na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: Toyambi mosala nabango ya ntina monene pe totondi bango botondi.
translated: [' Tondimi mosala monene oyo bazali kosala mpe tozali komonisa botɔndi na biso. ']

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: Kasi, mosala nabango pe ezo senga mis-à -jour na botali Masungi ya Diagnostiki pe Bobelesi yasika pona COVID-19 (Meka version ya sambo) mayekoli ma leki.
translated: [' Kasi, mosala na bango eza mpe na mposa ya bansango ya sika na kolanda malako ya sika ya Diagnostiki mpe ya kobikisa maladi mpo na COVID-19 (Komeka version ya nsambo) mpe bolukiluki euti kosalema. ']

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: Na bolandi edition ya sambo (3 Mars 2020), pona kondima cas bakaniseli ezo senga bosangisi ya itemi moko ya lisolo ya bikila-kila ya epidemiologie na ba itemi mibale ya ba manifestation ya cliniki pona kosala analyse mobimba, to eza na posa etondisa ba itemi misato ya ba manifestation ya cliniki soki ezangi moi ya nsango ya epidemiologie:
translated: [' Na kotalela edition ya sambo (3 Mars 2020), mpona kondima cas bakanisi eza na ntina ya kosangisa eloko moko ya lisolo ya epidemiologie na biloko mibale ya ba manifestation ya cliniki mpo na kosala analyse ya mobimba, to esengeli kokokisa makambo misato ya ba manifestation ya cliniki soki eza te na lisolo ya epidemiologie ya polele: ']

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: Nsango ya Epidemiologie: (1) nsango ya mobembo to ya bofandi na mboka Wuhan pe pembeni nango, to masanga mosusu ya bacas ya COVID-19 esalami lapolo mikolo 14 eleki liboso basymptomi ebanda; (2) nsango ya bokangani na cas ya SARS-CoV-2 (teste positive ya noyau ya acide nucleiki); (3) nsango ya bokangani ma mobeli ya nzoto fievre to basymptomi ya kopema awuti na mboka Wuhan na bisika ya pembeni to lisusu masanga mosusu esika basali lapolo ya bacas ya COVID-19 na mikolo 14 eleki liboso ya basymptomi ya ebandeli; (4) nsango ya bokangani na liboke ya bacas endimami (≥ cas 2 na fievre pe/to basymptomi ya kopema kati ya poso 2 na bisika mike, ndakisa ndako, bilo, kelasi ya sikola, bnb).
translated: [' Lisolo ya maladi mabe: (1) istware ya mobembo to ya kofanda na engumba Wuhan mpe na bisika ya zingazinga, to bisika mosusu oyo bato ya COVID-19 bamonanaki na mikolo 14 oyo eleki liboso ete bilembo ebanda; (2) istware ya kokutana na SARS-CoV-2 oyo ezwaka bato (na ekzame ya aside nucleiki po); (3) istware ya kosolola na bato oyo bazalaki na fievre to bilembo ya mpema euti na engumba Wuhan mpe bisika ya zingazinga, to bamboka mosusu oyo COVID-19 emonanaki na mikolo 14 oyo eleki liboso ete bilembo ebanda; (4) Lisolo ya kosolola na cluster ya bato oyo baza na maladi (≥ 2 oyo bazalaki na fievre mpe/to bilembo ya mpema esalemaki na kati ya mposo 2 na bisika ya mike, na ndakisa ndako, biro, kelasi ya kelasi, mpe bongo na bongo). ']

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: Bamanifestation ya cliniki: (1) fievre pe/to basymptomi ya bopemi; (2) na bilembo ya bilili ya bokono ya COVID-19 ; (3) lotango ya baglobule ya pembe nionso ezo lakisa normale, ekita, to lotango ya lymphocyte ekita na tango ya ebandeli.
translated: [' Bilakiseli ya cliniki: (1) fievre mpe/ to bilembo ya kopema; (2) na biloko ya elilingi ya maladi ya COVID-19; (3) motango nyonso ya baselile ya mpembe ya makila oyo elakisaka normal, ekitaki, to ekitisaki motango ya lymphocyte na ebandeli ya ebandeli ya ebandeli. ']

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: Diagnostiki ya cas endimami esengeli ezala nase ya cas bakaniseli na itemi ata moko ya ekenenge to evidence ya serologie evidence lokola elandi awa: (1) teste ya PCR ya temps reel positive pona SARS-CoV-2; (2) bolandi ya genome mobimba ezo lakisa homogeneite emata na ba coronavirus yasika eyebani; (3) eza positive pona IgM specifiki ya anticorps pe IgG anticorps na SARS-CoV-2 na teste ya serume; to mbongwana na IgM ya SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG anticorps uta negative ti positive, to kobuta ya titer ≥ mbala 4 na phase ya recouvrement likolo ya cas phase ya songe.
translated: [' Diagnostiki ya cas endimisami esengeli kozala likolo ya moto oyo bakanisi aza na itemi moko ya biloko epesaka maladi to bilembeteli ya serologie na ndenge elandi: (1) ekzame ya PCR na ntango ya solo emoni SARS-CoV-2; (2) genome mobimba ya virisi emonisi ndenge moko mingi na bacoronavirisi ya sika oyo eyebani; (3) positive mpo na anticorps ya sikisiki ya IgM mpe anticorps ya IgG na SARS-CoV-2 na ekzame ya serum; to mbongwana ya anticorps ya IgG ya SARS-CoV-specifiki longwa na negative kino na oyo ya malamu, to titer komata mbala ≥4 na eteni ya kobikisama likolo ya oyo na eteni ya makasi. ']

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: Toko komona ete teste ya PCR ya temps reel pona acide nucleiki na nzela ya kopemela to echantillon ya makila ebakisamaki na ba edition ya mibale (18 Janvier 2020) pe ya misato (22 Janvier 2020).
translated: [' Tokoki komona ete ekzame ya PCR na ntango ya solo mpo na aside nucleiki na nzela ya kopema to babakisaki ba echantillon ya makila na ba edition ya mibale (18 sanza ya liboso 2020) mpe ya misato (22 sanza ya liboso 2020). ']

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: Bokundoli ya ekenenge ya echantillon ya makila ebakisamaki na ba edition ya mine (27 Janvier 2020) pe ya mitano (8 Février 2020); pe evidence ya serologie ebakisamaki na edition ya sambo .
translated: [' Komona maladi ya echantillon ya makila ebakisamaki na mokolo ya minei (27 sanza ya liboso 2020) mpe ya mitano (8 sanza ya mibale 2020); Mpe na nsima bilembeteli ya serologie ebakisamaki na ebimeli ya nsambo. ']

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: Bambongwana yango na botali ya bakundoli elandelaki mosala ete pona koluka bisaleli ya diaginositiki ya bombango pona bokundoli optimal ya acide nucleiki, elongo na echantillon ya nzela ya bopemeli tia nakati echantillon ya makila, mutu ebutisaki bobelemi ya ba endimeli ya ndenge ebele, pe esungaki bomemi ya resultat ya anticorps specifiki positive na bacritiki endimama.
translated: [' Mbongwana oyo na kolanda bato ya mayele bakobaki mosala oyo mpo na koluka eloko ya malamu ya komona aside nucleiki mpo na koyeba yango noki, mpe ba echantillon oyo euti na nzela ya kopema ata mpe kozwa echantillon ya makila, oyo ebakisaki kozala na ba echantillon ekeseni, mpe esungaki komema resultat ya anticorps ya sikisiki ya malamu na bacritere endimami. ']

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: Lisusu, ba evidence ezo matisama oyo ezo rappeler biso ete to bimisa miso na babeli baza atypiki symptomatiki na asymptomatiki.
translated: [' Longola yango, ezali na bilembeteli mingi oyo ezali kokundwela biso kokeba na bato ya maladi oyo bazali na basymptomi te mpe oyo bazali na bilembo te. ']

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: Pona kolanda, graphiki ya Zhou et al. esengeli etiamama à jour, lokola batiaki moto azanga basymptome cliniki esika ya “riske ya moke“.
translated: [' Yango wana, karte ya flux ya Zhou et al. esengeli ezala ya sika, mpo batyaki moto oyo azangi bilembo ya cliniki lokola "likama moke". ']

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: Systemi ya ba point pe esengeli ezala vérifié na masaleli pe mayekoli ya cliniki ya kobakisa.
translated: [' Systemi ya ba point esengeli mpe kondimisama na mayele mosusu ya cliniki mpe na boyekoli. ']

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: Mpona kosukisa, toza na elikia ete ba evidence ya libela ekobakisama pe ebengi batangi bapesa ndenge bamoneli.
translated: [' Mpo na kosukisa, toza na elikya ete bilembeteli mingi ya polele oyo ekoya mpe tokobenga batángi bapesa makanisi na bango. ']

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: Mpona diaginositiki ya “cas ekaniselami” pe “endimami” tozo belela kolanda pe kotosa nde masungi yasika mazo uta na bikolo na bango.
translated: [' Mpo na diagnostiki ya "cas ekaniseli" mpe "endimami", tozopesa likanisi ya kolandela mpe kotosa malako ya sika ya bamboka na bango. ']

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: Lisanga nabiso pe ekosala mis a jour na tango ekoka lisungi nabiso pona kopesa lisalisi.
translated: [' Ekipi na biso ekobongisa mpe na ntango malamu litambwisi na biso mpo na kopesa lisalisi. ']

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: Bangladesh epesi rapor ete bato misato bakufi na COVID-19, koleka mikolo misusu
translated: [' Bangladesh elobi ete bato mitano bakufi mpo na COVID-19, motango ya makasi mokolo na mokolo ']

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: Lobi, Bangladesh epesi sango ete bato mitano bakufi na COVID-19 na mokolo moko.
translated: [' Lobi, Bangladesh endimi ete bato mitano bakufi mpo na COVID-19 na mokolo wana. ']

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: Oyo ezali kufa ya likolo koleka na virisi oyo.
translated: [' Oyo eza motango eleki monene ya bato bakufaki na mokolo moko mpo na virisi. ']

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: Lobi, Institut ya Bangladesh ya bapandemi, Kolandela Maladi na Bolukiluki (IEDCR) balobi ete motango bato bazali na maladi ezali 114 mpe 33 oyo bazalaki kofanda na ndako babiki.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya lobi, Institut ya baepidemiologie ya Bangladesh, Kolandela Maladi mpe Bolukiluki (IEDCR) elobaki ete motango ya bato oyo bazwaki maladi ezalaki na bato 114 oyo bazalaki kobela mpe bato 33 oyo babikaki oyo bazalaki kofanda na ndako. ']

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: Bato 17 bakufi.
translated: [' Bato 17 bakufaki na mikanda ya kala. ']

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: Na basango ya internet, Directeur ya IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, alobi ete bato oyo bakufi ezali mibali mibale mpe basi mibale.
translated: [' Na bansango ya internet, diretere ya IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, alobaki ete makama ya liwa ezalaki na mibali minei mpe moko ya basi. ']

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: Mpona Dr Meerjady, mibale bazali na mibu 60, mibale mibu kati na 51 te 60, mpe moko kati na mibu 41 te 50.
translated: [' Na kotalela Dr Meerjady, bato mibale ya kobela bazalaki na mibu koleka 60, mibale kati ya 51 pe 60, mpe moko ya mibu 41-50. ']

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: Alobi mpe ete mibale ya bato oyo bakufi bawuti Dhaka.
translated: [' Alobaki lisusu ete mibale kati na bato oyo bakufaki bautaki Dhaka. ']

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: Organization Mondial ya Sante (OMS) ebengi COVID-19 pandemi mokolo ya 11 sanza ya liboso.
translated: [' Organisation Mondial ya Sante (OMS) ebengaki COVID-19 pandemi mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: Moto azali kosala na lepital alobi na Anadolu Agency, esika ya basango ya mboka, moko ya bato oyo akufi ezali Jalal Saifur Rahman, Directeur ya commission ya Kotelema-Moyibi, oyo azalaki na lepital ya Kuwait Maitree.
translated: [' Mokonzi moko ya lopitalo alobaki na Anadolu Agency, esika moko ya kopanza bansango ya mboka, ete moko ya bato oyo bakufaki eza Jalal Saifur Rahman, mokambi ya commission ya kobundisa kanyaka ya Bengali, oyo babatelaki ye na lopitalo ya Kuwait Maitree. ']

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: Na mokolo ya mposo, na video ya basango na internet, Ministre ya nzela na Bangladesh Obaidul Quader alobaki ete babis ekokanga mpona mikolo ebele, ti mokolo ya mposo oyo ezali koyaka.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya pɔsɔ, na liyebisi ya video na internet, Ministre ya transport ya nzela ya Bangladesh mpe ya bagbagba Obaidul Quader alobaki ete bisi ya bato nyonso ekokangama mpona ntango molai koleka ndenge bakanaki na ebandeli, kino na mokolo ya poso oyo ezoya. ']

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: Kokanga ya babis oyo ebandaki mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato mpe esengelaki esila mokolo ya mposo, sanza ya minei na mokolo ya 4.
translated: [' Bokangami oyo ya transport ya bato ebandaki liboso na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato mpe bakanaki kosuka na mokolo ya poso, 4 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: Komema biloko oyo ezali na ntina – bankisi, mafuta ya mituka na ya bilei – ekoki koleka.
translated: [' Transport ya biloko ya ntina -- ya monganga, ya carburant mpe ya bilei -- epesamaki kaka nzela. ']

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: Bamaladi ya liboso ya COVID-19 na Bangladesh ezalaki mokolo ya 8 sanza ya misato, na bato mibale oyo bautaki Italie mpe mwasi ya moko na bango.
translated: [' Makambo ya liboso oyo bamonaki ete ezalaki na COVID-19 na Bangladesh ezalaki mokolo ya 8 sanza ya misato, na bato mibale oyo bautaki Italie mpe lisusu mwasi ya moko na bango. ']

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato, bato oyo misato babikaki.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato, bato oyo misato basilaki kobika. ']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: SARS-Cov-2 eleki bamaladi moko na milio na mokili mobimba
translated: [' SARS-CoV-2 eleki milio moko ya maladi na mokili mobimba ']

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: Na mokolo ya minei, motango ya ba oyo babeli na SARS-CoV-2 maladi ya coronavirisi elekaki milio moko na mokili, elobi makomi ya Johns Hopkins.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya minei, bato nyonso oyo babelaki SARS-CoV-2 oyo bazwaki maladi ya coronavirisi balekaki milio moko na mokili mobimba, bansango ya universite ya Johns Hopkins emonisaki yango. ']

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: Kufa 52 ezalaki ya COVID-19, maladi oyo euti na coronavirisi.
translated: [' Pene ya bato nkoto 52 oyo bakufaki bazalaki na COVID-19, maladi oyo euti na coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: Molongi wana eye mokolo oyo Malawi na Zambie bazalaki na ya bango ya liboso oyo azalaki kobela coronavirisi.
translated: [' Likambo monene esalemaki mokolo oyo Malawi endimaki maladi na yango ya liboso ya coronavirisi mpe Zambie ezalaki na liwa na yango ya liboso oyo eutaki na coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: Na Corée ya Nordi balobaki ete, na mokolo ya minei, bazalaki mboka ya liboso kati na bamboka oyo bazalaki na bato ya kobela coronavirisi te.
translated: [' Corée ya nordi elobaki, na mokolo ya minei, ezalaki moko ya mwa bamboka oyo etikali na maladi ya coronavirisi te. ']

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: Lobi, Organization Mondial ya Sante epesi sango ya 1,051,635 oyo bazalaki kobela mpe 79,332 na mokolo 1 uta 10h Ngonga ya Europe (0800UTC) na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya minei 4.
translated: [' Na lobi, Organisation Mondial ya Sante epesi lapolo ya bato ya kobela 1,051,635, kati na bango bato 79,332 na bangonga ntuku mibale na minei liboso ya ngonga ya 10 na ntongo na ngonga ya Europe centrale (0800 UTC) na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: Na États-Unis, koleka ya bato ya kobela nkoto 244 na coronavirisi, mpe kufa 5,900.
translated: [' Na Etats Unis, koleka nkóto 244 ya bato ya kobela na coronavirisi bakomaki yango, mpe ezalaki kosangisa bato pene ya 5,900 oyo bakufaki. ']

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: Basango ya CBS elobi ete, nsima ya Université ya Johns Hopkins, bato ya kokufa na maladi ya coronavirisi bazalaki 1,000 na mokolo ya misato.
translated: [' Bansango ya CBS elobaki, bazongelaki bansango ya universite ya Johns Hopkins, bato ya Etats-Unis bakufaki na mokolo ya misato mpo na maladi ya coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: Na mokili, bamboka batieli mibeko makasi mpona kosukisa kopalangana ya virisi.
translated: [' Na mokili mobimba, mikili elobaki ete mibeko ya makasi ezali mpo na kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: Na mokolo ya minei, Sergei Sobyanin, Maire ya Moscow, apusaki konfinema ti mokolo ya 1 sanza ya mitano.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya minei, Sergei Sobyanin, mokonzi ya Moscou, apusaki konfinema ya engumba na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya mitano. ']

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: Na mboka nyonso, Mokambi Vladimir Putin alobaki ete bato ya Russie bakotikala kozwa lifuti ata soki bazali kokende mosala te ti sanza ya minei mokolo ya 30.
translated: [' Na mboka mobimba, Prezida Vladimir Putin alobaki ete bato ya Russie bakokoba kofuta bango kozanga kokende mosala kino na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: Parlement ya Portugal aponaki kopusa konfinema na mikolo 15; vote elekaki na 215 vote, zomi bazalaki te, mpe moko aboyaki yango.
translated: [' Parlement ya Portugal evotelaki mpo na kobakisa mikolo 15 ya urgence ya ekolo; Vote elekaki na bavote 215 oyo elongi, bato zomi baboyaki, mpe vote moko elongi. ']

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: Na Arabie Saudi bapusaki konfinema na bamboka ya santu ya Mecca na Medina mpona mokolo mobimba; liboso, konfinema ezalaki kaka mpona 3h ya mpokwa ti 6h ya ntongo.
translated: [' Arabie Saudite ebakisaki ngonga ya kobima na bingumba mosantu ya Mecque mpe Medina mpo eumela mokolo mobimba; Liboso, ngonga ya kobima libanda ezalaki kosalema kaka na kati ya ngonga ya 3 ya butu kino ngonga ya 6 ya ntongo. ']

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: Thailand ebongamaki na couvre-fe na 10h ya mpokwa ti 4h ya ntongo.
translated: [' Thaïlande ezalaki na likanisi ya kosalela ngonga ya kobima libanda ya ndako na kati ya ngonga ya 10 ya butu kino na ngonga ya 4 ya ntongo. ']

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: Gouverneur ya Ohio, Mike DeWine alobaki ete egumba ekopusa kofanda-na-ndako ti mokolo ya 1 ya sanza ya mitano.
translated: [' Gouverneur ya Ohio, Mike DeWine, alobaki ete etuka ebakiselaki etinda na bango ya kofanda na ndako kino na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya mitano. ']

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: Babutik na Australie basukisaki boni y aba papiergenik moto moko akoki ko somba
translated: [' Babutik na Australie bakitisaka ndelo ya papiergenik na mombongo moko ']

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: Na mokolo ya lomingo mpe ya mposo nab utu, butik ya Australie babengi Woolworths na Coles batiaki mibeko na kosomba papiergenik na moko to mibale na moto na babutik nyonso ya mboka.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya lomingo mpe ya pɔsɔ na mpokwa, babutik ya Australie Woolworths na Coles bakitisaki mibeko na bango ya kosomba papiergenik na mibale mpe liboke moko na mombongo nyonso na babutik nyonso na nivo ya mboka, ndenge ezalaka. ']

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI mpe akotisaki mibeko ya moko kaka na moto, na mokolo ya liboso.
translated: [' ALDI mpe ekɔtisaki limit ya paketi moko, na mokolo ya yambo. ']

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: Mibeko oyo ekomamaki na mokanda libanda ya butik mpe na Facebook na bango.
translated: [' Bandelo oyo etyamaki lokola bansango na bisika ya kolandela, mpe na basite ya Facebook ya chaine. ']

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: Bato bazalaki kosomba ebele mpona bomo ete COVID-19 ekoki kotinda bato bakangama na ndako.
translated: [' Balobi ete basombi bazalaki kobomba biloko mpo bazalaki kobanga COVID-19 soki bato basengeli komifandela. ']

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: Na mokolo ya misato, Woolworths mpe ekotisi mibeko na misala ya livraison-domicile na papiergenik boni moto akoki kosomba.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya misato, Woolworths mpe epekisaki kosomba bapapye ya kabine mpo na kotinda biloko na ndako na pakete moko na komande. ']

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: Mibeko oyo elandaki ya minei kaka na moto na Woolworths na Coles mokolo ya 4 na 5 sanza ya misato.
translated: [' Mbongwana oyo esalemaki nsima ya bipekiseli minei ya kala ya mombongo mokomoko oyo Woolworths na Coles babimisaki na mokolo ya 4 mpe 5 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: Coles, na basango na ye ya mokolo ya 8 sanza ya misato, alobaki ete mibeko ya minei-na-moto ekotaki, ‘’babutik misusu biloko ezali kosila kaka na ngonga moko soki biloko eye mpe abengi mposa ya bato ‘ya koleka’, ntango ALDI, na Facebook na mokolo ya mibale abengaki yango ‘Ya koleka’.
translated: [' Coles, na bapanzi-sango na ye ya mokolo ya 8 sanza ya misato, alobaki ete na epekiseli ya maboke minei, "babutik mingi eza kaka koteka na ngonga moko nsima ya kokabola biloko", mpe abengaki mposa wana "ndenge esalema naino te", ntango ALDI, na Facebook na mokolo ya mibale, abengaki yango "ndenge bakanisaki te". ']

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: Koteka ‘emataki makasi’ mposo oyo eleki, elobi moto ya Woolworths.
translated: [' Mombongo emataki na "bokoli makasi" mposo eleki, ndenge molobeli ya Woolworths alobaki. ']

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: Butik ya Costo a Canberra mpe asukisaki na mibale na moto mposo oyo eleki.
translated: [' Butik ya Costco na Canberra mpe etiaki ndelo na motango oyo bapesaki nzela na maboke mibale mposo eleki. ']

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: Mpona kosepelisa mitungisi oyo biloko ezalaki kosila, Coles asengaki biloko mingi, Woolwoths asengaki mpe mingi, AlDI asengaki biloko ya mokolo ya misato oyo ezali koyaka mikolo mingi liboso.
translated: [' Mpo na kokitisa lisusu kozanga, Coles asengaki bapakete ya minene na bato oyo bazalaki koteka biloko mpe kobakisa motango ya kokabola biloko, Woolworths asengaki biloko ebakisama, mpe ALDI asalaki biloko mpo na special ya mokolo ya misato oyo bakanaki kozwa yango na ebandeli. ']

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman, Executive Directeur ya Association ya Bateki na Australie alobaki ete, bateki bazali komatisa biloko ya koteka, kasi mibeko ya mboka ezali kotungisa bango makasi.
translated: [' Russell Zimmerman, mokambi ya lisanga ya bato batekaka biloko na Australie, alobaki ete bato oyo batɛkaka biloko balukaka komatisa biloko, kasi mibeko ya conseil ya mboka mpo na ngonga ya kokabola mituka ya minene ezali kosala ete ezala mpasi. ']

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: Bato bayeba ete makasi ya kosala biloko esengeli emata mpona kotondisa mposa ya bato.
translated: [' Azali komizela na komata ya ntalo ya biloko oyo bazali kobimisa, mpo bakompanyi oyo ezali koteka biloko ezali koluka kokokisa bamposa ya bato, mpe biloko ya ntina mingi te. ']

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: Na mokolo ya mibale, ALDI alobaki ete nsima oyo babimisaki biloko mikolo liboso, babutik misusu bako zala na Special ya mokolo ya misato te.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya mibale, ALDI alobaki ete nsima ya kobima ya liboso ya biloko, babutik mosusu bakoki te kosala spécial ya mokolo ya misato. ']

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: Na rapor ya news.com.au, Dr Gary Mortimer, moteki ya koyeba makasi na Universite ya Technologu na Queensland alobaki babutik ekotisaka biloko batu nyonso.
translated: [' Na rapore ya News.com.au, Dr Gary Mortimer, moto ya mayele na makambo ya koteka na Université ya Teknolozi ya Queensland, alobaki ete babutik etondaka biloko wana butu nyonso. ']

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: Amonaki ete papiergenik ezali eloko ya monene, mpona bongo te ekotaka mukie, mpe ekendeke noki, ekikaka bisika ya butik pamba, yango nde ekotisaka lisusu kobanga ya kosila ya biloko.
translated: [' Abongolaki papiergenik ya kabine eza eloko moko ya monene, yango esalaka ete motango ya biloko ezala mingi te, mpe, soki batɛki yango, etikaka bisika minene ya kobomba biloko mpamba, yango ebakisaka mpasi na mayoki ya kozanga. ']

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: ‘’Coles na Woolworths balobi solo (ete) soki biloko ezalaki mingi na butik, soki biloko lokola papiergenik na kisi ya kosokola maboko ekokaki (kosombama) na mingi, nkasi bomo mpe ekiti’’ elobi Russell Zimmerman na Basango ya ABC.
translated: [' "Coles na Woolworths baza na likanisi [ete] soki biloko ezalaki mingi na butik, soki eloko lokola ba roll ya bawese mpe nkisi ya kopetola ekoki kozala [kosomba] mpe eza wana na motango, mbala mosusu okokitisa kobanga" wana maloba ya Russell Zimmerman per ABC News. ']

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: Moto oyo asalaka ba Papiergenik nkombo Who Gives a Crap alobi na mokolo ya misato oyo eleki bazalaki lisusu na biloko te.
translated: [' Mokeli ya papiergenik oyo esalemi lisusu Who Gives a Crap alobaki na mokolo ya misato eleki ete biloko na bango esili. ']

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: Kimberly-Clark, oyo asalaka papier ya Kleenex, na mosali ya papier ya Solaris oyo esalaka Sorbent, balobaki ete bazali na mosala 24/7 mpona kotondisa mposa ya bato, nsima ya basango ya news.com.au.
translated: [' Kimberly-Clark, oyo asalaka Kleenex Toilet Tissue, mpe Solaris Paper oyo esalaka Sorbent, balobaki mingi ete bazalaki kosala 24/7 mpona kobatela biloko oyo bazalaki kopesa, ndenge rapore ya News.com.au elobi. ']

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com, bato ya mosala ya ba ndako balobaki ete bakolo ndako misusu bazalaki kopesa paiergenik ya ofele na moto ya liboso oyo akopesa talo mpona kosomba ndako, ntango bato bazalaki kosomba lisusu mingi te mpo ete bazalaki na eloko te ya kosala na suka ya mposo ya mokolo ya basali.
translated: [' Domain.com, site moko ya koteka bandako, elobaki ete bato mosusu oyo batɛkaka bandako bapesaki papiergenik ya ofele na moto ya liboso oyo apesaki mbongo na bisika ya koteka na Melbourne, ntango bato bazalaki koteka mingi te mpo basombi bazalaki na ntango ya konje na wikende ya molai ya mokolo ya basali. ']

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: Basango ya mokolo ya minei ya NT News, basanga ya kotanga ya Darwin, ezalaki na papier mwambe oyo bato bakokaki kokata mpona kosalisa lekola papiergenik.
translated: [' Ebimeli ya mokolo ya minei ya NT News, zulunalo oyo ebimaka mokolo na mokolo na Darwin, ezalaki na insert ya nkasa mwambe oyo ezalaki mpona kokata yango mpe kosalela yango lokola papiergenik. ']

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: Liboso babutik balingaki te kokotisa mibeko, rapor ya Australi ya ABC elobi mokolo ya 3 ya sanza ya misato bazalaki na mposa te ya kosukisa biloko boni bato bazalaki kosomba.
translated: [' Na ebandeli babutik bazalaki kolinga te kotya mibeko, na kotalela lapolo ya ABC ya Australie na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato oyo balobaki ete baza na likanisi moko te ya kokotisa mibeko mpona kosomba biloko wana. ']

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman alobaki ete bato bazali mpe na mposa makasi ya biloko misusu, lokola bamask, bakisi ya bopeto, bilei ya kokauka, ya kosokola maboko mpe farine.
translated: [' Russell Zimmerman abakisaki ete bato mingi balukaka mpe biloko mosusu, na ndakisa bamask, nkisi ya kopetola nzoto, biloko ya kokauka, kosokola maboko mpe farine. ']

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: Mpe, libanda ya Australie, na mokolo ya loming nab utu na butik ya Ocado na Angleterre bamonaki ete bato bazalaki kosomba lisusu mingi ya papiergenik ya Andre te na mibale ya packet ya 12.
translated: [' Ndenge moko, libanda ya Australie, na mokolo ya lomingo na mpokwa na internet na magazini monene ya Grande Bretagne Ocado emonanaki ete bazalaki kosomba mingi te papiergenik ya Andres na maboke mibale ya baroll 12. ']

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: Organization Mondial ya Sante ebengi COVID-19 pandemi
translated: [' Organisation Mondial ya Sante ebengi COVID-19 pandemi ']

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: Na mokolo ya misato, Organisation Mondial ya Sante (OMS) ebengaki kopalangana ya maladi oyo ya COVID-19 – Maladi oyo euti na coronavirisi ya SARS-CoV-2 – ezali pandemi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya misato, Organisation Mondial ya Sante (OMS) ebengaki kobima ya maladi ya COVID-19 oyo ezali kokoba – maladi oyo euti na coronavirisi SARS-CoV-2 — ezali maladi mabe. ']

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: Ata ete nkombo ‘pandemi’ elandi kaka ndege nini malady etamboli molayi, kasi makasi na yango te, OMS emonaki ntina ya bagouvernema babanda mosala:
translated: [' Ata soki liloba "pandemi" elimboli kaka ndenge maladi moko epanzani mingi, kasi te ndenge nini maladi ya sikisiki eza likama, OMS emonaki ntina ya kopusa baguvernema na kosala eloko: ']

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: ‘’Bamboka nyonso bakoki kosukisa pandemic oyo.
translated: [" ''Mikili nyonso ekoki kaka kobongola nzela ya maladi mabe oyo. "]

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: Soki bamboka bamoni, basali baekzame, ba salisi bato, batie konfinema mpe balandeli mpe basangani bato mpona etumba,’’ elobi Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, irector-general ya OMS.
translated: [' Soki mikili bamoni, bamekaka, kosalisa bato, bamitangola, kolandela mpe koyanganisa bato na bango na ndenge ya kobundisa yango," wana maloba ya Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Diretere général ya OMS. ']

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: ‘’tozali na kobanga na ndenge nini ezali kopalangana mpe na ndenge nini eloko te ezali kosalema.’’
translated: [' "Tozali komitungisa mingi na ndenge ya nsɔmɔ ya kopalangana mpe ya makasi mpe na nivo ya kobangisa ya kozanga kosala eloko." ']

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: Elobi Dr. Tom Frieden, oyo azalaki directeur ya kala ya Esika oyo Elandelaka bamaladi mpe Esukisaka yango mpona Etats Unis, pandemic ezala ‘ya bikamwa.’
translated: [' Monganga Tom Frieden, oyo azalaki kala diretere ya centre ya kobundisa mpe kopekisa maladi na Etats-Unis, maladi mabe "esalemá naino te." ']

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: Alobi ete, na oyi basango ya CNN epesaki na sanza ya mibale, ‘’libanda ya influenza, maladi mosusu te ya mpema elandanaki na likama to na kopalangana na mokili.’’
translated: [" Alobaki, na maloba oyo CNN ebimisaki na sanza ya mibale, ''longola kaka grippe, virisi mosusu te ya mpema elandeli banda kobima tii na kopalangana ya mokili mobimba ntango nyonso''. "]

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: Ghebreyesus alobaki mpe bongo, alobaki ‘’nani totikali komona pandemi oyo salami na coronavirisi te’.’
translated: [" Ghebreyesus amonisaki likanisi ya ndenge moko, alobaki ''tomona naino te pandemi oyo euti na coronavirisi''. "]

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: Alobi lisusu, ‘’mpe nani tomona te pandemi oyo ekoki kosukisama.’’
translated: [' Akobaki boye, "mpe tomoná naino te maladi mabe oyo ekoki koyangelama na ntango moko." ']

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: Ebengami ya pandemi euti na ekateli ya OMS na sanza ya liboso kobenga yango likama ya kolongono mpona mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Status ya sika lokola maladi mabe euti na ekateli ya OMS na sanza ya liboso ya kobenga maladi oyo eza likama ya kolongono ya nzoto oyo ezali kotungisa mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: Dr ya Institu ya BaAlergie a Etats Unis na ya ba Maladi Anthony Fauci, alobaki ‘’nsima makambo eko beba makasi.’’
translated: [' Mokambi ya Institut National d\'Alergie et Infectious Disease, Monganga Anthony Fauci, alobaki na ntina ya maladi oyo, "na nse, ekobeba lisusu makasi." ']

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: Na mokolo ya minei, Basango ya Bomoko bapesi rapor ete kati 126,000 ya ba oyo babelaki COVID-19 na mokili 4,600 bakufaki.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya minei, Associated Press elobaki ete bato ya kobela COVID-19 bazalaki pene ya 126,000 na mokili mobimba, yango esalaki ete bato koleka 4,600 bakufa. ']

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Na 2019-20 Pandemi ya coronavirisi ezali pandemic ya coronavirisi ya 2019 (COVID-19), euti na maladi ya mpema ya coronavirisi 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: [' Pandemi ya coronavirisi 2019–20 ezali pandemi oyo esilaka te na maladi ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19), euti na maladi makasi ya mpema coronavirisi 2 (SARS-CoV-2). ']

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: Maladi emonanaki na Whuhan, Chine, na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, ekomaki likama ya kolongono ya bato mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso 2020, mpe ebengami pandemi mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato 2020.
translated: [' Maladi emonanaki na Wuhan, Chine, na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, balobaki ete eza likama ya kolongono ya nzoto oyo ezali kotungisa mokili mobimba na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso 2020, mpe eyebani lokola maladi mabe mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato 2020. ']

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: Na sanza ya minei mokolo ya 10 2020, bato 1.61milio bazalaki na COVID-19 ezalaka na bamboka mpe bisika 210, oyo ememaki kufa 97,000.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, pene ya bato 1.61 milio babelaki COVID-19 na mikili mpe bisika 210, oyo ebomaki bato pene ya 97,000. ']

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: Bato 364,000 bakiki.
translated: [' Bato pene na 364 000 babiki. ']

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: Kufa ezali na 4% na Chine, na mokili ezali na 13.04% na Algerie mpe .08% na Nouvelle Zealand.
translated: [' Bato bakanisi ete bato oyo bakufaki na maladi wana eza 4% na Chine, kasi na mokili mobimba ezalaki 13,04% na Algérie kino na .08% na Nouvelle-Zélande. ']

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: Basymptomi ezali, fefele, kosukosu na mpema ya mokuse.
translated: [' Bilembo oyo emonanaka mingi ezali fievre, kosukosu mpe mpema mokuse. ']

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Bacomplication ezali pneumonia, mpasi na kopema.
translated: [' Bacomplication eko kozala panzi pe pasi makasi ya kopema. ']

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Soki malady ekoteli nzoto lelo, ekozwa mikolo mitano to zomi na mibale mpona basymptom ebanda.
translated: [' Ntango banda na komona bilembo kino bobimi ya basymptomi ezalaka mingimingi pene ya mikolo mitano, kasi ekoki kozala mikolo mibale kino zomi na minei. ']

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: Vaccin to kisi na yango eyebani te.
translated: [' Vaccin to kisi ya sikisiki ya antivirusi eyebani te. ']

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: Liboso bako salisa basymptom mpe kosunga yo obika. Mpona kosukisa maladi esengeli yo osokola maboko, kanga zolo to monoko soki ozali kokosola, fanda mosika na bato, mpe kososola na komona ba oyo bazali na konfinema mpo ete bazalaki esika moko na moto oyo azwaki maladi yando.
translated: [' Kosalisama ya liboso ezali nkisi ya basymptomi mpe ya kosunga. Mayele ya komibatela oyo endimami ezali kosokola maboko, kozipa monoko ntango ozali kokosola, kozala mosika na bato mosusu, mpe kolandela mpe komifandela mpo na bato oyo bakanisi ete baza na maladi. ']

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: Mikonzi na mokili mobimba batie mibeko mpona kokanga ba nzela, konfinema, ngonga ya kokota mpe kobima ndako, biloko ya kobatela nzoto na bisika ya mosala, mpe kokanga bisika.
translated: [' Bakonzi na mokili mobimba basalaki na kosalela bipekiseli ya kosala mobembo, konfinema, ngonga ya kobima ndako, kolandela makama na esika ya mosala, mpe kokanga bisika. ']

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: Pandemi emonisi nkita ya mokili mpasi, kopusa to kokata masano, ba eklesia, makambo ya politik na ya kosepela, mpe ndenge biloko ezali lisusu mingi te na mokili mpo ete bato bazalaki kosomba mingi na bomo.
translated: [' Maladi mabe esali ete nkita ya mokili mobimba ebeba, kozongisa to kokata masano, makambo ya losambo, ya politiki mpe ya bonkɔkɔ, mpe kozanga biloko mingi oyo ebakisamaki mpo bato basombaki yango na nsɔmɔ. ']

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: Bakelasi na ba universite bakangi na mokili mobimba to na ba egumba na ba mboka 193, etungisi bana ya kelasi 99.4 pourcent ya population.
translated: [' Biteyelo mpe ba iniversite bakangi yango na mboka mobimba to na mboka na mikili 193, yango epesi mpasi na bato pene ya 99,4 na kati ya mokama ya bayekoli nyonso na mokili. ']

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: Kozanga koyeba maloba ya solo na virisi etandani na internet, mpe xenophobie emonani mingi na koyina ya bachinois, mpe bato ya Est na Sud ya Est ya Asie mpe ba oyo ya pene, mpe ba oyo na bisika oyo virisi ezali.
translated: [' Bansango ya lokuta etali virisi epanzani na internet, mpe ezalaki na makambo ya xenophobie mpe koponapona bato ya Chine, bato mosusu ya este mpe ya sudi este ya Asie mpe ndenge bazalaki komonana, mpe misusu oyo euti na bisika oyo eza na bato mingi ya virisi. ']

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: Nsima ya kokanga ba nzela, carbone na mopepe ekiti.
translated: [' Mpo na kokita ya mibembo mpe kokanga bakompanyi ya minene, kobeba ya mopɛpɛ mpe kobimisa carbone ekitaki. ']

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: Bakonzi na Wuhan, Chine (egumba ya monene ya Hubei) bamonaki kobela mingi ya pneumonia mokolo ya 31 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, mpe etid ebandaki mpona kososola yango ebandeli ya sanza ya liboso 2020.
translated: [' Bakonzi ya kolongono na Wuhan, Chine (mboka-mokonzi ya etuka ya Hubei) bamonaki ete bato mingi babelaki pneumonia oyo bazalaki na ntina eyebani te na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, mpe bolukiluki ebandaki na ebandeli ya sanza ya liboso 2020. ']

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: Ba oyo babelaki bautaki nzando ya banyama ya Huanan mpe elobami ete virisi euti kuna mpe ezali zoonotic.
translated: [' Ba oyo babelaki mingi bazalaki na boyokani na Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market mpe yango wana bakanisi ete virisi wana euti na banyama. ']

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: Virisi oyo ememi maladi ebengami SARS-CoV-2, virisi ya sika oyo euti na coronavirisi ya bangembo, coronavirisi ya bapagolin na SARS-CoV. Moto ya liboso oyo azalaki na basymptomi abelaki mokolo ya 1 sanza ya zomi na mibale na 2019, mpe moto wana bayebaki te soki ye awutaki nzando wana.
translated: [' Virisi oyo ebimisaki maladi wana eyebani na nkombo ya SARS-CoV-2, virisi moko ya sika oyo bamonaki ekokani mpenza na ba coronavirisi ya ngembo, ba coronavirusi ya bapangolin, mpe SARS-CoV.Moto ya liboso oyo ayebani oyo azalaki na bilembo ya bilembo bamonaki na nsima ete abɛlaki na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, mpe moto yango azalaki te na boyokani oyo emonanaki na etuluku ya zando ya mbula na nsima. ']

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: Na ba oyo babelaki na 2019, mingi ya ndambo na bango eyabanaki ete bautaki zando.
translated: [' Na etuluku ya liboso ya bato ya maladi oyo balobaki na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019, ndambo mibale na kati ya misato emonanaki ete eza na boyokani na bazando. ']

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato 2020, rapor euti Sud ya Chine na Morning Post elobaki ete kobela ebandaki na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya zomi na moko 2019, na moto ya miaka 55 na Hubei. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya mibale 2020, OMS elobaki bato ya kobela ekitaki na Chine kasi ebandaki komata na Italy, na Iran mpe na Core ya Sud, bato ya kobela balekaki oyo ya Chine.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato 2020, lapolo moko ya South China Morning Post elobaki ete likambo oyo bazolandela banda na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya zomi na moko 2019, na elenge moko ya mibu 55 oyo autaki na etuka ya Hubei, mbala mosusu ezalaki ya liboso. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya mibale 2020, OMS elobaki ete, ndenge balobi ete bato ya sika ya maladi bakitaki na Chine kasi na mbalakaka emataki na Italie, Iran, mpe Core ya Sud, motango ya bato ya sika oyo baza na maladi libanda ya Chine elekaki motango ya bato ya sika na kati ya Chine mpo na mbala ya liboso. ']

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: Ekoki koloba ete toyebi te bato boni bazali na kobela kati na ba oyo bazali na basymptomi mukie.
translated: [' Ekoki kozala na rapore ya solo ya bato oyo baza na maladi, mingimingi na kati ya bato oyo baza na bilembo ya pete. ']

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya mibale, bato ya kobela mukie bazalaki bajeune, ba oyo ya miaka 19 ekiti bazalaki 2.4% na mikili. Mokonzi ya etid ya science na Angleterre, Patrick Vallance, amonaki ete 60% ya population na Bretagne esengeli bazwa maladi mpo ete nzoto ya bato ebanda kolenda yango.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya mibale, kaka bato moke nde bazwaki yango na kati ya bilenge, mpe bato 19 wana mpe na nse bazalaki 2.4% ya bato oyo bazwaki yango na mokili mobimba. Mopesi-toli monene ya Royaume-Uni na makambo ya siansi, Patrick Vallance, alobaki ete 60% ya bato ya Grande Bretagne bakozala na mposa ya kozwa maladi liboso ete makoki ya komibatela malamu ya etonga ekoka kosalema. ']

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: Bacas ezali boni ya bato bazali na COVID-19, ba oyo baekzame elobi ete bazali na yango, elobi mibeko.
translated: [' Ba cas etali motango ya bato oyo basalaki bango ekzame ya COVID-19, mpe oyo ekzame na bango emonani ete bazali na yango na kolanda baprotocol ya leta. ']

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 23 na sanza ya misato, mboka moto te esalaki baekzame koleka 3% ya population na bango, mpe bamboka mingi batiaki mibeko ya kosala ekzame te na bato oyo bazali na basymptomi mukie, lokola Italy, Netherland, Espagne na Switzerland.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, mboka moko te esalaki ekzame koleka 3% ya bato na yango, mpe mikili mingi bazalaki na mibeko ya Leta ya kosala te ekzame na bato oyo baza kaka na bilembo ya mike, na ndakisa Italie, Hollande, Espagne, mpe Suisse. ']

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: Etid moko oyo babimisaki mokolo ya 16 sanza y amisato na Chine ti mokolo ya 23 sanza ya libobo, emoni ete 86% ya ba oyo bazalaki kobela na COVID-19 bayebanaki te, mpe bango moto bapanzaki malady na 79% ya ba oyo bayebani.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko oyo babimisaki mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato emonaki ete na Chine, kino na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya liboso, bakanisi ete 86% ya maladi ya COVID-19 emonanaki te, mpe maladi wana oyo ezangi mikanda ezalaki esika maladi euti na 79% ya bato oyo bakomaki yango na mikanda. ']

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: Ba limero moko oyo babimisaki na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya misato emonaki ete bamaladi na Italie bazalaki ebele koleka oyo balobaki.
translated: [' Botaleli ya mitango oyo babimisaki na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya misato emonisaki ete motango ya bato oyo bazwaki maladi na Italie ezalaki mingi koleka bato oyo balobaki. ']

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: Kopalangana ya (R0) COVID-19 ezali 1.4 to 2.4.
translated: [' Makanisi ya ebandeli ya motango ya ntina ya kobotama (R0) mpo na COVID-19 ezalaki 1,4 kino 2.4. ']

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: Etid moko oyo babimisaki na esika ya kolandela Maladi mpe kopekisa yango na US elobi ete ekoki kozala 5.7.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko oyo ebimaki na centre ya kobundisa maladi mpe kopekisa yango na États-Unis elobi ete ekoki kozala 5,7. ']

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: Bato mingi oyo bazali kobela COVID-19 bazali kobika.
translated: [' Bato mingi oyo bazali na COVID-19 babiki. ']

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: Mpona ba oyo bazali kobika te, ngonga ya basymptomi mpe na ya liwa ezali mikolo 6 ti 41, na oyo ya mingi mikolo 14.
translated: [' Mpona ba oyo bazali kosala yango te, tango banda na bokoli ya bilembo kino liwa eza kati ya mikolo 6 pe 41, mpe oyo eyebani mingi eza mikolo 14. ']

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, bato 97,000 bakufi na COVID-19.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, bato pene ya 97,000 bakufaki na COVID-19. ']

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: Na Chine, na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale 80% y aba oyo bakufaki bazalaki na miaka 60 to mingi, mpe 75% bazalaki na bamaladi misusu lokola malady ya motema na diabetes. Ba oyo bakufi na COVID-19 ezali ba oyo ekzame elakisaki ete bazali na COVID ndenge mibeko elobi.
translated: [' Na Chine, na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale pene ya 80% ya bato oyo bakufaki bazalaki na mibu koleka 60, mpe 75% bazalaki na maladi oyo bazalaki na yango liboso ata mpe maladi ya motema mpe diabete. Mbala mingi, bilembo ya bakonzi ya bato oyo bakufaki na maladi mabe ya COVID-19 mbala mingi elobelaka bato bakufi oyo bamonaki ete bazali na COVID na kolanda mibeko ya Leta. ']

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: Limero ya solo ya bato oyo bakufi na COVID-19 ekoki kozala mingi koleka, kasi emoni te bato oyo basali ekzame te – lokola, na ndako, na ndako ya bakoko, mpe mingi.
translated: [' Motango ya bato bakufi ya solo na COVID-19 ekoki kozala mingi koleka, mpo ekoki kozala te na bato oyo bakufi kozanga ekzame - na ndakisa na ndako, na bandako ya mibange, mpe bongo na bongo. ']

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: Etid ya ndambo oyo euti Italie emoni ete bato oyo bakufi na COVID eleki 4-5x oyo bango basosolaki.
translated: [' Bansango ya ndambo euti Italie emonaki ete motango ya bato oyo bakufaki koleka ndelo na ntango ya maladi mabe elekaki motango ya bato oyo bakufaki na COVID na motango ya bato oyo bazwaki 4-5x. ']

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: Moto ya U.S ya Esika ya Kolandela Maladi mpe kopekisa yango (CDC) emoni ete ‘’To yebi ete (balimero ya kufa ya mboka) ezali ya solo te mpo ezali mukie’’, elobami bayekoli ya barapor ya U.S. Balimero ya mukie boye esalemaka mingi na bapandemi, lokola na pandemi ya 2009 na H1N1 kosukosu ya bangulu. Kufa ya libosso na Wuhan ezalaki na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya liboso na 2020.
translated: [' Molobeli ya centre ya kobundisa maladi mpe kopekisa yango na États-Unis (CDC) andimaki ete "Toyebi ete [motango ya bato oyo balobi ete bakufi] eza likambo ya koyeba mpenza te", maloba oyo endimami na balapolo ya anecdotal oyo emonisi ete bato ya États-Unis bazalaki kotánga mingi te. Mbala mingi kozanga estimation boye eyaka na pandemie, na ndakisa maladi mabe ya grippe H1N1 ya bangulu ya 2009. Moto ya liboso oyo akufaki ezalaki na Wuhan na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya liboso 2020. ']

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: Kufa ya libosso na Chine ezalaki mokolo ya 1 sanza ya mibale na Philippines, mpe kufa libanda ya Asie ezalaki na France mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale.
translated: [' Kufa ya liboso libanda ya Chine esalemaki na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya mibale na Philippines, mpe liwa ya liboso libanda ya Asie ezalaki na France na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale. ']

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, libanda ya Chinne, bato mingi na zomi na mibale bakufaki na Iran, Core ya Sud mpe na Italie.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, libanda ya Chine, bato koleka zomi na mibale bakufaki moto na moto na Iran, Core ya Sud, mpe Italie. ']

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato, bamboka ntuku minei bazalaki na bato oyo bakufaki na maladi, na ba mboka nyonso kasi na Antartik te. Misala mingi ezali kosalema mpona koyebani bato boni bakufi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato, mikili mpe bateritware koleka ntuku minei balobaki ete bato bakufaki, na kɔntina nyonso longola kaka Antarctique.Mayele mingi basalelaka yango mbala mingi mpona koyeba motango ya bato bakufi. ']

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: Balimero oyo ezali ndenge mosusu na bisika mingi, mpe elandi ba ekzame oyo ezali kosalema, mpe ndenge ya balepital, ndenge ya kosalisa, ntango banda kopalangana ebandaki, mpe misusu etali population lokola miaka, nzoto ya mwasi to ya mibali, mpe kolongono ya moto. Kufa kati ya balimero ezali kati ya ba oyo bazali kobela.
translated: [' Mitango oyo ekeseni na bisika mpe na ntango, mpe ezali na bopusi na motango ya ba ekzame, lolenge ya systeme ya kolongono ya nzoto, ndenge ya kosalisa yango, ntango banda maladi ya ebandeli, mpe bizaleli ya bato na ndakisa mbula, sexe, mpe kolongono ya nzoto mobimba. Ratio ya liwa na moto ezali komonisa motango ya bato bakufi oyo bakabolami na motango ya bato oyo bazwaki maladi na eleko moko boye. ']

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: Mpona bastatistik ya Johns Hopkins Universite, kufa kati na ba oyo bazali kobela ezali 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) uta mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020.
translated: [' Na kotalela bastatistik ya Johns Hopkins University, ratio ya mokili mobimba ya liwa na moto ya maladi ezali 6,0% (97,039/1,617,204) na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020. ']

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: Limero etaliesika na yango.
translated: [' Motángo yango ekeseni na kotalela etúká. ']

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: Na chine, kufa kati na ba oyo bazali kobela ezali 17.3% (Ya ba oyo bazali na basymptomi mikolo ya 1-10 sanza ya liboso 2020) na 0.7% (mpona ba oyo na basymptomi mokolo ya 1 sanza ya mibale 2020). Ba ndenge misusu ezali limero y aba oyo bakufi (CFR), oyo elakisi pourcentahe y aba oyo bazalaki na malady mpe bakufi, mpe limero y aba oyo bazali na malady (IFR) oyo etali pourcentage y aba oyo bazali na maladi (oyo ekzame elobi) mpe bakufi na malady.
translated: [' Na Chine, ba estimation mpo na ratio ya liwa na moto ekitaki longwa na 17,3% (mpo na bato oyo basymptomi ebandaki 1–10 sanza ya liboso 2020) kino na 0,7% (mpo na bato oyo baza na bilembo oyo ebandaki nsima ya 1 sanza ya mibale 2020). Meko mosusu ezali motango ya liwa ya bato ya maladi (CFR), oyo ezomonisa pourcentage ya bato oyo bazwaki maladi moko oyo bakufaka na maladi, mpe taux ya liwa ya maladi (IFR), oyo ezomonisa pourcentage ya bato oyo baza na maladi (oyo bamoni yango te mpe oyo bamoni te) oyo bakufaka na maladi moko. ']

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: Ba statistic oyo ezali ya ngonga moko te, elandi ndege nini makambo ezali kokende na mokili mpe na population.
translated: [' Bastatistiki oyo ezali na ngonga te mpe elandaka te motango ya sikisiki uta na maladi na nzela ya ekateli ya likambo. ']

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: Ba academi mingi emeki komona ba limero oyo mpona ba population ebele.
translated: [' Bato mingi ya mayele bamekaki kosala kalkile ya mituya yango mpo na bato ya sikisiki. ']

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: Esika ya Etid ya Bakisi na Universite ya Oxford emoni ete kufa ya malady ezali kati ya 0.1% ti 0.39
translated: [' Centre ya minganga oyo euti na bilembeteli ya Université ya Oxford elobi ete motango ya liwa ya maladi mabe na mobimba na yango eza kati ya 0,1% mpe 0,39%. ']
