sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: Limero ya likolo ezali moko na oyo Germany esalaki Etid ya COVID-19, mpe etid ya statistic nakomona baekzame ya CFR.
translated: [' Estimation ya likolo ya molongo oyo eyokani na ba résultat ya ekzame ya liboso ya random mpo na COVID-19 na Allemagne, mpe etid ya statistique oyo ezali kosala na kotalela bopusi ya ekzame na ba estimation CFR. ']

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: OMS elobi ete pandemic oyo ekoki kolandelama.
translated: [' OMS elobi ete maladi mabe ekoki kolandelama. ']

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: Mikolo oyo pandemic oyo eko wumela eyebani te mpe etali esika na esika
translated: [' Molai mpe ntango ya nsuka ya kopalangana ya maladi eyebani mpenza te mpe ekoki kokesana na kotalela esika. ']

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: Maciej Boni ya Penn State Universite elobi, ‘’Soki esosolami malamu te, malady ekoki kokita soki bisika na yango ya kobatama ezali lisusu te.
translated: [' Maciej Boni ya Penn State University alobaki, "Soki epekisami te, maladi oyo epanzanaka ezalaka mingimingi plateau mpe na nsima ebandaka kokita soki maladi esilisi bisika oyo ezali. ']

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: Kasi ndenge ya koyeba ezali te mikolo oyo na ndenge eko zala’’.
translated: [' Kasi eza pene ya likoki te ya kosala projection moko ya mayele sikoyo na oyo etali ntango oyo yango ekozala". ']

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: Gouvernema ya bayekoli ya bakonzi ya Chine na Zhong Nanshan balobi ete ‘’ ekoki kosila na sanza ya motoba’’ soki bamboka nyonso balandi toil ya OMS na ndenge nini kolandela virisi.
translated: [" Mopesi-toli monene ya minganga ya gouvernema ya Chine Zhong Nanshan alobaki ete ''ekoki kosila na sanza ya motoba'' soki mikili nyonso bakoki kosangisa yango mpo na kolanda toli ya OMS na oyo etali bibongiseli ya kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te. "]

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato, Adam Kucharski ya Kelasi ya London mpona Bopeto & Kisi ya Tropical alobaki ete SARS-CoV-2’’ ekotambola mpona mbula moko to mibale’’.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato, Adam Kucharski ya London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine alobaki ete SARS-CoV-2 "ekobanda kotambola, ekoki kosalema mbula moko to mibale". ']

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: Mpona Etid ya College ya Imperial oyo Neil Ferguson asali, emoni ete kofanda mosika na bato mpe mibeko misusu oyo esengeli ezali malamu ‘’ti oyo tokokoma na vaccine (ekoki kozwa ba mbula 18 to mingi)’’.
translated: [" Na kotalela bolukiluki ya College ya Imperial oyo Neil Ferguson akambaki, ekosenga kozala mosika na nzoto mpe mibeko mosusu ''tii ntango mangwele ekobanda kobima (ekoki kozala sanza 18 to koleka)''. "]

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: William Schaffner ya Vanderbilt Universite alobi, ‘’Nayebi te soki ezali ete coronavirisi – mpo ete ekobosama noki – ekokende libela’’ mpe ekoki kokoma malady oyo eyakaka mpe ekendeke, ekoki kozonga ba mbula nyonso’’.
translated: [' William Schaffner ya Universite ya Vanderbilt alobaki, "Nakanisi eza mpasi mpo ete coronavirisi oyo-mpo eza mpasi te na kobongola yango-ekolimwa mpenza" mpe "ekoki kokoma maladi ya eleko moko, ezongaka mbula nyonso". ']

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: Ntando na yango ya kozonga etali ndenge nini nzoto ya bato ekokoma makasi na kobundela yango mpe soki ekomi makasi koleka.
translated: [' Virulence ya kozonga ekozala na kotalela immunité ya etonga mpe bonene ya mutation. ']

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: Basymptomi ya COVID-19 ekoki kozala mingi mpe bato oyo bazala na maladi bakoki koyeba te.
translated: [' Basymptomi ya COVID-19 ekoki kozala ya sikisiki te mpe bato oyo baza na maladi bakoki kozala asymptomatiki te. ']

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: Basymptomi mibale oyo ezali mingi ezali fefele (88%) mpe kosukosu ya kokauka (68%).
translated: [' Bilembo mibale oyo emonanaka mingi eza fievre (88%) mpe kosukosu ya kokauka (68%). ']

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: Basymptomi ya mikie lokola bolembu ya nzoto, maladi ya mpema, kobungisa ya koyoka solo, mpeka ya kokatana, mpasi na mikua, engine, motu mpasi, malili na kolenga ya nzoto, hemoptysis, pulupulu, to cyanosis. OMS elobi ete moto moko na motoba ako bela makasi mpe akozala na mpasi ya kopema.
translated: [' Bilembo oyo emonanaka mingi te eza kolɛmba, kobimisa sputum ya mpema (phlegm), kobungisa koyoka nsolo, kopema mokuse, mpasi na misisa mpe na matonga, mongongo mpasi, motó mpasi, koyoka malili, kosanza, kobima makila, pulupulu, to cyanose. OMS elobi ete moto moko na kati ya bato motoba abɛlaka makasi mpe azali na mokakatano ya kopema. ']

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: Na U.S Esika ya kolandela bamaldi mpe kosukisa yango (CDC) ekomi basymptom ya likama lokola mpasi na kopema, mpasi na tolo to kilo na tolo, kobunga koyeba makambo, mpasi na kotambola, mbembo ya motani; kokende lepital noki esengami soki basymptomi oyo ezali. Lisusu maladi ekoki kobenga pneumonia, maladi ya nzela ya mpema, sepsis mpe liwa.
translated: [' Esika ya kolandela maladi mpe kopekisa yango na États-Unis (CDC) elobi ete bilembo ya mbalakaka ezali mpasi ya kopema, mpasi to motungisi oyo esilaka te, mobulungano ya mbalakaka, mpasi ya kolamuka, mpe elongi to mbɛbu; Likebi ya noki ya monganga epesami toli soki basymptomi oyo ezali. Bokóli mosusu ya maladi ekoki komema pneumonia ya makasi, pasi makasi ya kopema, sepsis, choque septique mpe liwa. ']

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: Misusu oyo bazali na maladi bakoki kozala na basymptomi te, na basymtomi te kasi na baekzame oyo elakisi maladi, nde yango bayekoli bapesi toil ete ba oyo bazalaki pene ya ba oyo baekzame emonaki bango na maladi esengeli basosola bango malamu.
translated: [' Bato mosusu oyo baza na maladi bakoki kozala na bilembo te, baza na bilembo ya maladi te kasi na ba résultat ya ekzame oyo endimisi maladi, yango wana bato basalaka bolukiluki babimisi toli ete bato oyo baza pene na bato oyo baza na maladi basengeli kolandela bango malamu mpe kotala bango mpo na koboya kozwa maladi. ']

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: Chine elobi ete bato oyo bazali na basymptomi te ekoki kozala 44%.
translated: [' Ba estimasio ya Chine ya ratio asymptomatiki ezali moke kino na 44%. ']

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: Ntango ya kisi mpona kokota malamu (Ntango maladi esimbi moto mpe basymptomi ebandi koyaka) ezali mokolo moko to 14; mingi-mingi ezali mikolo mitano. Lokola kozanga koyeba, bato boni bazali na COVID-19 oyo babungisi koyooka solo bazalaki 30% mpe bakitaki na 15%.
translated: [' Eleko ya incubation oyo emonanaka mingi (ngonga oyo elekaka kati ya maladi mpe bilembo oyo balaki) ezalaka mikolo moko kino na mikolo 14; Ezalaka mbala mingi na mikolo mitano. Lokola ndakisa ya kozanga koyeba, estimation ya bato moke oyo bazalaki na COVID-19 oyo babungisaki koyoka nsolo ezalaki na ebandeli 30% mpe na nsima ekitaki na 15%. ']

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: Toli na ndenge nini malady ezali kopalangana eyebani.
translated: [' Makambo mosusu etali ndenge maladi ezopanzana eyebani naino te. ']

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: Bandimi ete malayi ezali kopalangana soki bato bazali pene mpe na ba soyi mikie oyo ebimaka soki moto akosoli, asali itche, to azali koloba; kozala pene ezali 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 ft).
translated: [' Bakanisi ete maladi epanzanaka mingimingi na ntango ya bokutani ya pene mpe na matanga ya mike oyo ebimaka ntango bazali kokosola, kosala itche, to kosolola; na contact ya pene eza na distance ya bametele 1 to 2 (3 to 6 feet). ']

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: Ba etid emoni ete soyi ya kokosola ekoko kotambola 4.5metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27feet).
translated: [' Bolukiluki emoni ete kosukosu oyo ezipamaki te ekoki kosala ete matanga ekende mosika na bametele 4,5 (15 feet) kino na 8,2 metres (27 feet). ']

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: Bato misusu balobi ete virisi ekoki mpe kopalangana na ba mayi ya nzoto ya mikie oyo etikalaka na mopepe ba ngonga molayi, oyo esalemaka ntango moto azali koloba. Ba mayi ya kopema mpe ntango moto azali kopema, mpe kotambola, virisi ezali na kati ya mopepe te.
translated: [' Bato mosusu balobi ete virisi ekoki mpe kopesama na matanga ya mike oyo etikalaka na ntango molai na mopepe, oyo ekoki kobima na ntango ya koloba. Bakoki mpe kobimisa matanga ya mpema ntango ozali kopema, ata mpe ntango bazosolola, atako mbala mingi virisi yango ebotamaka na mopepe te. ']

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: Matangi ya mayi ekoki kotoka n amonoko to zolo ya bato oyo bazali pene, bakoki mpe kopema yango.
translated: [' Matangá yango ekoki kokita na minɔkɔ to na zolo ya bato oyo bazali pene na bango to mbala mosusu bapemaka yango na mimpululu. ']

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Kotia tube na kati ya mongonga mpona Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) ekoki kosala ete matangi ya kopema ekona na kati ya nzoto.
translated: [' Misala mosusu ya monganga na ndakisa kotia tiyo na kati mpe resuscitation cardiopulmonary (CPR) ekoki kosala ete biloko oyo ebimaka na mpema ebebaka mpe yango ekosala ete mopepe epanzana. ']

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Ekoki mpe kopanzana soki moto asimbi esika oyo ezali na matangi, mpe mposo ya nzoto, mpe tango bazali kosimba miso, zolo na monoko.
translated: [' Ekoki mpe kopalangana ntango moto asimbi esika oyo ezali na mikrobe, ata mpe na loposo mpe na nsima asimbi miso, zolo, to monɔkɔ na ye. ']

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: Misusu balobi ete ekoki kotambola na kati ya tufi, kasi oyo ezalia kobanga mukie kaka.
translated: [' Ata eza na mitungisi oyo ekoki kopanzana na ba faeces, bakanisi ete likama wana eza moke. ']

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: Gouvernema ya Chine aboyi ete SARS-CoV-2 ekoki kotambola na kati ya tufi. Virisi ezali kopangalana makasi na mikolo misato ya liboso ya nsima ya basymptomi, kasi ekoki kotambola ata soki basymptomi ezali te mpe na mikolo ya suka ya virisi.
translated: [' Gouvernema ya Chine aboyaki ete virisi oyo epanzanaka na monɔkɔ ya mama ya SARS-CoV-2.Virisi epanzanaka mingi na mikolo misato ya liboso nsima ya kobanda bilembo na yango, kasi kopalangana ekoki kosalema liboso ete bilembo ya maladi emonana mpe na bileko ya nsima ya maladi. ']

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: Bato bamonani kozala na maladi mikolo misato nsima ya kozwa malady, yango nde elobi ete moto akoki kopanza yango soki nani azali na basymptomi te.
translated: [' Bato basali bango ekzame ya maladi kino mikolo misato liboso ya kobanda bilembo oyo emonisi ete kopesama na maladi ekoki kosalema liboso ya kozwa bilembo ya minene. ']

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: Kaka ba etid mukie ya laboratoire emoti ete ba oyo bazangi basymptomi bazali kasi bato ya basymptomi bamonani na ba mboka misusu ntango bazali kolanda ba oyo bazalaki pene na ba oyo bazwami na malady.
translated: [' Kaka barapore moke ya bato oyo baza na basymptomi na laboratoire ezali, kasi kopalangana ya asymptomatiki emonani na mikili misusu ntango bazolandela bato oyo bakutanaki na bango. ']

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Esika ya Kopekisa Maladi mpe Kolandela yango ya Europe (ECD) elobi eyebani ya solo te ndenge nini maladi ezali kotambola kaka boye, moto moko akoki kopanza yango na bato mibale to misato. Virisi ekoki kowumela ba ngonga molayi na likolo ya biloko.
translated: [' Centre ya Eropa mpo na kopekisa mpe kobundisa maladi (ECDC) elobi ete atako eyebani mpenza te ndenge maladi epanzanaka noki, mbala mingi moto moko azwaka bato mosusu mibale to misato. Virisi ebikaka na boumeli ya bangonga mingi to mikolo na bisika. ']

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: Mpo, virisi emonanaki likolo ya Plastic (polypropylene) ti mikolo misato ya koleka mpe na libende ya 304, mpona mokolo moko na carton, mpe mikolo minei na motako.
translated: [' Na specifiki, emonanaki ete virisi ekoki komonana kino mikolo misato na plastike (polypropylene) mpe ebende 304 oyo eninganaka te, mpona mokolo moko na carton, mpe kino ngonga minei na motako. ']

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: Kasi, oyo etali soki esika yango ezali mulunge to molunge te. Bambwa na banyama misusu bakoki kozala na COVID-19.
translated: [' Kasi, yango ekeseni na kotalela malili mpe temperature. Banyama ya mboka mpe banyama mosusu bazali na COVID-19. ']

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: Etid moko te elobi ete banyama bakoki kopesa virisi yango na bato, kasi bakonzi na Angleterre ba lobi esengeli moto asokola maboko nsima ya kosimba banyama, lekola na nsima ya kosimbabisika oyo bato ya maladi basimbi.
translated: [' Eza na eloko moko te emonisi ete banyama bakoki kopesa virisi wana na bato, atako bakonzi ya Grande Bretagne bapesi toli ya kosokola maboko nsima ya kokutana na banyama, lekola nsima ya kokutana na bisika mosusu oyo eza na maladi bato bakokaki kosimba. ']

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Syndrome ya Maladi ya Makasi ya kopema ya coronavirisi 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ezali sika, moto ya liboso ya kozala na yango batiaki ye mosina na bato oyo bazali na pneumonia to maladi ya kopema na Wuhan.
translated: [' Syndrome ya pasi makasi ya pema ya coronavirusi 2 (SRAS-CoV-2) ezali ya sika, elongolamaki liboso na bato misato oyo bazalaki na pneumonia ekangami na liboke ya bato ya maladi makasi ya mpema na Wuhan. ']

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Nyonso ya SARS-CoV-2 ya sika ezali kosalema na bisika oyo yango ezali. Libanda ya nzoto ya moto, virisi ekoki kofanda likolo ya sabuni nsima eko bozanma mpe ekufi. SARS-CoV-2 ezali moko ya libota ya SARS-CoV.
translated: [' Makambo nyonso ya virisi SARS-CoV-2 ya sika emonanaka na bacoronavirusi ekangani na bozalisi. Na libanda ya nzoto ya moto, virisi yango ekufaka na sabuni ya ndako, oyo epanzaka anvelope oyo ebatelaka yango. SARS-CoV-2 ekokani mpenza na SARS-CoV ya ebandeli. ']

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: Balobi ete ekoki kowuta esika ya banyama.
translated: [' Bato bakanisaka ete yango eutá na banyama mosusu. ']

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: Kososola bagenetik emoni coronavirisi na kati ya baninga ya Betacoronavirisi, na bisika ya Sarbecovirisi (nzela ya B) bomoko na mibale oyo euti na ba ngembo.
translated: [' Botaleli ya bagenetik emonisi ete bituluku ya ba gene ya coronavirisi na genus Betacoronavirus, na subgenus Sarbecovirusi (lineage B) elongo na ba strain mibale oyo euti na ngembo. ']

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: Ezali 96% bomoko na genome oyo ya coronavirisi oyo euti na bangembo (batCov RaTG13).
translated: [' Eza ndenge moko na 96% na nivo ya genome mobimba na ba echantillon mosusu ya coronavirisi ya ngembo (BatCov RaTG13). ']

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: Na sanza ya mibale na 2020, etid na Chine emoni ete oyo ekaboli bango ezali kaka amino acid moko na bisika misusu ya genome ya virisi ya nkakolo na oyo ya bato.
translated: [' Na sanza ya mibale 2020, bato ya Chine oyo basalaka bolukiluki bamonaki ete eza kaka na bokeseni ya aside amino moko na bisika mosusu ya genome oyo ekaboli bavirisi oyo euti na bapangolin mpe oyo euti na bato. ']

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: Genome nyonso emonani na 92% ya oyo bankakolo na bato bazali na coronavirisi mpe SARS-CoV-2, oyo ekoki te koloba ete maladi euti na bankakolo.
translated: [' Bokokanisi ya genome mobimba kino lelo emoni na mingi 92% ya biloko ya gene oyo ekabolamaki na kati ya coronavirusi ya pangolin mpe SARS-CoV-2, oyo ekoki te mpo na komonisa ete bapangolin nde bazali esika ya mibale oyo efandaka. ']

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: Maladi nsima ya virisi ekoki komonana kati ya basymptomi, kasi kososola mpona kondima yango esengeli esalema na kotala na ndenge ya kati polymérase (rRT-PCR) ya bisika oyo ezali na maladi na elili ya CT.
translated: [' Maladi na virisi ekoki komonana na ndenge ya kala na kotalela basymptomi, kasi kondimisama eza sukasuka na reaction ya chaine ya transcription ya polymerase (rRT-PCR) ya basecretion ya infection to bilili ya CT. ']

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Etid mpona komona nini ekaboli PCR na CT na Wuhan emon ete CT ezali komona koleka PCR, kasi esosoli kaka likambo moko te, mpo ete bilili mingi ezali komonana na bamaladi ya pneumonia mpe misusu.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko oyo ekokanisaki PCR na CT na Wuhan elobi ete CT eza makasi mingi koleka PCR, atako eza ya sikisiki te, mpe makambo na yango mingi ya elilingi eleki mingi na pneumonia mosusu mpe ndenge ya kobela. ']

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: Na sanza ya misato 2020, College ya BaAmeriquain ya Radiology elobi ete ‘’CT ekoki kosalema te mpona ba oyo babeli sika na COVID-19’’.
translated: [" Na sanza ya misato 2020, College ya Radiology ya Amerika elobi ete ''Esengeli te kosalela CT mpo na kosala ekzame mpo na ekzame ya liboso mpo na koyeba soki moto azali na COVID-19''. "]

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: OMS ebimisaki manuskri na baekzame mingi ya RNA mpona SARS-CoV-2, ya liboso ebimaki na sanza ya mokolo ya 17.
translated: [' OMS ebimisaki baprotocol mingi ya kosala ekzame ya RNA mpo na SARS-CoV-2, mpe ya liboso ebimaki na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya liboso. ']

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Ekzame esalisi komona ezaleli ya ba polymerase (rRT-PCR).
translated: [' Ekzame esalelaka na ntango ya solo reaction ya chaine ya polymerase ya transcription (rRT-PCR). ']

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: Ekzame ekoki kosalema na mpena to na makila.
translated: [' Ekzame ekoki kosalema na maladi ya mpema to ya makila. ']

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: Baresulta ekoyebana na ba ngonga mikie oyo elandi to na mikolo.
translated: [' Mbala mingi ba résultat ebimaka nsima ya mwa bangonga na mikolo. ']

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: Kasi baekzame oyo esalemi ya kotoka mayi ya zolo mpe ya kati ya mongongo. Balaboratoir mingi na bacompani bazali kosala baekzame ya serological oyo ekomona ba anticorps.
translated: [' Mbala mingi ekzame oyo esalemaka na swab ya zolo atako bakoki mpe kosalela swab na mongongo. Balaboratoire mingi mpe bakompani ezali kosala ba ekzame ya serologie, oyo emonaka ba anticorps. ']

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya minei 2020, ata moko te ya oyo emonanaki kozala ya solo mpo ete bato mingi baselela yango.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya minei 2020, ata moko te na yango emonanaki ete eza ya sikisiki mpenza mpo endimama mpo bato mingi basalela yango. ']

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: Na US eloko ya ekzame moko ya serologi oyo esalemi na Cellex endimani mpona kosalisama ya likama kaka mpona ba laboratoir.
translated: [' Na US ekzame ya serologi oyo Cellex esalaki endimami mpona kosalela yango na mbalakaka kaka na balaboratoire oyo endimami. ']

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: Bilili ya radio nay a tomography ya ordinateur (CT) ya bato oyo bazali na basymptomi te ezali na talatala ya opak mpe kosangana mingi ya makila esali te.
translated: [' Bilili ya bizaleli eza na baradio mpe tomographie ya ordinatere (CT) ya bato oyo baza na bilembo eza asymmetric peripherique ya talatala ya mabele opacities mpe kozanga ba effusion pleural. ']

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: Societe ya Radio ya baItalien ezali kosala esika moko na internet mpona komona bilili ya bato oyo bazali kobela.
translated: [' Société ya Radiological ya Italie ezali kosangisa esika ya mokili mobimba oyo ezali na internet ya makambo bamoni na bililingi mpo na bato oyo bazali na maladi. ']

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: Mpo ete ezali kovukama na bamaldi mingi lekola adenovirisi, elili na kozanga komona na PCR ezali mukie mpona komona COVID-19.
translated: [' Mpo na kolekisa ndelo na maladi mosusu lokola adenovirisi, kosala foto kozanga endimiseli na PCR ezali na makambo mingi te mpo na koyeba COVID-19. ']

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: Etid ya monene na Chine emoni ba tolo na CT mpe na PCR elobi ete bilili ezali koloba mingi te, ezali noki mpe ezali kosola malamu te, mpona koloba ete esalisama na etumba oyo ya pandemic.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko ya monene na Chine ekokanisaki ba resultat ya CT ya tolo na PCR mpe emonisaki ete atako kosala bafoto eza sikisiki te mpo na maladi, eza noki mpe ezososola mingi, emonisi ete kotalela yango lokola esaleli ya ekzame na bisika oyo maladi mabe ezali. ']

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: Bayele ya Artificiel mpona komona ba nerf nakati ya moto soki virisi ezali na Radio to CT.
translated: [' Ba réseaux neuronale ya convolutional oyo esalemi na intelligence artificiale esalemi mpona komona makambo ya elilingi ya virisi na baradio mpe CT. ']

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: Misala mpona kopekisa kopanzana ys malady ezali kopetola nzoto malamu, kosokola maboko, mpona kosimga elongi te, zolo, to monoko na mabokok oyo esokolami te, mpe kokosola to kosala itche na kati ya elamba mpe kobwaka yango noki na poubelle.
translated: [' Mayele mpo na kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te eza na ndakisa kozala na bopeto nyonso ya malamu, kosokola maboko, koboya kosimba miso, zolo, to monoko na maboko oyo esokwami te, mpe kokosola to kosala itche na kati ya tissue mpe kotya misisa mbala moko na kati ya eloko ya bosoto. ']

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: Ba oyo bakoki kozala na malady esengeli balata mask na libanda ya ndako.
translated: [' Ba oyo bakoki kozala deja na kpokoso bapesaki bango toli balata mask ya minganga na esika ya bato nyonso. ']

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: Kofanda mosika na bato mpe. Ba gouvernema mingi basukisi to bakati bato kosala banzela oyo ezali na ntina te na bamboka oyo bazali na pandemic.
translated: [' Mibeko ya kozala mosika na bato ezali mpe malamu mpo na kopekisa maladi epanzana. Baguvernema mingi bapekisaki to bapesaki toli ete bato nyonso basala te mibembo oyo eza ntina mingi te mpo na kokende mpe kouta na mikili mpe bisika oyo maladi ezali. ']

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: Kasi, virisi ekomi esika ya kopalangana kati na bato na mokili mombimba.
translated: [' Kasi, virisi ekomaki na ebandeli ya kopanzana ya bato na bisika mingi na mokili. ']

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: Oyo elingi koloba ete virisi ezali kopanzana kati na bato na lingomba, magonba misusu ba yebi te ndenge nini to wapi bazalaki maladi. Banganga oyo bazali kosalisa bato ya kobela esengeli basalisa toli ya kobatela nzoto na kofanda mosika mpe kobatela miso. Kolanda ya bato ezali ntina makasi mpona mikonzi na koyeba esika oyo maladi euti mpona kosukisa yango.
translated: [' Elimboli ete virisi ezopanzana na kati ya bamboka, mpe bato mosusu ya communauté bayebi te esika nini to ndenge nini bazwaki yango. Minganga oyo basalisaka bato oyo bazali kobatela moto oyo akoki kozala na maladi yango basengeli kosalela mayele ya standard, komibatela na bato oyo bakutanaki na bango, mpe kobatela miso. Kolandela bato oyo bakutanaki na bango eza metode ya ntina mingi mpo na bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto mpo na koyeba esika maladi euti mpe kokanga nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Gouvernema kosalisa komona esika ya telephone ebangisi bato, Amnesty International na ba organisation misusu 100 mpona ndenge bazali kotia miso na makambo ya bato.
translated: [' Kosalela bansango ya esika oyo euti na batelefone ya maboko na baguvernema mpo na mokano wana ebimisaki mitungisi ya kobatela makambo ya bato, Amnesty International mpe masangá mosusu koleka 100 babimisaki maloba oyo ezosenga kotya ndelo na lolenge oyo ya kokengela bato. ']

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Baaplications mingi ya telephone esalemi mpona kosalisama, na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya minei 2020, koleka zomi na mibale ya bayekoli bazalaki kosala na mosala ya kobatela makambo ya bato, lekola kosalisa Bluetooth mpona koyeba bato bazali pene ndenge nini na batelephone mosusu.
translated: [' Baaplication ndenge na ndenge ya telephone esalemaki to bakani kosalela yango na bolingo na bango moko, mpe na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya minei 2020, koleka bituluku zomi na mibale ya bato ya mayele bazalaki kosala na mayele ya kobatela makambo ya bato, na ndakisa kosalela Bluetooth mpo na kokoma pene ya moto moko na batelefone mosusu ya maboko. ']

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
targetString: Nsima bato bakozwa message ete bazalaki pene na moto oyo azali na COVID-19. Lekuta ezali kotambola na ndenge nini kopekisa maladi; lekola kosokola zolo mpe kosokola monoko na kissi ya monoko, nyonso ezali solo te.
translated: [' Na nsima bato oyo basalelaka yango bazwaka nsango soki bazalaki pene ya moto moko oyo ekzame emonisaki ete azali na COVID-19. Makanisi mabe ezopanzana na oyo etali ndenge ya kopekisa maladi; Na ndakisa, kosukola zolo mpe kopakola bosɔtɔ na monɔkɔ esalisaka te. ']

sourceString: There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
targetString: Vaccin mpona COVID-19 ezali te, kasi ba organization mingi bazali kosala mosala mpona ete ezala.
translated: [' Vaccin ya COVID-19 ezali te, ata baorganization mingi bazali kosala makasi mpona kosala yango. ']

sourceString: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
targetString: Kosokola maboko esengami mpona kopekisa ete malady epanzana na bato.
translated: [' Esengami kosokola maboko mpona kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
targetString: CDC esengi bato basokola maboko ba mbala ebele na sabuni na mayi mpona baseconde ntuku mibale, nsima ya kokenda kabine to soki maboko ezali na vindo; liboso ya kolia bilei; mpe nsima ya kopopola zolo, kokosola, mpe kosala itche.
translated: [' CDC elobi ete bato basokolaka maboko mbala mingi na sabuni mpe mai ata mpo na basegonde ntuku mibale, mingimingi nsima ya kokende wese to ntango maboko ezali komonana salite; liboso ya kolya; mpe nsima ya kobeta zolo, kokosola to kosala itche. ']

sourceString: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
targetString: Oyo ezali mpo ete libanda ya nzoto ya moto, virisi ekoki kobamama na sabuni ya ndako, oyo ekotobola ndako na yango ya kobatama.
translated: [' Ezali bongo mpamba te na libanda ya nzoto ya moto, virisi yango ebomaka na sabuni ya ndako, oyo epasukisaka fulufulu na yango oyo ebatelaka yango. ']

sourceString: CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
targetString: CDC apesi lisusu toil ete kosokola maboko na kisi oyo ezali na 60% ya lotoko koleka mayi na sabuni ezali mingi te.
translated: [' CDC elobaki lisusu kosalela nkisi ya kopetola maboko oyo esalemi na alcol oyo eza na alcol ata 60% na volume soki sabuni na mai eza pete te. ']

sourceString: The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: OMS apesi bato toil batika kosimba miso, zolo to monoko na maboko oyo esokwami te.
translated: [' OMS epesi bato toli ete básimba te miso, zolo, to monoko na maboko oyo esokwami te. ']

sourceString: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine.
targetString: Bisika ekoki kozala na maladi mpe na basolutionimingi (na minute moko ya komipesa na kozwa malady na koboma microbe na libende), mpe 62-71% ya ethanol, 50-100% ya isopropanol, 0.1% ya sodium hypochloride, 0.5% ya hygrogen peroxide, mpe na 0.2%-7.5% ya povidone-iodine.
translated: [' Bisika ekoki kobeba na biloko mingi ya kosilisa yango na basolution mingi (na miniti moko nsima ya kokutana na nkisi ya koboma mikrobe mpo na esika ya ebende oyo eninganaka te), ata mpe 62–71% ya ethanol, 50–100% ya isopropanol, 0,1% ya sodium hypochlorite, 0,5% ya peroxide ya hydrogène, mpe 0,2–7,5% ya povidone-iodine. ']

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
targetString: Basolution misusu, lekola benzalkonium chloride na chroxedine gluconate, ezali makasi mingi te.
translated: [' Basolution mosusu, na ndakisa benzalkonium chloride mpe chrohexidine gluconate, esalisaka mingi te. ']

sourceString: The CDC recommends that if a COVID case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and ATM machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected.
targetString: CDC epesi toil ete soki moto na COVID amonani na lepital to bakanisi akoki kozala na COVID, lokola mpe na mosala, kelasi ya bana, bisika nyonso lekola douche, esika ya kofanda, ba electronic ya kokabola, ba ecran, ba clavier, ba command ya tele, mpe ba machine ATM oyo moto ya kobela asimbi, esengeli kopetola yango.
translated: [' CDC epesi toli ete soki moto ya COVID bakanisi to bandimi ye na esika moko na ndakisa biro to mokolo ya kobatela bana, bisika nyonso na ndakisa babiro, bawese, bisika oyo bato nyonso basalaka, biloko ya elektroniki lokola tablet, ba ecran ya kosimba, ba clavier, bacontrol ya mosika, mpe bamashine ATM oyo bato ya maladi basalelaka, esengeli kolongola mikrobe. ']

sourceString: Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately.
targetString: Ba organization ya kolongono esengi bato bakanga monoko mpe zolo na kati ya couode ya liboko to na elamba mpona kokosola to kosala itche, mpe kobwaka yango noki.
translated: [' Bibongiseli ya kolongono elobaki ete bato bazipa monoko mpe zolo na coude egumbami to na misisa ntango bazali kokosola to kosala itche, mpe kobwaka misisa nyonso mbala moko. ']

sourceString: Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing.
targetString: Bamask ya lepital esengeli mpona ba oyo bazali na maladi, mpo ete kolata mask ekoki kosukisa nzela ya matangi ntango moto azali koloba, kosala itche to kokosola.
translated: [' Bamask ya minganga ezali malamu mpona ba oyo bakoki kozala na maladi, mpo kolata mask ekoki kokitisa motango mpe distance ya mobembo ya matanga ya expiratoire oyo epanzanaka ntango bazosolola, kosala itche, mpe kokosola. ']

sourceString: The WHO has issued instructions on when and how to use masks.
targetString: OMS epesi mibeko mpona ntango nini kolata bamask.
translated: [' OMS epesi malako mpo na ntango nini mpe ndenge nini kosalela bamask. ']

sourceString: According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, "Wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene."Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease.
targetString: Stephen Griffin, moyekoli ya bavirisi na universite ya Leeds, alobi ‘’kolata mask ekoki kopekisa bato na kosimba simba elongi, mpo yango ezali ntina ebele ya nzela oyo maladi ezali kokota. ‘’Bamask mpe ekoki kolatama mpona moto oyo azali kosalisa moto oyo koki kozala na malady.
translated: [' Stephen Griffin, virologue na universite ya Leeds alobi ete, "Kolata mask ekoki kokitisa motango ya bato [ya] mpo na kosimba bilongi na bango, yango nde epesaka maladi mingi kozanga kopetola maboko malamu." Bamask etindami pe mpóna kosalelama na ba oyo bazali kobatela moto oyo akoki kozala na bokono yango. ']

sourceString: The WHO has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with COVID-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face.
targetString: OMS elobi bato oyo bazali kobela te esengeli balata mask kaka soki bazali na risk ya kozwa maladi, lekola ba oyo bazali kosunga moto oyo azali kobela COVID-19, kasi ba moni mpe ntina mpo ete bato batika kosimba simba elongi na bango.
translated: [' OMS esengi bato oyo baza na nzoto kolongono balata bamask kaka soki baza na likama makasi, na ndakisa bato oyo bazali kosalisa moto oyo azali na COVID-19, kasi bandimi mpe ete kolata bamask ekoki kosalisa bato na kokima kosimba elongi na bango. ']

sourceString: Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public.
targetString: Ba mboka mingi bakomi kosenga bato balata bamask na libanda ya ndako.
translated: [' Bamboka mingi babandi kolendisa bato ya leta basalela bamask ya elongi. ']

sourceString: In the U.S., the CDC recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.China has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people.
targetString: Na U.S, CDC esengi bato balata bamask oyo esalemi na etendi. Chine esengi bato balata bamask oyo elatamaka kaka mbala moko mpona ba oyo bazali kobela te, ntina mingi soki bazali kopusana pene (1 metre (3ft) to mukie) ya bato misusu.
translated: [' Na U.S, CDC elobi ete esengeli kolata mask ya elongi oyo eza ya monganga te oyo esalemi na elamba. Chine elendisi mpenza kosalela bamask ya monganga oyo esalelamaka mbala moko na bato ya nzoto kolongono, mingimingi ntango bazokutana pene (1 metre (3 ft) to na nse) na bato mosusu. ']

sourceString: Hong Kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places.
targetString: Hong Kong esengi bato balata bamask ya lepital ntango bazali na babis to na bisika oyo bato ebele bazali.
translated: [' Hong Kong elobi ete esengeli kolata mask ya minganga ntango ozali komata na bisi to kofanda na bisika oyo bato bazali mingi. ']

sourceString: Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily.
targetString: Bakonzi ya kolongono na Thailand basengi bato balata mask ya etendi na ndako mpe basokola yango mokolo nyonso.
translated: [' Bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Thaïlande bazolendisa bato basala bamask ya elamba na ndako mpe kosokola yango mokolo na mokolo. ']

sourceString: The Czech Republic and Slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth.
targetString: Na Republique ya Tcheque mpe na Slovaki batie mibeko oyo epekisi bato babima libanda soki balati mask oyo ekangi zolo na monoko te.
translated: [' République tchèque na Slovaquie bapekisaki kobima na esika ya bato kozanga kolata mask to kozipa zolo na monoko. ']

sourceString: On 16 March, Vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, Vietnam asengaki bato nyonso balata bamask ntango bazali kobima libanda mpona komibatelama mpe kobatela baninga.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, Vietnam asengaki bato nyonso balata mask ya elongi ntango bazokende na bisika ya bato nyonso mpona komibatela mpe kobatela bato mosusu. ']

sourceString: The Austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask.
targetString: Gouvernema ya Australie asengaki ete moto nyonso oyo azali kokota zando esengeli alata mask ya elongi.
translated: [' Gouvernema ya Autriche elobaki ete moto nyonso oyo azali kokota na butik asengeli kolata mask ya elongi. ']

sourceString: Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public.
targetString: Israel esengaki bato balata mask soki bazali libanda ya ndako.
translated: [' Israele esengi bato nyonso balata bamask ntango bazali na esika ya bato nyonso. ']

sourceString: Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-March, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 April.
targetString: Taiwan, oyo ezali kosala bamilio zomi ya bamask na mokolo uta katikati ya sanza ya misato, basengaki bato nyonso na train mpe na ba bus balata bamask banda mokolo ya 1 sanza ya minei.
translated: [' Taiwan, oyo ezalaki kosala bamask bamilio zomi na mokolo banda na katikati ya sanza ya misato, esengaki bato oyo baza na bingbunduka mpe na babisi oyo ekendaka na kati ya bingumba balata bamask na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks.
targetString: Panama esalisi yango mobeko oyo esengeli moto nyono alanda soki bazali kobima libanda ya ndako, mpe bapesi mpe toil kosala bamask ya etendi na ndako mpona ba oyo bakoki kosomba mask te.
translated: [' Panama esali ete esengeli kolata mask ya elongi ntango nyonso oyo ezobima libanda, ntango moko mpe bazolendisa kosala masque ya elongi oyo basali na ndako mpona bato oyo bakoki kosomba bamask ya elongi te. ']

sourceString: Face masks have also been widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore.
targetString: Bamask esalemi mingi na Japan, Core ya Sud mpe Malasie mpe na Singapore.
translated: [' Bamask ya elongi esalelami mpe mingi na Japon, Core ya Sud, Malaisie, mpe Singapour. ']

sourceString: Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals.
targetString: Kofanda mosika na bato (to kozala mosika na bato) ezali kopekisa bamaladi oyo ekoki kopekisa kosukisa kopalangana ya maladi nako sukisa kofanda bomoko ya bato.
translated: [' Kofanda mosika na bato (oyo babengaka mpe kozala mosika na nzoto) etaleli mpe misala ya kobundisa maladi oyo mokano na yango eza ya kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te na ndenge esalaka ete bato bakutana mingi te na kati ya bato. ']

sourceString: Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres.
targetString: Bametod misusu ezali quarantaine; kokanga ba nzela; mpe kokanga ba kelasi, bisika ya mosala, bastade, ba teatre, mpe bisika ya minene ya babutik ebele.
translated: [' Bametode etaleli mpe konfinema; bipekiseli mpo na kosala mobembo; mpe kokanga biteyelo, bisika ya mosala, mabándá ya masano, bisika ya teyatre, to bisika ya kosomba biloko. ']

sourceString: Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others.
targetString: Bato bakoki kosalisa kofanda mosika ya bato na kofanda na ndako, kosala nzela te, kotika kokende bisika oyo bato ebele bazali, kosimba bato te, mpe kozala mosika na bato.
translated: [' Bato moko bakoki kosalela mayele ya kozala mosika na bato na kofanda na ndako, kosala mibembo mingi te, koboya bisika oyo bato mingi bazali, kosalela mbote ya kozanga kokutana na bato, mpe komibatela na nzoto na bato mosusu. ']

sourceString: Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak.
targetString: Ba gouvernema mingi bazali kokotisa mibela ya kofanda mosika na bato na bisika oyo epanzani makasi na maladi.
translated: [' Baguvernema mingi bazali sikoyo kosenga to kolendisa kozala mosika na bato na bituka oyo ezali na maladi oyo. ']

sourceString: The maximum gathering size recommended by US government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known COVID-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people.
targetString: Gouvernema ya US alobi ete bato bakoki kozala lisanga kaka soki bazali 250 to mukie (Soki COVID-19 emonani te na lingomba na bango) to 50, mpe nsima balobi 10.
translated: [' Monene ya koyangana ya likolo oyo masanga ya gouvernema ya Etats-Unis mpe masanga ya kolongono ya nzoto elendisaki ekitaki noki longwa na bato 250 (soki COVID-19 eyebani te epanzanaki na etuka moko) na bato 50, mpe na nsima ekomaki bato 10. ']

sourceString: On 22 March 2020, Germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.Older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the CDC to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.In late March 2020, the WHO and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato 2020, Germany ekataki makambo ya kosangana ya bato 2 to mingi. Bato ya mikolo mpe ba oyo bazali kobela na bamaladi misusu lokola diabete, maladi ya motema, maladi ya kopema, tension, mpe kozanga systeme ya immunite ya nzoto ya makasi bakoki kobela makasi CDC alobi esengeli batikala na ndako na bisika oyo kopalangana ya maladi ezali. Suka ya sanza ya misato 2020, OMS mpe bisika misusu ya kolongona bakomi ko benga ‘Kozala mosika’ na ‘kofanda mosika’, mpona koloba ete esengeli zonto na yo ezala mosika kasi esengeli bato basolola na internet to na mosika.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato 2020, Allemagne epekisaki makita ya bato nyonso koleka mibale. Mikóló ya mikolo mpe baoyo baza na maladi ya kala na ndakisa diabete, maladi ya motema, maladi ya mpema, hypertension, mpe mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi oyo ebebi baza na likama mingi ya kobela makasi mpe mikakatano mpe CDC epesi bango toli ete batikala na ndako na bisika oyo maladi ezopanzana na kati ya bato. Na nsuka ya sanza ya misato 2020, OMS mpe masanga mosusu ya kolongono babandaki kozwa esika ya kosalela liloba "kozala mosika na bato" na esika ya "kozala mosika na bato", mpo na kolimbola polele ete mokano eza ya kokitisa bokutani ya nzoto kasi kobatela boyokani ya bato, ezala pene to na mosika. ']

sourceString: The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.Some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic.
targetString: Koloba ‘Kozala mosika’ elobi na bato esengeli basolola at ate na bato, bazala kaka bango moko, kasi esengeli bato basolola soki bakoki. Ba gouvernema misusu bakotisi toil ya kosangana nzoto na pandemic oyo.
translated: [' Kosalela maloba "kofanda mosika na bato" ebimisaki makambo oyo bato basengeli kosala na komitangola mpenza na bato, na esika ya kolendisa bango na kotikala na boyokani na bato mosusu na nzela ya banzela mosusu. Bakonzi mosusu babimisi mibeko etali kolongono ya nzoto mpona kosalela yango na ntango ya pandemi. ']

sourceString: These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus.
targetString: Ezali na toil ya kosangana nzoto kaka na moto ozali kofanda ndako moko na ye, oyo azali na virisi to basymptomi te.
translated: [' Na ndakisa batoli ya kosangisa nzoto kaka na moto oyo ofandaka na ye, oyo azali na virisi te to bilembo ya virisi te. ']

sourceString: Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with COVID-19 and those who suspect they have been infected.
targetString: Konfinema na ndako esengami mpona ba oyo bazali na COVID-19 mpe ba oyo bakanisi bazali na yango.
translated: [' Komitangola na bato mosusu na ndako etindami malamu mpona ba oyo bamonaki ete bazali na COVID-19 mpe ba oyo bakanisi ete baza na yango. ']

sourceString: Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.Many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas.
targetString: Bisika ya kolongono epesi toil mpona konfinema ya malamu. Bagouvernema mingi batie mibeko to basengi konfinema ya bato nyonso na bisika oyo maladi ezali.
translated: [' Bibongiseli ya kolongono ya nzoto ebimisaki malako ya sikisiki mpo na komifandela malamu. Baguvernema mingi batiaki mobeko to bazolendisa konfinema mpona bato nyonso oyo bafandaka na bisika oyo maladi ezali. ']

sourceString: The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups.
targetString: Mibeko ya konfinema ya makasi epesami na ba oyo bakoki kozwa maladi noki.
translated: [' Malako ya makasi ya komitya na quarantaine epesamaki na bato oyo baza na bituluku ya bato oyo baza na likama makasi. ']

sourceString: Those who may have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure.
targetString: Ba oyo bazalaki pene na moto oyo azali na COVID-19 mpe ba oyo bauti nzela na bisika to bamboka oyo ezali na maladi makasi kofanda na konfinema mpona mikolo 14.
translated: [' Ba oyo mbala mosusu bakutanaki na moto moko oyo azali na COVID-19 mpe ba oyo bauti kosala mobembo kala mingi te na mboka to na etuka oyo bato mingi bapesaki maladi na bango, bapesi bango toli ete bámitia na quarantaine mpona mikolo 14 banda ntango bakutanaki na bango mbala ya nsuka. ']

sourceString: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation.
targetString: Ndenge ya kobundela kopalangana oyo eza kosukisa to kokitisa to kozongisa yango nsima.
translated: [' Mayele mpo na kobundisa maladi ezali kokanga bato to kosukisa yango, mpe kokitisa mokakatano. ']

sourceString: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population.
targetString: Kosukisa ezali kosalema na ebandeli ya kopalangana ezali kolanda bato mpe kokonfine ba oyo bazali na maladi mpe kosala misusu oyo ekozongisa maladi nsima mpe kopesa ba vaccine na bato mpona kokitisa malady na population.
translated: [' Kosukisa ezali kosalema na ebandeli ya kopalangana ya maladi mpe mokano na yango eza ya kolandela mpe kokabola bato oyo baza na maladi mpe kokotisa mibeko mosusu ya kobundisa maladi mpe kopesa mangwele mpo na kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te na bato mosusu. ']

sourceString: When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
targetString: Ntango ekomi mpasi kokanga kopalangana ya maladi, mosalo siko oyo ekomi ya: kokitisa kopalangana ya virisi na lingomba.
translated: [' Ntango likoki ezali lisusu te ya kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te, milende na nsima ezokende na ebandeli ya kokitisa yango: bibongiseli ezwami mpo na kokitisa kopalangana mpe kokitisa bopusi na yango na ebongiseli ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe na bato. ']

sourceString: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
targetString: Mosala ya kosukisa na kokitisa ekoki kosalema elongo moko.
translated: [' Kosangisa bibongiseli ya kokanga nzela mpe kokitisa mokakatano ekoki kosalema na ntango moko. ']

sourceString: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
targetString: Kokitisa esengi ete mosala mingi esalema mpona kobalola panama na kokitisa kopanza na yango na moto 1. Kolandela maladi ezali kokitisa kopusana ya nzela ya pandemic, eyo ebengami kokitisa pusa ya pandemic.
translated: [' Suppresseur esengaka kosala makambo ya makasi koleka ndelo mpo na kobongola maladi mabe na kokitisa motango ya ntina ya kobota na nse ya 1.Eteni ya kolandela kobima ya maladi oyo epanzanaka ezali komeka kokitisa nivo ya maladi mabe, oyo babengaka kolɛmbisa curve ya maladi mabe. ']

sourceString: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
targetString: Oyo ekitisaki risk ya bisika ya kosalisa nzoto etonda mingi mpe epesi ntango mpona vaccine na kisi esalama.
translated: [' Yango ekitisaka likama ya misala ya kolongono ya nzoto oyo ezali koleka ndelo mpe ezali kopesa ntango mingi mpo mangwele mpe bankisi ya kobikisa esalema. ']

sourceString: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
targetString: Makambo oyo ezali ya lepital te oyo ekoki kosalisa mpe esali kopesisa maladi eyaka ezali kosokola maboko, kolata bamask, konfinema; mibeko ya ligomba mpona kofanda mosika na bato lekola kokanga ba kelasi mpe kopekisa bato mingi basangana; kondima ya ligomba na kosala makambo oyo; mpe kopetola likola ya biloko na egumba. Mibeko misusu ya makasi ezwamaki na Chine ntango ete likama ekomaki monene, batiaki egumba mobimba na konfinema mpe bakangi ba nzela.
translated: [' Misala oyo ezali ya kisi te oyo ekoki kobundisa maladi ezali mayele ya komibatela na nzoto, na ndakisa kopetola maboko, kolata elongi ya nzoto, mpe komitia na quarantaine; Mibeko ya mboka oyo eza na mokano ya kozala mosika na nzoto na ndakisa kokanga biteyelo mpe kopekisa bafeti ya koyangana ya bato ebele; Komipesa na bato ya mboka mpo na kolendisa kondima mpe kosangana na misala ya ndenge wana; mpe bibongiseli ya kobatela mabele na kopetola mabele na ndenge wana. Makambo mingi ya makasi oyo ezalaki mpo na kokanga maladi nzela esalemaki na Chine ntango maladi makasi na yango emonanaki polele, na ndakisa kotya bingumba mobimba na quarantaine mpe kotya mibeko makasi mpo na kosala mobembo. ']

sourceString: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ba mboka misusu batie mibeko mpona kosukisa virisi.
translated: [' Bamboka mosusu mpe bandimaki mibeko ndenge na ndenge oyo ezalaki mpo na kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
targetString: Core ya Sud ebandaki kosale ba ekzame ya minene mpe babongisaki bisika ya konfinema, mpe bapekisi bato batambola mingi.
translated: [' Core ya Sud ebandaki kosala ba ekzame ya bato mingi mpe konfinema ya bato ya mboka, mpe bapesaki makebisi na ndenge bato oyo bazalaki na maladi bazali kotambola. ']

sourceString: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
targetString: Singapore epesaki mbongo na ba oyo bamitiaki na konfinema mpe batiaki etumbu mpona ba oyo baboyaki kosala yango.
translated: [' Singapour epesaki lisungi ya mbongo mpona bato oyo bazalaki na maladi oyo batyaki bango moko konfinema mpe batiaki amande ya minene mpona bato oyo balongaki te kosala yango. ']

sourceString: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
targetString: Taiwan ematisaki kosala bamask mpe batiaki etumba na ba oyo bazalaki kombomba bamask ebele. Oyo esali Angleterre na Etats Unis elakisi (kopusa nsima kasi kosukisa kopalangana ya pandemi) été kosukisa (kozongisa pandemi nsima) ezali makasi mingi.
translated: [' Taiwan ebakisaki mosala ya kosala bamask ya elongi mpe epesaki etumbu na kobomba biloko ya kosalisa maladi. Bilakiseli mpo na Grande Bretagne mpe Etats-Unis emonisi ete kokitisa mpasi (kokita kasi kosukisa kopalangana ya maladi mabe te) mpe kosukisa (kozongisa bokoli ya maladi mabe) ezali na mikakatano minene. ']

sourceString: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
targetString: Mibeko ya kosukisa ekoki kosalisa ba oyo bazali kosala na balepital na kokitisa boni ya bato bazali kokende na 2/3 mpe kokata kufa na ndambo mpe mpasi ya ba oyo bazali kosala mosala na lepital.
translated: [' Mibeko ya kokitisa mibeko ya malamu ekoki kokitisa mposa makasi ya minganga na 2/3 mpe bato oyo bakufi na katikati, kasi ezali kaka kosala ete bato mingi bakufa mpe bibongiseli ya kolongono ya nzoto etonda mingi. ']

sourceString: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
targetString: Kosukisa ekoki kozala malamu kasi esengeli ekende liboso kaka soki virisi mpe ezali kaka na kati ya bato (to ti mokolo oyo vaccine eko yaka), mpo ete kopalangana ezongaka soki bato bakeyi liboso na mibeko ya kosukisa te.
translated: [' Bakoki kopona kosukisa maladi kasi esengeli kobatela yango ntango nyonso oyo virisi ezali kotambola na kati ya bato (to ti ntango mangwele ekoyebana, soki eyei liboso), mpo ndenge mosusu kopesama ezongaka noki soki mibeko elɛmbi. ']

sourceString: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
targetString: Mibeko ya ntango molayi na kosukisa pandemic ekozala talo mpona ligomba mpe nkita.
translated: [' Kokɔta na ntango molai mpo na kosukisa maladi mabe oyo ebimisaka mbongo ya bomoi mpe ya nkita. ']

sourceString: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
targetString: Kisi ya kobikisa nani ezali te mpona CODI-19, kasi mosala ya kosalela yango ezali, mpe na komeka bakisi oyo ezali.
translated: [' Bakisi ya sikisiki ya virisi ezali te oyo endimami mpo na COVID-19, kasi milende ya bokolisi ezali kosalema, ata mpe kosala ekzame ya bakisi oyo ezali. ']

sourceString: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
targetString: Komela kisi ya kosukosu oyo osombi na pharmacy, komela ba mayi, mpe kolala malamu ekoki kosalisa na ba symptom.
translated: [' Komela bankisi ya malili oyo eza na contre-over-the-counter, mayi ya komela, mpe kopema ekoki kosalisa na kokitisa ba symptomes. ']

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: Soki ezali makasi koleka, thepari ya oxygen, kolekisa biloko na kati ya mongongo, mpe bamachine ya kopema ekoki kosalisa.
translated: [' Na kotalela makasi na yango, ekoki kosɛnga kopesa oxygene, biloko oyo ezali na kati ya misisa, mpe biloko oyo esalisaka mpo na kopema. ']

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: Kosalisa ba steroids ekoki kotumbola makambo na ndenge ya mabe.
translated: [' Kosalela basteroide ekoki kobakisa lisusu matomba na yango. ']

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: Basymptomi mingi endimamaki kosalisama na bakisi y aba maladi ya ba virisi misusu ezali na etid mpona kosalisama mpona COVID-19.
translated: [' Biloko mingi oyo endimamaki liboso mpo na kosalisa maladi mosusu oyo euti na virisi ezali kosalema mpo na kosalela yango mpo na kosalisa COVID-19. ']

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: OMS mpe alobaki ‘’bakisi misusu ya mboka mpe ya ndako’’ ekoki kosalisa basymptomi oyo ya SARS-CoV-19.
translated: [" OMS mpe alobaki ete ''bankisi mosusu ya bonkɔkɔ mpe ya ndako'' ekoki kosalisa na bilembo oyo SARS-CoV-19 epesaka. "]

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: Komatisa mpe kobungisa balepital mpona mposa y aba oyo bazali kobela na COVID-19 ezali ntina makasi na etumba oyo elobi OMS.
translated: [' Kobakisama ya makoki mpe kobongisa kolongono ya nzoto mpo na bamposa ya bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 elobelami na OMS ete eza meko ya ntina mingi mpo na kobundisa maladi. ']

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: ECDC na biro ya Europe ya OMS babimisi mibeko mpona balepital ba banganga mpona kosalisa biloko na bisika misusu ya kolongono, lekola kosalisa laboratoir na baekzame ya COVID-19, kopekisa ba mposa misusu ya bato ya kobela, kotia mosika to na konfinema ba oyo bazali na COVID-19, mpe komatisa ndenge ya kosalisa bato na kotangisa bato ya lepial mpe kozala na bamachine ya pema mingi na ba mbeto.
translated: [' ECDC mpe biro ya etuka ya Europe ya OMS babimisi malako mpo na balopitalo mpe misala ya premiers soins mpo na kobongola makoki na ba nivo mingi, na ndakisa kotya misala ya laboratoire na kosala ba ekzame ya COVID-19, kolongola mayele ya electif soki likoki ezali, kokabola mpe kokabola bato oyo baza na COVID-19, mpe kobakisa makoki ya soins intensifs na kobongisa bato ya mosala mpe kobakisa motango ya baventilateur mpe bambeto oyo ezali. ']

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: Maloba ezali mingi na esika oyo moto ya maladi oyo ya liboso (oyo babengi patient zero) euti.
translated: [' Eza na makanisi ndenge na ndenge na oyo etali esika oyo moto ya maladi ya liboso mpenza (oyo babengaka moto ya maladi zero) mbala mosusu eutaki. ']

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: Moto ya kobela ya liboso na coronavirisi ya sika akoki kouta mokolo ya 1 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 na Wuhan, Hubei, Chine.
translated: [' Moto ya liboso oyo ayebani na coronavirisi ya sika akoki kolandela banda na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 na Wuhan, Hubei, Chine. ']

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: Na sanza moko, bato oyo bazalaki na maladi ya coronavirisi na Hubei emataki makasi.
translated: [' Na sanza moko, motango ya bato bazobela coronavirisi na Hubei emataki mokemoke. ']

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Bazalaki bato oyo bazalaki na banzela ya zando ya Huanan, oyo ezalaki koteka banyama ya bomoi pe, mpe maloba moko elobi ete virisi yango euti na banyama oyo; to; oyo misusu balobi ewuti na banyama ya zamba to ezali zoonotic. Bato mingi bazalaki kobela pneumona na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya zomi mpe basilisaki bango na monganga Zhang Jixian na Lepital ya egumba ya Hubei, ayebisaki CDC ya Jianghan na Wuhan na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya zomi.
translated: [' Yango ezalaki mingimingi na boyokani na Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, oyo ezalaki mpe koteka banyama ya bomoi, mpe liteya moko elobi ete virisi yango eutaki na moko ya banyama ya ndenge wana; To, na maloba mosusu, euti na banyama. Liboke ya pneumonia ya ntina eyebani te emonanaki na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya zomi na mibale mpe monganga Zhang Jixian asalisaki ye na lopitalo ya etuka ya Hubei, oyo ayebisaki CDC ya Jianghan na Wuhan na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya zomi na mibale. ']

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: Na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya zomi mibale, lisanga ya banganga na Lepital ya Egumba ya Wuhan bayebisaki baninga ete maladi moko ya ‘’SARS-lekola-coronavirisi’’ ezalaki kotambola.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya zomi na mibale, lisanga moko ya minganga ya Lopitalo Centrale ya Wuhan bayebisaki baninga na bango ya mosala ya "coronavirisi oyo ekokani na SARS". ']

sourceString: Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
targetString: Mwambe ya banganga, mpe Li Wenliang, basimbaki bango na police mpo ete balobaki makambo ya lekuta, Ai Fen, bakataki ye mosala na bakonzi na ye mpo ete abimisaki likama yango.
translated: [' Na kati ya minganga yango, mwambe kati na bango Li Wenliang, bapolisi balendisaki bango mpo bapanzi nungunungu ya lokuta, mpe mosusu Ai Fen, bapamelaki bakonzi na ye mpo ete abimisaki alarme. ']

sourceString: The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO.
targetString: Commission ya kolongono ya egumba ya Wuhan babimisaki sango mokolo ya 31 sanza ya zomi mpe bayebisaki OMS.
translated: [' Commission ya kolongono ya egumba ya Wuhan na nsima ebimisaki liyebisi ya bato nyonso na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya zomi na mibale mpe eyebisaki OMS. ']

sourceString: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
targetString: Bato mingi oyo bazalaki kobela pneumona bafundaki bango na basali ya kolongono na Wuhan mpo ete basosola yango na ebandeli ya sanza ya liboso. Mikolo ya liboso ya kopalangana ya maladi, limero ya bato oyo bazalaki kobela ezalaki komata makasi na mikolo nsambo to na ndambo ya mokolo.
translated: [' Bato mingi oyo babelaki pneumonia oyo eyebani te bayebisaki yango na bakonzi ya kolongono na Wuhan mpo na kobanda bolukiluki na ebandeli ya sanza ya liboso.Na ntango ya ebandeli ya kopalangana ya maladi, motango ya bato ya maladi emataki mbala mibale pene ya mikolo nsambo na ndambo. ']

sourceString: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
targetString: Na ebandeli mpe na katikati na sanza ya liboso na 2020, virisi ekotaki ba egumba misusu na Chines, esungamaki na feti ya ebandeli ya mbula mpe mpo ete Wuhan ezali esika ya nzela oyo batrai ezali kosuka ebele.
translated: [' Na ebandeli mpe na katikati ya sanza ya liboso 2020, virisi epanzanaki na bituka mosusu ya Chine, esalisaki bato oyo bakendaki na mbula ya sika ya Chine mpe Wuhan ezalaki esika monene ya transport mpe banzela ya minene ya bingbunduka. ']

sourceString: On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso, Chine elobaki ete bazalaki na bato ya kobela 140 na mokolo moko, mpe bato mibale na Beinjing na moko na Shenzhen.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso, Chine ezalaki na bato ya kobela pene ya 140 na mokolo moko, mpe bato mibale na Beijing mpe moko na Shenzhen. ']

sourceString: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
targetString: Nsima balimero ya gouvernema elakisi 6,174 ya bato oyo bazalaki na basymptomi na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso 2020. Na mokolo ya 26 ya sanza ya misato, Etats Unis eleki Chine na Italie na bato mingi koleka oyo bazali na maladi na mokili. Na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya minei 2020, koleka bato 1.61 milio bazalaki kobela na mokili; koleka 97,000 bakufaki mpe koleka 364,000 babikaki.
translated: [' Na nsima, bansango ya Leta emonisi ete bato 6 174 basi babɛlaki basymptomi na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya yambo 2020.As na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato, Etats Unis elekaki Chine mpe Italie na bato mingi oyo baza na maladi wana na mokili mobimba. Na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya minei 2020, koleka 1,61 milio ya bato ya maladi bazwaki yango na mokili mobimba; Bato koleka 97 000 bakufaki mpe bato koleka 364 000 babiki. ']

sourceString: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
targetString: Bamboka 200 mpe bisika nazalaki na mwa moto moko ya kobela.
translated: [' Bamboka mpe bateritware pene na 200 bazwi ata moto moko ya kobela. ']

sourceString: Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
targetString: Likolo ya pandemic na Europe, ba mboka mingi na Schengen bapekisa bato batambola mingi mpe bakangaki ba nzela.
translated: [' Mpo na maladi mabe oyo esalemaki na Eropa, bamboka mingi na Schengen Area bapekisaki bato kotambola na bonsomi mpe batyaki mibeko ya kolandela bandelo. ']

sourceString: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India.
targetString: Bato batiami na konfinema na mokili (mibeko ya ebengami kofanda na ndako, kitala na ndako, to konfinema) mpe kotia ban tango ya kobima libanda. Na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya minei, bato 300 milio to 90% ya population, bazali na konfinema ya ndenge moko na Etats Unis, koleka 50 milio bato bazali na konfinema na Philippines, koleka 59 milio bazali na konfinema na Afrik di sid, mpe 1.3 bilio na konfinema na Inde.
translated: [' Ba reaction ya mboka mobimba eza mibeko ya kokanga nzela epanzana te na ndakisa konfinema (oyo babengaka mitindo ya kotikala na ndako, mitindo ya kofanda na esika ya kolala, to konfinema) mpe ngonga ya kobima ndako. Na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya minei, bato pene ya bamilio 300, to pene ya 90% ya population, baza na konfinema ya lolenge moko boye na Etats-Unis, bato koleka bamilio 50 bazali na konfinema na Philippines, bato pene ya bamilio 59 bazali na konfinema na Afrika ya Sudi, mpe bato 1,3 bilio bazali na konfinema na Inde. ']

sourceString: On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato, 1.7 bilio ya baton a mokili bazalaki na konfinema, oyo etindaki bato 2.6 bilio na mokili mikolo kaka mibale oyo elekaki bakota konfinema – mwa nyonso ya population ya mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato, bato 1,7 bilio na mokili mobimba bazalaki na konfinema ya lolenge moko boye, oyo emataki na bato miliare 2,6 mikolo mibale na nsima—pene ya ndambo moko na kati ya misato ya bato nyonso na mokili. ']

sourceString: The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November.
targetString: Moto ya liboso yo abelaki COVID-19 bamoni ete ezalaki na mokoli ya 1 na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 na Wuhan, misusu balobi ete ekoki kozala mokolo ya 17 sanza ya zomi na moko.
translated: [' Moto ya liboso oyo aza na COVID-19 bamonaki ye banda na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 na Wuhan; Rapore moko oyo endimami te emonisi ete moto ya liboso oyo aza na maladi ezalaki na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya zomi na moko. ']

sourceString: Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Monganga Zhang Jixian amonaki bato ya kobela ya pneumonia mingi na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya zomi na mibale, mpe nsima lepital na ye eyebisaki CDC ya Jianghan na Wuhan na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya zomi na mibale.
translated: [' Monganga Zhang Jixian amonaki liboke ya bato babelaki pneumonia na ntina eyebani te na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya zomi na mibale, oyo lopitalo na ye eyebisaki CDC ya Jianghan na Wuhan na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya zomi na mibale. ']

sourceString: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus.
targetString: Baekzame ya liboso oyo emonaki genetic y aba oyo bazalaki kobela na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 emonaki SARS-lekola ya- coronavirisi.
