translated: [' Kosala ekzame ya gene ya ebandeli ya ba echantillon ya moto ya maladi na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 emonisaki kozala ya coronavirisi oyo ekokani na SARS. ']

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: Commission ya Kolongono na Egumba ya Wuhan epesaki sango na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya zomi na moko.
translated: [' Liyebisi ya bato nyonso ebimaki na Commission ya kolongono ya egumba ya Wuhan na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya zomi na mibale. ']

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: OMS mpe epesaki sango mokolo wana.
translated: [' Bayebisaki OMS kaka na mokolo wana. ']

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: Ntango basango oyo ezalaki kosalema, banganga na Wuhan bapekisaki bango na police balboa lokuta te na likama wana.
translated: [' Lokola ba notifike wana esalemaki, minganga ya Wuhan bakebisaki bango na bapolisi mpo na "kopanza nungunungu" mpo na maladi oyo. ']

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Commission ya mboka mpona kolongono na Chine elobaki ete malady yando ezali kotambola kati na bato te ‘’eloko te elakisi yango’’.
translated: [' Commission ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Chine elobaki liboso ete ezalaki te na "elembeteli ya polele" ya kopesa bato maladi mosusu. ']

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: Na suka ya sanza ya liboso, gouvernema ya Chine abandaki compagne oyo babengaki na secretaire general ya politik ya bacommunist Xi Jinping ete bazali na ‘’etumba’’ ya kolanda kopalangana ya virisi.
translated: [' Na suka ya sanza ya liboso, gouvernema ya Chine ebandaki kampanie moko ya makasi na nsima oyo Xi Jinping, secrétaire général ya parti communiste ya Chine abengaki yango "etumba ya bato" mpona kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: Oyo babengi ezali lekola ‘’konfinema ya monene na masolo ya mokili’’, mosala ya kolongono ebandaki mokolo ya 23 na sanza ya liboso kopekisa banzela ya kokota mpe kobima Wuhan, oyo esalemaki na ba egumba 15 na Hubei, mpona bato 57 milio.
translated: [" Oyo balobi ete eza ''konfinema ya monene koleka na lisolo ya bato'', balobaki ete nkisi ya kopetola cordon esalemaki na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya liboso kokata mibembo na kati mpe kobima Wuhan, oyo ekomaki bingumba nyonso 15 na Hubei, yango epesi mpasi na bato pene ya bamilio 57. "]

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: Mituka ya bato epekisamaki na egumba.
translated: [' Bapekisaki kosalela mituka ya moto ye moko na engumba. ']

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: Feti ya ebandeli ya sanza na Chine (25 sanza ya liboso) esukisamaki.
translated: [' Bafeti ya mbula ya sika ya Chine (25 sanza ya liboso) ekatanaki na bisika mingi. ']

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: Bakonzi mpe babandaki kotonga lepital ya huoshenshan oyo basilisaki na mikolo 10.
translated: [' Bakonzi balobaki mpe ete bazotonga lopitalo ya ntango mokuse, lopitalo ya Huoshenshan, oyo esilaki nsima ya mikolo 10. ']

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: Lepital mosusu esalemaki nsima, lepital ya leishenshan, mpona kosalisa bato ya kobela.
translated: [' Lopitalo mosusu etongamaki nsima, lopitalo ya Leishenshan, mpo na kosalisa bato mosusu ya maladi. ']

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: Lisusu mpe na balepital ya sika, Chine ebongisaki mpe bisika 14 na Wuhan, lekola ba stade na bisika ya lisanga ya mineinei, na balepital. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya liboso, gouvernema ebandaki kolandela kopalangana ya COVID-19, mpe kopesa toil na ba oyo bazalaki kosala nzela na feti ya Spring.
translated: [' Longola balopitalo oyo bauti kotonga, Chine ebongolaki mpe bisika mosusu 14 na Wuhan, na ndakisa bisika ya mayangani mpe ya masano, na balopitalo ya ntango mokuse. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya liboso, gouvernema abandisaki mibeko mosusu mpo na kokanga COVID-19 nzela epanzana te, ata mpe kobimisa bansango ya kolongono ya nzoto mpo na bato oyo bazosala mobembo mpe koyeisa feti ya Printemps molai. ']

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: Ba universite na bakelasi na mboka ekangaki.
translated: [' Bakangaki mpe ba iniversite na biteyelo ya zingazinga ya mboka. ']

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
targetString: Ba egumba na Hong Kong bakotisaki mibeko mingi, mpona oyo etali ba kelasi na ba universite.
translated: [' Bitúká ya Hong Kong mpe Macau babandisaki mibeko mingi, mingimingi na oyo etali biteyelo mpe ba iniversite. ']

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: Kasala mosala na mosika ebandaki na ba egumba na Chine.
translated: [' Bibongiseli ya kosala na mosika esalemaki na bituka mingi ya Chine. ']

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: Bakotisaki mibeko ya kokanga banzela na Hubei.
translated: [' Bipekiseli ya kosala mobembo esalemaki na Hubei mpe libanda na yango. ']

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: Babis ekomaki ndenge mosusu, mpe na bamuse na kati ya Chine ekangaki.
translated: [' Babongisaki transport ya bato nyonso, mpe ba musée na Chine mobimba bakangaki yango mpo na ntango moke. ']

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: Kolandela kotambola ya bato esalemaki na ba egumba ebele, mpe elobami ete bato 760 milio (eleki ndambo ya population) bapekisamaki kobima libanda. Nsima oyo malady ekotaki na sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Chine ekotisaki mibeko ya makasi mpona kopekisa virisi ekota ba mboka misusu.
translated: [' Kolandela kotambola ya bato esalelamaki na bingumba mingi, mpe emonani ete bato pene ya bamilio 760 (koleka katikati ya bato) bakutanaki na lolenge moko to mosusu ya kopekisa bato na libanda. Nsima ya kopalangana ya maladi ekotaki na eteni na yango ya mokili mobimba na sanza ya misato, bakonzi ya Chine bazwaki mibeko ya makasi mpona kokanga virisi nzela ya "kokota" na mikili mosusu. ']

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: Lekola, na Beijing batiaki mibeko ya konfinema ya mikolo 14 mpona bato nyonso oyo bauti ba mboka misusu. Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, Chine ezalaki kaka na moto moko oyo azwaki maladi na kati ya mboka na mikolo mitano, eutaki na moto moko oyo autaki Guangzhou azalaki kozonga na Istanbul.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, Beijing etiaki konfinema ya mikolo 14 mpona bato nyonso oyo bauti na mikili mosusu oyo bazalaki kokota na engumba. Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, mokili ya Chine kaka moto moko ya maladi apesaki na mboka na mikolo mitano liboso, na ndakisa oyo na nzela ya moto moko ya mobembo oyo azongaki na Guangzhou longwa na Istanbul. ']

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato 2020, moto ya liboso ya Chine Li Keqiang alobaki ete kopalangana ya maladi na ba oyo bazali kati na mboka esimbamaki mpe Chine alandaki likama yango malamu.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato 2020, premier ministre ya Chine Li Keqiang alobaki ete kopalangana ya bato ya maladi oyo bapesaki na mboka ekangamaki mpenza mpe maladi yango ezalaki na Chine. ']

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: Mokolo wana kaka bakangaki banzela na Hubei, batikaki Wuhan, ba sanza mibale nsima ya konfinema. Ministre ya bapaya ya Chine na Hubei alobaki mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020 ete bakoki kopesa ba visa ten a mikanda ya kokota mboka mikolo oyo te banda mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato mpe emati, bayebisaki te mobeko oyo ekosila mokolo nini.
translated: [' Mokolo moko wana mibeko ya kosala mobembo ekitaki na Hubei, longola kaka Wuhan, sanza mibale nsima ya konfinema oyo bakangaki. Ministere ya makambo ya bapaya ya Chine elobaki na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020 ete kokota mpona viza to bato oyo baza na ndingisa ya kofanda ekosuka banda na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato mpe kokende liboso, mpe makambo ya sikisiki te mpo na ntango nini mobeko oyo ekosuka. ']

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: Ba oyo balingi kokota Chine bakosenga visa na Ambassade ya Chine to na Consulaire.
translated: [' Ba oyo balingi kokota na Chine basengeli kosenga viza na ba ambassade ya Chine to na ba consulat. ']

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: Gouvernema ya Chine epesaki toil na ba companie bafondolo mokolo ya 30 sanza ya misato, mpe bapesaki mbongo mukie na ba oyo bazali na ba companie. Bakonzi ya egumba basengaki ete mokolo ya kolela ezala na 10:00 mokolo 4 sanza ya minei, ekutamaki na feti ya Qingming, kasi gouvernema ya monene esengaki bato bakanisa bato na internet mpona kotosa kozala mosika na bato mpona pandemic ya COVID-19.
translated: [" Gouvernema ya Chine elendisaki babusiness mpe baizini efungwama lisusu na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya misato, mpe epesaki bapakete ya kolendisa mosolo mpona bakompani. Conseil ya l'Etat elobaki ete mokolo ya kolela ekobanda na miniti misato ya kimia na ekolo mobimba na ngonga ya 10:00 ya 4 sanza ya minei, ezalaki na ntango moko na Qingming Festival, atako gouvernema ya centre asengaki na mabota bapesa limemya na bango na internet mpona kotala kozala mosika na nzoto mpo na kokima kobima ya COVID-19 ya sika. "]

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: COVID-19 epanzanaki na Core ya Sud na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso 2020 na Chine.
translated: [' COVID-19 endimamaki ete epanzanaki na Core ya Sud na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso 2020 uta Chine. ']

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: Esika ya egumba ya kolongono balobaki ete bato ya kobela bazali komata mokolo ya 20 sanza ya minei, ezalaki mpona lisanga oyo esalemaki na losambo ya Daegu oyo babengi Eklesia ya Yesu ya Shincheonji.
translated: [' Biro ya kolongono ya nzoto ya ekolo elobaki ete bato ya kobela babakisami mingi na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya mibale, mingimingi balobaki ete ezalaki mpo na likita moko oyo esalemaki na Daegu ya lingomba moko ya sika oyo eyebani na nkombo ya Lingomba ya Yesu ya Shincheonji. ']

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: Bato ya Shincheonji oyo bakendaki Daegu na Wuhan bamonaki ete bango moto bapanzaki malady.
translated: [' Bato oyo bamipesi na Shincheonji oyo bayaki na Daegu oyo bautaki Wuhan bakanisaki ete ezalaki esika maladi yango euti. ']

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya mibale, bato 9,336 ya Eklesia, 1,261 to 13% bazalaki na basymptomi. Core ya Sud ezalaki na mingi ya bato ya kobela ya mokolo ya 23 sanza ya mibale 2020.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya mibale, na kati ya bayekoli 9 336 ya lingomba, 1,261 to pene ya 13% balobaki ete baza na basymptomi. Core ya Sud elobaki ete bokengi eleki monene na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya mibale 2020. ']

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, koleka bato 2,000 bazalaki na maladi na Kore, emataki na 3,150 na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya mibale.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, koleka 2,000 bazalaki na maladi na Kore, emati na 3,150 na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya mibale. ']

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: Bisika nyonso ya bato ya limpimgo ya Core ya Sud batiaki bango na konfinema nsima ya kosala bango ekzame bamonaki ete bato ya limpimgo misato bazalaki na virisi.
translated: [' Bisika nyonso ya basoda ya Corée ya sude batyaki yango na konfinema nsima ya baekzame oyo emonisaki ete basoda misato bazalaki na virisi. ']

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: Ba ngona ya mpepo mpe emonaki mpasi. Core ya Sud ebandaki mosala oyo ya liboso mpe ya monene na moili mpona kosala ekzame ya population ya virisi, mpe kokonfine ba oyo bazalaki na yango mpe kolande ba oyo bazalaki pene na bango.
translated: [' Baprograme ya mpepo mpe ebebaki mpe yango wana babongolaki yango. Core ya Sud ekɔtisaki programe oyo bato bazalaki komona ete eleki monene mpe ebongisami malamu na mokili mobimba mpo na komona bato oyo bazali na virisi, mpe kokabola bato nyonso oyo bazalaki na maladi mpe kolandela mpe kotya bato oyo basololaki na bango na quarantaine. ']

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: Mosala ya kosala ekzame esengelaki bato bango moko bayaka liboso soki bazali na basymptomi mpona ba oyo bauti mboka ya mopaya bakoki koyebisa na application ya telephone,ba nzela ya public ya mituka mpe ezalaki kosala ekzame ya virisi mpe ematisaki mosala ya kosala ekzame na 20,000 ya bato oyo basalelami ekzame na mokolo moko.
translated: [' Bametode ya ekzame ezalaki kosɛngisa bato oyo bauti na mikili mosusu balobela basymptomi na nzela ya application ya telefone, kosala ekzame ya drive-thru mpo na virisi na ba résultat oyo ezali mokolo ekolanda, mpe kobakisa makoki ya kosala ba ekzame mpo na kopesa nzela na bato 20,000 basala ekzame mokolo na mokolo. ']

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Emonanaki ete rogram ya Core ya Sud ezalaki kolandela maladi malamu soki ata batiaki ba egumba na konfinema te. Societe ya Core ya Sud babebisamaki na mokambi Jae-in na oyo ye alobaki likolo ya likama oyo.
translated: [' Ebongiseli ya Corée ya sude etalelami ete ezolonga na kolandela maladi wana ata bakangi bingumba mobimba na quarantaine te. Na ebandeli bato ya Corée ya sude bazalaki na bokabwani na ndenge prezida Moon Jae-in asalaki mpo na likama wana. ']

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: Ba Coreen mingi batiaki elembo mpo ete ye alongola na mosala mpona oyo bango babengaki kosimba maladi malamu te, to kosepela na nini ye alobaki.
translated: [' Bato mingi ya Corée batyaki maboko na mikanda oyo basɛngaki bakanga Moon mpo na likambo oyo balobaki ete guvɛrnema ezalaki kolandela maladi yango malamu te, to mpe kokumisa ndenge asalaki yango. ']

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, balobaki Core ya Sud ezalaki na kobelo ya mukie na ba mposo minei mpo ezalaki kaka moto moko.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, balobaki ete Corée ya sude ezalaki na bato ya kobela mingi te na mokolo moko na mposo minei. ']

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya misato elobamaki ete banda mokolo ya 1 bato nyonso oyo bauti mboka ya mopaya bakokota konfinema mpona ba mposo minei.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya misato elobamaki ete kobanda mokolo ya 1 sanza ya minei bato nyonso ya sika oyo bakoya na mikili ya bapaya bakotia bango konfinema mposo mibale. ']

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: Na ndenge basango elobi na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya minei, Bato basengaki Core ya Sud biloko ya ekzame na bamboka 121.
translated: [' Na bansango nyonso ya bapanzi-nsango na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya minei, Core ya Sud bazwaki masengi ya lisalisi ya ekzame ya virisi na mikili 121 ekeseni. ']

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: Iran emonaki bato na maladi ya SRS-CoV-2 na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya mibale na Qom, esika oyo mpona ministere ya kolongono mpe ya kotanga kolongono, bato mibale bakufaki mokolo yango.
translated: [' Iran emonaki bato na yango ya liboso oyo bazalaki na maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya mibale na Qom, esika oyo, ndenge ministere ya santé mpe ya mateya ya minganga elobi, bato mibale bakufaki na nsima ya mokolo wana. ']

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: Gouvernema abandaki mosala ya noki na kokanga ba concerts, masano, losambo ya mokolo ya mitani, mpe kokanga ba universite be bisika misusu ya kotanga na bakelasi.
translated: [' Mibeko ya liboso oyo gouvernema alobaki ezalaki ya kokata baconcert mpe makambo mosusu ya culture, masano, mpe mabondeli ya mokolo ya mitano, mpe kokanga ba iniversite, biteyelo ya milai, mpe biteyelo. ']

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: Iran ebimisaki mbongo trilio misato mpona kobundela virisi.
translated: [' Iran epesaki rials trilio mitano mpona kobundisa virisi. ']

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: Mokamdi Hassan Rouhani alobaki mokolo ya 26 sanza ya mibale 2020 ete bango balingaki te kotia baton a konfinema na bisika oyo baton a malady bazalaki, kaka bango moto bakokota konfinema.
translated: [' Prezida Hassan Rouhani alobaki na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya mibale 2020 ete bazalaki na likanisi moko te ya kotya konfinema na bisika oyo maladi ezali, mpe kaka bato nde bakotya bango na quarantaine. ']

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: Mosala ya kosukisa banzela na kati ya egumba ebandaki na sanza ya misato, kasi embouteyage monene na babalabala ezalaki liboso ya feti ya ebandeli ya sanza ya Ersian Nowruz.
translated: [' Bibongiseli ya kokitisa mibembo na kati ya bingumba esakolamaki na sanza ya misato, atako mituka mingi na kati ya bingumba liboso ya Bonane ya Perse Nowruz ekobaki. ']

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: Bisika ya losambo na Shia ekangaki ten a pilgrims ti mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato 2020. Iran akomaki mboka oyo ezalaki na malady makasi koleka nsima ya Chine na sanza ya mibale.
translated: [' Bisika mosantu ya Shia na Qom ezalaki kaka mpo na bato oyo bakendaka kotala yango kino na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato 2020.Iran ekomaki esika monene ya kopalangana ya virisi nsima ya Chine na sanza ya mibale. ']

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: Ata oyo balobaki ete bango bazalaki kobomba basekele ya palangana na Iran, bamboka zomi eleki balobaki moto na bango ya liboso ya kobela autaki Iran na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, koloba ete maladi ezali makasi ya koleka bato ya kobela 388 oyo gouvernema ya Iran elobi.
translated: [' Na kati ya bato oyo balobaki ete babombaki bonene ya maladi na Iran, mikili koleka zomi batalelaki bato na bango na Iran na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, yango emonisi ete bonene ya maladi ekoki kozala makasi koleka bato 388 oyo gouvernema ya Iran elobaki na dati wana. ']

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: Parlement ya Iran ekangaki, mpo ete 23 ya 290 ya baton a bango bamonanaki na virisi mokolo ya 3 sansa ya misato.
translated: [' Parlement ya Iran ekangamaki, mpe 23 na kati ya 290 ya basangani na yango balobaki ete bazalaki na virisi na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato, bato ya Kososola Bonsoni ya Bato basengaki bakonzi ya boloko ya Iran babimisa bato oyo bazalaki kobundela bonsoni ya bato mpe kobimisa mpona tango mokuse bato misusu oyo bazalaki na boloko.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato, Human Rights Watch esengaki bakonzi ya babolɔkɔ ya Iran babimisa kozanga mindondo bato oyo babatelaka ntomo ya bato oyo bakangaki mpo na bato oyo bakeseni na kimia, mpe lisusu babimisa mpo na ntango mokuse bato nyonso ya boloko oyo babongi. ']

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: Elobaki ete risk ya virisi ezali makasi na kopalangana na kati ya boloko, oyo bazali na balepital ya malamu te.
translated: [' Elobaki ete eza na likama monene ya virisi epanzana na bibongiseli oyo ekangami lokola bisika ya kokanga bato, oyo ezangi mpe lisalisi ya monganga oyo ebongi. ']

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 15 sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Iran ekomaki na bato 100 oyo bakufaki na mokolo moko, ya mingi koleka na mboka uta pandemic ebandaki.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 15 sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Iran elobaki ete bato 100 bakufaki na mokolo moko, bato mingi bakufaki na mboka mobimba banda maladi ebandaki. ']

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: 12 ya bato ya politik na gouvernema ya Iran bakufaki na maladi yango na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato.
translated: [' Pene ya bato 12 oyo bafandaki to bato ya kala ya politiki mpe bakonzi ya leta ya Iran bakufaki na maladi wana na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, Iran ezalaki na bato ya kobela 50 na ngonga moko mpe moko azalaki kokufa na baminute 10 na coronavirisi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, Iran ezalaki na bato ya kobela 50 ngonga nyonso mpe moto moko ya sika azalaki kokufa nsima ya miniti zomi nyonso mpo na coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: Mpona bato ya OMS, bato ya Iran ekoki kozala mitano koleka na oyo balobi.
translated: [' Na kotalela mokonzi moko ya OMS, ekoki kozala na bato ya kobela mbala mitano koleka oyo ezolobelama. ']

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: Elobami mpe ete mibeko oyo Etats Unis atie Iran etungisi nkita na bango na kobundela virisi ya pandame.
translated: [' Elobami mpe ete mbala mosusu bitumbu oyo Etats Unis etye Iran ezali kobebisa makoki ya mosolo ya mboka mpo na kobundisa maladi ya virisi. ']

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: Commisariat ya Likolo ya ONU mpona Bonsoni ya bato esengi ete mibeko oyo ezali kotungisa nkita ya bamboka esukisama mpona pandemi, lokola oyo ya Iran.
translated: [' Haut Commissariat ya ONU mpo na ntomo ya bato esengi ete bitumbu ya nkita ekita mpona bikolo oyo ezali konyokwama makasi na maladi oyo, ata mpe Iran. ']

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: Pandemi epanzamaki na Italy na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya liboso, ntango bachinois mibale bamonanaki na SARS-CoV-2 na Rome.
translated: [' Maladi yango endimamaki ete epanzanaki na Italie na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya liboso, ntango bato mibale ya Chine bamonanaki na SARS-CoV-2 na Rome. ']

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: Bato ya kobela ebandaki komata noki makasi esengaki gouvernema ya Italie ekanga nzela ya ba mpepo oyo ezali kouta Chine mpe abenga likambo yango likama.
translated: [' Bato ya kobela babandaki komata makasi, oyo etindaki gouvernema ya Italie na kopekisa bampepo nyonso oyo ezalaki kokende mpe kouta Chine mpe kobenga yango likama. ']

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: Lisanga ya bato mingi oyo bazalaki na COVID-19 emonanaki, ebandaki na bato 16 na lombardy na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya mibale, na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya mibale, Lisanga ya Toli ya baministre elobaki ete mibeko ya sika ezali mpona kolandela pandemi, lekola konfinema ya bato 50,000 koleka na ba egumba 11 na Nord ya Italie.
translated: [' Etuluku moko ya bato oyo bazalaki na COVID-19 oyo bazalaki na boyokani te emonanaki na nsima, ebandaki na bato 16 oyo bazalaki na yango na Lombardy na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya mibale.Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya mibale, Conseil ya baministre elobaki mobeko ya sika mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo, ata mpe konfinema ya bato koleka 50,000 oyo bautaki na ba communes 11 ekeseni na nordi ya Italie. ']

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: Ministre ya liboso Giuseppe Conte alobaki, ‘’Na bisika oyo pandemic ebeti makasi, kokota na kobima eko zala te.
translated: [' Ministre ya liboso Giuseppe Conte alobaki, "Na bisika oyo maladi ezali, bato bakopesa bango te kokota mpe kobima. ']

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Kosukisa ya mosala mpe na masano ebandi na bisika wana misusu. ‘’Na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Italie asengaki bakanga ba kelasi na ba universite nyonso na mboka ntango oyo Italie akomaki na bato 100 oyo bakufaki na maladi.
translated: [' Kokata misala ya mosala mpe masano esi etindami na bisika wana." Na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Italie apesaki etinda bakanga biteyelo nyonso mpe ba iniversite nyonso na mboka mobimba mpo Italie ekomaki na bato 100 oyo bakufaki. ']

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: Masano nyonso ya minene, mpe Footbal ya serie A, elingaki ezalema na kati ya esika bakangi baporte na sanza ya minei, kasi na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya misato, masano nyonso ekatanaki mpona sanza moko kokende liboso.
translated: [' Masano nyonso ya minene, ata mpe bamatch ya ndembo ya Serie A, esengelaki kosalema na nsima ya kokanga baporte kino na sanza ya minei, kasi na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya misato, masano nyonso ekatanaki mpenza ata mpo na sanza moko. ']

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: Na sanza ya misato mokolo ya 11, minister ya liboso Conte atindaki ba business nyonso oyo bazali koteka biloko bakanga batika kaka bazando na bapharmacy. Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya misato, Colle ya Italie ya Anaesthesie, Analgesie, Resuscitation mpe Kolsalisa makasi (SIAARTI) ebimisi etid ya sante mpona ndenge nini kokabola biliko.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato, Ministre ya liboso Conte apesaki etinda ya kosukisa misala pene ya nyonso ya mombongo longola kaka bazando minene mpe ba pharmacy. Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya misato, College ya Italie ya Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) ebimisaki batoli etali bizaleli ya minganga na oyo etali mayele ya triage oyo ekoki kozala na mosala. ']

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: Na mokolo y a19 sanza ya misato, Italy elekaki Chines na bato oyo bakufaki na coronavirisi mpe mokili nyonso ekomaki na bato ya kokufa 3,405 na pandemic.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato, Italie elekaki Chine lokola mokili oyo eza na bato mingi oyo bakufaki na coronavirisi na mokili nsima ya koloba ete bato 3,405 bakufaki na maladi mabe oyo. ']

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato, elobamaki ete Russie etindaki bam pepo libwa na biloko ya lepital na Italie.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato, elobamaki ete Russie etindaki bampepo libwa ya basoda na bisaleli ya lepital na Italie. ']

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya minei, bato ya kobela bazalaki 128,948, 15,887 bakufaki, mpe 21,815 babikaki na Italy, mingi na bango bazalaki na Lombardy.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya minei, bato ya kobela bazalaki 128,948, 15,887 bakufaki, mpe bato 21,815 babikaki na Italie, mpe bato mingi oyo bazwaki maladi wana bazalaki na etuka ya Lombardy. ']

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: Rapor ya CNN elobaki ete bato ya mikolo na Italy oyo bakokaki kozwa ekzame te moto esali ete bazala na kufa mingi.
translated: [' Rapore ya CNN emonisaki ete kosangisa mibange ya Italie oyo baza ebele mpe kozanga kosala ekzame na bato nyonso oyo baza na virisi kino lelo ekoki kozala ete yango nde esalaki ete bato mingi bakufa na mbalakaka. ']

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Mosala ya Angletere ya liboso mpona kobundela virisi ebandaki malembe na bamboka oyo esimbaki, mpe na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya misato 2020, gouvernema ya Angleterre akotisaki mibeko ata moko te mpona kozala mosika na bato to konfinema na bato ya mboka.
translated: [' Eyano ya Royaume-Uni na virisi ebimaki mpo na mbala ya liboso lokola moko ya makambo ya bopemi makasi na mikili oyo ezalaki na likama, mpe kino na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya misato 2020, gouvernema ya Grande Bretagne etiaki te lolenge moko ya kozala mosika na bato to kotya bato mingi na quarantaine na bato na bango. ']

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: Mpe bongo, bato basepelaki ten a gouvvernema mpo ete basalaki mingi te mpona likama oyo ezali kati na bato. Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, minister ya liboso Boris Johnson alobaki ete bato batika kobima libanda ya mboka soki ezali ntina makasi te mpe bazala mosika na bato mpe bakenda te bisika lekola babar, malewa, mpe bateatre.
translated: [' Yango wana, bato basepelaki te na guvɛrnema mpo bamonaki ete ezalaki kotambola mbangu te mpe makasi te mpo na kobundisa mitungisi oyo bato bazali kokutana na yango. Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, Ministre ya liboso Boris Johnson apesaki liyebisi moko mpo na koboya bato nyonso oyo basalaka mibembo ya ntina mingi te mpe kokutana na bato, alobaki ete bato basalaka na ndako soki likoki ezali mpe baboyaka bisika lokola ba pub, malewa, mpe bisika ya teyatre. ']

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato, gouvrnema alobaki ete bisika nyonso ya kosepelisa nzoto lokola bagyms esengelaki bakanga, mpe bako futa baton a bango ya mosala 80% ya salaire na bango to £2,500 na sanza mpo ete bato batika kozanga mosala. Na mokolo ya 23 saza ya misato, minister ya liboso akotisaki mibeko ya makasi mpona kozala mosika na bato, akataki lisanga nyonso ya koleka bato mibale mpe akangaki banzela mpe atikaki kaka makambo ya libanda oyo zali mpeza na ntina makasi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato, gouvernema alobaki ete bisika nyonso ya kominanola na ndakisa ba pub mpe ba salles ya masano esengeli bakanga yango noki, mpe balakaki kofuta 80% ya lifuta ya bato ya mosala na ndelo ya £2,500 na sanza mpona kokanga nzela na kozanga mosala na mpasi wana. Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, minister ya liboso alobaki mibeko ya makasi ya kozala mosika na bato, epekisaki koyangana ya bato koleka mibale mpe kopekisa mibembo mpe kosala libanda na oyo bamonaki ete eza mpenza na ntina. ']

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Lokola ya liboso te, mibeko oyo esengelaki esosolama na Police na kotia bato etumba mpe kopanza soki bato basangani.
translated: [' Na bokeseni na bibongiseli oyo ezwamaki liboso, bapolisi bazalaki kotosisa mibeko wana na nzela ya kopesa lomande mpe kopanza mayangani. ']

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: Babusiness ebele balobaki na bango bakanga, etikala kaka babusiness oyo ezali na ‘’ntina makasi’’ lekola bazando, ba pharmacy, babank, bisika ya kosomba biloko ya kosala mosala, bastation, mpe bisika ya kobatela mituka.
translated: [' Babusiness mingi basengaki bango bakanga, longola kaka babusiness oyo bamonaki ete "ezali ya ntina", ata mpe bazando minene, ba pharmacy, babanke, bisika ya koteka biloko ya kosala mosala, bisika ya koteka essence, mpe ba garage. ']

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso, moto ya liboso na malady ya COVID-19 azalaki na Pacific Northwest egumba ya Washington na mobali oyo autaki Wuhan mokolo ya 15 sanza ya liboso.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya liboso, moto ya liboso oyo ayebanaki na COVID-19 andimamaki na Pacifique Nord-Ouest ya etuka ya Washington na mobali moko oyo autaki Wuhan na mokolo ya 15 sanza ya liboso. ']

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: Ekipi ya Ndako ya Mpembe esalemaki mokolo ya 29 sanza ya liboso.
translated: [' Ekipi ya Ndako ya Mpembe mpo na coronavirisi esalemaki na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya liboso. ']

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 31, biro ya trump elobaki ete oyo ezali likama ya kolongono, mpe bakotisaki mibeko mpona banzela ya Chine.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya liboso, gouvernema ya Trump elobaki ete eza likama ya kolongono ya nzoto, mpe batiaki mibeko mpona kokota mpona bato oyo bauti Chine. ']

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya liboso 2020, Esika ya Kolandela Bamaladi – elandani ya Institu ya kolongono ya bato mpona gouvernema ya U.S- balobaki ete basali biloko ya ekzame ya bango moko.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya liboso 2020, Esika ya kolandela maladi-institut ya kolongono ya nzoto ya gouvernema ya Etats-Unis elobaki ete basalaki biloko na bango moko ya kosala ba ekzame. ']

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Nsima ya kosala yango, Etats Unis ebandaki kosala ba ekzame nsima, oyo eningisaki bosolo ya pandemic nan tango oyo.
translated: [' Ata basalaki bongo, Etats Unis ezalaki na ebandeli ya malembe na ba ekzame, oyo ezipaki bonene ya solo ya maladi na ntango wana. ']

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: Biloko ya kosala ekzame esalemaki na gouvernema federal na sanza ya mibale, kozanga kondima ya gouvernema ya federal mpona biloko ya ekzame oyo eliki etid te (na academie, bacompanie to balepital) ti suka ya sanza ya mibale, mpe batoli mingi mpona bato oyo bakokaki komisalisa ekzame ti ebandeli ya sanza ya misato (mokanda ya monganga esengamaki).
translated: [' Ba ekzame ebebaki mpo na biloko ya ekzame ya mabe oyo gouvernema federal ebimisaki na sanza ya mibale, kozanga kondima ya gouvernema ya federale mpo na biloko ya kosala ekzame oyo eza ya leta te (na bato ya mayele, bakompani mpe balopitalo) tii na suka ya sanza ya mibale, mpe mibeko ya makasi mpo bato bakoki kosala ekzame kino na ebandeli ya sanza ya misato (esengelaki etinda ya monganga na nsima). ']

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya mibale, Washington Post areportaki mukie yaba ekzame 4,000 esalemaki na Etats Unis.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya mibale, The Washington Post elobaki ete ba ekzame 4 000 esalemaki na Etats-Unis te. ']

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato, Atlantic ereportaki mukie ya baekzame 14,000 esalemaki.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato, Atlantic elobaki ete na nse ya ba ekzame 14 000 esalemaki. ']

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato, Associated Press ereportaki: ‘’Bato mingi oyo bazali na basymptomi mpe mokanda ya monganga bazelaki ba ngonga milayi to mikolo mpona kosala ekzame.’’ Nsima moto ya liboso oto akufaki na Etats Unis atangamaki na Washington mokolo ya 29 sanza ya mibale, gouverneur Jay Inslee abenganki yango likama ya kolongono mpona egumba, nsiima mboka mobimba elandaki yango.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato, Associated Press elobaki: "Bato mingi oyo baza na basymptomi mpe mokanda ya monganga bazelaki bangonga mingi to mikolo mpona ekzame." Nsima ya liwa ya liboso na Etats-Unis eyebanaki na etuka ya Washington na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya mibale, guvernere Jay Inslee abengaki yango likama, likambo oyo eumelaki te bituka mosusu elandaki. ']

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: Bakelasi na Seattle bakangaki na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato, mpne na katikati ya sanza ya misato, bakelasi na kati ya mboka ebandaki kokanga. Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya misato 2020, bayebisaki Etats Unis ndenge nini bamoni likambo ya coronavirisu oyo ekokende na bayekolo ya pandemic na College ya Imperial na Angleterre.
translated: [' Biteyelo ya etuka ya Seattle ekangaki mateya na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya misato, mpe na katikati ya sanza ya misato, biteyelo na mboka mobimba bakangaki yango. Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya misato 2020, bapesaki Etats Unis toli ya baprojection mpo na bopusi ya coronavirisi ya sika na mboka na etuluku moko ya ba epidemiologiste na College Imperial ya Londres. ']

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: Mokolo wana kaka Mokambi Trump atiaki elembo na mokanda ya mosala ya kobundela coronavirisi, oyo ezalaki $8.3 billion yam bongo ya likama mpona ba agence federal na kobundela pandemic.
translated: [' Kaka na mokolo oyo prezida Trump atiaki maboko na mobeko etali komibongisa mpe kobundisa maladi ya kobakisa biloko mpo na kobundisa coronavirisi, oyo epesaki $8,3 bilio ya mosolo ya mbalakaka mpona ba agence federal mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo. ']

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Bacorporation bapekisaki na mibeko ete basali na bango basala nzela, bakangaki kosangana, mpe balobaki na bato basala uta bandako na bango.
translated: [' Bacorporation batiaki mibeko ya kopekisa bato ya mosala na kosala mobembo, bakangaki makita, mpe balendisaki bato ya mosala na kosala bandako na bango. ']

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: Masano ya saiso mpe ekatanaki. Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato, Trump alobaki ete mibeko ya kokanga nzela ezalaki mpona Europe nyonso, kasi Angleterre te, mpona mikolo 30, kobanda mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato.
translated: [' Masano mpe bileko ekatanaki. Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato, Trump alobaki ete bipekiseli ya kosala mobembo mpona mikili mingi ya Eropa, longola kaka Royaume-Uni, mpona mikolo 30, kobanda na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: Mokolo mosusu oyo elandaki, apanzaki mibeko yango mpona ezale mpe mpona Angleterre ya Ireland.
translated: [' Na mokolo oyo elandaki, abakisaki bipekiseli yango mpo na kokɔtisa Royaume-Uni mpe Irlande. ']

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato, abengaki yango likama ya national, nde yango ebimisaki mbongo ya federal mpona kobundela pandemic.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato, abengaki yango likama ya national, oyo esalaki ete mbongo ya federale ezala mpona kobundisa likama. ']

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ebandeli ya 15 sanza ya misato, babusiness mingi bakangaki to bakitisaki ba ngonga ya misala na U.S mpona kokitisa kopalangana ya virisi.
translated: [' Kobanda na mokolo ya 15 sanza ya misato, babusiness mingi bakangaki to bakitisaki bangonga na U.S mobimba mpo na komeka kokitisa kopalangana ya virisi. ']

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato, pandemic ezalaki na ba egumba 50 mpe na Columbie, Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, new York ezalaki na bato ya kobela 10,700 na coronavirisi, koleka nyonso oyo ya Core ya Sud.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato, maladi mabe endimamaki na bituka nyonso 50 mpe na etuka ya Columbia.Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, balobaki ete New York City ezalaki na bato 10 700 oyo bazalaki na maladi ya coronavirisi, koleka bato nyonso oyo bazalaki na maladi na Core ya Sud. ']

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 25 sanza ya misato, gouverneur alobaki ete kofanda na mosika na bato ezalaki kosimba, mpo ete na oyo bato ya kobela bazala 2.0 na mokolo ekomaki 4.7 na mokolo.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 25 sanza ya misato, guvernere alobaki ete emonani ete kozala mosika na bato ezali kosala, mpo makanisi ya bato ya maladi emataki mbala mibale banda na mikolo 2,0 kino na mikolo 4,7. ']

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato, ezalaki na 32,308 ya bato ya kobela na New York, mpe 672 bato bakufaki na virisi. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato Etats Unis ezalaki na bato ya kobela na coronavirisi ya koleka bamboka nyonso na mokili, Chine na Italie mpe. Na mokolo ya 8 sanza ya minei, 400,335 ya bato ya kobela bazalaki na Etats Unis, mpe 12,841 bakufaki.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato, bato ya kobela bazalaki 32,308 na New York City, mpe bato 672 bakufaki na virisi. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato, balobaki ete Etats Unis ezalaki na bato mingi ya maladi ya coronavirisi koleka mikili nyonso mosusu na mokili, ata mpe Chine mpe Italy.As ya 8 sanza ya minei, bato 400 335 bazwi yango na Etats Unis, mpe bato 12,841 bakufaki. ']

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: Basanga ya 30 sanza ya msiato elobaki ete, na U.S. Mokambi Trump alobaki batia makasi mibeko ya kozala mosika na bato mokolo ya 30 sanza ya minei.
translated: [' Barapore nyonso ya bapanzi-nsango na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya misato, prezida ya Etats-Unis Trump azwi ekateli ya kobakisa malako ya kozala mosika na bato kino na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: Na mokolo wana mpe, USNS Comfor, lepital ya bwato na bambeto 1000, ekomaki na New York.
translated: [' Kaka na mokolo wana, USNS Comfort, masuwa ya lopitalo oyo eza na bambeto pene ya 1000, basalaki longo na New York. ']

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya minei, U.S ezalaki na 884 ya bato oyo bakufaki na coronavirisi na ba ngonga 24.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya minei, U.S ezalaki na bato 884 oyo bakufaki mpo na coronavirisi na eleko ya bangonga 24. ']

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: Na New York bato ya kobela balekaki 100,000 na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya minei. Bato basepelaki te na Ndako ya Mpembe mpo ete bazwaki yango na ntina mingi te mpe kotia miso na maloba nini ezalaki kotambola na bayekoli ya kolongogo mpe ya science na kobongisa nini mboka elingi koloba mpe bamanuskri ya virisi na biro ya vice-president Mike Pence.
translated: [' Na etuka ya New York, bato ya kobela baleki 100 000 na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya minei.Bato balobaki mabe na ndako ya mpembe mpo bakitisaki likama wana mpe kolandela bamesaje na ndenge batindaki bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe bato ya siansi na kobongisa maloba ya bato nyonso mpe mikanda etali virisi na biro ya vice-president Mike Pence. ']

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Kondima ya ndenge Trump azali kolandela likambo emonani mabe na bato misusu.
translated: [' Kondima nyonso ya ndenge Trump azalaki kotambwisa makambo ya mpasi ezalaki polarisé na kolanda milongo ya parti. ']

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Bakonzi misusu ya U.S mpe ba oyo balobaka makambo basepeli ten a U.S mpo ete bango batiaki elikia mingi na biloko oyo ezali kouta libanda ya mboka lekola biloko ya kosalisa bokono ya ntina makasi, ya Chine.
translated: [' Bakonzi mosusu ya U.S mpe bato bazolobela makambo balobaki mabe ndenge Etats-Unis ezalaki kotya motema na kokota biloko ya ntina mingi, ata mpe biloko ya ntina ya monganga, oyo euti Chine. ']

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Etid ya kosala nzela esalemaki mpona kolandela ndenge virisi epalangani ezalaki na Journal ya Kosala Nzela ya Kolongono na katikati ya sanza ya liboso 2020.
translated: [' Botaleli ya ndenge ya kosala mobembo na mpepo esalelamaki mpona kosala karte mpe koyeba ndenge ya kopanzana mpe ebimaki na The Journal of Travel Medicine na katikati ya sanza ya liboso 2020. ']

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Na oyo Association ya nzela ya pepo elobaki na 2018, Bangkok, hong kong, Tokyo, na Taipei bazalaki na bato mingi oyo bautaki Wuhan.
translated: [' Na kotalela bansango ya 2018 ya Association International ya Transport ya mpepo, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, mpe Taipei bazalaki na bato mingi oyo bautaki Wuhan. ']

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: Dubai, Sydney, na Melbourne bazalaki mpe bisika oyo bato mingi bazalaki kosala nzela uta Wuhan.
translated: [' Dubai, Sydney, na Melbourne mpe balobaki ete eza bisika oyo bato mingi bakendaka kosala mobembo na Wuhan. ']

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Bali ezalaki mboka oyo bato bazalaki kokende mingi ten a bisika populaire y aba egumba 20 oyo basosolaki na ndenge ya kobongama, ntango ba egumba na Australie emonanaki kozala na likama makasi. Australie abimisaki ya ye Plan ya mosala mpona likama ya coronavirisi ya sika (COVID-19) mokolo ya 7 sanza ya mibale.
translated: [' Bato balobaki ete Bali ezalaki na makoki mingi te na kati ya bingumba 20 oyo bato balingaka mingi na oyo etali komibongisa, kasi bingumba ya Australie ezalaki kotalelama ete eza na makoki mingi. Australie ebimisaki plan na bango ya kobundisa maladi ya mbalakaka mpo na coronavirisi ya sika (COVID-19) na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya mibale. ']

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: Elobaki ete esengelaki mingi eyebana na cOVID-19, mpe Australie ekokotisa mibeko ya nzela ya ngambo mpe ya koyebisa bato makambo ya pandemic.
translated: [' Elobaki ete makambo mingi eyebani naino te mpo na COVID-19, mpe Australie ekolobela mingi kolandela bandelo mpe kosolola na ndenge ezali kobundisa maladi mabe oyo. ']

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya misato, likama ya biosecurite ya bato ebandaki na Australie.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya misato, likama ya biosecurite ya bato ebimaki na Australie. ']

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Ezalaki na konfinema ya babis na Wuhan mpe na Hubei, bamboka mingi babongamaki kobimisa bato na bango ya politik na bisika wana, liboso na mpepo ya mboka, na kondima ya bakonzi ya Chine.
translated: [' Mpo na konfinema ya malamu ya babisi na Wuhan mpe na Hubei, bamboka mingi bakani kobimisa bato na bango mpe bato ya misala ya diplomate na esika wana, mingimingi na nzela ya bampepo ya mboka oyo bafutelaki bango, mpe bakonzi ya Chine bapesaki ndingisa. ']

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Canada, Etats Unis, Japan, Inde, Sri Lanka, Australie, France, Argentine, Germany, na Thailand bazalaki bato ya liboso oyo babimisaki bato na bango.
translated: [' Canada, Etats-Unis, Japon, Inde, Sri Lanka, Australie, France, Argentine, Allemagne, mpe Thaïlande bazalaki bato ya liboso oyo bakanaki kobimisa bato na bango na mboka. ']

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: Pakistan elobaki ete ekobimisa moto na bango moko na a Chine.
translated: [' Pakistan elobi ete ekobanda te kobimisa ata moto moko ya ekolo na Chine. ']

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya mibale, Brazil ebimisaki bato ya Brazil 34 to baboti na linsungi ya bato ya Poland minei, moto ya Chine moko, mpe moto ya Inde.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya mibale, Brésil ebimisaki bato ya Brésil 34 to bato ya libota na bango longola bato ya Pologne minei, moto ya Chine, mpe moto ya Inde. ']

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Bato ya Poland, Chine na ya Inde babongamaki na Poland, bato ya Brazil bazwaki basukisaki mpepo mpe bakeyi na Brazil.
translated: [' Bana-mboka ya Pologne, ya Chine mpe ya Inde babongisaki yango na Pologne, esika mpepo ya Brésil etelemaki liboso ya kolanda nzela na yango na Brésil. ']

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: Bato ya Brazil oyo bakendaki Wuhan bakotaki konfinema na esika moko pene na esika ya bato ya limpimgo ya Brazil.
translated: [' Bana-mboka ya Brésil oyo bakendaki na Wuhan batyaki bango na konfinema na káa ya basoda pene ya Brasília. ']

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Na mokolo wana mpe, 215 bato ya Canada (176 oyo bazalaki na mpepo, mpe 39 oyo bazalaki na mpepo mosusu ya gouvernema ya U.S) babimisaki bango Wuhan na kokende konfinema na CFB Trenton mpona ba mposo mibale.
translated: [' Na mokolo wana moko, bato ya Canada 215 (176 oyo bautaki na mpepo ya liboso, mpe 39 na mpepo ya mibale oyo gouvernema ya Etats-Unis bafutelaki) babimisaki bango na Wuhan na CFB Trenton mpo batya bango konfinema mpona mposo mibale. ']

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale, mpepo mosusu na bato ya Canada 185 oyo bautaki Wuhan basukaki na CB Trenton.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale, mpepo mosusu ya bato ya Canada 185 oyo bautaki Wuhan ekitaki na CFB Trenton. ']

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Bakonzi ya Australoe babimisaki baton a bango 277 na mokolo ya 3 na 4 ya sanza ya mibale na esika ya kosimba bato ya Christmas Island, oyo ebongamaki mpona konfinema, bazalaki kuna mikolo 14.
translated: [' Bakonzi ya Australie babimisaki bana-mboka 277 na mokolo ya 3 mpe 4 sanza ya mibale na esika ya bolɔkɔ ya Christmas Island, oyo babongisaki lisusu lokola esika ya kotya bato na quarantaine, esika batikalaki mikolo 14. ']

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: Na Nouvelle Zeland mpepo oyo ezalaki kobimisa bato ekomaki mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale; bato oyo bazalaki na kati (misusu mpe ya Australie mpe Pacific) bakendaki konfinema na Whangaparoa, Nord ya Auckland.
translated: [' Mpepo ya Nouvelle-Zélande oyo ezalaki kobimisa bato ekomaki na Auckland na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale; Bato na yango (ata mpe bato mosusu oyo bautaki Australie mpe Pacifique) batyaki bango konfinema na esika moko ya basoda ya mai na Whangaparoa, na nordi ya Auckland. ']

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 15 sanza ya mibale, Etats Unis elobaki ekobimisa bato ya Amerik oyo bazala na bwato ya Diamond Pricess.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 15 sanza ya mibale, Etats-Unis elobaki ete bakobimisa bato ya Amerika na masuwa Diamond Princess, masuwa ya bisengo. ']

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya mibale, mpepo oyo ememaki bato ya Canada 129 oyo bautaki Diamond Princess bakomaki na Trenton, Ontario.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya mibale, mpepo moko oyo ezalaki na bato ya Canada 129 oyo babimisaki na Diamond Princess ekitaki na Trenton, na Ontario. ']

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: Na ebandeki ya sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Italie abandaki kobimisa bato na Iran. Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya misato Mpepo ya Sid Afrik oyo ya gouvernema ya Sid Afrik ebimisaki bato ya Sid Afrik 112.
translated: [' Na ebandeli ya sanza ya misato, boyangeli ya Inde ebandaki kobimisa bato na yango na Iran.Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya misato mpepo moko ya South African Airways oyo gouvernema ya Afrika ya Sud efutaki ezongisaki bato 112 ya Afrika ya sudi. ']

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: Baekzame esalemaki, mpe bato minei ya Sid Afrik oyo bazalaki na basymptomi ya coronavirisi batikalaki mpona kobatela basusu.
translated: [' Basalaki ekzame ya minganga liboso ya kokende, mpe bato minei ya Afrika ya Sudi oyo bazalaki komonisa bilembo ya coronavirisi batikalaki nsima mpo na kokitisa likama. ']

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Kaka bato ya Sid Afrik oyo ekzame elobaki ete bazali na malady te babimaki.
translated: [' Kaka bato ya Afrika ya Sudi oyo ekzame emonisaki ete bazali na maladi te, bazongisaki bango na mboka na bango. ']

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: Baekzame esungaki bato ya Sid Afrik mpe bato oyo bazalaki komema mpe kosala na kati yam pepo basalaki ekzame, bato ya hotel, police, bambila oyo bazalaki na mosala, ezalaki mpona komibatela, nyonso batikalaki kososola bango mpona mikolo 14 na Ranch Resort.
translated: [' Resulats ya baekzame elongolaki bato nyonso ya Afrika ya sudi, ata mpe bato ya mpepo, bapilote, bato ya hotel, bapolisi mpe basoda oyo bazalaki na mosala ya kosunga bato oyo, mpo na komibatela, bango nyonso batikalaki kotala mpe bazalaki na konfinema mpona eleko ya mikolo 14 na The Ranch Resort. ']

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato, Etats Unies ebandaki kobenda bato ba bango na Irap likolo ya pandemi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato, Etats Unis ebandaki kolongola ndambo ya basoda na bango na Irak mpo na maladi mabe oyo. ']

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale, minister ya bapaya ya Chine elobaki ete bamboka 21 (Delarus, Pakistan, Trinidad mpe Tobago, Egypt, Iran mpe na kati) batindaki lisungi na Chine.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale, ministere ya bapaya ya Chine elobaki ete mikili 21 (Biélorusse, Pakistan, Trinidad mpe Tobago, Egypte, mpe Iran) batindaki lisungi na Chine. ']

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: Bana ya kelasi misusu ya Chine na Universite na Amerik basanganako mpona kontinda lisungi na bisika ya Chine oyo bazalaki na virisi makasi, mpe na lisanga mosusu na Chicago batindaki bamask 50,000 N95 na balepital na Hubei mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso. Organization ya kosunga bato Direct Relie, na bomoko ya FedEX, batindaki bamask 200,000 mpe na biloko misusu ya kobatela nzoto, lekola bagan, barobe, na mpepo ya biloko ya likama na lepital ya Union ya Wuhan mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso.
translated: [' Bayekoli mosusu ya Chine na ba iniversite ya Amerika basanganaki mpo na kosalisa na kotinda lisungi na bisika mosusu ya Chine oyo virisi ezali, mpe etuluku moko na teritware monene ya Chicago balobaki ete balongaki kotinda bamask 50,000 N95 na balopitalo ya etuka ya Hubei na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso.Ebongiseli ya kosalisa bato Direct Relief, na boyokani na FedEx, batindaki bamask 200 000 elongo na biloko mosusu ya kobatela nzoto,  ata mpe bagan na ba robe, na nzela ya komema mpepo ya mbalakaka na lopitalo ya Wuhan Union na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso. ']

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale, Bill na Melinda Gates balobaki ete bapesi OMS $100 milio mpona etid ya vaccine mpe mosala ya kosalisa mpe na ‘’kobatela bapopulation oyo bazali na likama na Afrik mpe na Sud ya Asie’’.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale, Bill na Melinda Gates balobaki ete bakopesa OMS $100 milio mpo na kopesa mosolo mpo na bolukiluki mpe milende ya kobikisa mangwele elongo na kobatela "bato oyo baza na likama na Afrika mpe na Asie ya Sudi". ']

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Interaksyon alobaki ete gouvernema ya chine epesaki 200,000 mask na Philippines na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya mibale, nsima oyo Senateur Richard Gordon atindaki bamask 3.16milio na Wuhan.
translated: [' Interaksyon alobaki ete gouvernema ya Chine apesaki bamask 200 000 na Philippines na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya mibale, nsima wana Senateur Richard Gordon atindaki bamask 3,16 milio na Wuhan. ']

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya mibale, Croix Rouge ya Singapore elobaki ete babongisa $2.26 milio mpona kosalisa Chine.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya mibale, Croix Rouge ya Singapore elobaki ete bakotinda lisungi ya dolare 2,26 milio na Chine. ']

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Japan epesaki bamask ya million moko na Wuhan, Turkey epesaki biloko ya kosalisa bokono, Russie epesaki 13 tonnes ya biloko ya kosalisa bokono na Wuhan, Malasie elobaki ekopesa 18 milion ya bagan na Chine, Germany epesaki biloko ya kosalisa mingi lekola 10,000 robe ya hazmat, mpe Etats Unis epesaki 17.8 tons ya biloko ya kosalisa bokono na Chine mpe balobaki ete mbongo $100 milio ezali na nzela mpona ba mboka oyo bazali na likama. Nsima bato ya kobela na Wuhan esukaki makasi, mboka etikalaki kotinda lisungi na ba mboka ebele oyo bazalaki na pandemi.
translated: [' Japon epesaki bamilio moko ya bamask na Wuhan, Turquie etindaki bisaleli ya kosalisa maladi, Russie etindaki batone koleka 13 ya biloko ya kosalisa maladi na Wuhan, Malaisie elobaki ete bapesaki 18 milio ya bagan ya kosalisa maladi na Chine, Allemagne apesaki biloko ya kosalisa maladi ndenge na ndenge lekola bilamba ya Hazmat 10 000, mpe Etats-Unis apesaki batone 17,8 ya biloko ya kosalisa maladi na Chine mpe balakaki lisungi mosusu ya badolare bamilio 100 na mikili oyo ezalaki na likama. Nsima ya komonana ete bato ya kobela na Chine bazalaki kobongisa makambo, mboka ezalaki kotinda lisungi na bikolo ndenge na ndenge oyo maladi mabe ezalaki kozwa. ']

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Na sanza ya misato, Chine, Cuba na Russie batindaki biloko ya kosalisa maladi mpe minganga mpo na kosalisa bato ya Italie na kobunda na coronavirisi.
translated: [' Na sanza ya misato, Chine, Cuba na Russie batindaki biloko ya kosalisa maladi mpe bato ya mayele mpo na kosalisa Italie na kobundisa maladi na yango ya coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Moto ya mombongo Jack MA atindaki biloko ya komona maladi 1,1 milio, bamasque 6 milio, mpe bilamba ya kobatela nzoto 60 000 na Addis Abeba, na Ethiopie mpo ete Union Africaine ekabola yango.
translated: [' Moto ya mombongo Jack Ma atindaki biloko ya kosala ekzame 1,1 milio, bamask 6 milio, mpe bilamba ya kobatela 60 000 na Addis Abeba, na Ethiopie mpo Union africaine ekabola yango. ']

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Na nsima ye atindaki biloko 5 000 ya komona maladi bamasque 100 000 mpe ba ventillateur 5 na Panama.
translated: [' Na nsima atindaki biloko 5 000 ya kosala ekzame, bamask 100 000 mpe baventilateur 5 na Panama. ']

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Monsieur Ma apesaki mpe bisaleli ya minganga na Canada. Pays-bas, Espagne, Turquie, Georgie, mpe Rèpublique tchèque balobaki ete bazalaki na mitungisi mpo na bamasque mpe biloko ya komona maladi oyo euti Chine.
translated: [' Ma apesaki mpe biloko ya kosalisa maladi na Canada.Pays-Bas, Espagne, Turquie, Géorgie, mpe République tchèque bamonisaki kobanga na bango mpo na bamask oyo esalemi na Chine mpe biloko ya kosala ekzame. ']

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Na ndakisa, Espagne baboyaki biloko 58 000 ya komona maladi ya coronavirisi oyo eutaki na Chine ezalaki kolakisa ba resultat ya solo kaka na 30%, na nsima, Pays-bas bazongisaka bamasque 600 000 ya Chine mpo ezalaki ya kobeba.
translated: [' Na ndakisa, Espagne elongolaki biloko 58,000 ya kosala ekzame ya coronavirisi oyo esalemi na Chine mpe ezalaki na taux ya sikisiki kaka ya 30%, na ntango wana, Pays-Bas ezongisaki bamasque 600 000 ya Chine oyo ezalaki malamu te. ']

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Belgique ezongisaki bamasque 100 000 oyo basalelaki te, mpo bakanisaki eutaki na Chine, kasi na koloba ya solo eutaki na Colombie.
translated: [' Belgique ezongisaki bamasque 100 000 oyo bakoki kosalela te, oyo bakanisaki ete eutaki na Chine, kasi ya solo eutaki na Colombie. ']

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: Kasi, bayamabaki malamu lisungi ya Chine na bamboka mosusu ya Amerique Latine mpe na Afrika. Na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya minei, banque mondiale ebandaki misala ya lombangu mpo na kosalisa mikili ya bobola.
translated: [' Na ndambo mosusu, lisungi ya Chine endimamaki malamu na bisika mosusu ya Amerika Latine mpe na Afrika.Na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya minei, Banque Mondiale ebandaki misala ya lisungi ya mbalakaka mpona mikili ya bobola. ']

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: OMS ekumisaki milende wana ya bakonzi ya Chine na ndenge bazolandela mpe kokanga maladi mabe nzela mpo epanzana te.
translated: [' OMS epesi longonya na milende ya bakonzi ya Chine na kolandela mpe kokanga maladi mabe nzela epanzana te. ']

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: OMS elobelaki bokeseni eza na kati ya kobima ya SARS 2002-2004, epai wapi bakonzi ya Chine bafundami ete bazolobela te makambo polele na milende basalaki te mpo na kobundisa mpe kokanga maladi wana nzela mpe ete maladi ya sikoyo, oyo bakonzi “bazopesa mbala na mbala bansango ya sika mpo na koboya kobangisa bato na liboso ya fete ya Ebandeli ya Mbula’’.
translated: [' OMS emonaki bokeseni oyo eza na kati ya kobima ya SARS ya 2002–2004, esika bafundaki bakonzi ya Chine ete babombaka sekele oyo epekisaki milende ya kokanga nzela mpe kokanga yango nzela epanzana te, mpe mpasi ya sikoyo esika gouvernema central "epesi bansango ya sika mbala na mbala mpo na kokima kobanga liboso ya feti ya Bonane". ']

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya yambo, na kolandela ekateli oyo bakonzi bazwaki ya kopekisa transpore nyonso na Wuhan, momonisi ya OMS Gauden Galea alobaki ete ata soki ‘’ezalaki mpenza te toli oyo OMS epesaki’’, ezalaki ‘’likambo ya malamu emonisaki ete komipesa ya makasi ata soki eza esika moko’’ mpe ye abengaki yango ‘likambo oyo esalema nanu te na makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto”. Na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso, ntango bayebaki ete moto apesi moto mosusu maladi wana na ibanda ya Chine mpe komata ya motango ya bato ya maladi na mikili mosusu, OMS elobaki ete maladi oyo eza Urgence de santé publique de portée internationale (USPPI), PHEIC ya motoba banda bazwa bibongiseli mpo na kosukisa grippe ya makasi ya 2009.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya liboso, mpo na kolandela ekateli ya bakonzi ya centre ya kosalela mobeko ya kopekisa transport na Wuhan, momonisi ya OMS Gauden Galea alobaki lisusu ete atako ezalaki "ya solo te toli oyo OMS esali", ezalaki mpe "elembo ya ntina mingi ya komipesa mpona kokanga maladi mabe nzela na esika oyo batyaka yango mingi" mpe abengaki yango "ndenge esalema naino te na lisolo ya kolongono ya nzoto ya bato". Na mokolo ya 30 sanza ya liboso, nsima ya kondima ete moto apesi moto mosusu maladi na libanda ya Chine mpe komata ya motango ya bato ya maladi na bamboka mosusu, OMS elobaki ete maladi oyo ezali likama ya kolongono ya nzoto ya bato nyonso oyo ezali kotungisa mokili mobimba (PHEIC), PHEIC ya motoba banda mobeko wana esalelamaki mpo na mbala ya liboso na ntango ya maladi mabe ya grippe ya bangulu ya 2009. ']

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Diretere general ya OMS Tedros Adhanom alobaki ete PHEIC ekoki “kopanzanana mokili mobimba, mingimingi na mikili ya bobola oyo baza te na balopitalo ya malamu.
translated: [' Diretere général ya OMS Tedros Adhanom alobaki ete PHEIC ezalaki mpo na "likama ya kopalangana na mokili mobimba, mingimingi na mikili ya bobola moke mpe ya katikati oyo ezangi bibongiseli ya makasi ya kolongono ya nzoto. ']
