sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Nsima ya kopekisa mibembo, Tedros alobaki ete “eza na ntina te batya mibeko oyo ezopekisa kosala mibembo mpe mombongo kati na mikili” mpe ete ‘’OMS ezopesa te nzela ya kopekisa bato mombongo to ezopesa bato nzela ya kosala mibembo.”
translated: [' Na kolandela ndenge bipekiseli ya kosala mobembo esalemaki, Tedros alobaki ete "ezali te na ntina ya kozwa bibongiseli oyo ezali kobebisa mibembo mpe mombongo ya mikili mingi mpamba" mpe ete "OMS ezali kolendisa te kosukisa mombongo mpe kotambola." ']

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale, OMS esengaki mikili bapesa mbongo 675 milio ya badolare mpo na kosunga milende ya komibongisa mpo na mikili ya bobola, alobaki ete lisalisi eza ya lombangu na mikili wana oyo “eza te na bibongiseli mpo na koyeba bato oyo bazwi virisi wana, ata soki ekobima”.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale, OMS asengaki na mokili mobimba mbongo 675 milio ya badolare mpo na kopesa mosolo mpo na komibongisa na mayele na mikili ya bobola, alobaki ete esengeli kosunga mikili wana oyo "bazali na bibongiseli te mpo na komona bato oyo bazwi virisi, ata soki esengelaki ebima". ']

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros alobaki lisusu ete ‘’toza makasi ndenge moko na lien na biso ya pete mpenza” mpe asengaki mikili “na komipesa lelo to na kofuta mingi na nsima.” Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale, na conference de presse moko, OMS elobaki ete COVID-19 eza nkombo ya maladi wana.
translated: [' Tedros alobaki lisusu maloba oyo elobaki ete "tozali makasi kaka ndenge tozali na boyokani na biso ya makasi te" mpe asengaki bato ya mokili mobimba "batya mbongo lelo to bafuta mbongo mingi na nsima". Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale, OMS na likita ya bapanzi-sango emonisaki COVID-19 lokola nkombo ya maladi. ']

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Kaka na mokolo wana, Tedros alobaki ete secrétaire général ya ONU António Guterres andimaki kopesa “makasi ya ebongiseli mobimba ya ONU mpo na kobundisa yango.”
translated: [' Kaka na mokolo wana, Tedros alobaki ete secrétaire général ya ONU António Guterres andimaki kopesa "nguya ya ebongiseli mobimba ya ONU na ndenge bazoyanola". ']

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: Ekipi ya ONU oyo ekipaka makambo ya lombango ebandaki mosaka, epesaki nzela ete ONU mobimba esangana na etumba wana, oyo OMS ete ekosalisa na kotya “likebi na makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto ntango bibongiseli mosusu ezomema mayele na bango mpo na kotala makambo etali bomoi ya bato, makambo ya mbongo, mpe ya kokolisa makambo ya mboka.”
translated: [' Ekipi moko ya ONU oyo elandelaka makambo ya mpasi efungwamaki mpo na yango, epesaki nzela na kobongisa makambo nyonso ya ONU mpo na kobundisa yango, oyo OMS ekopesa bango nzela ya "kotya likebi na ndenge ya kobundisa kolongono ya nzoto ntango bibongiseli mosusu ekoki komema mayele na bango mpo na komema makambo mingi na bomoi ya bato, ya nkita mpe ya bokoli ya maladi oyo". ']

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale, ekipe ya OMS na Chine babandaki kosala elongo mpo na kosalisa minganga ya mikili mingi mpe ya OMS makoki ya kosalisa Chine na kobundisa maladi wana mpe kotala “makasi ya maladi wana mpe ndenge ezopesama na bato” na nzela ya ba-atelier mpe makita na bibongiseli ya ntina ya mikili mingi mpe kosala vizite mpo na koyeba “bopusi ya misala ya kobundisa maladi na etuka wana mpe na mokili wana, ata mpe na bingumba na bamboka.” Na mokolo ya 25 sanza ya mibale, OMS elobaki ete “mokili esengeli kosala makambo mingi mpo na komibongisa na maladi mabe ya coronavirisi,” alobaki ete ata tokoki nanu te kobenga yango maladi mabe, mikili esengeli “kozala ya kobongama.’’
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya mibale, Ekipi moko ya Mission Joint oyo etambwisami na OMS esalemaki mpo na kopesa bato ya mayele ya mikili mpe ya OMS na mabele na Chine mpo na kosalisa na kolandela makambo ya mboka mpe kotalela "makasi mpe ndenge maladi ezali koleka" na kosala ba-atelier mpe makita na biteyelo ya ntina mingi ya ekolo mpe kosala mibembo na elanga mpo na kotalela "bopusi ya misala ya koyanola na nivo ya province mpe ya etuka,  ata mpe bisika ya bingumba mpe ya bamboka". Na mokolo ya 25 sanza ya mibale, OMS elobaki ete \'\'mokili esengeli kosala mingi mpo na komibongisa mpo na maladi mabe ya coronavirisi oyo ekoki kobima,\'\' elobaki ete atako eza nanu te kobenga yango maladi mabe, mikili esengeli atako bongo kozala "na eleko ya komibongisa". ']

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Mpo na kobundisa maladi na Iran, OMS etindaki ekipe moko kuna mpo na kotalela likambo yango. Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, bakonzi ya OMS balobaki ete likama ya coronavirisi na mokili mobimba eza “likolo” kasi esengeli kokoma “likolo koleka,” nivo ya makasi koleka ya bokengi mpe ya likama.
translated: [' Mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo ezali kokola na Iran, OMS etindaki ekipe ya Mission Joint kuna mpo na kotalela makambo. Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, bakonzi ya OMS balobaki ete botaleli ya likama ya coronavirisi na nivo ya mokili mobimba ekomata longwa na "likolo" kino na "makasi mpenza", nivo na yango ya likolo ya kokeba mpe kotalela makama. ']

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Mike Ryan, diretere ya likama ya kolongono ya nzoto ya OMS ya makambo ya lombango, akebisaki na bansango ete “Oyo ezali likambo ya solo oyo mokili nyonso ya planete esengeli kolandela: Bo lamuka.
translated: [' Mike Ryan, mokambi ya ebongiseli ya OMS ya makambo ya mbalakaka ya kolongono ya nzoto, akebisaki na maloba ete "Oyo eza chèque ya solo mpona boyangeli nyonso oyo eza na planɛti: Bólamuka. ']

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Mbala mosusu virisi oyo eza na koya mpe esengele komibongisa,” alobaki ete esengeli kozwa bibongiseli ebongi oyo ekosalisa mpo “makambo ebeba te koleka ndelo” na mokili.
translated: [' virusi oyo ekoki kozala na nzela na yango pe osengeli komilɛngɛla," alendisaki ete bibongiseli ya malamu mpo na kobundisa yango ekoki kosalisa mokili na kokima "makambo ya mabe koleka". ']

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan alobaki lisusu ete bansango ya sikoyo ezopesa te bakonzi ya makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto makoki ya koloba ete ezali malabi mabe; alobi ete koloba bongo elimboli ete “tozondima mpenza ete moto nyonso na mabele akozwa virisi oyo.’’
translated: [' Ryan alobaki lisusu ete bansango ya sikoyo ebongi te ete bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto baloba ete maladi mabe ezali na mokili mobimba, alobaki ete eyambweli ya ndenge wana elimboli "tondimi mpenza ete moto nyonso oyo azali na planɛti akozala na virisi wana." ']

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato, OMS elobaki ete coronavirisi eza maladi mabe.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya misato, OMS elobaki ete kobima ya coronavirisi eza maladi mabe. ']

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Diretere général alobaki ete OMS “ezali komitungisa mingi na ndenge ezopanzana mingi mpe na makasi na yango, mpe na ndenge tozosala eloko moko te.” Bato mingi basepeli te na OMS mpo bamoni ete bazolandela makambo wana malamu te, na ndakisa balobaki na retard ete eza urgence na makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe ete virisi oyo eza maladi mabe.
translated: [' Diretere général alobaki ete OMS "ezalaki komitungisa mingi mpo na nivo ya kobangisa ya kopalangana mpe ya makasi, mpe na nivo ya kobangisa ya kozanga kosala eloko". Bato balobeli OMS mabe mingi mpo na oyo ezomonana ete ebongi te kobundisa maladi mabe oyo, ata mpe kobenga nsuka ya likama ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe kotya virisi na molongo ya maladi mabe. ']

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya minei, bato 733,000 batyaki maboko na mokanda mpo na kosenga diretere général ya OM Tedros Adhanom a demissioné.
translated: [' Botomboki wana ezalaki na mokanda oyo diretere général ya OMS Tedros Adhanom asengaki ye alongua, oyo bato 733 000 batyaki maboko na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020, bato mingi ya mayele ya lotomo ya bato ya ONU babetaki nsete na kotosa lotomo ya moto nyonso na ntango oyo ya maladi mabe ya COVID-19.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020, bato mingi ya mayele na makambo ya ntomo ya bato ya ONU balobelaki mingi kotosa ntomo ya moto mokomoko na ntango ya maladi mabe ya COVID-19. ']

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Etuluku ya bato ya mayele balobaki ete esengeli kobikisa moto nyonso mpe baguvernema eza na mokumba wana.
translated: [' Etuluku ya bato ya mayele balobaki ete moto nyonso azali na lotomo ya kozwa bibongiseli mpo na kobikisa bomoi ya bato mpe boyangeli ezali na mokumba wana. ']

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Bato yango balobaki ete kozanga mbongo to assurance ya maladi eza ntina ya konyokola etuluku moko ya bato.
translated: [' Etuluku yango elobaki makasi ete kozanga biloko to assurance ya maladi esengeli ata moke te kozala kolongisa likambo ya koponapona bato na etuluku moko boye. ']

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Bato ya mayele balobaki ete moto nyonso aza na lotomo ya kozala nzoto kolongono, ata mpe bibosono, bato oyo bazali na lisanga ya bato moke, mibange, bato oyo bakima na mboka na bango moko, bato bazangi ndako, babola ya makasi, bato ya boloko, mpe ba refuzie ata mpe bato oyo etuluku na bango eyebani te, guvernema esengeli kosalisa bango.
translated: [' Bato ya mayele bamonisaki ete moto nyonso azali na lotomo ya kozala nzoto kolɔngɔnɔ, ata mpe bibosono, ya bituluku ya bato moke, mibange, bato oyo bakimi bisika na bango na kati, bato oyo bazangi ndako, bato oyo bafandaka na bisika ya bobola makasi, bato oyo baza na bolɔkɔ, mpe bato bakimá mboka mpe bituluku mosusu oyo eyebani te oyo baza na mposa ya lisungi ya leta. ']

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Bagouvernema ya mikili bazozwa bibongiseli mpo na kobongisa makambo ya mbongo mpe ya bomoi euti na maladi ya COVID-19.
translated: [' Masanga ya gouvernema ya mokili mobimba ezali kolandela makambo ya nkita mpe ya bomoi ya bato mpo na likama ya COVID-19. ']

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Organisation ya coopération économique et développement esali esika moko mpo na bansanga ya sika mpe ya malamu na makambo oyo mikili ezosala mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo, ata mpe makanisi na batoli.
translated: [' Organisation de coopération économique et de développement efungoli esika moko mpo na kopesa bansango na ntango ebongi mpe ya mobimba na oyo etali ndenge ya kosala mibeko na mikili ya mokili mobimba, mpe makanisi mpe toli. ']

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Bonsomi mpo na kolendisa systeme ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe nkita ya mokili mobimba na kobundisa bopusi ya confinement mpe ya bipekiseli ya kosala mobembo, hub ya internet eza na eloko elandelaka politiki ya mboka, mpe esalisaka mikili bayekola na mikili mosusu mpe esalisa bango na kobunda na bampasi ya coronavirisi.
translated: [' Banda na mibeko ya kolendisa bibongiseli ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe nkita ya mokili mobimba mpo na kobundisa bampasi oyo confinement mpe bipekiseli ya kosala mibembo, esika monene ya internet eza na Country Policy Tracker, mpe mokano na yango eza ya kosalisa mikili na koyekola moko na mosusu mpe kosalisa na kosala elongo na mokili mobimba mpo na kobundisa maladi ya coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Etats-Unis elobeli guvernema ya Chine mabe, ministre ya Cabinet ya Royaume-Uni Michael Gove, mpe Edouardo Bolsonaro, mwana ya prezida ya brésil Jair Bolsonaro mpo na ndenge bazobundisa maladi mabe oyo, oyo ebandaki na etuka Hubei na Chine.
translated: [' Etats-Unis, Ministre ya Royaume-Uni na Cabinet Michael Gove, mpe Eduardo Bolsonaro, mwana ya president ya Brésil Jair Bolsonaro mpo na ndenge bazobundisa maladi mabe oyo, oyo ebandaki na etuka ya Hubei na Chine. ']

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Bato mosusu ya biro ya parti communiste ya Chine (PCC) balongolaki bango na mosala na ndenge bazolandela milende ya Chine ya kotya bato na quarantaine na Chine Central, elakisi ete bato bazosepela te na ndenge bakonzi bazosala makambo na bisika wana.
translated: [' Bakonzi mingi ya nivo ya province ya parti communiste ya Chine (CPC) balongolaki bango mpo na ndenge bazalaki kolandela milende ya kotya bato na quarantaine na Chine Central, elembo ya kosepela te na ndenge bakonzi ya politiki bazosala mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo na bituka wana. ']

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Bapanzi-nsango mosusu bazondima ete ntina ya likambo wana eza ya kobatela sécrétaire général ya parti communiste ya Chine Xi Jinping, mpo bato basilika ye te nde coronavirisi.
translated: [' Bato mosusu bakanisi ete likambo oyo ezalaki mpo na kobatela secrétaire général ya parti communiste ya Chine Xi Jinping na nkanda oyo bato bazalaki na yango mpo na kobima ya coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Bakonzi mosusu ya Chine, na ndakisa Zhao Lijian awanganaki ete coronavirisi ebandaki na Wuhan, mpe kotalela kofunda euti na Etats-Unis mpe na Italie ete COVID-19 basalaki yango kosala.
translated: [' Bakonzi mosusu ya Chine, na ndakisa Zhao Lijian baboyaki kondima liboso ete coronavirisi ebanda kobima na Wuhan, mpo na makanisi ya likita mpo na COVID-19 oyo eutaki na U.S to Italie. ']

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Guvernema ya États-Unis ya Donald Trump elobi ete coronavirisi eza ‘virisi ya Chine” to “virisi ya Wuhan” mpe alobi ete Chine “ebongaki sekele ya virisi oyo ekomi maladi mabe na mokili mobimba,” bato mosusu balobi ete maloba wana eza koyina bato mpo na loposo na bango mpe “ezozipa foti ya guvernema na ye ndenge bazokoka te kobundisa maladi oyo.”
translated: [' Guvernema ya U.S ya Donald Trump ebengi coronavirisi \'\'virisi ya Chine\'\' to \'virisi ya Wuhan\'\' balobi ete Chine \'\'kolandela makambo eleki virisi oyo sikoyo ekómi maladi mabe na mokili mobimba\'\', oyo na ngala na yango bato mosusu balobaki mabe mpo na yango ete ezali koyina bato ya mposo mosusu mpe "ezali kolongola likebi [na bango] mpo guvernema na ye elongaki te kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te". ']

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Daily Beast azwaki kable moko ya gouvernema ya États-Unis emonisi masolo na conseil ya sécurite ya mboka, ebongo balobi ete masolo yango nyonso “Ezalaki kolobela kaka Chine.
translated: [' Daily Beast azwaki nsinga ya boyangeli ya Etats-Unis oyo ezomonisa stratagem ya communication oyo emonani ete eutaki na Conseil de Sécurité Nationale, mpe bato bazolobela mayele wana "Makambo nyonso etali Chine. ']

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Bazoyebisa biso tomeka mpe tolongola nsango wana na ndenge nyonso, ezala na conference de presse mpe na televizio.” Politico, mayele ya bapaya, mpe bloomberg balobi ete milende ya Chine ezosala mpo na kotinda lisalisi na mikili oyo virisi ekoteli bango eza na kati ya kampanye bazosala mpo bazala na bopusi na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Bazali koyebisa biso tómeka mpe kobimisa bamesaje oyo na ndenge nyonso, ata mpe makita ya bapanzi-sango mpe kobima na televizyo." Bisika ya koteka na ndakisa Politico, Foreign Policy, mpe Bloomberg balobi ete milende ya Chine ya kotinda lisungi na mikili oyo virisi ezali na kati ya makambo ya propagande mpo na kosala bopusi na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Josep Borrell moto ya Eunion Européenne atalaka makambo ya bapaya akebisaki ete eza ‘’likambo ya koluka kozwa nguya na nzila ya espionage mpe ‘mayele ya kokaba.’”
translated: [' Josep Borrell mokonzi ya politiki ya bapaya ya Union Européenne akebisaki ete eza na "eteni moko ya geo-politiki ata mpe kobunda mpona bopusi na nzela ya spinning mpe \'politiki ya kokaba\'". ']

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borell alobaki mpe ete “Chine ezotinda kotinda maloba na makasi ete, na kokesena na États-Unis, aza moninga ya malamu mpe ya kotyela motema.’’
translated: [' Borrell alobaki pe ete "Chine ezali kotindika makasi nsango oyo, na bokeseni na Etats-Unis, eza moninga ya mokumba mpe ya kotyela motema." ']

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Chine esengi mpe États-Unis alongola bitumbu oyo etyela Syrie, Venezuela mpe Iran, mpe alobi ete atindi lisungi na mikili mibale oyo ya nsuka.
translated: [' Chine esengi mpe Etats-Unis alongola bitumbu na yango na Syrie, Venezuela mpe Iran, ntango balobi ete akotinda lisungi na mikili mibale ya nsuka. ']

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Bamasque 100 000 oyo Jack Ma atindaki na Cuba, bakangaki yango na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya minei mpo na etumbu ya États-Unis.
translated: [' Bokangami ya Jack Maya bamask 100 000 na Cuba, epekisamaki mpo na bitumbu ya Etats-Unis na mokolo ya 3 sanza ya minei. ']

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Bafundi mpe bakonzi ya États-Unis ete bazobotola lisalisi oyo batindelaki mikili mosusu mpo na bango moko.
translated: [' Bafundaki mpe bakonzi ya Etats-Unis ete bazolongola lisungi oyo ezalaki mpona bikolo mosusu na mboka na bango moko. ']

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Mpe baloki ete bamboka mosusu mpe baswana mpo na bamasque, na ndakisa Allemagne, Austriche, na Swisse; mpe Republique tcheque na Italie.
translated: [' Mpe ezalaki na ntembe oyo euti na bamask oyo balobaki na kati ya mikili mosusu, na ndakisa Allemagne, Autriche mpe Suisse; mpe République tchèque mpe Italie. ']

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Lisusu, Turquie akangaki ba ventillateur oyo esengaki ekende na Espagne.
translated: [' Lisusu, Turquie ekangaki bankama ya baventilateur oyo esengelaki kokende na Espagne. ']

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Na ebandeli ya sanza ya misato, guvernema ya Italie esepelaki te na kozanga bomoko ya Union Européenne na likambo ya maladi ya coronavirisi na Italie.
translated: [' Na ebandeli ya sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Italie elobaki mabe ndenge Union Européenne ezalaki na bomoko te na Italie oyo ezalaki na coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, Ambasadere ya Italie na Union Européenne, alobaki ete “Chine mpamba esalaki makambo mpo na bolamu na bango mibale.
translated: [' Maurizio Massari, ambasadere ya Italie na Union Européenne, alobaki ete "Kaka Chine nde eyanolaki na bilaterale. ']

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Ya solo, eza te elembo malamu te mpo na bomoko ya Eropa.’’
translated: [' Na ntembe te, oyo ezali elembo ya malamu te ya bomoko ya Eropa." ']

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato, nsima ya kosolola na telefone na Ministre ya liboso Giuseppe Conte, prezida ya Russie, Vladimir Putin atindaki basoda ya Russie oyo baza minganga, mituka ya koboma mikrobe, mpe biloko mosusu ya kosalisa kolongono ya nzoto na Italie.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 22 sanza ya misato, nsima ya kosolola na telefone na premier ministre ya Italie Giuseppe Conte, president ya Russie, Vladimir Putin, abongisaki basoda ya Russie batinda minganga ya basoda, mituka ya ntina mpo na koboma mikrobe, mpe biloko mosusu ya kosalisa maladi na Italie. ']

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Zulunalo ya Italie La Stampa elobaki ete “mokonzi moko ya monene ya politiki” oyo aboyaki kopesa nkombo, alobaki ete 80 pourcent ya lisungi ya Rissue “ezalaki na ntina te to ntina moke mpo na Italie.”
translated: [' Zulunalo ya Italie La Stampa elobelaki "liziba ya politiki ya likolo" oyo bato bayebi te ete 80 pourcent ya lisungi ya Russie ezalaki "na ntina te to ezalaki na ntina mingi te mpo na Italie". ']

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Moto yango afundaki Russie ete ezobanda bitumba mpo na ‘kozwa bamboka mpe kolonga na politiki.”
translated: [' Moto yango afundaki Russie ete ebandi kosala makambo ya mabe ya "geopolitique mpe ya diplomatie". ']

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Prezida ya Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, na ministre ya bapaya Luigi Di Maio bawanganaki bansango wana mpe bapesaki botondi na bango.
translated: [' Prezida ya Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, mpe ministre ya bapaya ya Italie Luigi Di Maio baboyaki makambo oyo bapanzi-sango balobaki mpe bamonisaki botɔndi na bango. ']

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Russie mpe atindaki mpe mpepo na biloko ya kosalisa kolongono ya nzoto na Etats-Unis.
translated: [' Russie etindaki mpe mpepo moko ya biloko na lisalisi ya monganga na Etats-Unis. ']

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Molobi ya Kremlin, Dimitry Peskov, alobaki ete “ntango batindaki lisalisi na baninga na bango”ya États-Unis, [Putin] akanisaki ete ntango bakompani ya États-Unis ekozongela mosala na bango ndenge ezalaka, bakosala mpe bongo soki esengeli.”
translated: [' Molobeli ya Kremlin Dmitry Peskov alobaki ete "ntango bazopesa lisungi na baninga ya Etats-Unis, [Putin] akanisi ete ntango bakompanyi ya Etats-Unis oyo esalaka bisaleli ya monganga mpe biloko ekozwa makasi, bakozala mpe na likoki ya kozongisa boyokani soki esengeli." ']

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Ngalisisi ya basoda ya OTAN oyo esengelaki kosalema na “Defender 2020” na Allemagne, Pologne, mpe na Pays Baltes, ngalasisi ya monene koleka oyo OTAN asala na nsima ya nsuka ya bitumba ebengami guerre froide, ekosalema na date mosusu.
translated: [' Ngalasisi ya basoda ya OTAN "Defender 2020" oyo bakanaki kosala na Allemagne, Pologne, mpe na mikili ya Baltes, ngalasisi ya monene koleka ya etumba ya OTAN banda na suka ya guerre froide, ekosalema na nivo ya moke. ']

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Kate Hudson, sécretaire général ya kampanye mpo na kosilisa mandoki ya Nikleyere alobaki mabe mpo na ngalasisi wana ya Defender 2020: “Na mpasi ya sikoyo ya kolongono ya nzoto, eza kotya na likama kaka te bomoi ya basoda bauti na États-Unis mpe na mikili mingi ya Eropa oyo bazosangana kasi mpe ya bato ya mikili oyo bakosala yango.” “Kala mingi te guvernema ya Iran etungisamaki mingi na virisi oyo, mpe bato zomi na mibale ya parlema baza na maladi wana mpe bato zomi na mitano mosusu ya politiki ya sika mpe ya kala.
translated: [' Secrétaire général ya Kampanie mpo na kolongola mandoki ya nikleyere Kate Hudson alobaki mabe mpo na ngalasisi ya Defender 2020: "Na mpasi ya sikoyo ya kolongono ya nzoto ya bato, ezali kotya na likama kaka te bomoi ya basoda oyo bauti na Etats-Unis mpe na mikili mingi ya Eropa oyo bazali kosangana kasi nde bafandi ya mikili oyo bazali kosala." Gouvernema ya Iran ebebisami mingi na virisi, zingazinga ya basangani ya parlema mibale bazwaki maladi mpe bato zomi na mitano mosusu ya politiki ya sikoyo to ya kala. ']

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Prezida ya Iran, Hassan Rouhani, akomaki mokamda ya polele na bakonzi ya mokili mobimba mpo na kosenga lisungi na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya misato 2020, alobaki ete mboka na ye ezokoka te kobundisa maladi oyo mpo bazangi likoki ya kokota na bazando ya mokili mobimba mpo na bitumbu ya États-Unis epesa Iran. Kobima ya maladi oyo ezosenga États-Unis basalela mayele ya malamu mpo na bato na mikili mosusu ya bozwi, ata mpe kolongono ya nzoto ya mokili mobimba, kolongono ya nzoto ya bana, congé ya kofuta mpo na libota, mpe lisengi makasi ya kozwa mosolo mpe kolongono ya nzoto ya bato nyonso.
translated: [' Prezida ya Iran, Hassan Rouhani, akomelaki bakonzi ya mokili mokanda na miso ya bato nyonso mpo na kosɛnga lisalisi na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya misato 2020, alobaki ete mboka na ye ezali kobunda na maladi oyo mpo bazangi likoki ya kozwa bazando ya mikili mingi mpo na bitumbu oyo Etats Unis etyelaki Iran.Kobima ya maladi etindi bato na kosenga ete Etats-Unis ezwa mibeko ya bomoi oyo ezalaka mingi na mikili mosusu ya bozwi,  ata mpe kolongono ya nzoto ya bato nyonso, kobatela bana na mokili mobimba, kofuta congé ya libota, mpe kozwa mosolo mingi mpo na kolongono ya nzoto ya bato. ']

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Bato oyo basosolaka makambo ya politiki bakanisaki ete ekoki kokitisa ba chance oyo Donald Trump aza na yango mpo na maponi ya 2020. Boyokani na ye na Japon mpe Corée ya sude ebebi makasi mpo na maladi mabe oyo.
translated: [' Bato bazolobela makambo ya politiki bakanisaki ete ekoki kozala na bopusi mabe na mabaku ya Donald Trump ya koponama lisusu na maponi ya president ya 2020. Boyokani ya diplomatie kati ya Japon na Core ya Sud ebebaki makasi mpo na maladi mabe oyo. ']

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Corée ya sude elobaki mabe mpo na “milende eyebani te mpe ya kozanga ntina ya quarantaine” ya Japon ntango Japon alobaki ete bato nyonso oyo bauti na Corée ya sude bakotya bango na quarantaine mposo mibale na bisika oyo guvernema ekobongisa.
translated: [' Core ya Sud elobaki mabe mpo na "milende ya polele te mpe ya quarantaine ya pasiive" nsima wana Japon elobaki ete moto nyonso oyo akouta na Corée ya sude bakotya ye na quarantaine ya mposo mibale na bisika oyo gouvernema aponi. ']

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Na ebandeli bato ya Corée ya sude basepelaki te na makambo prezida Moon Jae-in asalaki mpo na kobundisa virisi.
translated: [' Na ebandeli bato ya Corée ya sude bazalaki na bokabwani na ndenge prezida Moon Jae-in asalaki mpo na likama wana. ']

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Bato mingi ya Corée batyaki maboko na mokanda oyo ezosenga Moon atika mosala mpo bango bamoni azokoka te kobundisa maladi oyo, to mpo na kokumisa makambo azosala. Maladi oyo epesi mikili nzela ya kobimisa mbeko mpo na kobundisa yango.
translated: [' Bato mingi ya Corée batyaki maboko na mikanda oyo basɛngaki bakanga Moon mpo na likambo oyo balobaki ete guvɛrnema ezalaki kolandela maladi yango malamu te, to mpe kokumisa ndenge asalaki yango. Pandemia epesi mikili nzela ya kobimisa mibeko ya mbalakaka mpona kobundisa yango. ']

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Bato mosusu balobaki bazali komitungisa mpo yango epesi baguvernema libaku ya kokangama na bokonzi na bango.
translated: [' Bato mosusu oyo balobeli likambo yango bamonisaki kobanga na bango ete ekoki kopesa baguvɛrnema nzela ya kolendisa bokonzi na bango. ']

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Na Hongrie, parlema esalaki vote mpo na kopesa premier ministre, Viktor Orbán, nzela na koyangela libela, na kolongola bato ya parlema mosala mpe koboya maponi esalema mpe kopesa etumbu na bato oyo amoni ete bapanzaki bansango ya lokuta mpo na virisi mpe ndenge guvernema ezolandela maladi oyo.
translated: [' Na Hongrie, parlema na bango esalaki vote mpo na kopesa premier ministre, Viktor Orbán, nzela ya koyangela na mobeko oyo eyebani te, kopekisa parlema mpe maponi mpe kopesa etumbu na bato oyo bamoni ete bapalanganisaki bansango ya lokuta na virisi mpe ndenge guvernema ezolandela makambo ya mpasi wana. ']

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Kobima ya coronavirisi esali ete bafunda bato mingi mpo na kozanga bisaleli, banda na mposa makasi ya kozala na bisaleli mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo, kosomba bisomba-somba, mpe kozanga biloko na ba-izine mpe biloko mosusu.
translated: [' Bato balobi ete kobima ya coronavirisi ezali mpo na makambo mingi oyo ezalaki kozanga biloko, euti na ndenge mokili mobimba bato bakómi kosalela bisaleli mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo, kosomba biloko na kobanga, mpe kobebisa misala ya baizini mpe ya logistics. ']

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Ministere ya bilei mpe ya bankisi ya États-Unis epesi likebi mpo na kozanga bankisi mpe bisaleli mpo bato basengi biloko mingi koleka mpe stoke esili.
translated: [' Ministere ya bilei mpe ya bankisi ya États-Unis epesi makebisi na ntina ya kozanga bankisi mpe bisaleli ya monganga mpo bato bazali kosenga biloko mingi mpe bakompanyi ezali kobebisa biloko. ']

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Na bisika mingi mpe bato bakomi kosomba bisomba-somba, yango esali ete biloko esila na ba magazin, ndakisa bilei, papier ya wese, mpe milangi ya mai mpe stoke ya biloko.
translated: [' Bato mingi ya mboka bamonaki mpe kosomba biloko na nsɔmɔ oyo esalaki ete balongola biloko ya ntina na bilei lokola bilei, papiergenik, mpe mai ya milangi, yango esalaki ete biloko ezala mingi te. ']

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Industrie ya teknolozi ekebisi makasi ndenge biloko ya elektronike ezoumela na kokoma.
translated: [' Mingimingi, bakompanyi ya tekiniki ezalaki kokebisa mpo na retare na kotinda biloko ya elektronike. ']

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Mpo na diretere général ya OMS Tedros Adhanom, mposa ya bilamba ya kobatela nzoto emati mbala 100.
translated: [' Na kotalela diretere général ya OMS Tedros Adhanom, mposa ya biloko ya kobatela nzoto emataki mbala 100-mbala mingi. ']

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Mposa oyo esali ete bantalo ya biloko emata mbala zomi na mibale mpe elobaki ete bisaleli ya kimonganga ekozala na retard ya basanza minei to motoba.
translated: [' Mposa oyo esali ete ntalo ya biloko emata mbala ntuku mibale na ntalo ya malamu mpe esalaki mpe ete biloko ya monganga ezala na retard na boumeli ya sanza minei to motoba. ']

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Esali pe ete na mokili mobimba bato bazanga bilamba ya kobatela nzoto, mpe OMS ekebisi ete ekotya kolongono ya nzoto ya minganga na likama.
translated: [' Esali mpe ete biloko ya kobatela nzoto ezala mingi te na mokili mobimba, OMS ekebisi ete yango ekotya bato ya kolongono na likama. ']

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Na Australie, maladi mabe epesi libaku na bateki ya daigou bateka biloko ya Australie na Chine.
translated: [' Na Australie, maladi mabe epesaki libaku ya sika mpona basombi ya daigou ya koteka biloko ya Australie na Chine. ']

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Yango esali ete bazanga bilei ya babebe na bazando mosusu ya minene mpe guvernema ya Australie apekisaki yango. Ata bato mingi mpenza bazozwa COVID-19 na norde ya Italie mpe na Wuhan, mpe ezosenga bilei ezanga; bisika nyonso mibale wana bazangi mpenza bilei.
translated: [' Mosala wana esali ete miliki ya bana ezala mingi te na bazando mosusu ya minene mpe na nsima guvernema ya Australie epekisaki yango. Ata bato ya kobela COVID-19 baza mingi na nordi ya Italie mpe na etuka ya Wuhan, mpe na nsima mposa makasi ya biloko ya kolya, bisika nyonso mibale babikaki mpo bilei ya makasi ezalaki te. ']

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Bibongiseli bazwi na Chine mpe na Italie esalisa na kolonga na kobundisa mombongo wana ya mabe ya biloko ya ntina, kosala ete bilei esila te na Eropa mpe na Amerika ya norde ndenge bakanisaki.
translated: [' Mibeko ya Chine mpe ya Italie mpo na koboya kobomba biloko ya ntina mpe mombongo ya mabe ya biloko ya ntina mingi, ezali kokima kozanga bilei ya makasi oyo bakanisaki na Eropa mpe na Amerika ya Nordi. ']

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Norde ya Italie na ndenge basalaki mingi misala ya bilanga ekiti mingi mpenza, kasi bantalo ekoki komata na kotalela biloko oyo ezobima.
translated: [' Nordi ya Italie oyo eza na mosala na yango ya kosala bilanga mingi emona te kokita ya mingi, kasi talo ekoki komata na kotalela bamonisi ya industrie. ']

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Ba etagere ezangi bilei esalemaki kaka moke, ata na engumba, mpe bakonzi ya Chine babimisaki bangulu oyo babombaka mpo bato nyonso bazanga te bilei.
translated: [' Bisika ya kobomba bilei oyo ezangi eloko ekutanaki kaka mpo na ntango mokuse, ata na engumba Wuhan, mpe bakonzi ya gouvernema ya Chine babimisaki misuni ya ngulu mpo na kondimisa bato balyaka bilei oyo ekoki. ']

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Mibeko ya ndenge moko eza na Italie oyo ezosenga bato basalaka bilei babombaka bilei mpo na ntango ya mpasi.
translated: [' Mibeko ya ndenge moko eza mpe na Italie oyo ezosenga bato oyo basalaka bilei babatela esika ya kobomba mpo na makama ya ndenge wana. ']

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Mpasi oyo ebimi na nkita ya mokili mobimba ya esimbi mpe Chine: bansango ya bapanzi-nsango elobi ete na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, nkita ya Chine ebebaki makasi na basanza mibale ya liboso ya 2020 mpo na bikateli guvernema ezwaki mpo na kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te, mpe ntalo ya biloko emataki na 20,5%.
translated: [' Kobeba ya nkita ya mokili mobimba emonani na Chine: na kotalela lapolo ya bapanzi-sango ya mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, nkita ya Chine ebebaki makasi na basanza mibale ya liboso ya 2020 mpo na mibeko oyo gouvernema azwaki mpo na kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te, mpe mombongo ya koteka ekitaki na 20,5%. ']

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Eteni ya Chine oyo eza na mabele eza eteni ya monene na nkita ya mpe na bakompani na ngo, kobima ya virisi ezobebisa makasi mpenza nkita ya mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Lokola Chine ya mokili eza esika monene ya nkita mpe ya kosala biloko, maladi ya virisi emonani ete ezali likama monene oyo ekobebisa nkita ya mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais ya de serivice ya renseignement ya makambo ya nkita elobi ete bazando ekozala kaka bongobongo kino makambo ekozonga ndenge ezalaka.
translated: [' Agathe Demarais ya Economist Intelligence Unit elobi ete bazando ekozala kaka na yikiyiki kino elilingi ya polele ekomonana na makambo oyo ekoki kobima. ']

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Na sanza ya liboso 2020, bato mosusu balobaki ete kokwea ya nkita na mokili mobimba ekoki koleka oyo esalemaki na kobima ya SARS na 2002-2004.
translated: [' Na sanza ya liboso 2020, bato mosusu ya mayele balobaki ete kokwea ya nkita ya maladi mabe na bokoli ya mokili mobimba ekoki koleka oyo ebimaki na 2002–2004 SARS. ']

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Bolukiluki moko na iniversite ya Washington na St. Louis alobi ete tokozanga mbongo koleka badolare 300 miliard na bisaleli na mokili, mbongo tokokaki kosalela mbula mibale.
translated: [' Likanisi moko euti na moto moko ya mayele na universite ya Washington na St Louis epesaki bopusi ya badolare miliare 300+ na biloko oyo mokili ezosomba oyo ekoki koumela mibu mibale. ']

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Lisanga ya mikili oyo etekaka petrole (OPEP) elobi ete “bakwea” ndenge ntaolo ya essance ekoti mpo bato ya Chine bazosenga yango mingi lisusu te.
translated: [' Organisation ya mikili oyo etekaka petrole (OPEP) elobi ete "esili" nsima ya kokita makasi ya ntalo ya petrole mpo Chine ezosenga yango mingi te. ']

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Zando ya mokili mobimba ebebaki na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya mibale mpo na motango ya bato oyo bazalaki na COVID-19 emataki mingi na Chine.
translated: [' Zando ya mokili mobimba ekitaki na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya mibale mpo na komata makasi ya motango ya bato bazobela COVID-19 libanda ya Chine. ']

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya mibale, mpo na basusi mingi na ntina ya kobima ya coronavirisi, ba indice mingi ya bazando ya Etats-Unis ata mpe NASDAQ-100, S& indice P 500, mpe Dow Jones ekitaki makasi na ndenge esala te banda 2008, mpe Dow ekitaki na bapoint 1 191, kokita makasi na mokolo moko mpamba banda mpasi oyo ezalaki na 2007-08.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya mibale, mpo na mitungisi oyo ezalaki kobakisama mpo na kobima ya coronavirisi, ba indice ndenge na ndenge ya biloko ya Etats-Unis ata mpe NASDAQ-100, index S&P 500, mpe Dow Jones ekitaki makasi banda 2008, mpe Dow ekitaki na bapoint 1 191, kokita makasi na mokolo moko banda mpasi ya nkita ya 2007–08. ']

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Ba indice nyonso misato esukisaki mposo na nse ya 10%.
translated: [' Ba indice nyonso misato esukisaki mposo na kokita koleka 10%. ']

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, Scope Ratings GmbH endimaki valeur ya guvernema ya Chine, kasi ezalaki kaka malamu te.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale, Scope Ratings GmbH endimaki ete Chine eza na nyongo ya bokonzi, kasi abatelaki makanisi ya mabe. ']

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Biloko esilaki lisusu mpo na bobangi ya coronavirisi, kokita ya makasi ezalaki na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato.
translated: [' Biloko ekitaki lisusu makasi mpo na kobanga ya coronavirisi, kokwea ya monene ezalaki na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Bato mingi bakanisi ete nkita ekowea mpenza.
translated: [' Bato mingi bamonaka ete kokwea ya nkita ekoki kozala bongo. ']

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Moto ya Nkita Mohamed El-Erian akumisaka babanke centrales mpe mikili mpo na bibongiseli ya malamu bazwaki na lombango.
translated: [" Moto ya mayele na nkita Mohamed El-Erian akumisaki babanke centrales 'mpe bibongiseli ya mbalakaka oyo bitúká bazwaki na ntango ebongi. "]

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Babanke ya centrales bazosala makambo noki koleka ndenge basalaki na mpasi ya nkita ya 2008.
translated: [' Babanke ya centrales bazosala makambo noki koleka ndenge basalaki na kokwea ya nkita ya 2008. ']

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Tourisme ezali esika ekonyokwama makasi mpenza mpo na bipekiseli ya kosala mibembo, mpe bakangi bisika ya bato mingi ata mpe bisika ya kitoko ya kokende kotala, mpe ndenge baguvernema ezopekisa kosala mobembo na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Tourisme eza moko ya misala oyo ebebi makasi mpo na bipekiseli ya kosala mobembo, kokanga bisika ya bato nyonso ata mpe bisika ya kobenda bato na mibembo, mpe toli ya baguvernema oyo epekisi mobembo nyonso na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Yango wana, bampepo mingi ekati mibembo na yango mpo bato moke nde baza na mposa ya kosala mobembo, ata mpe British Airways, Chinese Eastern Airlines, mpe Quantas, kasi British regional airline Flybe ekwei.
translated: [' Mpo na yango, bampepo mingi ekangi bampepo mpo bato mingi baza na mposa na yango mingi te, na ndakisa British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, mpe Qantas, ntango mpepo ya etuka ya Grande Bretagne Flybe ekweaki. ']

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Bopusi na yango na mobembo ya mai eza makasi na nivo moko emonana nanu te.
translated: [' Bopusi na industrie ya ligne ya croisière ezalaki na nivo oyo emonana naino te. ']

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Bisika mingi oyo train etelemaka mpe mabongo, ekangama.
translated: [' Bisika mingi oyo engbunduka etɛlɛmaka mpe mabongo ya masuwa bakangi mpe. ']

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Maladi mabe eyei nzela moko na Chunyun, eleko monene ya mobembo oyo esalamaka na ntango ya fete ya mbula ya sika na Chine.
translated: [' Maladi mabe wana esalemaki na ntango ya Chunyun, eleko monene ya mobembo oyo ezalaki na boyokani na feti ya mbula ya sika ya Chine. ']

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Makambo mingi oyo esangisaka bato mingi, bapekisaki yango na bagurnema ya bituka, ata mpe bafete ya mbula ya sika; bakompani ya prive mpe ekangai baboutique na bango mpe bisika bato bayaka kotala na ndakisa Hong Kong Disneyland mpe Shanghai Disneyland.
translated: [' Makambo mingi oyo esalemaki na bato ebele, baguvernema ya mikili mpe ya bituka bakangaki yango, ata mpe bafeti ya mbula nyonso ya mbula ya sika, bakompani ya prive ekangaki mpe na ndenge na bango moko babutik na bango mpe bisika ya bapaya na ndakisa Hong Kong Disneyland mpe Shanghai Disneyland. ']

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Bafeti mingi ya mbula ya mpe bisika bapaya bayaka kotala, bakanga yango mpo na kopekisa bato mingi basala makita, ata mpe Forbidden City na Beijing mpe bafete ya makoko ya bokoko.
translated: [' Bafeti mingi ya Bonane mpe bisika ya bapaya bakangi yango mpona kopekisa bato mingi basangana, ata mpe Forbidden City na Beijing mpe bafoire ya bonkɔkɔ ya batempelo. ']

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Na 24 na kati ya 31 bituka, bamboka mpe bisika mingi na Chine, bakonzi bapusaki feti ya mbula ya sika na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya mibale, mpe eyebisaki bisika mingi ya mosala ete efongwama te kino na date wana.
translated: [' Na bituka 24 na kati ya 31 ya Chine, ba egumba mpe bituka, bakonzi bapusaki fete ya mbula ya sika na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya mibale, balobaki ete bisika mingi ya mosala efungwama lisusu te kino na dati wana. ']

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Bituka wana ezali 80% ya bomengo ya mboka mpe 90% ya mbongo eutaka na biloko batekaka.
translated: [' Bisika wana ezalaki 80% ya PIB ya mboka mpe 90% ya biloko batekaka na mikili mosusu. ']

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong ematisaki mibeko na ye mpo na kobundisa maladi mpe elobelaki etat d’urgence, ekangaki biteyelo kino na sanza ya misato mpe epekisaki fete ya mbula ya sika. Mombongo ebebisa mpenza na mokili mobimba, ba boutique bakitisi bangonga ya mosala to bakangi yango mpo na ntango moke.
translated: [' Hong Kong ematisi nivo ya makasi ya kobundisa maladi na yango na likolo mpe elobaki ete eza likama, bakangaki biteyelo kino na sanza ya misato mpe bakangaki bafeti na yango ya Bonane. Mosala ya koteka biloko ebebi na mokili mobimba, mpe bakitisaki bangonga ya butik to kokanga yango mpo na ntango mokuse. ']

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Kosomba biloko na ba boutique mike ekita na Eropa mpe na Amerique Latine na 40%.
translated: [' Kokende kotala bato ya mombongo na Eropa mpe na Amerique Latine ekitaki na 40%. ']

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Mombongo ya bato ya Amerika ya norde mpe ya moyen Orient oyo batekaka biloko basombi ekiti na 50-60%.
translated: [' Amerika ya Nordi mpe bato ya koteka ya Moyen-Orient bamonaki kokita ya 50–60%. ']

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Ememaki kokita ya 33-43% na bato ya makolo oyo bazokende na esika baboutique ezalaka na sanza ya misato soki tokokanisi yango na sanza ya mibale.
translated: [' Yango mpe esalaki ete 33–43% ya bato ya makolo oyo bazalaki kokende na bisika ya kosomba biloko ekita na 33–43% na sanza ya misato soki tokokanisi yango na sanza ya mibale. ']

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Bato batekaka na bazando na mokili mobimba, batyeli bango mibeko mosusu, na ndakisa kolongola mikrobe, kotya ba scanner mpo na kozwa temperature ya basombi, mpe kokanga makambo ya kosangana. Na kotalela ministere ya nkita ya Etats-Unis mpo na Amerique Latine, balobi ete mpasi ya maladi oyo ekosala ete bato kati ya 14 mpe 22 milio ya bato bakozala bobola makasi na Amerique Latine koleka soki maladi oyo ebimaki te.
translated: [' Bato oyo basalaka na izine na mokili mobimba batiaki mibeko mosusu, bobakisi ya bopeto ya ndenge wana, kotya ba scanner ya thermique mpo na kotala temperature ya basombi, mpe kokanga ba evenement. Na kotalela likanisi ya ONU ya nkita ya Amerique Latini, kokita ya nkita oyo euti na maladi mabe ekoki kotika bato bamilio 14 mpe 22 oyo baza na bobola makasi na Amerique Latine koleka ndenge ekokaki kozala na situation wana soki maladi mabe ezalaki te. ']

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Na sanza ya liboso mpe ya mibale na 2020, ntango bato mingi mpenza babelaki na Wuhan, bato pene ya bamilio 5o na Chine babungisaki mosala na bango.
translated: [' Na sanza ya liboso mpe ya mibale 2020, ntango maladi mabe ezalaki makasi na Wuhan, bato pene ya bamilio 5 na Chine babungisaki misala na bango. ']

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Bato mingi na kati ya bato bamilio 300 ya Chine oyo basalaka na bamboka bakangami na bituka to na etuka ya Hubei. Na sanza ya misato 2020, bato ya Amerika koleka bamilio 10 babungisaki misala na bango mpe basengaki lisungi na guvernema.
translated: [' Mingi ya bato ya Chine oyo basalaka misala pene ya bamilio 300 ya bamboka ya mike bakangami na ndako na bango na bituka ya kati to bakangami na etuka ya Hubei. Na sanza ya misato 2020, bato ya Amerika koleka bamilio 10 babungisaki misala na bango mpe basɛngaki lisalisi ya Leta. ']

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Kobima ya coronavirisi esali ete bato bamilio 47 babungisa misala na Etats-Unis mpe kozanga mosala emati na 32%, na kotalela bantalo euti na banke Federal ya St Louis. Confinement na Inde esali ete bamilio ya bato oyo baliaka na mosala ya (oyo bafutaka bango mokolo na mokolo) bazangi mosala. Ankete ya Institut Angus Reid emoni ete bato ya mabota ya Canada 44% bazangi mosala na lolenge moko boye. Pene ya bato ya mosala 900 000 babungisaki misala na Espagne banda confinement ebandaki na katikati ya sanza ya misato 2020.
translated: [' Kobima ya coronavirisi ekoki kolongola misala bamilio 47 na Etats-Unis mpe kozanga mosala ekoki kozala na 32%, na kotalela makanisi ya Federal Reserve Bank ya St Louis.Bokangami na Inde esali ete bamilio mingi ya bato ya Inde oyo basalaka na mosala (oyo bafutaka bango na nzela ya lifuta ya mokolo na mokolo) bazanga mosala. Bolukiluki oyo eutaki na Institut Angus Reid emonisaki ete 44% ya mabota ya Canada bakutanaki na lolenge moko boye ya kozanga mosala. Pene ya bato ya mosala 900 000 babungisaki misala na bango na Espagne banda bakangaki yango na katikati ya sanza ya misato 2020. ']

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Na eteni ya mibale ya sanza ya misato, bato ya France bamilio 4 oyo basalaka mosala basalaki demande mpo na kozwa matomba ya ntango mokuse ya kozanga mosala mpe bato ya Grande-Bretagne milio 1 oyo basalaka mosala basalaki demande mpo babimisa mwanga ya kodefisa bango mbongo. Katikati ya milio moko ya bakompani ya Allemagne basengaki bato na bango ya mosala baluka lisalisi na manaka ya ntango mokuse oyo babengaka Kurzarbeit.
translated: [' Na eteni ya mibale ya sanza ya misato, bato ya France bamilio 4 ya mosala basɛngaki lisungi ya ntango mokuse mpo na kozanga mosala mpe bato 1 milio ya mosala ya Grande Bretagne basɛngaki ebongiseli moko ya kodefisa bato nyonso mbongo. Bakompani pene ya ndambo ya milio moko na Allemagne batindaki bato na bango ya mosala na bibongiseli ya ntango mokuse ya mosala ya ntango mokuse oyo gouvernema apesaki, oyo babengaka Kurzarbeit. ']

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Bato ya France mpe Grande-Bretagne bandima kosalela mobeko ya Allemagne oyo etali kofuta mbongo na ntango mokuse.
translated: [' Ebongiseli ya kofuta bato ya Allemagne mpo na mosala ya ntango mokuse endimamaki na France mpe Grande Bretagne. ']

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Misala ya art mpe ya makambo ya bonkoko ebebisami makasi na maladi mabe oyo; ezonyokola masanga mpe bato mokomoko, eza baoyo bazali na mosala mpe baoyo basalaka misala na bango moko, na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Misala ya art mpe ya libula ya culture oyo ezosala malamu ebebi mpenza mpo na maladi mabe oyo, ezali kobebisa misala ya bibongiseli mpe na bato-ezala na bato oyo basalaka mosala mpe na lipanda-na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Bato ya misala ya art mpe ya culture bamekaki kolanda kosala misala na bango (oyo mbala mingi mbongo eutaka na bato) mpo na kolanda kosepelisa bato ya bisika bafandi, kosala ete bato na bango ya mosala mpe bato nyonso bazala na libateli, mpe kosalisa ba-artiste soki likoki ezali.
translated: [' Masanga ya misala ya ntɔki mpe ya culture emekaki kolongisa mosala na bango (oyo mbala mingi bapesaka mbongo na Leta) mpona kopesa bato ya mboka nzela ya kozwa libula ya mimeseno ya mboka, kobatela libateli ya bato na bango ya mosala mpe ya bato nyonso, mpe kosalisa bayemi soki likoki ezali. ']

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Na sanza ya misato 2020, na mokili mobimba mpe na banivo ekeseni, ba musee, babiblioteke, bisika ya masano, mpe bisika mosusu ya culture, bakanga yango mpenza; mpe biloko oyo bato bayaka kotala, masano oyo basalaka kuna ekosalema te to babongoli date na yango.
translated: [' Na sanza ya misato 2020, na mokili mobimba mpe na ba degré ekeseni, ba musées, babiblioteke, bisika ya kosala mosala, mpe bisika mosusu ya culture bakangaki yango mpo na ntango eyebani te na baexposition, ba evenement mpe masano na bango ekatanaki to ebongwanaki. ']

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Yango wana, bato basalaki milende mingi mpo na kozwa mwango mosusu ya kosala mosala na nzela ya internet. Likambo mosusu ya mpasi eza ndenge bapekisa mangomba basala makita te, bapekisa makambo ya sports, mpe makambo mosusu ya bomoi ya bato, na ndakisa bafete ya miziki mpe ba concert, makita ya technologie mpe ba defile de mode.
translated: [' Mpo na koyanola ezalaki na milende makasi ya kopesa misala mosusu na nzela ya bisika ya kosalela digito. Kokwea mosusu ya mikolo oyo mpe ya lombango ya kokwea ya maladi eza kolongolama ya milulu ya losambo, makambo ya minene oyo esalemaka na masano, mpe na makambo mosusu ya bomoi ya bato, na ndakisa bafete ya miziki mpe ba concert, makita ya teknolozi, mpe bashow ya elateli. ']

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Mosala ya bafilme mpe ezosalama lisusu te. Vatican elobaki ete bafete ya mposo ya mosantu na Rome, oyo esalemaka na mposo ya nsuka ya eleko ya kokila bilei, ekosalema te.
translated: [' Industrie ya bafilme ekutanaki mpe na mobulu. Vatican elobaki ete milulu ya poso mosantu na Rome, oyo esalemaka na poso ya nsuka ya eleko ya etumbu ya Boklisto ya Lent, ekatani. ']

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Badiocese mingi esengi Bakristo oyo baza mibange bafanda olie ya kokende na misa na mikolo ya Eyenga; mangombe mosusu bazosala makita na bango na nzela ya radio, na internet na steaming en direct to na televizio mpe basusu bazosala makita na balabala.
translated: [' Ba diocèse mingi elendisi mibange bakristu batikala na ndako na esika ya kokende misa na mokolo ya lomingo; Balingomba mosusu esali ete misala ya lingomba ezala na nzela ya radio, na internet na streaming to na televizyo mpe basusu bazali kopesa losambo ya drive-in. ']

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Badiocese ya Katolika ya Roma ekangaki bandako ya nzambe na yango mpe St. Peter’s Square ebimisaki Bakristo mpo etikala mpamba, mangomba mosusu mpe bakati makita na bango mpe etya mibeko na makita ya bato nyonso na ndako ya nzambe, na ba mosquee, na basinagoge, na batempelo mpe na ba-eklezia.
translated: [' Lokola diocèse ya Katolika ya Roma ya Roma ekangaki bandako-nzambe na yango mpe na bandako na yango ya losambo mpe na place Saint-Péters oyo ezalaki na ba pèlerins ya Saint-Péter, mangomba mosusu ekataki mpe milulu mpe makita ya bato nyonso ezalaki mingi te na bandako-nzambe, na bamosquées, na basinagoga, na batempelo mpe na gurdwaras. ']

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Ministre ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Iran alobaki ete losambo ya mokolo ya mitano na bisika oyo virisi ezali ekosalema lisusu te mpe bakangaki batempelo na nsima, kasi Arabie Saudite episi bana-mboka mpe bapaya na kokende na losambo Mecque mpe Medine.
translated: [' Ministre ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Iran alobaki ete bazolongola mabondeli ya mokolo ya mitano na bisika oyo maladi wana ezalaki mpe bakangaki bisika mosantu na nsima, kasi Arabie Saudite epekisaki kokota ya bato ya bapaya oyo bazalaki kosala mobembo mpe bato na yango na bisika mosantu na Mecque mpe Medine. ']

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Maladi oyo ebebisi mpenza manaka ya sport na mokili mobimba koleka banda etumba ya mibale ya mokili mobimba.
translated: [' Maladi oyo esali ete makambo ya masano ebeba mingi na manaka ya masano na mokili mobimba banda Etumba ya Mibale ya mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Ba evenement mingi ya sport bakati yango to tabongoli date na yango, na ndakisa Champions League ya 2019-20 ya UEFA, Championnat ya Angleterre ya 2019-20, Euro 2020 ya UEFA, saison 2019-20 ya NBA, mpe saison 2019-20 ya NHL.
translated: [' Masano mingi ya minene ekatani to ebongoli yango, ata mpe Champions League ya 2019–20 ya UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 saison ya NBA, mpe saison 2019–20 ya NHL. ']

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Kobima ya maladi oyo ebebisi programe ya jeux olympique ya eleko ya molunge 2020, oyo esengelaki kobanda mpe kosuka na nsuka ya sanza ya nsambo; Comité olympique international elobaki na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato ete bakotya "date ya sika na nsima ya 2020 kasi ekozala liboso ya eleko ya molunge 2021". Masano ya casino mpe bisika mosusu ya masano na mokili mobimba bakangi yango mpe masano ya pocker en direct babongoli date na yango to ekosalema lisusu te.
translated: [' Kobima ya maladi ebebisaki mikano ya Jeux olympiques ya eleko ya molunge 2020, oyo esengelaki kobanda liboso na suka ya sanza ya nsambo; Comité olympique international elobaki na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato ete molulu wana "ekobongisama lisusu na date moko nsima ya 2020 kasi na nsima te na eleko ya molunge 2021". Ba casinos mpe bisika mosusu ya masano na mokili mobimba bakangi yango mpe ba tournois ya en direct ya poker epusami to ekosalema lisusu te. ']

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Yango esali ete bato mingi bakoma kosala masono na internet, mpe basite mingi ya masano na internet ekomi na bato mingi mpenza ya sika. Industrie ya masano mpe ezonyokwama, bituluku mingi ya miziki bazwi congé to bakati ba tournée na bango ya ba concert.
translated: [' Yango etindi bato mingi oyo basalaka masano ya mbongo bákende kofanda na internet, mpe bisika mingi ya masano ya mbongo na Internet elobi ete bato mingi babakisami mingi na motango na bango ya bato ya sika. Industrie ya masano ekutanaki mpe na mokakatano, bituluku ndenge na ndenge ya miziki ekatani to bakangaki mibembo ya ba concert. ']

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Bisika mingi ya minene ya teyatre na ndakisa oyo ya Broadway mpe elobi ete masano nyonso ekosalema te.
translated: [' Bisika mingi ya minene ya teyatre na ndakisa oyo eza na Broadway ekangaki mpe masano nyonso. ']

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Ba-artiste mosusu bazoluka ndenge ya kolanda kobeta miziki mpe kokabola misala na bango na internet olie ya kosala ba concert en direct, na ndakisa bazobeta ba concert na streaming en direct to bazosala “bafeti” na internet mpo ba artiste babeta ba concert, mpe kosala piblisite ya mosala na bango.
translated: [' Bato mosusu ya ntɔki balukaki ndenge ya kokoba kobimisa mpe kokabola mosala na esika ya internet lokola lolenge mosusu ya kosala na esika ya misala ya kala ya live, na ndakisa baconcert ya live streaming to kosala "bafeti" oyo esalemi na web mpona bayembi kosala miziki, kokabola, mpe koyebisa mosala na bango. ']

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Na internet, masolo mingi oyo ezolobela coronavirisi etondi mpo bato mosusu bakomisi yango lisolo ya kosekisa mpe eleko ya kolekisela ntango ata toyebi te ndenge ekosuka.
translated: [' Na internet, ba meme mingi ya Internet oyo eza na makanisi ya coronavirisi epanzani ntango mingi bakómi kosɛkisa mpe kolongola likebi na bango na kati ya kozanga koyeba. ']

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Banda kobima ya COVID-19, bato bakomi koyina makasi, kozwa makanisi mabe, mpe koyina mpo na mposo ya nzoto bato ya Chine mpe bato oyo bankoko na bango bauta na Asie ya este, mpe bato ya Eropa, ya Éats-Unis mpe ya mikili mosusu oyo maladi wana ezali mingi.
translated: [' Banda kobima ya COVID-19, bato mingi bakaniselaka basusu mabe, xenophobie, mpe racisme emonanaki na bato ya Chine mpe bankoko ya Asie ya este, mpe kobundisa bato oyo bauti na bisika oyo maladi ezalaka makasi na Eropa, na Etats-Unis mpe na mikili mosusu. ']

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Bapanzi-nsango emonisi ete na mikili mingi, mingimingi na Eropa, na Asie ya este, na Amerique ya norde, mpe na mikili ya Asie Pacifique, makambo ya kobangisa bato, ya kozwela bango makanisi mabe, mpe ya koyina bango emonani mingi.
translated: [' Makambo ya bobangi, ya kokanisela mabe, mpe ya koyina emonanaki na mikili mingi, mingimingi na Eropa, na Asie ya este, na Amerika ya Nordi, mpe na etuka ya Asie-Pacifique. ']

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Barapore ya sanza ya mibale (ntango bato mingi ya maladi bazalaki kaka na Chine) elobelaki mayoki ya koyina bato ya Chine euti na mokili mobimba, mpe bato mingi bazalaki koloba ete ebongi mpenza virisi wana ezwa bato ya Chine mpo na kofuta bango.
translated: [' Barapore ya sanza ya mibale (ntango bato mingi ya maladi bazalaki naino kaka na Chine) elobeli makanisi ya koyina bato ya mposo mosusu oyo bamonisaki na bituluku ndenge na ndenge na mokili mobimba ya bato ya Chine oyo babongi na virisi to bazwaki oyo balobaki ete eza etumbu ya malamu. ']

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Na mikili mosusu ya Afrika mpe bakomi koyina mingi bato ya Chine.
translated: [' Mikili misusu na Afrika mpe bato bakómi koyina bato ya Chine. ']

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Bato mingi ya Wuhan mpe ya Hubei balobi ete bato bazomona bango mpamba mpo na esika bauta.
translated: [' Bato mingi ya Wuhan mpe ya Hubei balobi ete bazali koponapona bango na kotalela esika bauti. ']

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Bato mingi bazopesa bato ya Chine maboko, na internet mpe na libanda ya internet mpe bazosunga baoyo bazali na bamboka oyo virisi ezali.
translated: [' Lisungi ezalaki mpona ba Chinois, na libanda mpe na libanda, mpe na bato oyo baza na bisika oyo virisi ezali. ']

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Na kotalela bokoli ya virisi na mikili oyo ekoti mingi, bato ya Italie, mokili ya liboso ya Eropa oyo maladi ya COVID-19 ezwaki bato mingi, bato bakoki mpe kokoma mpe kobanda koyina bango mpe kozwela bango makanisi mabe. Bato ya mikili lokola Malaisie, Nouvelle-Zelande, Singapour, mpe Corée ya sude batyaki maboko na mokanda mpo na kopekisa bato ya Chine na kokota na mboka na bango mpo na kosilisa maladi wana.
translated: [' Na nsima ya bokoli ya kopalangana ya maladi na mikili ya sika oyo eza makasi, bato bauti Italie, mokili ya liboso na Eropa oyo maladi ya COVID-19 ebimaki, bakoki mpe kokanisela bango mabe mpe koyina bapaya. Bana-ekolo ya mikili lokola Malaisie, Nouvelle-Zelande, Singapour, mpe Corée ya sude batyaki maboko liboso na mikanda ya koluka kopekisa bato ya Chine na kokota na mikili na bango mpona kosukisa maladi wana. ']

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: Na Japon, bazokoma na Twitter #BatoyaChineBoyaTenaJapon ezotambola mingi.
translated: [' Na Japon, hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan emonanaki mingi na Twitter. ']

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Bato ya Chine mpe bato mosusu ya Asie oyo baza na Royaume-Uni mpe na États-Unis balobi ete bato bakomi koyina bango mingi mpo na mposo na bango mpe bazoluka kosala bango mabe.
