translated: [' Bato ya Chine mpe bato mosusu ya Asie na Royaume-Uni mpe na Etats-Unis balobi ete bato ya mposo mosusu bakómi koyina bango mingi, mpe kobundisa bango. ']

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Prezida ya États-Unis Donald Trump abengaki coronavirisi ‘’virisi ya bato ya Chine’’, maloba oyo bato balobi eza koyina bato ya mpo na mposo na bango mpe koyina bango mpenza.
translated: [' Prezida ya Etats-Unis Donald Trump akutanaki na bato mosusu mpo abengaki coronavirisi "Virisi ya Chine", liloba oyo bato oyo balobaka mabe batalelaka ete eza koyina bato ya mposo mosusu mpe koyina bato ya Chine. ']

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Na Ukraine bato babundisaki babisi oyo ezalaki komema bato ya Ukraine mpe bapaya oyo bawutaki Wuhan, ezalaki komema bango na Novi Sanzhary.
translated: [' Bato bazosala mobulu na Ukraine babundisaki babisi oyo ezalaki komema bato ya Ukraine mpe bapaya oyo bakimaki Wuhan kino na Novi Sanzhary. ']

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Bana ya kelasi oyo bawutaki na norde este ya Inde, oyo ekaboli ndelo na Chine, mpe bayekolaka na bingumba minenne ya Inde balobi ete bato bazonykola bango mpe na kobima ya coronavirisi.
translated: [' Bana ya kelasi oyo bauti na norde este ya Inde, oyo eza na ndelo moko na Chine, mpe bolukiluki na bingumba minene ya Inde balobi ete bakutanaki na minyoko mpo na kobima ya coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Prezida ya parti ya etuka ya Bharatiya Janata na West Bengal Dilip Ghosh alobaki ete bato ya Chine babebisi mokili “yango wana Nzambe azopesa bango etumbu.”
translated: [' President ya etuluku ya etuka ya Bharatiya Janata na West Bengal Dilip Ghosh alobaki ete bato ya Chine babebisaki bozalisi mpe "yango wana Nzambe azongisaki mabe na bango." ']

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Consolat ya Chine na Kolkata, akweisaka makambo mpe alobaki te eza “libunga.” Na Chine, xenophobie mpe racisme epai ya bato oyo bafandaka te na Chine ekomi mingi mpo na maladi oyo, mpe bazobenga bapaya “bosoto ya bapaya” mpe baza na likanisi ya “kobwaka” bango.
translated: [' Na nsima, consulat ya Chine ekweisaki maloba wana na Kolkata, babengaki yango "na libunga". Na Chine, xenophobie mpe racisme lisusu bato oyo baza te bato ya Chine bavimbi mpo na maladi mabe oyo, mpe bapaya balobi ete eza "bosoto ya bapaya" mpe bakanaki "kobwaka yango". ']

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Bazulunalu mingi oyo eza na paywalls elongoli makambo mosusu to nyonso oyo balobaki mpo na coromavirisi.
translated: [' Bazulunalu mingi oyo eza na paywalls elongoli yango mpo na ndambo to nyonso oyo bazali na yango mpo na coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Bato mingi oyo babimisaka bansango ya siansi basali mikanda ezolobela maladi oyo mpe moto nyonso akoki kotanga yango ya ofele.
translated: [' Babimisi mingi ya siansi basalaki mikanda ya siansi oyo etali maladi oyo ezalaki na nzela ya polele. ']

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Bato mosusu ya siansi baponi kotya ba résultat na bango noki na bisika neti bioRxiv.
translated: [' Bato mosusu ya siansi baponaki koyebisa ba résultat na bango noki na ba-server ya preprint na ndakisa bioRxiv. ']

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Maladi mabe oyo ezobima - maladi mabe oyo ezouta na bavirisi, mbala mingi eza lolenge ya sika to ezopesama na lolenge ya sika
translated: [' Maladi oyo ezali kobima na maladi – Maladi ya mabe ya maladi oyo ezali kobima, mbala mingi ezalaka ya sika na lolenge na yango ya kobima to ndenge ezopanzana ']

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Mokili mobimba mpe maladi - Botaleli ya maladi na mokili mobimba mpe ndenge ezopanzana
translated: [' Mokili mobimba mpe maladi – Koyeba ndenge mokili mobimba ezali kopalangana mpe kopalangana ya maladi ']

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Bankombo ya maladi mpe maladi mabe - Liste ya motango ya bato bakufi mpo bazwaki maladi yango
translated: [' Liste ya maladi mabe mpe maladi mabe – Liste ya motango ya bato bakufi mpo na maladi oyo epanzanaka ']

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Kobebisa biloko ya zamba me banyama - Makama ya kolongonoo ya nzoto euti na koteka banyama ya zamba
translated: [' Banyama ya zamba bazali komema biloko na ndenge ya mabe mpe ya banyama – Makama ya kolongono ya nzoto euti na mombongo ya banyama ya zamba ya bapaya ']

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Ba-ekzame ya maladi ya mpema ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19) mpe ya virisi SARS-CoV-2 oyo eza na boyokani na yango etaleli mpe mayele ya koyeba virisi mpe mayele ya koyeba ba anticorps oyo ebotamaka mpo na kobundisa maladi.
translated: [' Baekzame ya laboratoire ya maladi ya mpema ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19) mpe virisi SARS-CoV-2 oyo ekangana na yango etaleli mpe bametode oyo eyebaka kozala ya virisi mpe oyo emonaka ba anticorps oyo ebimaka mpo na kobundisa maladi. ']

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Kozala ya virisi na kati ya ba échantillon endimisami na RT-PCR, oyo emonaka coronavirisi RNA.
translated: [' Kozala ya bavirisi na kati ya ba échantillon endimisami na RT-PCR, oyo emonaka RNA ya coronavirisi. ']

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Ekzame oyo eza ya sikisiki mpe mokano na yango eza kaka ya komona RNA ya virisi SARS-COV-2.
translated: [' Ekzame oyo eza ya sikisiki mpe esalemi mpona komona kaka RNA ya virisi SARS-CoV-2. ']

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Basalelaka yango mpo na komona maladi ya sika to maladi ya kala oyo eza na nzoto.
translated: [' Basalelaka yango mpona kondima maladi oyo euti kosalema to oyo ezosala mosala. ']

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Komona ba anticorps (serologie) ekoki kosalema mpo na diagnostic mpe kokengela bato.
translated: [' Komona ba anticorps (serologie) ekoki kosalelama mpo na koyeba maladi mpe kokengela bato. ']

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Ekzame ya ba anticorps elakisaka motango ya bato oyo bazali na maladi, ata mpe baoyo bilembo na yango eza moke mpenza mpo emonana to oyo baza te na bilembo na yango.
translated: [' Baekzame ya ba anticorps emonisi motango ya bato oyo bazalaki na maladi wana, ata mpe bato oyo bilembo na bango ezalaki mike mpenza mpo na koyebisa yango to nani azalaki na bilembo te. ']

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Taux ya solo ya bato bazokufa na maladi oyo mpe nivo ya immunité ya bato nyonso ekoki koyebana na ba résulat ya ekzame oyo.
translated: [' Taux ya sikisiki ya liwa ya maladi wana mpe nivo ya immunité ya etonga na kati ya bato ekoki koyebana na ba résultat ya ekzame oyo. ']

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Lokola ba-ekzame ezali kosalema mingi te, na sanza ya misato 2020 ata mokili moko te ezalaki na bansango ya solo ezomonisa ndenge virisi ezopalangana kati na bato na bango.
translated: [' Mpo ba ekzame ezalaki mingi te, na sanza ya misato 2020 ata mokili moko te ezalaki na bansango ya solo ya ndenge virisi ezalaki mingi na kati ya bato na bango. ']

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, ata mokili moko te esalaki ekzame na bato na bango 3%, mpe bokeseni eza mingi na ndenge mikili mingi ezalaki kosala ekzame oyo.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato, mboka moko te esalaki ekzame koleka 3% ya bato na bango, mpe bokeseni monene eza na ndenge basalaki ba ekzame mingi na mikili nyonso. ']

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Bokeseni oyo ekoki kozala mpe na bopusi makasi na taux ya liwa, oyo ndenge ezomonana ekozala moke mpenza na mikili mingi.
translated: [' Bokeseni oyo ekoki mpe kobebisa mingi taux ya liwa oyo balobi, oyo emonani ete ekoleka ndelo na mikili mosusu. ']

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Na kosalela ndenge makambo esalemaka na nsima ya ekzame ya transcription ya kobaluka ya polymerase (rRT-PCR) ekoki kosalema na ba échantilon ya mpema oyo bazwaki na lolenge mingi, ata mpe kozwa ndambo ya miyoyo kati na zolo to échantillon ya kosukosu.
translated: [' Na kosalelaka reaction ya chaine ya transcription ya transcription ya nsima (rRT-PCR) ekzame ekoki kosalema na ba échantillon ya mpema oyo ezwami na bametode mingi, ata mpe echantillon ya swabe na zolo to sputum. ']

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Mbala mingi ba résultat ebimaka nsima ya mwa bangonga to mikolo 2.
translated: [' Mbala mingi ba résultat ebimaka nsima ya mwa bangonga to mikolo 2. ']

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Ekzame ya RT-PCR oyo esalemi na kosukosu ebimisaka résultat ya malamu kaka soki maladi eza na mposo ya liboso.
translated: [' Ekzame RT-PCR oyo basalaka na swabs ya mongongo ebongi kaka na mposo ya liboso ya maladi. ']

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Na nsima virisi ekoki kolimwa na mongongo kasi ezokoba kobotama na bapoumon.
translated: [' Na nsima, virisi yango ekoki kolimwa na mongongo ntango ezali kokoba kobotama na mimpululu. ']

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Mpo na bato ya maladi oyo basali ekzame na mposo ya mibale, bakoki kosala yango na kozwana mayi na kati mpenza ya nzela ya kopema ya kati na nzela ya cathetere to mayi ya kosokusu.
translated: [' Mpo na bato oyo baza na maladi oyo basalaki bango ekzame na mposo ya mibale, biloko mosusu ya echantillon ekoki bongo kozwa yango na banzela ya mozindo ya mopepe na suction catheter to kokosola biloko (sputum) ekoki kosalelama. ']

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Moko ya ekzame ya PCR ya liboso babandisaki yango na Charité na Berlin na sanza ya yambo 2020 na kosalelaka makambo esalemaka na nsima ya transcription ya kobaluka ya polymerase (rRT-PCR), mpe esalaki na kosala biloko 250 000 ya kosala ekzame oyo organisation mondiale de la santé (OMS) ekabolaki.
translated: [' Moko ya baekzame ya PCR ya liboso esalemaki na Charité na Berlin na sanza ya liboso 2020 na kosalelaka reaction ya chaine ya transcription ya transcription ya nsima (rRT-PCR), mpe basalaki moboko ya 250,000 kits mpo na kokabola yango na Organisation Mondiale de la Santé (OMS). ']

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: Royaume-Uni esalaki mpe biloko ya ekzame na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya yambo 2020. Kompani moko ya Corée ya sude Kogenebioch esalaki apareyi moko, PC -ewuta na SARS-CoV-2 (PowerChek Coronavirisi) na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya yambo 2020.
translated: [' Royaume-Uni esalaki mpe ekzame na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya liboso 2020.Kompani ya Coree ya sude Kogenebiotech esalaki grade ya cliniki, PCR ya kosalela biloko ya komona SARS-CoV-2 (PowerChek Coronavirus) na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya liboso 2020. ']

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Elukakaba gene “E” nyonso oyo eza na ba coronavirisi beta nyonso mpe ba gene RdRp ya sikisiki ya SARS-CoV-2. Na Chine, lisanga BGI ezalaki kompani ya liboso oyo oyo bazwaki ndingisa ya lisanga elandelaka makambo nyonso ya bankisi na Chine mpo na kosala apareyi ya PCR mpo kosala ekzame ya SARS-COV-2. Na États-Unis, bacentre ya kolandela mpe kobundisa maladi (CDC) ezali kokabola biloko na yango kosala ekzame ya coronavirisi ya sika-2019 (2019-nCoV) na ntango ya solo RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel na balaboratoire yato nyonso na lisalisi ya International Reagent Resource.
translated: [' Ezali koluka gene "E" oyo ba coronavirisi nyonso ya beta ekabolaka, mpe gene RdRp specifiki na SARS-CoV-2.In Chine, BGI Group ezalaki moko ya bakompani ya liboso oyo bazwaki ndingisa ya mbalakaka ya kosalela yango na Chine National Medical Products Administration mpo na eloko ya komona SARS-CoV-2 oyo euti na PCR. Na Etats Unis, Esika ya Kolandela Maladi mpe kopekisa yango (CDC) ezali kokabola Panel na yango ya diagnostiki ya coronavirisi ya sika 2019 (2019-nCoV) RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel ya ntango ya solo na balaboratoire ya kolongono ya nzoto na nzela ya International Reagent Resource. ']

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Na ba-ekzame na biso misato ya gene na bamodele ya kala, biloko ya kosala ekzame ezalaki kobimisa ba résultat ya malamu te, mpe mpasi mpasi ya kosala ekzame na CDC na Atlanda; esalaki ete basala ba-ekzame na ba échantillon 100 na mokolo na sanza ya mibale 2020.
translated: [' Moko ya ba ekzame misato ya gene na baversion ya kala ya biloko ya kosala ekzame ebimisaki ba résultat ya sikisiki te mpo ba retraitement ebebaki, mpe na bottleneck ya ba ekzame na CDC na Atlanta; Yango esalaki ete mwayene ya ba echantillon na nse ya 100 na mokolo ebongisama malamu na sanza mobimba ya mibale 2020. ']

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Kosalela biloko mibale ntango mpo na kosala ba ekzame emonanaki ete ezosala malamu te na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale 2020, mpe nsima na yango nde balaboratoire ya etuka mpe ya bamboka bazwaki ndingisa ya kobanda kosala ba ekzama.
translated: [' Baekzame oyo basalelaka biloko mibale emonanaki te ete ebongi kotyelama motema kino na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya mibale 2020, mpe ezalaki kaka na ntango wana nde balaboratoire ya etuka mpe ya mboka bazwaki ndingisa ya kobanda kosala ba ekzame. ']

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Ministere ya Bilei mpe Bankisi endimaka ba ekzame na nse ya ndingisa ya mbalakaka. Balaboratoire ya Etats-Unis ebandaki kosalisa ba ekzame na ebandeli ya sanza ya misato 2020.
translated: [' Ministere ya bilei mpe bankisi endimaki ekzame wana na nse ya mosala ya mbalakaka Authorization.US balaboratoire ya mombongo ebandaki kosala ekzame na ebandeli ya sanza ya misato 2020. ']

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya misato 2020 LabCorp elobaki ete bato ya mboka mobimba bakoki kobanda kosala ekzame ya COVID-19 na lisalisi ya RT-PCR.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya misato 2020, LabCorp elobaki ete bato ya mboka mobimba bakoki kosala ekzame ya COVID-19 na kotalela RT-PCR. ']

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Ndenge moko, Quest Diagnostics endimaka babanda kosala bato nyonso ya mboka ba ekzame COVID-19 na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya misato 2020.
translated: [' Quest Diagnostics ndenge moko esalaki ete bato ya mboka mobimba basala ekzame ya COVID-19 na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya misato 2020. ']

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Balobaki te motango ya nsuka; kozwa ba echantillon mpe kosala ba ekzame esengeli kosalama na kolanda mibeko ya CDC.
translated: [' Bandelo ya quantité eyebisamaki te; Kosangisa mpe kobongisa specimen esengeli kosalema na kolanda masengami ya CDC. ']

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: Na Russie, basalaki biloko ya kosalisa ekzame ya COVID-19 na centre ya bolukiluki ya bavirisi mpe biotecnologie VECTOR.
translated: [' Na Russie, basalaki ekzame ya COVID-19 mpe esalemaki na centre ya bolukiluki ya leta ya virologie mpe biotechnologie VECTOR. ']

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale 2020 ministere ekengelaka kolongono ya nzoto endimaka kosalisa ba ekzame. Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato 2020, balobaki ete lopitalo Mayo ebimisaka mashine ya kosala ekzame ya COVID-19. Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato 2020, FDA endimaki ete Roch Diagnostics basala ba ekzame oyo basengelaki kosala na bangonga 3,5 na motango ya mingi, epesaki mashine moko libaku ya kosala ba ekzame pene ya 4 128 na eleko ya bangonga 24.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale 2020 ekzame ekomamaki na Service Federal ya kokengela kolongono ya nzoto.Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato 2020, lopitalo ya Mayo esalaki ekzame mpo na komona maladi ya COVID-19. Na mokolo ya 13 sanza ya misato 2020, Roche Diagnostics azwaki ndingisa ya FDA mpo na kosala ekzame oyo ekokaki kosalema na bangonga 3,5 na motango ya makasi, yango wana epesaki nzela na mashine moko esala ba ekzame pene ya 4 128 na eleko ya bangonga 24. ']

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato 2020, FDA endimaki ete balaboratoire ya Abbott esala ekzame na systeme ya Abbott ya m2000; FDA esi endimaki basalela Hologic, LabCorp, mpe Thermo Fisher Scientific.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato 2020, FDA epesaki ndingisa ya kosalela yango na mbalakaka (EUA) na balaboratoire ya Abbott mpo na kosala ekzame na systeme m2000 ya Abbott; FDA liboso epesaki ndingisa ya ndenge moko na Hologic, LabCorp, mpe Thermo Fisher Scientific. ']

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya misato 2020, Cepheid mpe azwaki ndingisa ya EUA ewutaki na FDA mpo na kosala ekzame oyo ewumelaka kaka miniti 45.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya misato 2020, Cepheid azwaki ndenge moko EUA na FDA mpo na ekzame oyo ezwaka pene ya miniti 45. ']

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA endimaki basala ekzame oyo esengaka kosalela mayele ya aside isothermique nucleique na esika ya PCR.
translated: [' FDA endimaki kosala ekzame oyo esalelaka mayele ya kobakisa ba amplification ya aside nucleiki isothermal na esika ya PCR. ']

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Lokolo esengaka te kobongolaka temperature, metode oyo ekoki kopesa resultat ya bato oyo baza na maladi na nse ya miniti mitano mpe ya bato oyo baza na yango te na nse ya miniti 13.
translated: [' Mpo yango esengaka te kolandana ya ba cycle ya temperature oyo ebongwanaka metode oyo ekoki kobimisa ba resultat ya malamu na miniti mitano mpe ba resultat ya mabe na miniti 13. ']

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Eza sikoyo na bamashine peno ya 18 000 na Etats-Unis mpe bato ya mayele ya Abbott bakosala ba ekzame 50 000 na mokolo moko. Ekzame oyo basalelaka anticorps moko boye elongo na baproteine ya nuclecapside (proteine N) ya cornovirisi ya sika, baza na ksoala yango na Taiwan, na elikya ete ekoki kobimisa ba resultat nsima ya miniti 15 to 20 kaka ndenge ezalaka mpo na ekzame ya grippe.
translated: [' Eza sikoyo na bamashine pene ya 18 000 na Etats-Unis mpe Abbott azozela ete basala mingi na kosala biloko mpo na kosala ba ekzame 50 000 na mokolo moko. Ekzame oyo esalelaka anticorps monoclonique oyo ekangaka mpenza proteine nucleocapsid (proteine N) ya coronavirisi ya sika ezali kosalema na Taiwan, na elikya ete ekoki kopesa ba resultat na miniti 15 to 20 kaka ndenge ekzame ya grippe ya noki. ']

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Na sanza ya misato 2020 zulunalu elobaki ete “ba ekzame ya radio ya ntolo eza na ntina mingi te na bitambe ya ebandeli, kasi CT [tomographie esalamaka na ordinatere] ekoki kozala ata liboso bilembo ebanda komonana.”
translated: [' Bozongeli ya mikanda ya sanza ya misato 2020 esukisaki ete "ba ekzame ya radio ya ntolo eza na ntina moke ya koyeba maladi na ebandeli, kasi CT [tomographie ya ordinatere] makambo bamoni ekoki kozala ata liboso bilembo ebanda." ']

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Biloko ya CT eza na ndakisa batala-tala ya multilateral ya pete elongo na peripherique, asymetrique mpe elongo ya libanda.
translated: [' Biloko ya ndenge ezalaka na CT eza na ndakisa ba opacificities ya mabele ya multilobar mibale oyo eza na peripherique, asymetrique mpe bokaboli ya posterior. ']

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: Sous-pleural ezalaka monene, nguya ya makasi mpenza mpe bokasi ntango maladi ezopalangana.
translated: [' Dominance subpleural, pavement ya ligboma mpe consolidation ezali kokola ntango maladi ezali kokola. ']

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Bolukiluki moko oyo ekokanisaki PCR na CT na Wuhan na ebandeli ya maladi oyo elobi ete CT eza makasi mingi koleka PCR, kasi eza na ba resultat ya sikisiki te, mpe bafoto na yango mosusu elekaka likolo ya maladi ya pneumonie mpe maladi mosusu.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko oyo ekokanisaki PCR na CT na Wuhan na esika oyo maladi mabe ya sikoyo euti emonisi ete CT eza mpenza makasi koleka PCR, atako eza ya sikisiki te, mpe makambo mingi oyo elakisaka bilili eleki na pneumonia mosusu mpe ndenge ya kobela. ']

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Na sanza ya misato 2020, College ya Amerika ya radiologie elobaki ete “basalela CT te mpo na mpo na komona to neti ekzame ya liboso mpo na komona COVID-19.” Na sanza ya misato 2020, CDC elobaki bato basalela PCR na ebandeli.
translated: [" Na sanza ya misato 2020, College ya Radiology ya Amerika elobi ete ''Esengeli te kosalela CT mpo na kosala ekzame mpo na ekzame ya liboso mpo na koyeba soki moto azali na COVID-19''. Na sanza ya misato 2020, CDC ezolendisa PCR mpona ekzame ya ebandeli. "]

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Mpo na kobundisa maladi tokoki kobotisa ba anticoprs ata mpe IgG na IgG.
translated: [' Eteni moko ya mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi ezali kobima ya ba anticorps ata mpe IgM mpe IgG. ']

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Bakoki kosalela yango mpo na koyeba maladi na bato banda na mikolo 7 to mingi nsima ya komonana ya bilembo, mpo na koyeba makasi ya kobundisa maladi, mpe kokengela bato. Komeka ekoki kosalema na balaboratoire central (CLT) to na esika ya kosalisa ekzame (PocT).
translated: [' Bakoki kosalela yango mpona komona maladi na bato oyo babandi mikolo 7 to koleka nsima ya ebandeli ya basymptomi, mpo na koyeba immunité, mpe na bokengeli ya bato. Bakoki kosala ekzame na balaboratoire ya centre (CLT) to na ekzame ya point-of-care (PoCT). ']

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Ba systeme ya mpasi mingi ya automatique na balaboratoire ya balopitalo mingi ekokoka kosala ba ekzame wana kasi makoki na bango etalelama na motango ya bato oyo systeme mokomoko ekoki kosala.
translated: [' Basysteme ya automatique ya likolo na balaboratoire mingi ya cliniki ekozala na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame wana kasi kozala na yango ekotalela taux ya kosala systeme mokomoko. ']

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: Mpo na CLT basalelaka mbala mingi echantillon moke ya makila, ata bakoki kosalela ba echantillon mingi mpo na koyeba makasi ya nzoto ya kobundisa maladi.
translated: [' Mpo na CLT mbala mingi basalelaka mbala mingi echantillon moko ya makila ya peripherique, atako ba echantillon ya serial ekoki kosalelama mpo na kolanda mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi. ']

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: Mpo na PoCT mbala mingi bazwaki echantillon moko ya makila na mposo ya nzoto na tonga.
translated: [' Mpo na PoCT mbala mingi echantillon moko ya makila ezwamaka na kotɔbɔla loposo. ']

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Na kokesena na PCR, bametode ya kobimisa etambe eza na ntina te liboso ya kobanda. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020, FDA eponaki bisika 29 oyo bapesaka bango rapore ndenge esengeli mpe sikoyo bakoki kokabola ba ekzame na bango ya anticorps.
translated: [' Na bokeseni na bametode ya PCR, litambe ya kobimisa esengeli te liboso ya kopesa yango. Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020, FDA ebengaki bibongiseli 29 oyo epesaki liyebisi na agency ndenge esengeli mpe yango wana baza na makoki ya kokabola ba ekzame na bango ya ba anticorps. ']

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: Na mokolo 7 ya sanza ya minei,2020, FDA endimaki kaka ekzame moko na ntango ya urgence. Na nsuka ya sanza ya misato 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics mpe Epitope Diagnostics bazwaka ndingisa ya Eropa mpo babanda kosalela bamashine na bango ya kosala ekzame, oyo ekoki komona ba anticorps IgG na IgA na ba echantillon ya makila oyo eza na virisi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya minei 2020, kaka ekzame moko kaka endimami na FDA na ndingisa ya kosalela yango na mbalakaka. Na nsuka ya sanza ya misato 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics mpe Epitope Diagnostics bazwaki ndingisa ya Eropa mpo na biloko na bango ya kosala ekzame, oyo ekoki komona ba anticorps IgG mpe IgA oyo ebundisaka virisi na ba echantillon ya makila. ']

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: Baza na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame mingi na ba echantillon na ngonga moko mpe bakosala noki koleka PCR ya momeseno mpo na ekzame ya virisi RNA.
translated: [' Nguya ya kosala ba ekzame eza bankama mingi ya ba echantillon na bangonga mpe yango wana eza noki mingi koleka ekzame ya PCR ya ordinaire ya virisi RNA. ']

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: Mbala mingi ba anticorps emonanaka mikolo 14 nsima ya kobanda ya maladi. Na ebandeli ya sanza ya minei, Royaume-Uni emonaki ete ata bamashine moko te ya kosala ya ekzame oyo basombaki ezala malamu.
translated: [' Mbala mingi ba anticorps emonanaka mikolo 14 nsima ya ebandeli ya maladi. Na ebandeli ya sanza ya minei, Royaume-Uni amonaki ata eloko moko te ya kosala ekzame ya anticorps oyo esombaki ezalaki malamu mpenza mpo na kosalela. ']

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: Hong Kong ebimisaka mayele ya kotika na ndako bato oyo bazokanisa ete baza na maladi, “ministere ya urgence ekopesa bato ya maladi tube moko,” bakobwaka nsoyi kuna, bakozongisa yango, nsima batindi yango mpo na ekzame. NHS ya Grande-Bretagne elobaki ete bazosala mayele moko ya kosalisa ekzame na bato oyo bakanisi baza na maladi na ndako, ebongo ekopekisa moto ya maladi apesa bato mosusu maladi soki ayei na lopitalo to kosala kopetola ambulance soki basaleli yango mpo na moto moko. Na kosalaka ba ekzame ya COVID-19 na bato oyo bakanisi baza na maladi, monganga moko azwaka echantillon na bokengi mpenza.
translated: [' Hong Kong esali ebongiseli moko oyo bato oyo bakanisi ete baza bato ya maladi bakoki kotikala na ndako, "departema ya urgence ekopesa moto ya maladi tiyo ya specimen", babwakelaki yango nsoi, bazongisaka yango mpe bakozwa resultat ya ekzame mwa ntango nsima. NHS ya Grande Bretagne elobi ete bazali kotambwisa ebongiseli moko mpo na kosala ekzame ya bato oyo bakanisi ete baza na maladi na ndako, oyo elongolaka likama ya moto ya maladi ya kopesa bato mosusu maladi soki ayei na lopitalo to asengeli kolongola mikrobe na ambulance soki moto asaleli yango. Na drive-through ekzame ya COVID-19 mpo na bato oyo bakanisi baza na yango, monganga moko ya minganga azwaka ndakisa na kosalela mayele ya malamu ya komibatela. ']

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: Ba centre oyo ezalaka na mituka esalisi Coree ya sude na kosala ba ekzame na lombango mpe na bato mingi na mokili mobimba. Na Allemange lisanga ya mboka mpo na assurance ya kolongono ya nzoto ya minganga elobaki na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya misato, ete eza na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame pene ya 12 000 na mokolo moko na ba-ambulance mpe basalaki bato 10 700 na mposo oyo elekaki.
translated: [' Bisika ya kotambwisa mituka esalisi Corée ya sude na kosala ba ekzame mosusu ya noki, ya monene koleka na mboka nyonso. Na Allemagne, Association National ya minganga ya assurance ya kolongono ya nzoto elobaki na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya misato, ete ezalaki na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame pene ya 12,000 na mokolo na esika ya ambulatoire mpe 10,700 bamekaki yango na mposo eleki. ']

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: Mosolo efutamaka na assurance ya maladi soki ekzame yango esengami na monganga.
translated: [' Mbongo eutaka na assurance ya kolongono ya nzoto ntango ekzame esengami na monganga. ']

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Mpo na prezida ya eteyelo ya Robert Koch, Allemagne eza na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame 160 000 na mposo moko.
translated: [' Na kotalela prezida ya Institut Robert Koch, Allemagne eza na makoki nyonso ya kosala ba ekzame 160 000 na mposo moko. ']

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato ba ekzame bapesaki bingumba mingi ya minene likoki ya kosala ba ekzame.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato na motuka na ba ekzame epesamaki na bingumba mingi ya minene. ']

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020, motango ya bato oyo basalaki bango ekzame na Allemagne eyebanaki te, mpo balobeli kaka bato oyo bakangaki na maladi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya misato 2020 ba ekzame nyonso oyo basalaki na Allemagne eyebanaki te, mpo kaka ba resultat ya malamu nde ezolobelama. ']

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: Ankete ya liboso ya laboratoire oyo esalemaki na mposo ya 12/2020 emonisi ete basalaki ekzame na ba echantillon pene ya 483 295 mpe etalelaki mposo ya 12/2020 mpe ba echantillon 33 491 (6,9%) bazalaki na maladi ya SARS-COV-2. Na Israele, bato basalaka bolukiluki na lopitalo Technion and Rambam basalaki metode ya sika mpe basalaki ba ekzame na ba echantillon na bato 64 na mbala moko, na kotyaka ba echantillon mpe kaka kosala ba ekzame ya ba echantillon mingi ezalaki na maladi. Na Wuham laboratoire ya 2000-sq-metre ya likama esalemaki bapesi nkombo ‘Huo-Yan’’ (Kishinwa: 火眼 , to “liso ya moto” na Lingala) ebandaki mosala mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale 2020 na BGI, oyo ekoki kosala ekzame ya ba echantillon 10 000 na mokolo moko.
translated: [' Bolukiluki ya liboso ya laboratoire emonisaki ete na mposo ya manaka 12/2020 ba echantillon ata 483 295 basalaki ekzame mpe ata mpe na mposo ya 12/2020 mpe ba echantillon 33 491 (6,9%) bamonaki ete bazalaki na maladi SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, bato ya etid ya Technion mpe ya Rambam Hospital basalaki mpe bamekaki metode moko mpo na kosala ekzame ya bato ya maladi 64 na mbala moko, na kosangisa ba echantillon mpe kosala ba ekzame mosusu kaka soki bamoni ete echantillon oyo basangisi ezali malamu. Na Wuhan, laboratoire moko ya komona likama ya bametele 2000-sq-mètres ebengami "Huo-Yan" (Chinois: 火眼, to "Fire Eye" na Lingala) efungwamaki na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya mibale 2020 na BGI, oyo ekoki kobongisa ba echantillon koleka 10,000 na mokolo. ']

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: Na mosala ya kotanga ekambami na mobandisi ya BGI Wang Jian mpe ezwaki mikolo 5, kosala biloko ya Hubei elingaki kozala 47% ya koleka mpe ekokani na ntalo ya kotya bato na quarantaine elingaki komata mbala mibale soki babandisaka te mosala oyo ya kosala ekzame.
translated: [' Na mosala ya kotonga oyo Wang Jian mobandisi ya BGI alandelaki mpe ezwaki mikolo 5, modele emonisi ete bato ya kobela na Hubei balingaki kozala 47% koleka mpe mbongo oyo ekokani na yango mpo na kobundisa quarantaine elingaki komata mbala mibale soki makoki oyo ya kosala ba ekzame eyaki te na molongo. ']

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: Huo-Yan na Shenzehen, Tianjin, Beijing, na Shanghai, elandaki noki laboratoire ya Wuhan, na mobimba bingumba 12 ya Chine elanda bango.
translated: [' Laboratoire ya Wuhan elandanaki noki na balaboratoire ya Huo-Yan na Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, mpe Shanghai, na mobimba ya bingumba 12 na Chine mobimba. ']

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya misato 2020 ba ekzame oyo bazalaki kosala na mokolo ekomaki 50 000. Mokanda moko, midele ya multiplexe oyo Origami Assays ebimisaki, ekoki kosala ekzame ya ba echantillon ya bato ya maladi ya COVID19 na bato ya maladi 1 122 na kosalela kaka ba assays 93.  Midele ya malamu ekoki kosalelama na balaboratoire ya mike kozanga lisungi ya ba robot.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya misato 2020, motango ya mokolo na mokolo mobimba, bazalaki 50,000 ekzame na mokolo. Open source, mayemi ya multiplexed oyo Origami Assays ebimisaki ebimaki oyo ekoki kosala ekzame ya bato ya maladi 1122 mpo na COVID19 na kosalela kaka ba ekzame 93 .  Mabongisi oyo ya bokatikati ekoki kosalema na balaboratoire ya mike kozanga kozala na mposa ya barobo ya kosimba mai. ']

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: Na sanza ya misato, kozanga bankisi mpo na kosala bato mingi ba ekzame ekomaki motungisi ya monene na Union Européenne, na Royaume-Uni mpe na Etats-Unis.
translated: [' Na sanza ya misato, kozanga mpe biloko oyo ekoki te mpo na kosalela yango ekómi molangi mpo na kosala ba ekzame ya bato mingi na Union Européenne mpe na Royaume-Uni mpe na États-Unis. ']

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: Yango etindi bakomi mosusu na kobongisa mayele ya kosalela ba echantillono oyo ezosenge kotya yango na moto na temperature ya 98 °C (208 °F) na miniti 5 mpo na kobimisa ba genome RNA mpo na kosala ba ekzame mosusu. Na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya misato balobaki ete elobaki ete Emirats Arabe Unies eza na kosala bato na yango mingi ekzame ya coronavirisi na mokolo koleka mikili nyonso mosusu, mpe basalaki deja ekzame yango na bato na bango mingi mpenza.
translated: [' Yango etindi bakomi mosusu na koluka mayele ya kobongisa ba echantillon oyo esengaka kotya molunge na 98 °C (208 °F) na miniti 5 mpo na kobimisa ba genome RNA mpo na kosala ba ekzame mosusu. Na mokolo ya 31 sanza ya misato balobaki ete Emirats Arabe Unies ezalaki sikoyo kosala ba ekzame na bato na bango mingi mpo na Coronavirisi na motó moko koleka mikili mosusu nyonso, mpe bazalaki na nzela ya kobakisa nivo ya ba ekzame mpo na kokóma na bato mingi. ']

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: Esalemaki na nzela ya mayele ya ndenge na ndenge, mpe kosombela bato na bango biloko mingi ya kosala ekzame ya laboratoire na Group 42 mpe BGI (na kolande “Huo-Yan” na bango ya balaboratoire ya lombangu ya koyeba maladi na Chine).
translated: [' Yango ezalaki na nzela ya bosangani ya makoki ya kotambwisa motuka, mpe kosomba laboratoire ya masse-throughput ya bato na Group 42 mpe BGI (na kolanda balaboratoire na bango ya koyeba makambo ya mbalakaka "Huo-Yan" na Chine). ']

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: Etongami na mikolo 14, laboratoire ekoki kosala ba ekzame mingi mpenza ya RT-PCR na mokolo mpe ezali laboratoire ya liboso ya nguya ndenge oyo, oyo bazosalela na libanda ya Chine.
translated: [' Basalaka yango na mikolo 14, laboratoire eza na makoki ya kosala bankoto mingi ya ba ekzame RT-PCR na mokolo mpe eza ya liboso na mokili ya monene oyo ebanda kosala libanda ya Chine. ']

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: Bazomeka mayele mingi ya kosala ba ekzame na biteni mingi ya coronavirisi na Chine, France, Allemagne, Hong Kong, Japon, mpe na Etats-Unis.
translated: [' Ba recept ekeseni ya kosala ba ekzame oyo ezalaki na bisika ekeseni ya profil ya gene ya coronavirisi esalemaki na Chine, France, Allemagne, Hong Kong, Japon, mpe Etats-Unis. ']

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: Organisation mondiale de la sante endimaki mayele ya Allemange ya kosala mashine ya kosala ba ekzame ya kotinda na mikili ya bobola oyo baza na makoki te ya kosala ya bango moko.
translated: [' Organisation Mondiale de la Santé endimaki resipi ya Allemagne mpo na biloko ya kosala biloko ya kosala oyo batindaki na mikili ya bobola kozanga biloko ya kokolisa ya bango moko. ']

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: Mayele ya Allemagne ebimaki na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya liboso 2020; mayele oyo ba centre ya kobundisala maladi na Etats-Unis ezalaki nanu te kino na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya liboso; esalaki ete ba ekzame ya Etats-Unis ezala te. Chine na Etats-Unis bazalaki na mutungisi na ebandeli mpo bamashine na bango ya kosala ekzame ezalaki malamu te, mpe mikili wana na Australie bazalaki na makoki te kopesa motanga ya bamashine ebongi mpo eyokana na lisengi ya minganga.
translated: [' Recipe ya Allemagne ebimaki na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya yambo 2020; Protocol oyo esalemaki na bacentre ya kobundisa maladi ya Etats-Unis ezalaki te kino na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya liboso, esalaki ete ba ekzame oyo bazalaki na yango esalema noki te na Etats-Unis mpe na Etats-Unis ezalaki na mikakatano na ndenge biloko ya kosala ekzame ezalaki na ebandeli ya maladi oyo, mpe mikili wana mpe Australie bazalaki kokoka te kopesa biloko mingi mpo na kokokisa mposa mpe batoli mpo na kosala ba ekzame na minganga oyo bayebi makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto. ']

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Na bokeseni, minganga balobi ete lokola Coree ya sude ezalaki na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame, esali ete coronavirisi ya sika epalangana mingi te.
translated: [' Na bokeseni, bato ya mayele balobi ete ndenge Core ya Sud ezalaki na bato mingi ya kosala ba ekzame esalisaki na kokitisa kopalangana ya coronavirisi ya sika. ']

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: Makoki ya kosala ekzame, mingimingi na balabotoire ya bato bango moko, esalemaki na bambula mingi na guvernema ya Coree ya sude.
translated: [' Makoki ya kosala ba ekzame, mingimingi na balaboratoire ya bato bango moko, esalemaki na boumeli ya bambula mingi na boyangeli ya Corée ya sude. ']

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, Organisation mondiale de la sante elobaki ete baprograme ya kosala ba ekzame eza lolenge ya malamu koleka ya kolembisa na liboso maladi mabe ya COVID-19. Mposa makasi ya kosala ba ekzame na ndenge maladi epalanganaki esalaki ete baloboratoire mingi ya Etats-Unis bazalaki na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame mpe bazangaki biloko ya kozwa mai ya nzoto mpe bankisi ya kotya na ekzame mpo na komona maladi.
translated: [' Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato, Organisation Mondial ya Sante esengaki ete baprograme ya kosala ba ekzame ezala lolenge ya malamu koleka ya kolembisa bokoli ya maladi mabe ya COVID-19. Mposa makasi ya kosala ba ekzame mpo na kopalangana mingi ya virisi ebimisaki nsima ya bankama ya bankóto ya ba ekzame na balaboratoire ya bato ya Etats-Unis, mpe biloko ya kozwa ba swabs mpe biloko ya chimie ekomaki mpasi. ']

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: Na sanza ya misato 2020 Chine elobaki ete bamashine na bango ya kosala ba ekzame ezosala malamu te.
translated: [' Na sanza ya misato 2020 Chine elobaki ete eza na mikakatano ya sikisiki na biloko na bango ya kosala ekzame. ']

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: Na Etats-Unis, bamashine ya kosala ekzame oyo CDC esalaki ezalaki “na mbeba,” yango wana guvernema alongolaki mibeko oyo epekisaki ba laboratoire ya prive basala ba ekzame. Espagne esombaki bamashine ya kosala ba ekzame na kompani moko ya Chine, nkombo na yango Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, kasi bamonaki ete ba resultat ezalaki ya solo te.
translated: [' Na Etats-Unis, biloko ya kosala ekzame oyo CDC esalaki ezalaki na "mabunga;" gouvernema na nsima alongolaki bipekiseli ya biro oyo epekisaki kosala ba ekzame ya bato bango moko. Espagne esombaki biloko ya kosala ekzame na kompani ya Chine Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, kasi bamonaki ete baresultat ezalaki ya solo te. ']

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: Kompani yango elobaki ete ba resultat ya mabe ekoki kozala mpo bazozwa ba echantillon malamu te to bazosalela machine mabe.
translated: [' Kompani yango elimbolaki ete ba résultat ya mabe ekoki kozala mpo na kozanga kozwa ba echantillon to kosalela bisaleli yango malamu. ']

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: Ministere ya Espagne elobaki ete ekolongola bamashine oyo ebimisaki ba resultat ya mabe, mpe na esika na yango bakotya bamashine mosusu oyo euti na Shenzhen Bioeasy. 80% ya bamashine ya kosala ba ekzame oyo Republique Tcheque esombaki na Chine epesaki ba resultat ya mabe. Slovaquie esombaki bamashine 1,2 milio ya kosala ba ekzame na Chine kasi ezalaki ya mabe.
translated: [' Ministere ya Espagne elobaki ete ekolongola bisaleli oyo ezongisaki baresultat ya mabe, mpe na esika na yango bakotya biloko ya kosala ekzame ya ndenge mosusu oyo Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% ya biloko ya kosala ekzame oyo République tchèque esombaki na Chine epesaki matomba ya mabe. Slovaquie esombaki biloko 1,2 milio ya kosala ekzame na Chine oyo emonanaki ete ezalaki ya solo te. ']

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: Premier ministre Matovič alobaki ete babwaka yango na Danube. Ates Kara ministre ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Turquie alobaki ete bamashine oyo Turquie esombaki na Chine ezalaki ya “mabe makasi” mpe bapesaki yango te “mpo basalela yango.” Royaume-Uni asombaki 3,5 milio ya bamashine ya kosala ba ekzame na Chine kasi na ebandeli ya sanza ya minei 2020 balobaki ete likoki ya kosalela yango ezalaki te.
translated: [' Premier ministre Matovič apesaki likanisi ete babwakisa yango na Danube.Ateş Kara ya ministere ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Turquie alobaki ete biloko ya kosala ekzame oyo Turquie esombaki na Chine ezalaki na "taux ya libunga makasi" mpe "ezalaki te na kosalela." Royaume-Uni asombaki biloko 3,5 milio ya kosala ekzame na Chine kasi na ebandeli ya sanza ya minei 2020 elobaki ete bakoki kosalela yango te. ']

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: Kosala ba ekzame, na nsima kotya na quarantaine ya bato oyo baza na maladi mpe kolandela bato oyo bakutanaki na bato oyo bazali na SARS-COV-2, ebutaki mbuma malamu.
translated: [' Kosala ba ekzame, na nsima kotya na quarantaine ya bato oyo bazalaki na maladi mpe kolandela bato oyo bato oyo bazalaki na SARS-CoV-2 bakutanaki na bango, ebimisaki ba resultat ya malamu. ']

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: Bato basalaka bolukiluki oyo bazosala na engumba Vò na Italie, na esika oyo moto ya liboso akufaki na COVID-19 na Italie, basalaka ba ekzame mbala mibale na bato nyonso pene ya 3 400, na eleko ya mikolo pene na zomi.
translated: [' Bato basalaka bolukiluki oyo bazalaki kosala na engumba Vò na Italie, esika oyo moto ya liboso oyo akufaki na COVID-19 na Italie, basalaki ba ekzame mbala mibale na bato nyonso pene ya 3 400, bokabwani ya mikolo zomi. ']

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: Pene ya katikati ya bato bazalaki te na bilembo ya maladi, mpe bato nyonso oyo bakangaki bango na maladi, batyaki bango na quarantaine.
translated: [' Pene ya katikati ya bato oyo bazalaki na ekzame bazalaki na bilembo te, mpe bato nyonso oyo bamonaki bazalaki na maladi batyaki bango na quarantaine. ']

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: Lokolo bapekisaki mobembo na esika wana, esalaki ete bato mosusu bazwa te maladi wana ata moke.
translated: [' Lokola bapekisaki kosala mobembo na commune yango, yango elongolaki mpenza maladi ya sika. ']

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: Kolandela mpenza bato oyo bakutanaki na bato ya maladi, kopekisa mibembo, kosalisa ba ekzame, mpe kotya bato na quarantaine, coronavirisi 2020 na Singapour epanzanaki malamu koleka na mikili mosusu ya bobola, kasi kozanga bipekiseli ya makasi neti kokanga ba restaurant mpe bisika ya koteka.
translated: [' Kolandela makasi bato oyo bakutanaki na bango, kopekisa bato basala mobembo, kosala ba ekzame, mpe kotya bato na quarantaine, maladi mabe ya coronavirisi 2020 na Singapour esali malembe koleka na mikili mosusu ya bozwi, kasi kozanga bipekiseli ya makasi lokola kokanga na makasi barestora mpe bisika ya koteka. ']

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: Bakangi ba evenement mingi, mpe Singapour ebandi koyebisa bato bafanda na ndako na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato, kasi biteyelo bafungolaki na ntango ya feti ya mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato.
translated: [' Ba evenement mingi ekatani, mpe Singapour ebandaki kopesa bana-mboka toli ete batikala na ndako na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato, kasi biteyelo efungwamaki na ngonga malamu nsima ya konje na mokolo ya 23 sanza ya misato. ']

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: Mikili mingi mosusu basalaka mpe makambo na makasi mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe oyo, balandelaki bato oyo bakutanaka na bato ya maladi, bapekisaki bato na kosala mibembo, basalaki ba ekzame, mpe batyaki bato na quarantaine kasi basusu basalaka te makambo na makasi na ndakisa Islande na Coree ya sude.
translated: [' Bamboka mingi mosusu mpe balandelaki maladi mabe na kolandela makasi bato oyo bakutanaki na bango, kokanga nzela ya kosala mobembo, kosala ba ekzame, mpe kotya bato na quarantaine, kasi bakangi bango mpenza te, na ndakisa Islande mpe Corée ya sude. ']

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: Bolukiluki oyo etaleli bansango emonaki ete mikili oyo esalisaka ba ekzame mingi, na oyo etali motango ya bato bakufi, bato mingi te bakufaki, mbala mosusu mikili wana bazalaki na makoki ya komona bato oyo bazalaki na bilembo ya moke to bazalaki na yango te.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko ya statistics emoni ete mikili oyo basalaki ekzame mingi, soki tokokanisi yango na motango ya bato bakufi, eza na bato mingi te oyo bakufaka, mbala mosusu mpo mikili wana baza na makoki ya komona malamu bato oyo baza na bilembo ya pete to baza na bilembo te. ']

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: OMS elobi ete mikili oyo eza na makoki ya kosala ba ekzame mpe balaboratoire ya leta oyo eyebi malamu te COVID-19 batinda ba resultat ya liboso ya bato ya maladi mpe ba resultat zomi ya liboso ya bato oyo bamoni ete baza te na COVID-19 na moko ya balaboratoire 16 oyo OMS endimaka mpo batalela yango lisusu.
translated: [' OMS alobi ete mikili oyo baza na makoki te ya kosala ba ekzame mpe balaboratoire ya mboka oyo bayebi makambo mingi te na COVID-19 batinda bato na bango mitano ya liboso mpe ba echantillon zomi ya liboso ya COVID-19 ya liboso na moko ya balaboratoire 16 ya référence ya OMS mpo na kosala ekzame ya kondimisama. ']

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: Na kati ya balaboratoire 16 oyo endimama, 7 ezali na Asie, 5 na Eropa, 2 na Afrika, 1 na Amerique ya norde mpe 1 na Australie.
translated: [' Na kati ya balaboratoire 16 ya référence, 7 ezali na Asie, 5 na Eropa, 2 na Afrika, 1 na Amerika ya Nordi mpe 1 na Australie. ']

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: Na tableau elandi, molongo “% ya bato bakangi na maladi” esalemi na kolanda bibongiseli ya mokili wana ezwi mpo na kosala ba ekzame.
translated: [' Na karte elandi, colonne "Positive as % ya ba ekzame" ezali na bopusi ya mobeko ya mboka ya kosala ba ekzame. ']

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: Mokili oyo ezosalisa ekzame kaka na bato oyo bakoti lopitalo ekozala na % ya mingi ya bato oyo bakangi na maladi koleka mikili oyo ezosalisa bato nyonso ekzame, eza baza na bilembo to baza na yango te.
translated: [' Mokili oyo esalaka ba ekzame kaka bato oyo bakoti na lopitalo bakozala na maladi mingi lokola % ya ba ekzame koleka mokili oyo esalaka ba ekzame na bana-mboka nyonso, ezala bazali komonisa bilembo to te, makambo mosusu eza ndenge moko. ']

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: Kosokola maboko, oyo babengi mpe bopeto ya maboko, ezali kopetola maboko mpo na kolongola mabele, mafuta, mikrobe, mpe mbindo mosusu.
translated: [' Kosokola maboko (to kosokola maboko), oyo babengaka mpe bopeto ya maboko, eza mosala ya kopetola maboko ya moto mpona kolongola mabele, mafuta ya kopakola, biloko ya mike, to biloko mosusu oyo balingi te. ']

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: Kosokola maboko na sabuni mbala mingi na bantango “mosusu ya ntina” na mokolo ekangaka maladi nzela epanzana te na bato mingi, na ndakisa pulupulu, oyo eutaka na nyei mpe epesamaka na monoko.
translated: [' Kosokola maboko na sabuni ntango nyonso na "bantango mosusu ya mpasi" na moi epekisaka kopalangana ya maladi mingi, na ndakisa pulupulu mpe choléra, oyo epesamaka na nzela ya nyei na monoko. ']

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: Bato bakoki mpe kokoma na maladi ya kopema lokola grippe to maladi ya malili, na ndakisa, soki bazali kosokola maboko te liboso ya kosimba miso, zolo, to monoko (na ndakisa bisika oyo mayi ya nzoto elekaka).
translated: [' Bato bakoki mpe kokoma maladi ya mpema lokola grippe to malili ya bato nyonso, na ndakisa, soki bazali kosokola maboko te liboso ya kosimba miso, zolo, to monoko (elingi koloba, ba membrane ya mucous). ']

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Bangonga mitano ya ntina mingi na mokolo ntango oyo kosokola maboko na sabuni ezali ntina ezali: liboso mpe nsima ya kosumba, nsima ya kopetola masoko ya mwana to kolongola kush, liboso ya koleisa mwana, liboso ya kolya mpe nsima ya kolamba bilei to kosimba mosuni ya mobesu, mbisi, to soso.
translated: [' Bantango mitano ya mpasi na boumeli ya mokolo oyo kosokola maboko na sabuni eza ntina mingi ezali: liboso mpe nsima ya kosumba, nsima ya kopetola masoko ya mwana to kobongola nappies, liboso ya koleisa mwana, liboso ya kolya mpe liboso mpe nsima ya kolamba bilei to kosimba mosuni ya mobesu, mbisi, to soso. ']

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: Soki mai na sabuni ezali te, okoki kopetola maboko na putulu. Organisation mondiale ya Sante elendisi kosokola maboko:
translated: [' Soki mai mpe sabuni ezali te, mabɔkɔ ekoki kopɛtolama na putulu ya mɔtɔ. Organisation Mondiale de la Santé epesi toli ya kosokola maboko: ']

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: Liboso ya kolamba bilei, ntango ozali kolamba mpe na nsima.
translated: [' Liboso, na boumeli, mpe nsima ya kolamba bilei. ']

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: Liboso mpe nsima ya kosalisa moto ya maladi.
translated: [' Liboso mpe nsima ya kobatela moto ya maladi. ']

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: Nsima ya kolongola mpe kolatisa mwana kush to kosokola mwana oyo auti na wese.
translated: [' Nsima ya kolongola kushɛ to kopɛtola mwana oyo asili kosalela twalɛti. ']

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Nsima ya kosimba zolo, kokosola, to kosala itche.
translated: [' Nsima ya kobimisa zolo, kokosola to kosala itche. ']

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: Nsima ya kosimba banyama, bilei ya banyama, to bosoto ya banyama.
translated: [' Nsima ya kosimba nyama, bilei ya banyama, to bosɔtɔ ya banyama. ']

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: Bopeto ya maboko mpo na minganga ezali kotalela makambo ya bopeto na ntango ya kosala mosala ya monganga.
translated: [' Bopɛto ya maboko ya monganga elimboli bopɛto oyo euti na misala ya monganga. ']

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: Kosokola maboko liboso ya kopesa nkisi to ya kasalisa moto ya maladi ekoki kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te to epanzana mingi te.
translated: [' Kosokola maboko liboso ya kopesa nkisi to lisalisi ya monganga ekoki kopekisa to kokitisa kopalangana ya maladi. ']

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: Ntina ya makasi ya kosokola maboko mpo na minganga ezali mpona kolongola biloko mabe (mikrobe, bavirisi, to bamikrobe misusu ya moke oyo ekoki kopesa maladi) mpe biloko mosusu oyo ekoki kosala biso mabe to kopesa maladi.
translated: [' Mokano monene ya monganga ya kosokola maboko eza ya kopetola maboko ya mikrobe oyo epesaka maladi (mikrobe, bavirisi, to bamikrobe mosusu ya mike oyo ekoki kopesa maladi) mpe bankisi oyo ekoki kosala mabe to kopesa maladi. ']

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: Eza ntina mingi mpo na bato oyo basimbaka bilei to basalaka mosala ya monganga, kasi ezali mpe ntina mpona bato nyonso.
translated: [' Yango ezali na ntina mingi mpo na bato oyo basalaka mosala ya kolya to basalaka mosala ya monganga, kasi ezali mpe likambo ya ntina mingi mpo na bato nyonso. ']

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: Kosokola maboko ezali na matomba ebele ya malamu mpona kolongono ya nzoto, na ndakisa kokitisa kopalangana ya grippe, ya coronavirisi, mpe ya maladi mosusu; kokanga nzela na biloko ememaka pulupulu; mpe kokitisa maladi ya mpema;
translated: [' Kosokola maboko eza na matomba mingi mpo na sante, ata mpe kokanga kopalangana ya grippe moke, coronavirisi, mpe maladi mosusu oyo epanzanaka; kopekisa makambo oyo epesaka maladi ya pulupulu; kosilisa maladi ya mpema; ']

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: mpe kokitisa motango ya liwa ya bana ya mike oyo babotamaka na ndako.
translated: [' mpe kokitisa motango ya bana oyo bakufaka na kobota na ndako. ']

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: Na 2013 bolukiluki moko oyo emonisaki ete ezaleli ya kosokola maboko ekoki kobongola mwa moke bokoli ya bana oyo bakokisi naino te mbula 5.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko ya 2013 emonisaki ete kosokola maboko malamu ekoki kosala ete bana oyo bakokisi naino mbula mitano te bákola malamu. ']

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: Na mikili ya bobola, motango ya liwa ya bana oyo bakufaka na maladi ya mpema mpe na pulupulu ekoki kokita kaka soki tobongoli bizaleli, na ndakisa kosokola maboko na sabuni.
translated: [' Na mikili ya bobola, motango ya liwa ya bana oyo euti na maladi ya mpema mpe ya pulupulu ekoki kokita soki bakɔtisi mbongwana ya pete na bizaleli, na ndakisa kosokola maboko na sabuni. ']

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: Likambo oyo ya moke ekoki kokitisa motango ya liwa ya bana na maladi oyo na pene ya 50%.
translated: [' Likambo oyo ya pɛtɛɛ ekoki kokitisa motango ya bato oyo bakufaka na maladi wana na pene ya 50%. ']

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: Misala oyo ezali kolendisa kosokola maboko ekoki kokotisa maladi ya pulupulu mbala misato, mpe ezali ntina ndenge moko na kopesa mai ya peto na mikili ya bobola.
translated: [' Ba intervention oyo elendisaka kosokola maboko ekoki kokitisa ba episode ya pulupulu pene ya ndambo moko na kati ya misato, mpe yango ekokani na kopesa mai ya pɛto na bisika oyo bato baza na mbongo mingi te. ']

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: 48% ya kokita ya maladi ya pulupulu ekoki kouta na kosokola maboko na sabuni. Kosokola maboko na sabuni lolenge ya pete koleka mpe ya ntalo mingi te ya kokanga nzela na maladi neti pulupulu mpe maladi ya mpema (ARI), ezali ezaleli ya ntina oyo tosengeli kozala na yango na bandako, na biteyelo, mpe na bisika nyonso na mokili mobimba.
translated: [' 48% ya kokitisa ba episode ya pulupulu ekoki kozala na boyokani na kosokola maboko na sabuni. Kosokola maboko na sabuni eza lolenge kaka moko ya malamu koleka mpe ya ntalo moke ya komibatela na maladi ya mpema mpe maladi makasi ya mpema (ARI), mpo bizaleli ya otomatiki oyo esalemaka na bandako, na biteyelo, mpe na bamboka na mokili mobimba. ']

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: Pneumonie maladi makasi ya ARI, ezali maladi ya liboso oyo ebomaka bana mingi oyo bazali na mbu nse ya mitano, ebomaka bana pene ya 1.8 milio mbula nyonso.
translated: [' Pneumonie, ARI ya monene, eza ntina ya liboso ya liwa ya bana oyo bakokisi naino mbula mitano te, yango wana ebomi bana soki milio 1,8 na mbula moko. ']

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: Pulupulu na pneumonie ebomaka bana pene ya 3,5 milio mbula nyonso.
translated: [' Pulupulu mpe pneumonie elongo ezali koboma bana pene ya bamilio 3,5 mbula na mbula. ']

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: UNICEF alobi ete, kokomisa kosokola maboko na sabuni liboso ya kolya mpe nsima ya kouta na wese bizaleli ya kati na biso ekoki kobikisa bato mingi koleka mangwele to nkisi nyonso, ekokitisa motango ya bato bazali kokufa na pulupulu na katikati mpe bato bazali kokufa na maladi makasi ya mpema na ndambo moko na kati ya minei.
translated: [' UNICEF alobi ete, kobongola kosokola maboko na sabuni liboso ya kolya mpe nsima ya kouta na wese na momeseno oyo ekɔti ekoki kobikisa bato mingi koleka mangwele nyonso to lisalisi ya monganga, kokitisa motango ya bato oyo bakufi na pulupulu pene ya katikati mpe bato oyo bakufi na maladi makasi ya mpema na ndambo moko na kati ya minei. ']

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: Kosokola maboko ezalaka mingimingi elongo na baprograme mosusu ya kosalela mai, kopetola mpe kolongono ya nzoto (KOSOKOLA).
translated: [' Mbala mingi kosokola maboko esanganaka esika moko na misala mosusu ya kopetola nzoto na kati ya baprograme ya mai, ya bopeto mpe ya bopeto (WASH). ']

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: Kosokola maboko ebatelaka mpe na impetigo oyo epesamaka soki bato basimbani.
translated: [' Kosokola maboko ebatelaka mpe na impetigo oyo epesamaka na nzela ya kokutana mbala moko na nzoto. ']

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: Mabe moko kaka ya kosokola maboko ezali ete kosokola maboko mbala mingi ekoki kobebisa mposo ya nzoto mpe ekoki kokausa yango.
translated: [' Mabe moke ya kosokola maboko ezali ete kosokola maboko mbala na mbala ekoki kosala ete loposo ebeba mpo na kokausa loposo. ']

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: Bolukiluki moko ya Danemark ya 2012 emonaki ete kolekisa ndelo na kosokola maboko ekoki kopesa mokosa, kolongola bamposo na maboko oyo ebengami eczema to dermatite ya maboko, oyo ekomelaka mingi minganga.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko ya Danemark ya 2012 emonaki ete kosokola maboko koleka ndelo ekoki kosala ete moto azala mokosa, loposo ya lini oyo babengaka eczema ya maboko to dermatite ya maboko, oyo ezalaka mingi mpenza na bato oyo basalaka na kolongono ya nzoto. ']

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: Kosokola maboko koleka ndelo ezali mpe moko ya bilembo ya maladi ebengami maladi ya likama ya motungisi (OCD).
translated: [' Kosokola maboko mbala na mbala ezali mpe komonana lokola moko ya bilembo ya maladi babengi maladi ya mpasi ya compulsive (OCD). ']

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Ezali na bantango mitano ya ntina na moko oyo kosokola maboko na sabuni ezali ntina mingi mpo na kokitisa motango ya kopesa maladi longwa na nyei ekota na monoko: nsima ya kouta na wese (kosuba, kosumba), nsima ya kosokola mwana masoko (kolongola mpe kolatisa kush), liboso ya koleisa mwana, liboso ya kolya mpe liboso/nsima ya kolamba bilei to ya kosimba mosuni ya mobesu, to soso.
translated: [' Eza na bantango mitano ya ntina mingi na mokolo oyo kosokola maboko na sabuni eza ntina mingi mpo na kokitisa motango ya kopesa maladi na nyei na monoko: nsima ya kouta na wese (kosuba, kosumba), nsima ya kosokola mwana masoko (kobongola nappies), liboso ya koleisa mwana, liboso ya kolya mpe liboso/nsima ya kolamba bilei to kosimba mosuni ya mobesu, mbisi, to soso. ']

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: Mabaku mosusu ntango oyo kosokola maboko malamu esengeli kozala ezaleli mpo na kokanga maladi nzela ya kopanzana ezali kosokola maboko liboso mpe nsima ya kosalisa mpota; nsima ya kosala itye, ya kokosola, ya kosimba zolo; nsima ya kosimba bosoto ya banyama to ya kosimba banyama; mpe nsima ya kosimba bosoto.
translated: [' Mabaku mosusu oyo esengeli kosalela mayele ya malamu ya kosokola maboko mpo na kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te ezala liboso mpe nsima ya kosalisa mpota oyo ekatamaki to mpota; nsima ya kosala likise, kokosola to kobeta zolo na yo; nsima ya kosimba bosoto ya banyama to kosimba banyama; mpe nsima ya kosimba bosɔtɔ. ']

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: Na mikili mingi, bato mingi te basokolaka maboko na sabuni.
translated: [' Na mikili mingi, bato mingi bazali kosukola mabɔkɔ na sabuni te. ']

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: Bolukiluki moko na ntina ya kosokola maboko oyo esalemaki na mikili 54 na 2015 emonisi ete, bandako 38,7% basokolaka maboko na sabuni. Na 2014 bolukiluki moko emonisaki ete Arabie Saudite eza na motango makasi 97 pourcent; États-Unis ezalaki pene ya kati na 77 pourcent; mpe Chine na nse makasi na 23 pourcent. Misala mingi ezali lelo oyo ebongoli bizaleli ya kosokola maboko na mai mpe sabuni na bantango ya ntina. Kosokola maboko elongo moko mpo na bana ya kelasi na bangonga oyo etyama na mokolo ezali likanisi moko na mikili ya bobola mpo na kokotisa yango na bizaleli ya bana.
translated: [' Bolukiluki moko oyo esalemaki mpo na kosokola maboko na mikili 54 na 2015 emonisaki ete na mwayene, mabota 38,7% bazalaki kosalela sabuni ya kosokola maboko. Bolukiluki moko ya 2014 emonisaki ete Arabie Saudite ezalaki na bato mingi koleka 97 na kati ya mokama; Etats-Unis ezali pene ya katikati na 77 pourcent; mpe Chine oyo eza na nse ya 23 pourcent. Bametode mingi ya kobongola bizaleli ezali sikoyo mpo na kobakisa bizaleli ya kosokola maboko na sabuni na ntango ya mpasi. Kosokola maboko ya etuluku mpo na bana ya kelasi na bangonga oyo etyamá ya mokolo eza likanisi moko na mikili ya bobola ya kokomisa kosokola maboko na bizaleli ya bana. ']
