targetString: Kasi mpe, ‘’risk ya pneumonia ekitaki mpe na bato oyo basalisaki bango na ACE bato oyo bakokaki kozwa pneumonia noki, lekola ba oyo bazalaki kobela motema.
translated: ['Lisusu, "likama ya pneumonia ekitaki mpe na bato oyo bazwaki nkisi ya ACE oyo bazalaki na likama mingi ya kobela pneumonia, mingimingi bato oyo bazalaki na stroke mpe maladi ya motema.']

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Kosalisa ACE esanganaki mpe na kokitisa pneumonia mpo bato bakufa te, kasi baresulta ezalaki makasi mingi te na oyo ya risk ya pneumonia.’’
translated: ['Kosalela ba inhibiteur ya ACE ezalaki mpe na boyokani na kokitisa pneumonia oyo euti na kokufa, atako ba résultat ezalaki makasi mingi te koleka mpo na likama mobimba ya pneumonia."']

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Recombinant ya bato ACE2 (rhACE2) ezali therapie ya sika mpona mpasi ya mimpulupulu, mpe ezalaki kosalisa pulmonary hemodynaci mpe ekotonda ya oxygen na kati ya bangulu na lypopolysaccharie kati ya syndrome ya mpasi ya kopema.
translated: ['Recombinant ya bato ACE2 (rhACE2) ezali surmission ya sika mpo na mpota ya poumon ya makasi, mpe emonanaki ete ebongisaka hémodynamike ya poumon mpe kotonda ya oxygène na kati ya bangulu na syndrome ya mpasi makasi ya kopema oyo euti na lipopolysaccharide.']

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Bomoi ya moke ya rhACE2 na kati ya bato ezali bangonga 10 mpe ekosala mosala na baminute 30 elongo moko na ngonga 24.
translated: ['Bomoi ya ndambo ya rhACE2 na nzoto ya bato eza pene ya bangonga 10 mpe kobanda ya kosala eza miniti 30 likolo ya ndenge esalaka (ntango molai) ya bangonga 24.']

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Ba etid mingi elobi ete rhACE2 ekoki kozala kisi ya malamu mpona ba oyo nzoto eboyi renin-angiotensin (RAS inhibitors) to bamaldi angiotensin oyo ezali kotambo ezali makasi. rhACE2 esosolami na kati ya clinic mpona kosalisa maladi ya mpasi ya kopema.
translated: ['Bokundoli mingi emonisi ete rhACE2 ekoki kozala kisi ya malamu mpona bato oyo baza na tolerance te na inhibiteur ya systeme ya renin-angiotensin ya kala (RAS inhibitors) to na maladi oyo angiotensin II ezali kotambola. Infused rhACE2 emesamaka na komeka ya cliniki mpóna traitement ya syndrome ya pasi makasi ya kopema.']

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: B’COVID-19 apps ezali baaplication ya telephone oyo esalemi mpona kolanda bato oyo bakoki kozala na maladi ya pandemi ya coronavirisi ya 2019-20. Lekola, ndenge ya koyeba (‘’bato’’) oyo bakokaki kozala esika moko na moto oyo azalaki na maladi.
translated: ['Baaplication ya b\'COVID-19 ezali ba-application ya ba-software mobile oyo esalemi mpo na kosalisa na kolandela bato oyo bakutanaki na maladi mabe ya coronavirisi 2019-20, elingi koloba mosala ya koyeba bato ("bato oyo bakutanaka") oyo mbala mosusu bazalaki na contact na moto oyo azali na maladi.']

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Baaplication mingi esalemaki, mpe na lisungi ya gouvernema na bisika misusu.
translated: ['Ba demande ebele esalemaki to bakanaki kosala yango, na lisungi ya gouvernema ya leta na bateritware mpe na bituka mosusu.']

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Ba ndenge mingi ya kolandela bato esalemaki na baaplication ya telephone.
translated: ['Ba cadre mingi mpona ba-application ya kolandela bato ya ndako esi esalemi.']

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Bato basepekali te na ndenge ezali kotia miso na basekele ya bato, lekola basystem oyo ezali kolanda esika oyo bato bazali.
translated: ['Mitungisi ya kobatela makambo ya bato ebimaki, mingimingi mpo na basysteme oyo esimbami na kolandela esika oyo bato oyo basalelaka ba-application bazali.']

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ya kotia miso mingi te na kati ya basekele ya bato ezali basignal ya Bluetooth oyo ekoyebisa moto soki azali pene na ba telephone misusu.
translated: ['Ba ndenge mosusu ya kokota mingi te eza na ndakisa kosalela basignal ya Bluetooth mpona kokota pene ya moto na batelefone mosusu ya maboko.']

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, Google na Apple balobaki ete bakotia basystem ya kosunga application ya Bluetooth wana na kati ya Android na iOS.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, Google na Apple balobaki elongo ete bakosangisa misala mpo na kosunga ba-application ya ndenge wana oyo esalemi na Bluetooth mbala moko na basysteme na bango ya Android mpe IOS.']

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Na Chine, gouvernema ya Chine, elongo moko na Alipay, esali application oyo esungi bato ya mboka koyeba soki bazalaki pene na moto oyo azali na COVID-19.
translated: ['Na Chine, gouvernema ya Chine, elongo na Alipay, batiaki application moko oyo esalisaka bana-mboka na kotala soki bakutanaki na bato oyo baza na COVID-19.']

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Ezali kosalema kati na bigumba 200 na Chine, na Singapore, application moko nkombo TraceTogether ezali kosalema.
translated: ['Ezali kosalelama na bingumba koleka 200 ya Chine. Na Singapour, application moko babengi TraceTogether ezali kosalelama.']

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Bato ya mayele ya IT na kati ya egumba moto basalaki application yango, babimisaki yango mpona moto nyonso asalisa mpe bako pesa yango na gouvernema. Macedoine ya Nord ebimisaki ‘’StopKorona!’’, application ya Bluetooth oyo ekomona soki moto amipesi na maladi epayi ya moto oyo azali na maladi mpe kosunga etumba ya gouvernema na kolongono.
translated: ['App esalemaki na bato ya IT ya mboka, babimisaki yango lokola open source mpe bakopesa yango na maboko ya gouvernema. Macédoine ya nordi ebimisaki "StopKorona!", application moko ya Bluetooth mpona kolandela ndenge bakutanaki na bato oyo bakoki kozala na maladi mpe kopesa eyano ya noki na bakonzi ya kolongono.']

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: App esalemaki na Minisere ya Communication mpe ya Technologie na Ministere ya Kolongono.
translated: ['App esalemaki na ministere ya communication mpe ya technologie mpe ministere ya santé.']

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya minei 2020, application ezalaki kozela endimelo ya Google Play na ya Apple App Store.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya minei 2020, application ezalaki kozela ndingisa ya Google Play Store mpe Apple App Store.']

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya minei, gouvernema elobaki application ya kolandela bato ekomaki mosika, mpe bakokoka kosalela yango na ba poso oyo ezali koyaka. Application mosusu ya boye ezali kosalema na Ireland, mpe na France (‘’StopCovid’’).
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya minei, gouvernema alobaki ete application ya kolandela bato ezalaki na eleko ya liboso ya bokoli, mpe ekozala mpona kosalela yango nsima ya baposo. Application ya ndenge moko ebongisami mpe na Irlande, mpe na France ("StopCovid").']

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Australie na Nouvelle Zealand balingi kosalela application oyo ezali na Singapore TraceTogether mpe BlueTrace protocol. Russie ezali kosala application oyo ekomona bato oyo bazali na COVID-19 oyo bazali kofanda na Moscow, ekosalema mpona kolandela bango mpo ete babima libanda ya ndako te.
translated: ['Australie na Nouvelle-Zélande bazali kotalela ba-application oyo euti na application TraceTogether ya Singapour mpe protocol ya BlueTrace na yango. Russie alingi kokotisa application moko ya geofencing mpona bato ya maladi oyo bamoni ete baza na COVID-19 oyo bafandaka na Moscou, oyo esalemi mpo na koyeba soki babimi na ndako te.']

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, molakisi ya securite ya ingenieur na universite ya Cambridge, ayebisaki makambo mingi oyo ekoki kosalema na ba system ya application oyo, lekola bapositives ya lekuta, mpe mpasi mpona etambola malamu mpo ete application ekoki kosalisa kaka bato ndabo ya mboka.
translated: ['Ross Anderson, molakisi ya ingenieur ya libateli na universite ya Cambridge, atángaki mikakatano mingi oyo ekoki kobima na basysteme oyo eza na application, ata mpe ba positives ya lokuta mpe kozanga makasi oyo ekoki kosalema soki kozwa application esuki kaka na mwa ndambo moke ya bato.']

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Kolandela mitungisi na makambo yo ‘baaplication ya coronavirisi’ ekoki komema, Apple atie limit na baorganization oyo bakoki kotia application na App Store, kosukisa yango kaka na basali ya ‘’gouvernema’’ to baorganization misusu oyo eyebani makasi.
translated: ['Kolandela mitungisi na ntina ya kopalangana ya ba-application ya "coronavirisi" ya lokuta to ya mabe, Apple etiaki ndelo na balolenge nini ya bibongiseli ekoki kobakisa ba-application oyo etali coronavirisi na App Store na ye, kosukisa yango kaka na baorganization ya "official" to oyo eyebani te.']

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google na Amazon mpe ekotisi mibeko wana.
translated: ['Google na Amazon basali bipekiseli ya ndenge moko.']

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Bato yo bazila kobundela bonsoni ya kobomba ba sekekele ya bato mpona kokengela, bamituni soki bisika ya kosala mosala yango na ndenge ya malamu ezali mpe soki ekobebisama nsima ya coronavirisi
translated: ['Bato oyo balingi kobatela makambo ya bato bamonisaki kobanga na bango na oyo etali makambo oyo bato mingi bakoki kolandela na kosalelaka ba-application ya coronavirisi, mingimingi soki biloko ya kokengela oyo esalemi mpo na kobundisa maladi mabe ya coronavirisi ekosila soki likama eleki.']

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amesty International baorganization misusu 100 babengi bato batia mibeko na bolandela bato oyo eko salema.
translated: ['Amnesty International mpe bibongiseli mosusu koleka 100 babimisaki maloba oyo ezosenga kotya ndelo na lolenge oyo ya kokengela bato.']

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Baorganizations bakomaki batoli nsambo oyo gouvernema ekoki kolandela:
translated: ['Masanga elobaki ete makambo mwambe ezali kosalema na misala ya Leta:']

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: Kokengela esalema nakotosa ‘’mibeka mpe na ndenge y amalamu’’.
translated: ['bokengeli esengeli kozala "na kolanda mibeko, esengeli mpe eyokana";']

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: Esengeli ezala nan tango ya kosukisa kokengela;
translated: ['Kobakisa ya kolandela mpe kokengela esengeli kozala na ba clause ya kolala ya moi;']

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: Mitango ekosalema kaka mpona COVID-19;
translated: ['Kosalela bansango esengeli kosuka kaka na mikano ya COVID-19;']

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: Esengeli babetala makambo ya bato mpe bankombo na bango mpe esengeli balakisa te bazali kosala yango;
translated: ['Libateli ya bansango mpe kozanga koyeba nkombo na yango esengelaki kobatelama mpe komonisa ete ebatelama na kolanda bilembeteli;']

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: Kokengela na ndenge ya ordinateur esalema na kati ya koyina basusu te ;
translated: ['Kokengela ya digito esengeli koboya kobakisa bokabwani mpe kotya bato pembeni;']

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: Kokabola mitango na bato libanda ya mosala oyo esengeli episama na mibeko oyo ekomami;
translated: ['kokabola bansango nyonso na bato mosusu esengeli kolimbolama na mobeko;']

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: Esengeli ezala na ndenge ya kobatela bato ya mboka mpe kosunga soki moko amona mpasi mpona mosali oyo;
translated: ['esengelaki kozala na mibeko ya kobatela bato oyo bazali konyokola bango mpe ntomo ya bana-mboka ya kosala soki bazali konyokola bango;']

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: ‘’Moyo nyonso azala na kati ya mosala oyo’’ mpona ‘’bato’’ nyonso esengelami, mpe oyo ya basali ya kolongono ya bato mpe ba oyo bazali na bato ya kobatela bango te. German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) mpe na Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) mpe bakomaki ya bango batoli.
translated: ['Kosangana ya malamu na "bato oyo baza na ntina" ekosenga, ata mpe ya bato ya mayele na makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe bituluku oyo eza pembeni. Club ya ordinatere ya Allemagne (CCC) pe bapanzi-sango bazangi ndelo (Mopanzi-sango ohne Grenzen) (RSF) babimisaki mpe liste ya ba chèque.']

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Plan ya Google na ya Apple ekobenda matoyi na likambo ya kokengela oyo na kolongola system yango soki ntina na yango ezali lisusu te.
translated: ['Plan ya Google/Apple oyo bakani kosala eza na likanisi ya kosilisa mokakatano ya kokengela ntango nyonso na kolongola mechanisme ya kolandela na basysteme ya mosala ya ba échafaudages na bango soki eza lisusu na mposa na yango te.']

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Bamboka misusu basalisaki kolanda bato na reseau kasi na application te, yango esengi te bato bazala na application mpe bakoki kokima ekengeli.
translated: ['Bamboka mosusu basalelaki kolandela bisika oyo eza na reseaux na esika ya ba-application, balongolaki ntina nyonso mibale ya kozwa application moko mpe makoki ya koboya kolandela.']

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Na Israel, kolandela na reseau endimamaki.
translated: ['Na Israel, kolandela makambo na nzela ya reseau endimamaki.']

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Kolandela na reseau oyo elakisi wapi moto azali ezali mpe kotia miso na makambo oyo esengeli te.
translated: ['Mayele ya reseaux oyo eza na likoki ya kozwa bansango ya esika ya liboso eza na mikakatano mingi oyo ekoki kobatela makambo ya bato.']

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Kasi, basystem nyonso te esengeli eyeba esika oyo moto azali; ba system mingi oyo ebatelaka kokengela ya bato esalemi na intercommunication (tala section ya nse).
translated: ['Kasi, basystem nyonso te oyo eza na ba-server ya centre esengeli kozala na likoki ya kozwa bansango ya esika ya moto ye moko; Bibongiseli mingi oyo ebatelaka makambo ya bato esalemaki oyo esalelaka ba-server ya kati kaka mpo na intercommunication (tala eteni na nse).']

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Na Core ya Sud, balandelaki na oyo esengi te bato bazala na application.
translated: ['Na Core ya Sud, basalelaki systeme moko oyo eza te na application mpona kosala kolandela bato oyo bakutanaki na bango.']

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Na oyo basalela application, bazwaki ba information na bisika mingi lekola telephone, bakarte ya mbongo, mpe basalisi yango mpona koyebisa bato na SMS bakoki kozala na maladi.
translated: ['Na esika ya kosalela application moko oyo bapesaki bato, systeme yango esangisaki bansango ya kolandela makambo ndenge na ndenge na ndakisa bansango ya kolandela baaparɛyi ya maboko mpe bansango ya mombongo ya bakarte, mpe basangisaki yango mpo na kobimisa ba notice na nzela ya bamesaje na bato oyo bakoki kozala na maladi.']

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Mpe bayebisaki ba oyo mpe balekaki nzela wana, mpe gouvernema asalaki ete bato nyonso ba yeba esika yango, eloko oyo ezali ya malamu na kati ya mibeko mpo ete esalemaki na pandemi ya MERS oyo esalemaki na kati ya mboka.
translated: ['Longola kosalela bansango oyo mpo na koyebisa bato oyo bakoki kokutana na bango, gouvernema apesi mpe bansango ya esika yango na bato nyonso, eloko oyo bapesi nzela mpo na mbongwana ya mosika na mibeko ya koyebisa makambo ya bato nsima ya kobima ya MERS na mboka wana.']

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Information oyo moto nyonso akoki komona yango na baapplication mingi mpe ba siteweb. Bamboka lekola Germany balingaki basalela system ya kati na oyo eko batela kokengela ya bato.
translated: ['Bato nyonso bakoki kozwa bansango yango na nzela ya ba-application mpe basite mingi ya internet. Mikili ata mpe Allemagne batalelaki kosalela bibongiseli ya kati-kati mpe ya kobatela makambo ya bato.']

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya minei 2020, babimisaki yango naino te.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 6 sanza ya minei 2020, makambo nyonso ebimaki naino te.']

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Kolandela eyebani malamu, na ba etid mingi uta 2013. Na mokolo ya 7 sanza ya minei 2020, bayekoli mingi koleka zomi na mibale bazalaki kosala basystem oyo eko batela kokengela ya bato, lekola bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) mpona ko yebisa telephone soki ezali pene ya mosusu.
translated: ['Kolandela bato oyo babatelaka makambo ya bato eza likanisi oyo eyebani malamu, eza na lisanga monene ya mikanda ya bolukiluki oyo esalemaki ata na mokolo ya 2013.As ya mokolo ya 7 sanza ya minei 2020, koleka bituluku zomi na mibale ya bato ya mayele bazalaki kosala na mayele ya kobatela makambo ya bato, na ndakisa kosalela Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) mpo na kokota pene ya moto na batelefone mosusu ya maboko.']

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Kasi, PEPP-PT ezali makasi ya mosala ya kati na ya libanda, mpe ezali na toli moko te ya kosalela yango. Ba protocol ya libanda ezali keloka Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact (TCN. fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN) Privacy Sensible Protocols na Mechanisms ya Kolandela bato na telephone.
translated: ['Kasi, PEPP-PT eza milende ya co-ordination oyo eza na mayele ya kati-kati mpe ya decentralisé, mpe eza protocol moko te. Baprotocol ya decentralisé ezali Decentralized Privacy-Kobatela Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), banimero ya bokutani ya ntango mokuse (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Baprotocol ya koyeba makambo ya bato mpe ndenge ya kosala makambo mpo na kolandela bato na telefone (PACT) mpe misusu.']

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Na baprotocol oyo, makambo ya kati ya moto ekobima te, mpe nyonso ekosalema kaka na telephone.
translated: ['Na baprotocol oyo, bansango ya bato oyo bakoki koyeba elongwaka ata moke te na eloko wana, mpe nyonso oyo ekokani esalemaka na apareyi.']

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Group Prive na MIT Media Lab ezali kosala SafePaths, esika ya kosalela mosala ya kobatela makambo ya bato ntango bazali kozwa makambo mpe kosalisa esika oyo to kolandela bisika oyo bato bakutani mpona kolandela kopalangana ya COVID-19.
translated: ['Etuluku ya makambo ya bato na MIT Media Lab ezalaki kosala SafePaths, esika ya kosalela mayele ya kobatela makambo ya bato ntango bazosangisa mpe kosalela esika to nzela ya bansango oyo ekangaka mpo na kolandela kopalangana ya COVID-19.']

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Euti na etid ya mokanda ya mpembe ‘’Apps Gone Rogue: Kobatela makambo ya bato na pandemi ‘’ Ebimaki na sanza ya misato 2020. Mosala mosusu ezalaki ya SafeTrade ya Enigma MPZ, companie oyo ezali kosala batechnology ya kobatela makambo ya bato oyo babandaki uta mosala na bango na MIT Media Lab.
translated: ['Euti na bolukiluki euti na mokanda ya mpembe "Apps Gone Rogue: Kobatela makambo ya moto ye moko na maladi mabe" oyo ebimaki na sanza ya misato 2020.Molende mosusu ya ndenge moko eza esika ya SafeTrace na Enigma MPC, kompani moko oyo ezosala mayele ya kobatela makambo ya bato oyo ebandaki mpe na ebandeli na MIT Media Lab.']

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrade ezali kosalisa bamachine ya technologie oyo ebombaka makambo ya bato mpo été bato bapona soki balingi kopesa esika oyo bazali mpe makambo ya kolongono na bango na bato misusu mpe bato ya gouvernema, kasi nako buka mibeko ya kobomba mitango te.
translated: ['SafeTrace esalelaka mayele ya hardware ya libateli mpo na kopesa basaleli nzela ya kokabola esika ya makasi mpe bansango ya kolongono ya nzoto na bato mosusu mpe bakonzi, kozanga kobebisa makambo ya bansango wana.']

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya minei 2020, Coalition ya mokili ya TCN ebandaki na lisanga ya bato oyo bayokanaki na ndenge ya kosala makambo, mpo été bato bamona mpasi mingi te, mpe kosalisa interporabilite ya mokili na kolanda mpe koalerte ba applications, ezalaki ntina mpona mokili nyonso ebanda kosalela yango.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya minei 2020, Coalition ya TCN na mokili mobimba ebotamaki na bituluku oyo ezalaki na kati ya mayele oyo ezalaki mpenza ndenge moko mpe ezalaki mingimingi kolandela mibeko ya ndenge moko, na mokano ya kokitisa bokabwani, mpe kosalisa interoperability ya mokili mobimba ya kolandela mpe koyebisa ba-application, likambo ya ntina mingi mpo na kokokisa bato mingi ya kosalela yango.']

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya minei 2020, gouvernema ya Singapore elobaki été ezalaki na baprotocol ya BlueTrace oyo bato na bango ya gouvernema bazali kosalela.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 9 sanza ya minei 2020, gouvernema ya Singapour elobaki ete bafungolaki protocole BlueTrace oyo application na yango ya leta ya leta ezalaki kosalela.']

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, Google na Apple, Bacompanie oyo basali Android na IOS balobaki mosala moko ebandi mpona kosunga kolandela ya bato kasi ekobatela mpe basekele ya bato, ekosalema na technologie ya Bluetooth Low Energy mpe na oyo ezali kobomba makambo ya bato Cryptography.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya minei 2020, Google na Apple, bakompani oyo etambwisaka ba plateformes ya Android mpe IOS, balobaki ete bazosala ebongiseli moko mpo na kolandela bato, oyo balobaki ete ekobatela makambo ya bato, na kolanda bosangani ya teknoloji ya Bluetooth Low Energy mpe kobatela makambo ya bato.']

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Babimisi mpe mokanda oyo elakisaki technologie ya kati oyo bakosalela.
translated: ['Babimisaki mpe baspecifications ya mayele ya ntina oyo basalelaka na systeme.']

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Mpona Apple na Google, system ekosalema na batep misato:
translated: ['Na kotalela Apple na Google, ebongiseli wana eza mpona kobimisa yango na biteni misato:']

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: Kobongisa biloko oyo bakosala application yango ya kolandela bato mpona kosunga gouvernema na kobatela makambo ya bato.
translated: ['Kobimisa bisaleli mpo na kosalisa baguvernema na kosala ba-application ya kolandela makambo ya bato oyo ezali kobatela makambo ya bato ya coronavirisi']

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: Kokotisa yango na IOS mpe na AndroidGoogle mpe Apple alingi kolandela makambo ya kobomba makambo ya bato na kokotisa system yango na basystem oyo ezali kotambola, mpe nsima kolongola yango ndenge wana kaka
translated: ['Kosangisa mosala oyo mbala moko na IOS mpe AndroidGoogle mpe Apple eza na likanisi ya kolandela mikakatano ya kozwa mpe ya kokoba ya kokengela na kokabola liboso systeme na nzela ya ba update ya system ya mosala, mpe na nsima kolongola yango kaka ndenge kaka likama eleki.']

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: Kobongisa b’Drug (oyo babengi mpe kisi ya kosalisa) ezali kosalisa kisi oyo ezali mpona kobikisa maladi to condition oyo baselelaki yango mpona.
translated: ["b'Drug repositioning (oyo babengaka mpe kisi oyo epɛtolaka, kozongela lisusu, kozongela to kobongola nkisi) ezali kopetola kisi oyo endimami mpo na kobikisa maladi to maladi mosusu koleka oyo mpo na yango esalemaki na ebandeli."]

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Ezali liloba moko ya etid ya science oyo bazali kolandela mpona kosala kisi ya malamu mpona COVID-19.
translated: ['Oyo ezali molongo moko ya bolukiluki ya siansi oyo bazali kolandela sikoyo mpo na kosala bankisi ya malamu mpe ya malamu mpo na COVID-19.']

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Ba etid misusu elandi nzela ya koluka vaccin mpona COVID-19 mpe transfusion ya plasma. SARS-CoV-2 ezali na bakisi 66, nyonso ezali na ligand oyo esimbi yango.
translated: ['Makambo mosusu ya bolukiluki ezali kosala vaccin ya COVID-19 mpe kozongisa plasma ya bato oyo bazobika na yango. SARS-CoV-2 eza na baproteine pene ya 66 oyo ekoki kosalelama na nkisi, mokomoko na yango eza na bisika mingi oyo ekangamaka na ligland.']

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Komona bisika oyo esimbani pesa mosala oyo ekoki kosalema mpona komona makasi ya kisi mpona COVID-19.
translated: ['Kotalela bisika yango oyo ekangami epesaka mosala ya malamu ya kosala kisi ya malamu ya kobundisa virisi mpo na baproteine ya COVID-19.']

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Mpona SARS-CoV-2 ya ntina makasi, baprotein bazali lekola pa papain ya protease, RNA oyo etali polymerase ya RNA, helicase, S protein, na ADP ribophosphatase.
translated: ['Na baproteine ya ntina mingi ya SARS-CoV-2 oyo balingi eza protease oyo ekokani na papa, RNA etalelaka polymerase RNA, helicase, S protein, mpe ADP ribophosphatase.']

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein AA na etid ya al batangi combinaison ya bato mingi emonanaki basosolaki skelet komona soki ekokami na kisi oyo ekoki kopusa koluka kisi ya SARS-CoV-2 lekola ndenge ya koluka kisi.
translated: ['Hussein A A, et al bayekolaki biloko mingi ya candidat oyo na nsima ebongisaki mpe batalelaki soki mikuwa na yango ekokani na bakisi ya likolo oyo endimami mpo na kosala noki kisi ya makasi oyo ebundisaka SARS-CoV-2 na etid na ye ya liboso ya clinic elendisama na mayele ya koyekola ya cliniki.']

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Chloroquine ezali kisi ya palu oyo esalamaka mpona bamaladi ya system immune.
translated: ['Chloroquine eza nkisi ya malaria oyo basalelaka mpe mpo na kobundisa bamaladi mosusu oyo ebundisaka mikrobe na nzoto ya moto.']

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya misato, OMS elobaki ete Chloroquine na Hydroxycloroquine ekozala na kati ya bakisi minei kati ya Bomoko ya komeka bakisi.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya misato, OMS elobaki ete chloroquine na hydroxychloroquine oyo eza na boyokani na yango ekozala na kati ya bakisi minei oyo bayekolaki na kati ya komeka ya cliniki ya Solidarité.']

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Gouverneur ya New Andrew Cumo alobaki Egumba ya New York komeka chloroquine na hydroxychloroquine ekobanda mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato. Na sanza ya misato mokolo ya 28, FDA endimaki basalela hydroxychloroquine sulfate na chloroquine phosphate na Likama Ya Kondimela yango mpona Kosalisa (EUA).
translated: ['Gouverneur ya New York Andrew Cuomo alobaki ete etuka ya New York komeka chloroquine mpe hydroxychloroquine ekobanda na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato.Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato, FDA apesaki ndingisa ya kosalela hydroxychloroquine sulfate mpe chloroquine phosphate na nse ya ndingisa ya kosalela yango na mbalakaka (EUA).']

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: FDA endimaki te bameka kisi kasi endimamaki kati na EUA lekola kisi ya komeka mpona bato ya kobela oyo bazali na kati ya likama oyo bazali na lepital kasi bakoki kozwa kisi te.
translated: ['Nkisi endimami naino te na mayele ya FDA ya komeka mpe epesami ndingisa na EUA kaka mpo na komeka kosalela yango na mbalakaka na bato ya maladi oyo baza na lepital kasi baza na makoki te ya kozwa lisalisi na komeka ya cliniki.']

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC elobi ‘kosalela, dose, mpe wumela ya hydroxychloroquine mpona kisi ya SARS-CoV-2’’ eyebani te.
translated: ["CDC elobi ete ''kosalela, kopesa, to wumela ya hydroxychloroquine mpo na prophylaxis to kobikisa maladi ya SARS-CoV-2'' emonani nanu te."]

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Banganga balobi bazali kosalela kisi yango soki ‘’kisi mosusu ezali te’’.
translated: ['Minganga balobi ete bazali kosalela nkisi wana soki "nzela mosusu ezali te".']

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Etid ya turkey oyo ezali kosalema na Istanbul ezali komona ndenge chloroquine ekosala soki bavukisi yango na Zinc, Vitamin A, Vitamin C na Vitamin D.
translated: ['Ekipi moko ya bolukiluki ya Turquie na Istanbul bazali kosala bolukiluki ya moke na oyo etali kosalela chloroquine elongo na zinc, vitamini A, vitamini C mpe vitamini D.']

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Ba etid ya minene ezali kosalema na universite ya Duke mpe na Universite ya Oxford.
translated: ['Boyekoli ya minene ezali kosalema na universite ya Duke mpe na universite ya Oxford.']

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: Kelasi ya banganga na NYU Langone ezali komeka komona bolamu mpe mosala ya hydroxychloroquine.
translated: ['Eteyelo ya minganga ya NYU Langone ezali kosala momekano na oyo etali libateli mpe makasi ya kosalela hydroxychloroquine mpo na komibatela.']

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Na Chine, komeka ya bakisi na Wuhan mpe na Shenzhen elakisaki ete Favipavir ezalaki ‘’makasi mpenza’’.
translated: ["Komeka ya bakisi ya Chine na Wuhan mpe na Shenzhen balobaki ete elakisi favipiravir ezalaki ''polele ete ezali malamu''."]

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Bato ya kobela 35 na Shenzhen bamonaki bango negative kati na mikolo 4, kasi wumela ya maladi ezali mikolo 11 kati na bato ya kobela 45 oyo bazwaki kisi te.
translated: ['Bato ya maladi 35 na Shenzhen bamonaki bango negative na kati ya mikolo 4, kasi molai ya maladi ezalaki mikolo 11 na bato ya maladi 45 oyo bazwaki yango te.']

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Na Etid oyo basalaki na Wuhan na bato ya kobela 240 oyo bazalaki na pneumonia, ndambo bapesaki bango favipiravir ndambo mosusu umifenovir.
translated: ['Na bolukiluki moko oyo basalaki na Wuhan na bato 240 oyo bazalaki na pneumonia, ndambo bapesaki bango favipiravir mpe ndambo mosusu umifenovir.']

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Agence ya pharmacy ya Italie epesaki toli na bato ete baresulta ya kisi ezali nani kaka na ebandeli.
translated: ['Ebongiseli ya bakisi ya Italie ekundwelaki bato ete bilembeteli oyo ezali mpo na kosunga kisi ezali scant mpe ya ebandeli.']

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 2 ya sanza ya minei, Germany elobaki ete ekosomba kisi wana na Japan, bako salisa limpimgo mpona komema bango bakisi yango na balepital ya universite, bisika oyo kisi ekosalema mpona kosalisa bato bazali kobela na COVID-19.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya minei, Allemagne alobaki ete ekosomba kisi yango na Japon mpo na kobomba yango, mpe bakosalela basoda mpo na komema kisi yango na balopitalo ya universite, esika oyo kisi wana ekosalelama mpo na kosalisa bato oyo bazobela COVID-19.']

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Mpona basango ya South Chine Morning Post, Shinzo Abe akebisi biro ya Trump na kosomba kisi wana. Kisi yango ekoki kozala makasi mingi te na bato oyo bazali kobela makasi mpe virisi ekomi mingi na kati ya nzoto.
translated: ['Na kotalela zulunalo South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe asalaki ba overtures na gouvernema ya Trump na oyo etali kosomba kisi wana. Nkisi yango ekoki kozala makasi mingi te na bato oyo bazobela makasi esika virisi esi ekoma mingi.']

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Ekoki kozala malamu te mpona basi ya zemi to ba oyo bazali koluka zemi.
translated: ['Ekoki kozala malamu te basi ya zemi to baoyo bazali koluka kozwa zemi.']

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Etid moko ya lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), combinaison ya lopinavir na ritonavir esalaki ‘’Eloko te ya makasi’’.
translated: ['Bolukiluki moko ya lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), bosangani ya antivirals lopinavir na ritonavir, elobaki ete "litomba moko te emonanaki".']

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Bakisi yango esalema mpona kopekisa virisi ya VIH ekoma mingi na kati ya nzoto.
translated: ['Bankisi yango esalemaki mpo na kopekisa mikrobe ya sida ebotama na kokangama na protease.']

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Etid oyo esali bayekoli na Universite ya Colorado bazali kobongisa kisi yango mpona kosala kisi oyo ekosimba ya SARS-CoV-2. Misusu basepeli te mpo ete bazali kosalela biloko oyo esengeli basala bakisi mpona VIH/SIDA.
translated: ['Etuluku moko ya bato ya mayele na universite ya Colorado bazali komeka kobongola bakisi yango mpo na koluka eloko moko oyo ekokangama na protease ya SARS-CoV-2.Bato bazoloba mabe na kati ya bato ya siansi mpo na kolakisa biloko ya kopetola bakisi oyo esalemi mpenza mpo na VIH/SIDA.']

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: OMS ekotisaki lopinavir/ritonavir na bakisi ya komeka na mokili.
translated: ['OMS esangisaki lopinavir/ritonavir na komeka ya Solidarité international.']

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir esalemaki na Gilead Sciences lekola kisi ya virisi ya maladi ya Ebola mpe virisi ya maladi Marburg . Gilead Sciences moto emonaki remdesivir ezali na ntina na mosala ya vitro na kobundela ba filo- mingi, pneumo-, paramyzo-, mpe corona virisi .
translated: ['Remdesivir esalemaki mpe esalemaki na Gilead Sciences lokola nkisi mpona maladi ya virisi ya Ebola mpe maladi ya virisi ya Marburg . Na nsima, Gilead Sciences emonaki ete Remdesivir ezalaki na mosala ya antivirusi na vitro na filo mingi, pneumo-, paramyxo-, mpe corona- virusi.']

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Likambo moko oyo kisi yango ezali makasi na yango ya kolenda soki virisi ekomi makasi mingi mpona nzoto mpe ekomi kotumbola bamaladi ya makasi mpe kopalangana na kati ya bato.
translated: ['Likambo moko na traitement ya antivirusi eza bokoli ya resistance na nzela ya mbongwana oyo ekoki komema na maladi ya makasi koleka mpe kopanzana ya bato.']

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Ba Etid moko ya liboso elobi ete Remdesivir ekoki kozala makasi mingi. Baetid mingi ezali kosalema, lokola mibale oyo universite ya Cleaveland ezali kosala; moko mpona bato oyo bazali kobela makasi te mpe mosusu mpona ba oyo bazali kobela makasi.
translated: ['Bolukiluki mosusu ya liboso liboso ya komeka emonisi ete remdesivir ekoki kozala na mokakatano makasi na genetiki mpo na kobundisa yango. Komeka ya cliniki ezali mingi, ata mpe mibale oyo esalemaki na balopitalo ya universite ya Cleveland; Moko mpo na bato oyo bazali na maladi ya makasi te mpe mosusu mpo na baoyo bazali na maladi ya makasi koleka.']

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Mosala misato ya komeka bakisi ezali kosalema na komona Vitamin C mpona bato oyo bazali kobela makasi na COVID-19; ba placebo mibale enladani (Chine, Canada) mpe moko oyo bazali kolanda te (Italie).
translated: ['Ezali na baekzame misato ya cliniki oyo ezali kosalema na kati ya nzoto ya vitamine C na kati ya misisa mpo na bato oyo bakoti lopitalo mpe bazali kobela makasi na COVID-19; placebo mibale ezalaki kolandela (Chine, Canada) mpe moko oyo eza na control te (Italie).']

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: New York ebandaki komeka kisi babengi azithromycin na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato 2020.
translated: ['New York ebandaki komeka ba azithromycin ya antibiotique na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya misato 2020.']

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ya mboka ya Japan mpona Kolongono ya bato nyonso mpe ya bakisi (NCGM) ezali kobongama mpona komeka Kisi ya Teijin nkombo Alvesco (ciclesonide), kisi ya mpema mpona Asthme mpona kosalisa bato oyo bazali kobela na coronavirisi ya sika.
translated: ['Centre national ya kolongono ya nzoto mpe ya bakisi ya mokili mobimba (NCGM) ezali kobongisa komeka ya Teijin ya Alvesco (ciclesonide), corticosteroide oyo bapemaka mpo na asthme, mpo na kosalisa bato oyo bazalaki na basymptomi liboso ya kozala na maladi ya coronavirisi ya sika.']

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Angiotensin moko oyo ekomaka enzyme 2, komeka ya Phase II ebandi na bato ya kobela 200 oyo bazali kobela makasi na lepital na Denmark, Germany na Austria mpona komona soki kisi yango ezali makasi.
translated: ['Lolenge moko ya enzyme 2 oyo ebongolaka angiotenssin, Phase II ya komeka ezali kosalema na bato ya maladi 200 oyo bakozwa bango na bato ya maladi ya makasi, oyo bakoti lopitalo na Danemark, Allemagne, mpe Autriche mpo na koyeba soki nkisi yango ezali kosimba makasi.']

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Ba etid na insitut ya Canada ya Montreal oyo emonaki mitena bazali kotanga mosala ya colchicine na kokitisa kovimba mpe bacomplication ya kopema na bato oyo bazalali na basymptomi moke na COVID-19.
translated: ['Bato basalaka bolukiluki ya Montreal Heart Institute na Canada bazali sikoyo koyekola mosala ya colchicine mpo na kokitisa mpasi mpe mikakatano ya poumon na bato oyo bazobela bilembo ya moke ya COVID-19.']

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Etid, oyo babengi COLCORONA, ezali na bankombo ya bato 6000 bambula 40 emati oyo bamonaki na COVID-19 mpe bazalaki na basymptomi moke oyo esengaki te bakota lepital.
translated: ['Bolukiluki, oyo bapesaki nkombo COLCORONA, ezali kozwa mikolo 6000 ya mibu 40 mpe koleka oyo bamonaki ete bazali na COVID-19 mpe bazali na basymptomi moke oyo ezosenga te bakota lopitalo.']

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Basi oyo bazali na zemi to bazali komelisa mwana mabele to bazali na bakisi ya malamu ya kopekisa zemi te bakoki kokota te.
translated: ['Basi oyo bazali na zemi to bazali komɛlisa bana mabɛlɛ to oyo bazali na mayele ya malamu te mpo na kopekisa zemi bakoki kozwa yango te.']

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Baanticoagulants mingi bazali kososola yango na ekzame na Italie.
translated: ['Ba anticoagulants mingi bazali komeka yango na Italie.']

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: Kilo ya molecule ya nse ezali kosalema mingi mpona kosalisa bato ya maladi, etindi Agence ya bakisi ya Italie ekoma batoli ya kosalela yango.
translated: ['Heparin ya kilo ya molecule moke bazali kosalela yango mingi mpona kosalisa bato ya maladi, yango etindi agence ya bakisi ya Italie ebimisa malako etali kosalela yango.']

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Etid na bato ya kobela 300 oyo bazalaki komona mosala ya enoxaparin sodium na prophylaxis mpe na dose na yango ebandaki na Italie na sanza ya minei mokolo ya 14.
translated: ['Bolukiluki moko ya centre mingi na bato ya maladi 300 oyo bazalaki kosala bolukiluki ya kosalela enoxaparin sodium na prophylaxis mpe dose ya therapeutique esakolamaki na Italie na mokolo ya 14 sanza ya minei.']

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Lekola SARS-CoV-2 ezali virisi, ezalii kososolama makasi mpo esalema lisusu, ezali bakisi oyo basalelaki ntango ya pandemi ya MERS, SARS na virisi ya West Nile.
translated: ['Lekola SARS-CoV-2 eza virisi, likebi mingi ya bato ya siansi batye likebi mingi na kopetola bakisi ya kobundisa virisi oyo endimamaki oyo esalemaki mpo na maladi oyo ebimaki liboso na ndakisa MERS, SARS, mpe virisi ya West Nile.']

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: ribavirin ezali malamu mpona COVID-19 nsima ya toli ya 7 ya Chine
translated: ['Ribavirin: Ribavirin ezalaki malamu mpo na kozwa nkisi ya COVID-19 na kolanda malako ya ebimeli ya 7 ya Chine']

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umefenovir: Umifenovir ezali malamu mpona COVID-19 nsima ya toli ya 7 ya Chine
translated: ['Umefenovir: umifenovir epesamaki toli mpona kosalisa COVID-19 na kolanda malako ya ebimeli ya 7 ya Chine']

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Bakisi misusu mpe emonani malamu mpona kosalisa COVID-19:
translated: ['Antibiotiques misusu oyo emonanaki ete ekoki kopetolama lisusu lokola nkisi ya COVID-19:']

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Endimami na Chine.
translated: ['Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Endimami na Chine.']

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Mpe komeka na Italie na Chine. Mpe mona Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
translated: ['Kosamba mpe na Italie mpe na Chine. mpe tala Tocilizumab#COVID-19.']

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Vaccin ya b’COVID-19 ezali ya solo te mpona virisi ya 2019 (COVID-19).
translated: ["Vaccin ya b'A ya COVID-19 eza vaccin ya hypothetical mpona maladi ya coronavirisi 2019 (COVID-19)."]

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Ata vaccin moko te eleki etap ya komeka, mosala mingi ezali kosalema mpona kosala vaccin oyo ekoleka.
translated: ['Ata soki vaccin moko te esilisi komeka ya cliniki, bameki mingi kokende liboso mpona kosala vaccin ya ndenge wana.']

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Na nsuka ya sanza ya mibale 2020, Organisation Mondial ya Sante (OMS) elobi bazalaki kozela vaccin ya SARS-CoV-2 te, virisi ya makambo, ezwama moke ya baposo 18.
translated: ['Na nsuka ya sanza ya mibale 2020, Organisation Mondial ya Sante (OMS) elobaki ete bakanisaki te vaccin ya SARS-CoV-2, virisi oyo epesaka makasi, ekozala na nse ya basanza 18.']

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: Bavaccin mitano bazalaki na phase I ya na sanza ya minei.
translated: ['Ba candidat mitano ya vaccin bazalaki na Phase I ya etid ya libateli na sanza ya minei.']

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 emonanaki na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019.
translated: ['COVID-19 emonanaki na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019.']

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Epanlanganaki makasi na mokili na 2020, esengaki mbongo mingi mpe baetid mpona kosala vaccin.
translated: ['Maladi moko ya monene epanzanaki na mokili mobimba na 2020, yango ememaki na kobimisa mbongo mingi mpe mosala ya bolukiluki mpo na kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Baorganisation mingi bazali kosalisa bagenome oyo babimisaki mpona koluka vaccin ya SARS-CoV-2.
translated: ['Baorganization mingi bazali kosalela ba genome oyo ebimaka mpona kosala bavaccin oyo ekoki kosalema mpo na SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Balokaki na sanza ya minei, makasi ya CEPI ya koluka vaccin ezali mbango na bango, makasi ya kosala yango na ndenge ya monene, ya kotambwisa yango bisika mingi, mpe mpona mokili ezwa yango.
translated: ['Elobami na sanza ya minei, imperatives ya ebongiseli CEPI mpona kosala vaccin eza vitese, makoki ya kosala biloko, kosalela yango na monene, mpe kozwa yango na mokili mobimba.']

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Na sanza ya minei, bayekoli ya science ya CEPI balobaki ete ba ndenge ya technology 10 ezali kosalema na etid na ebandeli ya 2020 mpona kosala vaccin ya makasi ya kobundela COVID-19.
translated: ['Na sanza ya minei, bayekoli ya science ya CEPI balobaki ete bisika 10 ekeseni ya teknolozi ezalaki na etid mpe bokolisi na ebandeli ya 2020 mpo na kosala vaccin ya malamu mpona COVID-19.']

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: Bisika mingi basibakomaki na phase I ya etid komona soki vaccin ezali malamu:
translated: ['Esika ya monene mikano ya liboso na Phase I ya bolukiluki ya libateli ezali:']

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: Acid ya nucleic (DNA na RNA) (Kobongisa ya phase I mpe candida ya vaccin: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
translated: ['Acid nucleiki (DNA na RNA) (Mobongisi ya Phase I mpe candida ya vaccin: Moderna, mRNA-1273)']

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: ba vector ya viral (Phase I ya etid mpe candida: Biologie ya CanSino, adenovirus ya ndenge ya bavectir 5)
translated: ['vector ya virisi (Phase I developer mpe candida ya vaccin: CanSino Biologics, adenovirusi ya lolenge ya vector 5)']

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Ndenge bayekoli ya science ya CEPI elobi na sanza ya minei, 115 ya bavaccin bazalaki na ebandeli ya kosalema na 78 endimamaki lekola baprojets (79, elobi Insitu ya Milken), mpe 37 misusu, kasi bato bayebi mingi te na makambo yango (ezali kobongisama to ezali kosalema).
translated: ['Ndenge bayekoli ya science ya CEPI balobi na sanza ya minei, bato 115 nyonso oyo bakoki kozwa mangwele baza na ebandeli ya bokoli, mpe 78 endimamaki lokola baprojets ya makasi (79, na kotalela Institut Milken), mpe 37 mosusu eyebisamaki, kasi eza na makambo mingi te ya bato nyonso (bakanisi ete ezali na kobongisa to kobongisa yango).']

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Na phase I-II ya komeka bamonaka soki kisi ezali malamu mpe basalaka baekzame ya immune, esalemaka na bato ba mponami te, ba placebo ya kolandela, mpe bisika mingi, mpe koyeba, dose nini.
translated: ['Phase I-II ya komeka esalaka baekzame ya liboso ya libateli mpe ya immunogenicity, ezalaka mingimingi ya randomisé, placebo ya kolandela, mpe na bisika mingi, mpe koyeba dose ya sikisiki, ya malamu.']

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Phase III ya komeka ezalaka na bato mingi mpe ekip ya kolandela yango, mpe baekzame ya komona soki kisi ezali kosimba na kopekisa maladi, nyonso na kolandela mosala ya dose oyo bapesi.
translated: ['Mbala mingi komeka ya Phase III esengaka bato mingi basangana, ata mpe etuluku ya kolandela, mpe kosala ekzame ya mangwele mpo na kokanga maladi nzela epanzana te, mpe kolandela makambo ya mabe na dose ya malamu.']

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Na bavaccin 79 oyo ezali kosalema uta ebandeli ya sanza ya minei 2020), 74 bakomaki na bato te (bazalaki kaka na komeka ya etid ya ‘clinic’).
translated: ['Na kati ya bato 79 oyo bakoki kozwa mangwele na bokoli ya makasi (endimamaki na ebandeli ya sanza ya minei 2020), 74 bazalaki naino te na botaleli ya bato (ezalaki kaka na bolukiluki ya "liboso ya kosalisa maladi").']

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Na Australie na mokolo ya 24 sanza ya liboso 2020, Universite ya Queensland elobaki ete ezali kososola soki molecule moko ya vaccin eko sala mosala na protein viral mpona kotumbola reaction ya immune.
translated: ['Pene ya mokolo ya 24 sanza ya liboso 2020 na Australie, Universite ya Queensland elobaki ete bazali koluka koyeba soki vaccin ya clamp ya bamolekile ekoki kosala oyo ekobongola ba gene ya baproteine ya virisi mpo na kolamusa reaction ya immune.']

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Na sanza ya liboso mokolo ya 24 2020 na Canada, Esika ya International ya Bavaccin (VIDO-InterVac) na universite ya Saskatchewan elobaki ete babandaki mosala ya koluka vaccin, bakoki kobanda komeka na bato na 2021.
translated: ['Pene ya mokolo ya 24 sanza ya liboso 2020 na Canada, Centre International ya Bavaccin (VIDO-InterVac) na universite ya Saskatchewan elobaki babandi mosala ya kosala vaccin, na mokano ya kobanda kosala ba ekzame ya bato na 2021.']

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Misala ya koluka vaccin ebandaki na Esika ya kolandela mpe kopekisa bamaladi na Chinese na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya liboso 2020, mpe na universite ya hong kong sanza ya liboso mokolo ya 28.
translated: ['Baprojets ya bokolisi vaccin esakolamaki na Esika ya Kolandela Maladi ya Chine na mokolo ya 26 sanza ya liboso 2020, mpe universite ya hong kong na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya liboso.']

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 29 sanza ya liboso 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, oyo mokonzi Hanneke Schuitemaker, balobaki ete babandaki mosala ya kosala vaccin.
translated: ['Pene ya mokolo ya 29 sanza ya liboso 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, oyo Hanneke Schuitemaker, balobaki ete babandaki mosala ya kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Janssen azali kosala vaccin ya komela na moninga na ye ya biotechnology, vaxart.
translated: ['Janssen azali kosala elongo vaccin ya komela na moninga na ye ya biotechnology, Vaxart.']

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya misato 2020, Emergent BioSolutions alobaki ye na moninga Vaxart bazali koluka vaccin.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 18 sanza ya misato 2020, Emergent BioSolutions elobaki boyokani ya kosala biloko na Vaxart mpo na kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 8 sanza ya mibale 2020, laboratoire ya OncoGen na Romanie bakomaki manuskri na ndenge ya vaccin na technology moko oyo ezali kosalema mpona vaccin mpe kisi mpona cancer.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 8 sanza ya mibale 2020, laboratoire OncoGen na Roumanie ebimisaki mokanda moko elobelaki ndenge ya kosala vaccin na mayele ya ndenge moko na oyo basalelaki mpo na kobikisa cancer neoantigen.']

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 25 sanza ya misato mokonzi na institu ya etid alobaki basilisaki synthese babandaki na ekzame.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 25 sanza ya misato, mokambi ya institut ya bolukiluki alobaki ete basilisaki synthese ya vaccin mpe babandaki ba ekzame.']

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya mibale 2020, Companie moko ya moke ya Generex, NuGenerex Immuni-Ongologie, balobaki bazali kobanda projet ya vaccin kosala li-key peptide ya vaccin mpona COVID-19.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 27 sanza ya mibale 2020, kompani moko ya Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, balobaki babandi projet ya vaccin mpona kosala vaccin ya Ii-Key peptide mpona kobundisa COVID-19.']

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Balingaki basala candida ya vaccin oyo bakokaki komeka n abato’’na mikolo 90’’.
translated: ['Balingaki kobimisa candida ya vaccin oyo bakoki komeka na bato "na mikolo 90."']

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya misato 2020, universite ya Washington na St Louis balobaki babandaki mosala ya koluka vaccin.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya misato 2020, universite ya Washington na St Louis eyebisaki misala na yango ya kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya misato 2020, Etid ya limpimgo mpona kolongono na Etats Unis mpe Materiel Command na Fort Detrick mpe Institu ya limpimgo ya Walter Reed, nyonso mibale na oust ya Maryland, balobaki bazali kosala vaccin.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 5 sanza ya misato 2020, Etats-Unis Army Medical Research and Materiel Command na Fort Detrick mpe na Walter Reed Army Institute of Research na Silver Spring, nyonso mibale na weste ya Maryland, balobaki bazali kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: Na 10 sanza ya misato 2020, Emergent Biosolutions elobaki kakomi kosala na Novavax Inc.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 10 sanza ya misato 2020, Emergent Biosolutions elobaki ete esanganaki na Novavax Inc.']

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: Na koluka mpe kosala vaccin.
translated: ['Kosala mpe kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Balobaki mpe bakobanda baekzame ya clinic mpe phase I ya komeka ya clinic na sanza ya nsambo 2020.
translated: ['Baninga balobaki lisusu ete bazosala ba ekzame ya liboso ya clinic mpe Phase I ya komeka na sanza ya nsambo 2020.']

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato 2020, Minister ya kolongono na Inde balobaki bazali kosala mosala na 11 ya mopanzi, mpe ata soki bazalaki kokende noki ekozwa bango moko na ndambo to bambula mibale mpona kosala vaccin.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato 2020, ministere ya santé ya Inde elobaki bazali kosala na ba isolate 11, mpe ata na nzela ya noki ekozwa ata pene ya mbula moko na ndambo to mibale mpona kosala vaccin.']

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato 2020, Medicago, companie ya biotechnology na egumba ya Quebec, Quebec balobaki bazali kosala particle moko oyo ezali lekola ya coronavirisi na mbongo ndambo euti Institu ya Canada mpona etid ya kolongono.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 12 sanza ya misato 2020, Medicago, companie ya biotechnology na egumba ya Quebec, na Québec, balobaki ete basalaki particule moko oyo ekokani na coronavirisi na nse ya mwa mosolo euti na ba Institut ya Canada mpo na bolukiluki ya kolongono ya nzoto.']

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Vaccin ezali na etid ya laboratoire, bako banda komeka na bato na sanza ya nsambo to mwambe 2020.
translated: ['Candida ya vaccin azali na etid ya laboratoire, ba ekzame ya bato ebongisami na sanza ya nsambo to ya mwambe 2020.']

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Na ebandeli ya poso oyo, Guardian ereportaki ete Mokambi ya Etats Unis Donald Trump apesaki ‘CureVac’ mbongo ebele mpona kozwa vaccin ya COVID-19’’ gouvernema ya Germani atelemaki yango.
translated: ['Na ebandeli ya poso wana, The Guardian elobaki ete Prezida ya Etats-Unis Donald Trump apesaki CureVac "\'mbongo ebele\' mpo na kozwa kaka vaccin ya Covid-19", oyo guvernema ya Allemagne esalaki ntembe.']

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato 2020, companie ya bakisi ya Amerik Pfizer elobaki bazali kosangana na company na Germany babengi BioNTech mpona kosala vaccin oyo euti na mRNA.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato 2020, companie ya bakisi ya Amerika Pfizer elobaki bazosala boyokani na kompani ya Allemagne BioNTech mpo na kosala elongo vaccin oyo euti na mRNA.']

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: BNT162 candida ya vaccin oyo euti na mRNA, ezali na ekzame ya clinic eoyo ekobanda sanza ya minei 2020.
translated: ['Candida ya vaccin oyo euti na mRNA BNT162, sikoyo na ekzame ya liboso ya clinic na komeka ya cliniki ekobanda na sanza ya minei 2020.']

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Na Italie na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato 2020, Takis Biotech, companie ya biotech ya Italie balobaki bakozala na baresulta ya ekzame ya liboso ya clinic na sanza ya minei 2020 mpe vaccin na bango ya suka ekoki komekama na bato na ntango ya moyi.
translated: ['Na Italie na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya misato 2020, Takis Biotech, companie ya biotech ya Italie elobaki bakozala na ba resultat ya ekzame ya liboso ya clinic na sanza ya minei 2020 mpe candidat na bango ya suka ya vaccin ekoki kobanda ba ekzame ya bato na otomne.']

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: Na France na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato 2020, Coalition ya kobongama mpona epidemic mpe innovation (CEPI) elobaki bazali na US$4.9 milion na etid ya ekip ya vaccin ya COVID-19 na Insitu Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), mpe universite ya pittsburgh, oyo ememi mbongo nyonso ya CEPI mpona COVID-19 na US$29 milio.
translated: ['Na France na mokolo ya 19 sanza ya misato 2020, Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) elobaki ete bazali na US$4.9 milio na consortium ya etid ya vaccin ya COVID-19 oyo ezalaki na Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), mpe universite ya pittsburgh, yango epesi CEPI mbongo nyonso mpo na kosala vaccin ya COVID-19 na US$29 milio.']

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Bato misusu na ekipi ya CEPI mpona vaccin ya COVID-19 ezali Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Universite ya hong kong, universite ya Oxford, mpe universite ya Queensland.
translated: ['Baninga mosusu ya CEPI oyo basalaka na yango mbongo mpo na kosala vaccin ya COVID-19 ezali Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, universite ya Hong Kong, universite ya Oxford, mpe universite ya Queensland.']

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato 2020, bato ya kolongono ya Russie balobaki ete bayekoli ya science babandaki komeka bavaccin motoba na banyama.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato 2020, bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Russie balobaki ete bato ya siansi babandi komeka banyama na bato motoba bakeseni oyo bakoki kozwa vaccin.']

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: College Imperial ya bato ya etid ya Londres balobaki ete mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato 2020 bako banda kosala vaccin ya RNA mpona COVID-19.
translated: ['College Imperial ya bato ya etid ya Londres balobaki na mokolo ya 20 sanza ya misato 2020 ete bazali kosala vaccin ya ARN oyo ekomisi yango moko makasi mpona COVID-19.']

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Candida ya vaccin esalemaki na mikolo 14 nsima ya kozwa toli epayi ya Chine.
translated: ['Candida ya vaccin esalemaki na mikolo 14 nsima ya kozwa sequence na Chine.']

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Na nsuka ya sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Canada elobali mbongo C$275 milio mpona ba etid 96 mpona etumba ya COVID-19, mpe bacandida ya bavaccin mingi na bacompanie mpe bauniversite ya Canada, lekola na Medicago mpe mosala na universite ya Saskatchewan.
translated: ['Na nsuka ya sanza ya misato, gouvernema ya Canada elobaki ete mosolo C$275 milio mpona baprojet 96 ya bolukiluki na oyo etali kobundisa maladi ya COVID-19, mpe bato mingi oyo bakoki kozwa mangwele na bakompani mpe ba iniversite ya Canada, na ndakisa bibongiseli ya Medicago mpe ya Université ya Saskatchewan.']

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Na ngambo ya ntango moko, loyalo ya ekolo Canada esakolaki ba millon ya dollar C$192 ezalaki mingi-mingi mpo na kokolisa vaccin ya COVID-19, na likanisi babongisa “banki ya vaccin” ya ekolo mpó na ba vaccin ebele ya sika eko kosalamela soki pasi mosusu ya coronavirusi eyei.
translated: ['Na ngambo ya ntango wana, gouvernema ya Canada elobaki ete C$192 milio mpenzampenza mpo na kosala vaccin ya COVID-19, na likanisi ya kosala "banque ya vaccin" ya ekolo mobimba ya bavaccin mingi ya sika oyo ekoki kosalelama soki coronavirisi mosusu ebimi.']

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Na 2 Avril 2020, bakundoli ya Sikola ya Medicine ya Université ya Pittsburgh bapesaki lapolo ya tesite ya PittCoVacc, mutu eko kozala vaccin ya COVID-19 na bampuku, balobaki ete "MNA ebimisaki SRAS-CoV-2 S1 sous-unité ya vaccin emonanaki lokola antigene-specifiki ya ba anticorps ya makasi na biyano [na bampuku] ezalaki yasolo baposo 2 sima ya botie mangwele."
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 2 sanza ya minei 2020, bakundoli ya Sikola ya Medicine ya Université ya Pittsburgh balobaki ete basalaki ekzame ya PittCoVacc, ekoki kozala vaccin ya COVID-19 na bampuku, balobaki ete "MNA epesaki SRAS-CoV-2 S1 mangwele ya moke ebimisaki biyano ya makasi ya anticorps ya antigene-specifiki [na bampuku] oyo emonanaki kobanda mposo 2 nsima ya kozwa mangwele."']

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Na Canada na16 Avril 2020, Sikola ya Pharmacie ya Université ya Waterloo esakolaki bobongisi ya vaccin likolo ya DNA ezwama lokola kisi ya kopompé na zolo.
translated: ['Na Canada na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya minei 2020, Eteyelo ya Pharmacie ya Université ya Waterloo elobaki ete bazosala candida ya vaccin oyo euti na DNA lokola mbala mosusu nkisi ya kopola na zolo.']

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Na bosaleli ya balei ya baniama, DNA ekobongisama mpóna korepliqué kati ya baniama ya bato mpo ebota ba ndambo mike-mike ya ba virusi ebelisaka te, mutu eko koimité systemi immune mpo ebota ba anticorps ebundisa virusii ya SRAS-CoV-2
translated: ['Na bosaleli ya bacteriophage, DNA ekosalema mpona kosala replica na kati ya mikrobe ya bato mpo na kobimisa biloko mikemike oyo ekokani na virisi mabe, oyo ekoki kopusa systemi immune mpo ebota ba anticorps oyo ebundisaka virisi SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
