targetString: Na Mars 2020, loyalo ya E.U., industrie, pe ba université misatu batiaki ba resource esika moko mpo bakota na baordinateur super ya IBM, basangisa na misala ya ordinateur nuage ya Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, na Google.
translated: ['Na sanza ya misato 2020, gouvernema ya Etats-Unis, industrie, mpe ba iniversite misato basangisaki biloko mpo na kokota na baordinatere ya minene na IBM, elongo na biloko ya ordinatere cloud oyo euti na Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, mpe Google.']

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Ba vaccin mosusu ezali na ba effet heterologue, óyo ebengamaka lisúsu ba effet non-specifiki.
translated: ['Ba vaccin misusu eza na ba effet heterologous, oyo babengaka pe ba effet non-specifiki.']

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Yangó elingi koloba bakoki kozala na babenefice sima ya bokono bazo pekisa.
translated: ['Yango elimboli ete bakoki kozala na matomba oyo eleki maladi oyo bango bapekisaki.']

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Bomeki lisúsu ya libaku na ekolo ya Australie ezo luka ekomisa basali ya sante 4,170.
translated: ['Komeka mosusu ya randomisé na Australie ezali koluka kokomisa basali ya sante 4 170.']

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Ekokí kozala ete ba vaccin bazo lengela ekozala malamu te basalela na kimia pe lolenge elongobani.
translated: ['Ekoki kozala ete mangwele oyo ezali kosalema ekozala malamu te to ekosalisa te.']

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Likundoli ya yambo mpóna koevalué ba vaccin lolenge ebongi na bosaleli ya COVID-19-specifiki ya modeli ya bibwele, lokola mpuku ya ACE2-transgeniki, bibwele mosusu ya laboratoire, na ba primate ya makako, ezo lakisa mosapi na kimia ya bamesure ya niveau 3 ya confinement mpóna komanipulé ba virusi ya bomoi, pe boyokani ya bato ya mikili mpóna bosaleli ya banzéla standarde ya kimia.
translated: ['Bolukiluki ya liboso mpo na koyeba soki vaccin ezali makasi na kosalela COVID-19-specifiki ya modeli ya banyama, ndakisa mpuku ya ACE2-transgeniki, banyama mosusu ya laboratoire, mpe baprimate oyo eza ya bato te, emonisi ete esengeli kozala na bamekeli ya nivo 3 ya kokanga nzela mpo na kobundisa bavirisi ya bomoi, mpe boyokani ya mikili mingi mpo na kosala makambo ya libateli ndenge moko.']

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Ba vaccin ya tembe na SRAS pe MERS esi esalami momekano na bamodeli ya bato te.
translated: ['Ba vaccin ya tembe na SRAS na MERS basi basali ekzame na bamodele oyo eza ya banyama te.']

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Tii na mobu 2020, kisi to vaccin eza kaka te mpo esilisa to epekisa SARS pe epesama na kimia pe bolongi na nzoto ya bato.
translated: ['Na 2020, kisi to vaccin ya kobatela ezali te mpo na SARS oyo emonani ete ezali malamu mpe ezali makasi na nzoto ya bato.']

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Na bolandi ya bapapela ya bokundoli ebimaki na mibu 2005 pe 2006, boyebeli na bokolisi ya ba vaccin ya sika pe bakisi mpóna kosilisa bokono ya SARS ezalaki priorité mpóna ba loyalo na ba agence ya sante ya bato na mokili mobimba. Lisúsu vaccin ya bondimi mpóna MERS.pe ezali te
translated: ['Na kotalela mikanda ya bolukiluki oyo babimisaki na 2005 mpe 2006, koyeba mpe kosala mangwele ya sika mpe bankisi mpo na kosalisa SARS ezalaki likambo ya liboso mpo na baguvernema mpe bibongiseli ya kolongono ya nzoto na mokili mobimba. Ezali pe na vaccin moko te emonani mpóna MERS.']

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Ntángo MERS engindaki, ezalaki kondimama ete bokundoli ya SRAS óyo esi esalamaki eko kopesa template ya ntina mpóna bokolisi ba vaccin na therapi ya tembe na infection ya MERS-CoV
translated: ['Ntango MERS ekomaki mingi, bazalaki kokanisa ete bolukiluki ya SARS oyo ezalaki ekoki kopesa template ya ntina ya kosala bavaccin mpe therapi na maladi ya MERS-CoV.']

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Tii Mars2020, vaccin moko ya MERS (esalamaki likolo ya DNA) mutu esukisaki etapi I ya mimekano ya cliniki ya bato, pe misato mosusu ezalaki na nzela, nionso ya bango eza bavaccins a virusi vectoré, mibale ya adenoviral-vectoré (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), na moko MVA-vectoré (MVA-MERS-S).
translated: ['Na Mars 2020, ezalaki na vaccin moko (DNA based) MERS oyo esilisaki phase I ya komeka ya cliniki na bato, mpe misato mosusu ezali kosalema, nyonso eza bavaccin ya virisi, mibale ya adenoviral-vectoré (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), mpe moko MVA-vectoré (MVA-MERS-S).']

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Ba affiche ya media sociale esi etomboli likanisi ya complot ezo loba ete virusi etindiki COVID-19 eyebanaki pe vaccin esi esalama mpóna yango.
translated: ['Makambo bakomi na basite ya social etomboli likanisi moko ya mayele mabe oyo elobi ete virisi oyo ezalaki nsima ya COVID-19 eyebanaki mpe ete vaccin moko esi ebimaki.']

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Ba patente ba affiche ya media sociale ya lolenge bazali kocité ezali referé na ba patente ya kala mpóna ba sequence genetiki pe ba vaccin mpo na lolenge mosusu ya coronavirusi lokola coronavirusi ya SRAS.
translated: ['Ba brevet elobelami na ba post ndenge na ndenge ya social media elobeli ba patente oyo esi ezali mpo na ba sequence genetiki mpe ba vaccin mpo na lolenge mosusu ya coronavirisi lekola coronavirusi ya SRAS.']

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Mabela ya b'Coronavirusi ya 2019 (COVID-19) ezali pasi ya infection ya mabela ebendami na coronavirusi 2 ya syndrome ya songe ya bopemi (SRAS-CoV-2).
translated: ["b'Bokono ya b'Coronavirusi 2019 (COVID-19) ezali pasi ya infection ya palapalais ebendami na coronavirusi 2 ya syndrome ya songe ya pema (SRAS-CoV-2)."]

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Ba symptome ya ba tango mingi etie nakati fievre, kosukosu, na pema bokuse.
translated: ['Bilembo oyo emonanaka mingi eza fievre, kosukosu, mpe mpema mokuse.']

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Ba symptome mosusu eko kotía nakati kolemba, misuni pasi, pulu-pulu, mongongo pasi, koyóka solo, libumu pasi.
translated: ['Bilembo mosusu ekoki kozala kolɛmba, misisa mpasi, pulupulu, mongongo mpasi, koyoka nsolo te mpe mpasi na libumu.']

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Bandá bozwi ti bobandi ya basymptome eza ngambo ya mikolo mitano kasi eko komata mikolo mibale ti zomi na minei.
translated: ['Ntango banda na komona bilembo kino bobimi ya basymptomi ezalaka mingimingi pene ya mikolo mitano kasi ekoki kozala mikolo mibale kino zomi na minei.']

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Ba cas mingi ezalaka nango na basymptome ya pete, kasi mosusu esukaka na panzi mabe pe kopola ya ba organe.
translated: ['Ata soki bato mingi oyo bazobela yango ebimisaka bilembo ya pete, bokoli mosusu euti na pneumonia ya virisi mpe kobeba ya binama mingi.']

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Na 17 Avril 2020, koleka ba million 2.24 ya ba cas esi epesami lapolo na bikólo pe bingunda 210, mutu esúkeli na liwâ ya bato koleka 153,000.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya minei 2020, koleka bamilio 2,24 ya bato ya maladi bazwaki yango na mikili mpe bateritware 210, yango esalaki ete bato koleka 153,000 bakufa.']

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Koleka lotango ya bato 568,000 bazongi konungonu. yango virusi mingi-mingi epalanganaka kati ya bato baza na ngambo, mingi-mingi na biteni mike-mike ya nsoi ebimaka na kokosola, kosala kesia to koloba.
translated: ['Bato koleka 568 000 babiki. Virisi epanzanaka libosoliboso na kati ya bato ntango bazali pene na bango, mbala mingi na nzela ya matanga ya mike oyo ebimaka na kokosola, kosala itche, to koloba.']

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Biténi ya nsoi yango ebimaka pe tángo ya kopema, kasi mingi-mingi ekwéyaka na mabelé to esika ya ngambo ezalaka na infection ya bobwakami mosika te.
translated: ['Ata soki matanga yango ebimaka ntango ezali kopema, mbala mingi ekitaka na mabele to na bisika na esika ya kozala na maladi na ntaka molai.']

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Bato pe bako kokoma na infection soki bazali kosimba bisika eza contaminé pe sima basimbi miso, zolo, to monoko na bango.
translated: ['Bato bakoki mpe kozwa maladi soki basimbi esika oyo ezali na mikrobe mpe na nsima basimbi miso, zolo, to monɔkɔ na bango.']

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: virusii eko kozala ya bomoi na esika tii bangonga 72.
translated: ['Virisi yango ekoki kobika na bisika kino na bangonga 72.']

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Ezalaka na motungisi makasi mikolo misato ya yambo ya ebandeli ya basymtome, kasi bopalangani eko kozala nango liboso basymtome emonana pe na ntango ya sima ya maladi. Methode standarde ya diagnostiki eza na reaction na chaine ya bozongi sima na temps reel ya bokomi ya polymerase (rRT-PCR) na swabi sima ya zolo.
translated: ['Epanzanaka mingi na boumeli ya mikolo misato ya liboso nsima ya ebandeli ya basymptomi, atako kopalangana ekoki kosalema liboso ete bilembo emonana mpe na bileko ya nsima ya maladi. Methode standarde ya diagnostiki eza na reaction ya chaine ya transcription ya reverse ya transcription ya reaction (rRT-PCR) oyo euti na swabe ya zolo.']

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Bosáleli ya masike na elongi etindami mpóna bato bazo kanisela bango baza na virusi pe bakengeli na bango.
translated: ['Kosalela bamask ezali malamu mpona bato oyo bakanisi baza na virisi mpe bato oyo basalisaka bango.']

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Etindi ya bosaleli ya masike na bato banso na publiki ekesani, na ntina ete bakonzi mosusu bazo boya basalela yango, basusu bazo tinda yango, pe basusu bazo loba esengeli basalela yango.
translated: ['Batoli mpo na kosalela bamask na bato nyonso ekeseni, bakonzi mosusu bazolendisa koboya kosalela yango, basusu bazolendisa kosalela yango, mosusu bazolendisa kosalela yango, mpe mosusu ezosenga basalela yango.']

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Mikolo ya lelo, vaccin to kisi ya kobelesa COVID-19 ezali te.
translated: ['Sikoyo, vaccin to kisi ya sikisiki ya virisi ezali te mpo na COVID-19.']

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Bokaboli ya esika moko ya maladi esi ekomami na ebele ya bikolo na bingunda nyónso motóba ya OMS.
translated: ['Kopesana ya maladi na esika moko ekomami na mikili mingi na bituka nyonso motoba ya OMS.']

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Bato bazwi infection ya virusi bakoki kozala asymptomatiki to bako kokolisa basymtome ekokani na óyo ya grippe, ndakisa fievre, kosu-kosu, kolemba, pema mokuse.
translated: ['Ba oyo bazwi infection ya virusi bakoki kozala asymptomatiki to bako kokoma na bilembo ekokani na grippe lokola fievre, kosukosu, kolemba, pe kopema mokuse.']

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Ba symptome ya bombango etie nakati kopema na pasi, pasi ezo sila te kati ya tolo to pression, kobunga makanisi, kolamoka na pasi, pe elongi to mbebo ekomi bule; kenge ya monganga noki eluki botosi soki basymptome ya boye eza.
translated: ['Bilembo ya mbalakaka ezali mpasi ya kopema, mpasi na ntolo oyo esilaka te to pression, mobulungano, mpasi ya kolamuka, mpe elongi to mbɛbu; Likebi ya noki ya monganga epesami toli soki basymptomi oyo ezali.']

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Bambala mike, basymptome ya pema ya likolo lokola ba kesia, kotanga zolo to pasi na mongongo eko kozala.
translated: ['Mbala mingi, bilembo ya kopema ya likolo lokola kosala itche, kotanga zolo to mpasi na mongongo ekoki komonana.']

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Ba symptome gastrointestinale lokola posa ya kosanza, kosanza pe pulu-pulu esi emonani na porcentage ekesani.
translated: ['Bilembo ya gastrointestinale lokola mposa ya kosanza, kosanza mpe pulupulu emonanaki na pourcentage ekeseni.']

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Ba cas mosusu na Chine na ebandeli elakisaki kaka tolo kokanga pe motema kobeta.
translated: ['Ba cas misusu na Chine na ebandeli bamonisaki yango kaka na tolo kokanga pe kobeta ya motema.']

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Na bato mosusu, kobéla eko kokoma pasi ya panzi, ba organe ebele eko kopola, pe liwa.
translated: ['Na basusu, maladie eko kokoma pasi ya pneumonia, ba organe ebele eko kobeba, pe liwa.']

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: óyo ebengamaka ntango ya incubation.
translated: ['Yango nde babengaka ntango ya incubation.']

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Ntngo ya incubation mpóna COVID-19 eza mingi-mingi mikolo mitano ti motoba kasi range mikolo mibale ti 14.
translated: ['Eleko oyo maladi ya COVID-19 esalaka mpo emonana eza mingi-mingi mikolo mitano to motoba kasi ekoki kozala mikolo mibale ti 14.']

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: 97.5% ya bato bazwaka basymtome bamonaka yango kati ya mikolo 11.5 ya bozwi infection. Ba lapolo elakisi bato banso ya infection te babimaka basymtome.
translated: ['97,5% ya bato oyo bakozua basymptomi bakosala yango na mikolo 11,5 banda bazozwa yango. Barapore emonisi ete bato nyonso te oyo bazali na maladi yango bakómaka na basymptomi.']

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Ntína ya bamemi asymptomatiki yango na bokaboli naino eyebani mobimba penza te; kasi nde bilembo ya ebandeli ekaniseli ete baza na mosala na bopanzi kobéla.
translated: ['Mosala ya biloko oyo ememaka maladi asymptomatiki na kopesama eyebani naino mpenza te; Kasi, bilembeteli ya ebandeli emonisi ete ekoki kosala ete maladi yango epalangana.']

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Ndámbo ya lotango ya bato ya infection baye balakisaka basymptome te sik’oyo eyebani te pe ezo yekolama, na bacentre ya Korea mpóna Controle pe bopekisi ya Makono (KCDC) epesi lapolo ete 20% ya bacas nyónso baconfirmaki eza kaka asymptomatiki na bofandi na lopitalo.
translated: ['Motango ya bato oyo baza na maladi oyo bamonisaka bilembo te eyebani te sikoyo mpe bayekolaka yango, mpe bacentre ya Korea mpo na kobundisa maladi mpe kopekisa yango (KCDC) elobi ete 20% ya bato nyonso oyo bazalaki na maladi yango bazalaki kaka na bilembo te ntango bazalaki na lopitalo.']

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Comission Nationale ya Santé ya Chine esi ebandi kotia nakati bacas asymptomatiki na bacas ya moko-na-mokolo na 1 April; na 166 ya bakwoso nyónso ya mokolo wana, 130 (78%) ezalaki asymptomatiki na ntango ya tesite.
translated: ['Commission Nationale ya Sante ya Chine ebandaki ata mpe bato oyo bazalaki na basymptomi te na bato na yango ya mokolo na mokolo na mokolo na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya minei; Na kati ya bato 166 oyo bazwaki maladi na mokolo wana, 130 (78%) bazalaki na bilembo te na ntango ya kosala ekzame.']

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Milelu na nsoi eko kozala na kilo monene ya virusi.
translated: ['Soputum na nsoi ekoki komema bakilo ya minene ya virisi.']

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Koloba ya makasi elekaka matanga mingi na koloba ya normale.
translated: ['Koloba na mongongo makasi ebimisaka matanga mingi koleka masolo ya normal.']

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Liyekoli moko ya Singapore emoni ete kosu-kosu ezangi bozipi eko komema matanga na 4.5 metres (15 pied).
translated: ['Bolukiluki moko na Singapour emonaki ete kosukosu oyo ezipamaki te ekoki kosala ete matanga etambola na 4,5 metres (15 pied).']

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Atako virusi yango mingi-mingi ebotamaka nango na mopepe te, Academy National ya Science elobi bokabli na bioaerosol nde eko kosalama pe bikongoli ya mopepe na bacoridore libanda ya masuku ya bato epesi ba echantillon ya positife mpóna virusi RNA.
translated: ['Ata soki virisi yango ebotamaka mingi te na mopepe, Academy National ya Science elobi ete kopesama na bioaerosol ekoki kosalema mpe bato oyo bakɔngɔlaka mopepe oyo batyaka na kulware libanda ya bashambre ya bato bapesaki ba echantillon ya maladi ya virisi RNA.']

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Ba operation ya monganga mosusu lokola kotia tiyo na kati pe Resisitasio Cardiopulmonaire(CPR) ekoki kosala ete matanga ya kopema ekota na mopepe bongo kopanzana na mopepe.
translated: ['Misala mosusu ya monganga na ndakisa kotia tiyo na kati mpe resuscitation cardiopulmonary (CPR) ekoki kosala ete biloko oyo ebimaka na mpema ebebaka mpe yango wana esalaka ete mopepe epanzana.']

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Souci eza ete eko kopalangana na niei, likama yango ezo ndimama na niveau yase. virusii ezalaka makasi mingi na bokabwani soki bato baza symptomatiki; ta ko bopalangani eko kosalama liboso basymptome ebima, likama eza nase.
translated: ['Ata eza na mitungisi oyo ekoki kopanzana na nzela ya nyei, bakanisi ete likama wana eza moke. Virisi epanzanaka mingi soki bato baza na bilembo ya maladi; Ata kopalangana ekoki kozala liboso bilembo ya maladi ebima, kasi likama eza moke.']

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Centre ya Europa mpóna Controle pe Bopekisi ya Maladie (ECDC) elobi ta ko eyebani penza na moi te ndenge nini eza pasi te maladi epalangana, moto moko mingi-mingi apesaka kpokoso na bato mibale to misato mosusu. virusii ekoki kowumela ba ngonga molai na likolo ya biloko.
translated: ['Esika ya Eropa mpo na kopekisa maladi mpe kobundisa yango (ECDC) elobi atako eyebani mpenza te ndenge maladi epanzanaka noki, mbala mingi moto moko azwaka bato mosusu mibale to misato. Virisi ebikaka na boumeli ya bangonga mingi to mikolo na bisika.']

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Na specifiki, virusi emonanaki kowumela likolo ya carton mokolo mobimba, tii mokolo misato na plastiki (polypropylene) pe ebendé ezanga rouille (AISI 304), pe tii bangonga minei na 99% ya cuivre.
translated: ['Na specifiki, emonanaki ete virisi ekoki komonana mpona mokolo moko na carton, tii mikolo misato na plastik (polypropylene) mpe na ebende ya koguga te (AISI 304), mpe tii na bangonga minei na 99% ya cuivre.']

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Kasi, yango nde ekesanaka na botali humidité pe température.
translated: ['Kasi, yango ekeseni na kotalela ndenge malili ezalaka mpe molunge makasi.']

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Savo pe detergent ezalaka pe makasi soki esalameli lolenge elongobani; ba produit ya savo ekataka poso ya mafúta ebatelaka virusi, elongolaka bango, elongo na kolongola yango na poso to bisika mosusu.
translated: ['Sabuni mpe sabuni ya kosukola ezalaka mpe malamu soki basaleli yango malamu; Biloko ya sabuni elongolaka lokumu ya kobatela ya virisi, elongolaka yango na mosala, mpe kosikola yango na loposo mpe na bisika mosusu.']

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Basolution mosusu, lokola chloride ya benzalkonium pe gluconate ya chlorhexidine (desinfectant ya chirurgie), eza pete. Na boyekoli ya Hong Kong, ba echantillon ya nsoi bakongolaki kati ya mikolo mibale sima ya bokoti lopitalo.
translated: ['Mayele mosusu, na ndakisa benzalkonium chloride mpe chlorhexidine gluconate (nkisi ya koboma mikrobe na lipaso), esalisaka mingi te. Na bolukiluki moko ya Hong Kong, bazwaki ba echantillon ya nsoi na kati ya mikolo mibale nsima ya kobanda kokota lopitalo.']

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Na mitano ya babeli motoba, echantillon ya liboso elakisi kilo ya virusi emata na nsuka, ebongo mobeli ya motoba azalaki na kilo ya virusi emata mokolo ya mibale ya tesite.
translated: ['Na bato mitano na kati ya bato motoba ya maladi, echantillon ya liboso emonisaki kilo ya virisi oyo eleki mingi, mpe moto ya motoba ya maladi amonisaki kilo ya virisi mingi na mokolo ya mibale oyo basalaki ekzame.']

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Syndrome ya pasi mingi ya pema ya coronavirusi 2 (SRAS-CoV-2) eza coronavirusi ya sika ya pasi makasi ya syndrome ya kopema, elongolamaki mbala liboso na bato misato babelaki panzi ekangana na bato ya pasi makasi ya pema na Wuhan.
translated: ['Syndrome ya pasi makasi ya pema ya coronavirusi 2 (SRAS-CoV-2) eza coronavirusi ya sika ya pasi makasi ya syndrome ya kopema, elongolamaki liboso na bato misato oyo bazalaki na pneumonia ekangani na liboke ya bato ya maladi makasi ya mpema na Wuhan.']

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Bikilakila nionso ya virusi ya sika SRAS-CoV-2 ezalaka na bacoronavirusi ekangana na mokili.
translated: ['Makambo nyonso ya virisi SARS-CoV-2 ya sika emonanaka na bacoronavirusi ekangani na bozalisi.']

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Libanda ya nzoto ya moto, virusi ebomamaka na savon ya ndáko, mutu epasolaka boule ebatelaka yango. SRAS-CoV-2 ekangani mingi na SRAS-CoV ya ebandeli.
translated: ['Na libanda ya nzoto ya moto, virisi yango ekufaka na sabuni ya ndako, oyo epasukisaka fulufulu na yango oyo ebatelaka yango. SARS-CoV-2 ekokani mpenza na SARS-CoV ya ebandeli.']

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Mipululu mizali ba organe ezwaka mingi kpokoso ewutaka na COVID-19 mpo virusi ekotaka na cellula eyambaka ye na nzela ya enzyme angiotensin-convertisant enzyme 2 (ACE2), mutu ezali mingi na bacellula alveole type II ya mampulu.
translated: ['Mimpululu eza binama oyo enyokwamaka mingi na COVID-19 mpo virisi ekotaka na baselile oyo ebombaka yango na nzela ya enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), oyo ezalaka mingi na bacellula alveole type II ya mimpulupulu.']

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: virusi esalelaka surface speciale ya glycoproteine ebengamaka "spike" (peplomer) mpóna kokanga yango na ACE2 pe ekota na cellula moyambi.
translated: ['virusi esalelaka surface speciale ya glycoproteine oyo babengaka "spike" (peplomer) mpóna kokangama na ACE2 pe kokota na cellule moyambi.']

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Bozoki ya grave ya motema emonanaki na 12% ya bato ya kpokoso bakotisamaki na lopitalo na Wuhan, Chine, pe ezalaka mingi na maladi ya pasi makasi.
translated: ['Bozoki ya motema ya makasi emonanaki na 12% ya bato oyo bazalaki na maladi bakotaki na lopitalo na Wuhan, na Chine, mpe mbala mingi baza na maladi ya makasi.']

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Taux ya basymtome cardiovasculaire emata, eza mpóna reaction ya inflamation systemiki na pasi ya systemi immune ntango kobéla ezo kola, kasi bozoki ya songe ya myocardiaki eko pe kokangana na ba recepteur ya ACE2 na motema.
translated: ['Taux ya bilembo ya motema eza mingi, mpo na reaction ya inflammatoire systemiki mpe maladi ya systeme immune na ntango ya bokoli, kasi bozoki ya songe ya myocardial ekoki mpe kozala na boyokani na ba recepteur ya ACE2 na motema.']

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Ba recepteur ya ACE2 emonanaka mingi na motema pe esalisaka na bosali ya motema.
translated: ['Ba recepteur ya ACE2 emonanaka mingi na motema mpe esalaka mosala ya motema.']

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Incidence ebuta ya thrombose (31%) pe thromboembolisme ya ba misisa monene (25%) emonani na ba malade ya USI baza na kpokoso ya COVID-19 pe eko kozala na bokangani na prognostiki ya bopoto. Mapasoli ma bakufa ya COVID-19 elakisi mbeba ya alveole diffuse(AAD), pe lymphocyte-eza na infiltrate inflammatoire nakati ya poumon.
translated: ['Thrombose ya mingi (31%) mpe thromboembolisme ya ngɛngɛ (25%) emonanaki na bato oyo bazobela ICU oyo bazalaki na maladi ya COVID-19 mpe mbala mosusu euti na pronostique ya mabe. Autopsies ya bato oyo bakufaki na COVID-19 bamonaki mbeba ya alveole diffuse (DAD), mpe inflammatoire oyo ezalaka na lymphocyte oyo ezalaka na kati ya poumon.']

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: Ata ko SRAS-COV-2 eza na tropisme mpóna ACE2-expressing epithelial cells ya nzela ya kopemela, babeli ya COVID-19 ya makasi bazalaka na basymptome ya hyperinflammation systemiki.
translated: ['Ata soki SARS-COV-2 eza na tropisme mpo na ACE2-expressing epithelial cells ya nzela ya kopema, bato oyo bazobela COVID-19 ya makasi baza na bilembo ya hyperinflammation systemiki.']

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Na ebatiseli, na bacellula T ya GM-CSF-ebimisaka bapathogene elakisamaki ete ezali na correlation na recrutement ya bamoncyte IL-6 ebimisaka inflammasio pe pathologie ya pasi mabe ya lipili na malade ya COVID-19.
translated: ['Mingimingi, baselile T-cellule T-ebimisaka maladi emonanaki ete ezali na boyokani na ndenge bazwaki bamonocytes IL-6 ebimisaka inflammasio mpe pathologie ya makasi ya poumon na bato oyo bazobela COVID-19.']

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: Ba infiltrate lymphocytiki esi esalameli lisusu lapolo na bopasoli.
translated: ['Ba infiltrates lymphocytiki elobelami mpe na autopsie.']

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: OMS asi apublié baprotocole ebele ya tesite mpóna bokono yango.
translated: ['OMS ebimisaki baprotocol mingi ya kosala ekzame mpo na maladi wana.']

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Methode standarde mpóna bosalisi tesite eza bokomi na temps réel inverse ya reaction ya chaine ya polymerase (rRT-PCR).
translated: ['Methode standarde ya ba ekzame eza reaction ya chaine ya transcription ya transcription revers (rRT-PCR).']

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: Tesite na particulié esalamelaka na ba echantillon ya pema bazwaka na bosaleli ya tige motongo ya zolo ti na mongongo; kasi bako kosalela pe tige ya zolo to echantillon ya crachat.
translated: ['Mbala mingi ekzame esalemaka na ba echantillon ya mpema oyo bazwaki na swab ya zolo; kasi, bakoki mpe kosalela echantillon ya swab to sputum ya zolo.']

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: Baresulta ekoyebana mingi-mingi kati ya ba ngonga mike elandaka to na mikolo mibale.
translated: ['Mbala mingi ba résultat ebimaka nsima ya mwa bangonga to mikolo mibale.']

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: Bakoki kosalela batesite ya makila, kasi yango esengaka ba echantillon mibale ya makila babendi baposo mibale ekabwana pe ba resultat ezangi valele moke ya noki-noki.
translated: ['Bakoki kosalela ba ekzame ya makila, kasi yango esengaka ba echantillon mibale ya makila oyo bazwaki mposo mibale ekabwana mpe ba resultat eza na motuya moke ya noki.']

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: Bakundoli ya Chine bazalaki na makoki ma ko isolé lolenge ya coronavirusi pe bapubliaki sequence genetiki bongo ba laboratoire ya mokili mobimba bakoka kokolisa na kimpwanza batesite ya reaction ya chaine polymerase (PCR) mpóna kodetecté kpokoso na virusi.
translated: ['Bato ya siansi ya Chine bazalaki na makoki ya kokabola lolenge moko ya coronavirisi mpe babimisaki sequence genetiki yango wana balaboratoire na mokili mobimba bakoka kosala na ndenge na bango moko ba ekzame ya reaction ya chaine polymerase (PCR) mpo na koyeba kpokoso na virisi.']

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: Na 4 Avril 2020, tesite ya anticorps (mutu eko kodetecté bakpokoso ya actif pe soki moto asi azwaki kpokoso kala) ezalaki na bokolisi, kasi naino na bosaleli mingi te.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 4 sanza ya minei 2020, ba ekzame ya ba anticorps (oyo ekoki komona maladi oyo esalaka mpe soki moto azwaki yango kala) ezalaki na bokolisi, kasi naino bato mingi bazalaki kosalela yango te.']

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: Experience ya bato ya Chine na bosali ya tesite elakisi ete bosolo nayango eza kaka 60 ti 70%.
translated: ['Makambo bato ya Chine bakutanaki na yango na kosala ba ekzame emonisi bosolo na yango eza kaka 60 to 70%.']

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: FDA na Etats-Unis asi andimaki esika ya liboso ya bosali tesite ya depistage na 21 Mars 2020 po bato basalelaka na suka sanza. Milongo ya lisungi ya diagnostiki na Lopitalo ya Zhongnan ya Université ya Wuhan ekanisi ba methodi mpóna kodetecté ba kpokoso ose ya bikilakila ya cliniki pe likama ya epidemiologie.
translated: ['FDA na Etats Unis endimaki ekzame ya liboso ya point-of-care na mokolo ya 21 sanza ya misato 2020 mpona kosalela yango na suka ya sanza wana. Malako ya diagnostiki ebimisamaki na Zhongnan Hospital ya Universite ya Wuhan epesaki likanisi ya bametode ya komona maladi na kotalela makambo ya cliniki mpe likama ya epidemiologie.']

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: Ba opacité ya multilbare ya kitala-tala ya mabele ngambo mibale na peripherique, asymetrique pe bokaboli ya sima emonanaka mingi na ba kpokoso ya yambo.
translated: ['Ba opabingumba mibale ya mabele ya multilobar oyo eza na peripherique, asymetrique mpe bokaboli ya posterior emonanaka mingi na maladi ya ebandeli.']

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: Dominance subpleurale, pavement ya liboma (kovimba ya lobe septale na botondisi ya alveole ekesanaka), pe consolidation eko komonana tango maladi ezo kola.
translated: ['Dominance subpleural, pavement ya ligboma (lobular septal thickeningation na kotonda ya alveole variable), mpe consolidation ekoki komonana ntango maladi ezokende liboso.']

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: Badonnée mike kaka esi ebimi etali ba lesion microscopiki pe pathophysiologia ya COVID-19.
translated: ['Bansango moke ezali kolobela ba lesion microscopiki mpe pathophysiology ya COVID-19.']

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: Makundoli ma principale na autopsia mazali::
translated: ['Bokundoli ya monene ya pathologie na autopsia ezali:']

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: Macroscopia: pleuresie, pericarditite, consolidation ya lipili pe oedema ya lipululu.
translated: ['Macroscopya: pleuresie, pericardite, consolidation ya lipili mpe oedema ya lipulupulu']

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: Bandenge minei ya koswa ya pasi mingi na panzi eko komonana:
translated: ['Lolenge minei ya bokasi ya maladi ya mpema ya virisi ekoki komonana:']

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: panzi ya pete: panzi ya oedèma, hyperplasie pneumocyte, ba pneumocyte atypiki ya monene, inflammasio interstitiale na infiltration ya lymphocytiki pe formation ya cellula multinucleate ya kabakata
translated: ['Panzi ya pete: oedema ya poumonaire, hyperplasie pneumocyte, ba pneumocyte atypiki ya monene, inflammasio interstitiale na infiltration ya lymphocytiki mpe multinucleated cellula ya monene']

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: panzi ya pasi makasi: bopanzani mabe ya alveole (DAD) bopanzani ya ba exudate ya alveole.
translated: ['panzi ya makasi: kobeba ya alveole diffuse (DAD) na ba exudate ya alveole diffuse.']

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: DAD eza esika ewutaka syndrome ya pasi ya songe ya matáta ya kopema (ARDS) pe pasi mabe ya hypoxemie.
translated: ['DAD eza esika ewutaka syndrome ya pasi ya songe ya kopema (ARDS) pe pasi makasi ya hypoxemie.']

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: bosilisi ya panzi: bobongisi ya ba exudate kati ya mabulu ya alveole pe fibrose ya lipili interstitiale.
translated: ['pneumonie ya kobikisa: organisation ya exudate na mabulu ya alveole mpe fibrose ya poumon interstitiale']

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: Makila: bokangami na bopalangani ya makila na intravesicula (DIC); reactio ya leukoerythroblastiki
translated: ['Makila: Kopanzana ya intravascular (DIC); Reaction ya leukoerythroblastique']

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: Ba mezile mpóna bopekisi pe bokitisi ya makama ya kozwa kpokoso etie nakati bofandi na ndako, bokimi ya bisika ya bato mingi, bosokoli maboko na savo na mai mbala mingi molai ba seconde 20, bosaleli ya peto ya pema pe kotika kosimba miso, zolo to monoko na maboko ya mbindo.
translated: ['Mayele ya komibatela mpo na kokitisa mabaku ya kozwa maladi eza na ndakisa kotikala na ndako, koboya bisika oyo bato mingi bazali, kosokola maboko na sabuni mpe mai mbala mingi mpe ata basegonde 20, kosala mosala ya kopetola malamu ya mpema mpe koboya kosimba miso, zolo to monoko na maboko oyo esokwami te.']

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: Botindi ya CDC ezali bozipi monoko na zolo na muswale tango ya bokosoli na bosali kesia pe ezo tinda bosaleli ya bogunzami ya liboko soki muswale ezangi.
translated: ['CDC epesi toli ya kozipa monoko mpe zolo na tissue ntango ozali kokosola to kosala itche mpe ezolendisa kosalela na kati ya coude soki misisa ezali te.']

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: Bopéto ya solo sima ya bokosoli na bosali kesia esengami na molende.
translated: ['Bopɛto ya malamu ya maboko nsima ya kolendisa kosukosu nyonso to kosala itche.']

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: CDC atindi bosaleli ya elámba mpóna kozipa elongi na publiki, na ndámbo mpóna kokáta bopalangani ya bato baza asymptomatiki. Bastrategie ya bobombi distance kati ya bato ebongisami mpóna kokitisa bosangani ya bato bazali na infection pe bokangí basikola pe bisika ya bosali, bopekisi mibémbo pe bokangí ya bisika bato ebele basanganaka.
translated: ['CDC elendisi kosalela biloko ya kozipa elongi ya elamba na bisika ya bato nyonso, na ndenge moko mpo bato oyo baza na bilembo te bapanzana mingi te. Mayele ya kofanda mosika na bato eza na mokano ya kokitisa bokutani ya bato oyo baza na maladi na bituluku ya minene na kokanga biteyelo mpe bisika ya mosala, kopekisa bato basala mibembo mpe kokanga makita ya minene ya bato nyonso.']

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: Masungi ya bobombi distance pe etatoli ete bato batikala toloba 6 feet (1.8 m) na bokabwani.
translated: ['Malako ya kozala mosika elobi mpe ete bato batikalaka mosika na 6 feet (1,8 m).']

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: Kísi eza te óyo eyebani mpóna kopekisa na bokasi pasi ya COVID-19. Lokóla vaccin ezo zelama te esíla kosalama ti 2021 na elikia, ndámbo ya fungola mpóna kogéré COVID-19 eza komeka kokitisa songe ya ngomba ya epidemia, yango ebengami "kokómisa courbe platte".
translated: ['Nkisi moko te eyebani ete ekoki kosalisa mpo na kokanga vaccin nzela COVID-19.As vaccin ezozela te kino na 2021 noki koleka, eteni ya ntina mingi ya kobundisa COVID-19 ezali komeka kokitisa makasi ya maladi mabe, oyo babengaka "kolɛmbisa courbe".']

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: CDC esengi bato basokola maboko ba mbala ebele na sabuni na mai mpóna baseconde 20, nsima ya kokenda na kabine to tango maboko ezo monana na mbindo, liboso ya kolia bilei; mpe nsima ya kopopola zolo, kokosola, mpe kosala kesia.
translated: ['CDC elobi mpe ete bato basokola maboko mbala mingi na sabuni mpe mai ata mpo na basegonde 20, mingimingi nsima ya kokende wese to ntango maboko ezali komonana mbindo, liboso ya kolya mpe nsima ya kobeta zolo ya moto, kokosola to kosala itche.']

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: Elandeli kotinda bosaleli ya biloko basala na alcoholi ya 60% mpóna kotia bopeto na maboko, kasi kaka tango savo na mayi ezali te. Na bisika biye bizalaka na mambi ma kosomba basanitiseur ya bopeto ya maboko óyo batekaka te, OMS ekotisi baformule ya bobotisi yango na esika.
translated: ['Epesi lisusu toli ya kosalela nkisi ya kopetola maboko oyo esalemi na alcol oyo eza na 60% ya alcol, kasi kaka soki sabuni na mai eza pete te. Mpo na bisika oyo bankisi ya kopetola maboko ya mombongo ezali noki te, OMS epesi baformule mibale mpo na kosala biloko na mboka.']

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
targetString: Na baformula yango, bosali ya bobomi mikolobi etombokaka uta na ethanole to isopropanole.
translated: ['Na baformula yango, mosala ya koboma mikrobe ebimaka na ethanol to isopropanole.']

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: Basalelaka peroxide ya hydrogene mpóna kosalisa na bolongoli ya mabulu ya mikolobe na alcoholi; ezali "subistance elamuka te mpóna antisepsiki ya maboko".
translated: ['Basalelaka peroxide ya hydrogène mpo na kosalisa na kosilisa spores ya mikrobe na kati ya alcol; Ezali "te eloko oyo esalaka mosala mpo na antisepsis" ya maboko.']

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: Babakisaka glyceroli mpóna komouillé.
translated: ['Glycerol ebakisamaka lokola humectant.']

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: Bato bazo salisama na ba soin ya lisungi mutu eko kotia nakati therapi ya bamai, lisungi ya oxygene, pe kosunga ba organe mosusu ezwá kpokoso.
translated: ['Bato bazali kotambwisama na lisalisi ya lisungi, oyo ekoki kozala therapi ya mai, kosalisa oxygène, mpe kosunga binama mosusu ya ntina oyo eza na maladi.']

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: CDC azo tinda ete bato bazo kanisa bazo Mama virusi yango balataka masike ya sempele na elongi.
translated: ['CDC elobi ete bato oyo bakanisi ete baza na virisi wana balata mask ya pete ya elongi.']

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: Bopesi oxygene na nzela ya membrane ya libanda ya nzoto (ECMO) esalameli mpóna kosilisa pasi ya pema mabe, kasi bolamo nango eza naíno na boyekoli.
translated: ['Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) basalelaki yango mpona kosilisa likambo ya kobeba ya mpema, kasi matomba na yango eza kaka kotalelama.']

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: Bopeto ya moto ye moko na mode de vie pe diete ya bilei etindami mpóna kobongisa immunité.
translated: ['Bopeto ya moto ye moko mpe lolenge ya bomoi ya malamu mpe bilei ya bilei elendisami mpo na kobongisa immunité.']

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: Lisungi na batraitement eko kozala na ntina mpóna bato baza na basymptome ya pete na tango ya ebandeli ya kopkoso. OMS na Comité Nationale ya Santé ya Chine basi bapublié mitindo mpóna kosalisa bato baza na mbéto ya lopitálo mpóna COVID-19.
translated: ['Bankisi ya kosunga ekoki kosalisa na bato oyo baza na bilembo ya mike na ebandeli ya maladi. OMS na Commission Nationale ya Santé ya Chine babimisi batoli mpona kosalisa bato oyo bakoti lopitalo mpo na COVID-19.']

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: Ba intensiviste na ba pulmonologue na E.U. basi babongisi mitindo ya traitement ewuti na ba agence ya ndenge na ndenge na ba resource ya ofele, IBCC.
translated: ['Ba intensiviste na ba pulmonologue na E.U. babongisi batoli ya traitement oyo euti na ba agence ndenge na ndenge na kozwa mosolo ya ofele, IBCC.']

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Na sanza ya Avril 2020, traitement specifiki ezangi mpóna COVID-19.
translated: ['Na sanza ya minei 2020, kisi ya sikisiki ezali te mpo na kobikisa COVID-19.']

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: mpóna basymptome, minganga mosusu bazo tinda bosaleli ya paracetamol (acetaminophene) esika ya ibuprofene na etumba ya ebandeli.
translated: ['Mpo na basymptomi, minganga mosusu ya minganga balobi ete paracetamol (acetaminophen) eleka ibuprofen mpo na kosalela yango na ligne ya liboso.']

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: Baprecaution esengeli ezwama mpóna kokitisa likama ya bokaboli ya virusi, mingi-mingi na bisika ya minganga bazo pesa lisalisi óyo eko kobimisa ba aerosole lokola botie ya batiyo to mopepe ya kopepa na maboko.
translated: ['Baprecaution esengeli ezwama mpo na kokitisa likama ya kopanzana ya virisi, mingimingi na bisika ya kolongono ya nzoto ntango bazosala bametode oyo ekoki kobimisa aerosol, na ndakisa kotya batiyo na kati to mopepe ya kopepa na maboko.']

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: Mpo na basali ya sante bazo kengela bato ya bokono ya COVID-19, CDC azo tinda botie ya moto na Disuku ya Bokabolami ya infection Ebotamaka na Mopepe (AIIR) na bobakisi ya ba precaution standarde, baprecauton ya contacki pe baprecaution ya mopepe. CDC apesi masungi mpóna bosaleli ya bisaleli ya bobateli ya moto yemoko (PPE) na ntango ya pandemi.
translated: ['Mpo na minganga oyo bazali kosalisa bato oyo bazali na COVID-19, CDC epesi toli ya kotya moto yango na chambre ya isolement ya infection ya mopepe (AIIR) longola kosalela mayele ya standard, komibatela na bato oyo bakutanaki na bango mpe komibatela na mopepe. CDC elobeli malako mpo na kosalela biloko ya kobatela nzoto (PPE) na ntango ya pandemi.']

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: Materiel bazo tinda osalela eza:: Elamba ya PPE, respirateur to masike ya elongi, libateli ya miso, pe bagan ya monganga.Tango ekozala, ba respirateur (na esika ya bizipeli ya elongi) elingama koleka.
translated: ['Bisaleli oyo esengeli ezali oyo: robe ya PPE, biloko ya kopema to facemask, kobatela miso, mpe bagan ya monganga. Soki ezali, biloko oyo esalisaka na kopema (na esika ya kolata elongi) balingaka mingi.']

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: Ba respirateur N95 endimami mpóna bisika ya industrie, kasi FDA asi apesi ndíngisa mpóna bosaleli ya ba masike ose ya Ndingisa ya Bosáleli na Bombángo (EUA).
translated: ['Ba respirateur N95 endimami mpo na bisika ya industrie kasi FDA epesi ndingisa ya kosalela bamask yango na nse ya ndingisa ya Ndingisa ya Kosalelama ya mbalakaka (EUA).']

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: Esi ebongisama mpóna kobatela moto na pusiele ezalaka na mopepe kasi bolamo nayango na bokati ya bolekisi ya mikolobe eza garanti te na bosaleli na yango.
translated: ['Basalaka yango mpona kobatela na biloko oyo ebimaka na mopepe lokola mputulu kasi makasi na kobundisa eloko moko boye ya biologie eza na ndanga te mpona kosalela off-label.']

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: Ntango bamasike eza te, CDC etindi bosaleli ya ba pareface to, na bozangi nionso, masike esalami na ndako.
translated: ['Soki bamask ezali te, CDC elobi kosalela biloko ya kobatela elongi to, mpo na kosalela biloko ya kobatela elongi to, mpo na kosalela bamask ya nsuka, bamask oyo basali na ndako.']

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: Ba cas ngambo ya nyonso ya COVID-19 eza nango songe molai te mpo esenga bosaleli ya mopepe ya masini to ba alternatifi, kasi pourcent ya ba cas ezo senga yango.
translated: ['Ba cas mingi ya COVID-19 eza makasi te mpóna kosenga mopepe ya masini to ba alternatif, kasi pourcentage ya ba cas ezali.']

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: Type ya soutien ya pema mpóna bato ya pasi ekangami na kopola ya pema ya COVID-19 ezo yekolama makasi mpóna bato baza na lopitalo, na elembo ete botie na tiyo eko kokima na bolekisi mopepe makasi na cannule na nzela ya pema to na pression positive ya nivo mibale.
translated: ['Lolenge ya lisalisi ya kopema mpo na bato oyo baza na COVID-19 maladi ya mpema oyo euti na COVID-19 ezali koyekolama makasi mpo na bato oyo baza na lopitalo, na mwa bilembeteli emonisi ete batiyo ekoki kokima soki batye cannula na zolo to pression ya nzela ya mopepe ya malamu bi-level.']

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: Kasi eyebani te soki ta moko ya bango mibale ezo mema babenefice ya ndenge moko mpóna bato bazo bela makasi.
translated: ['Ata soki moko na mibale wana ezali komema na litomba motindo moko mpo na bato oyo bazali kobela makasi eyebani te.']

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: Minganga mosusu bazo mpóna masini ya mopepe ya kati ya nzoto soki ezali na ntina ete tekiniki óyo epekisaka bopalangani ya biteni mike-mike na mopepe mutu esalamka na bosaleli ya cannule ya mopepe ya makasi na zolo. Ba cas makasi emonanaka mingi na bato bakolo (baye baleki mibu 60, pe mingi-mingi penza baye baleki mibu 80).
translated: ['Minganga mosusu basepelaka kofanda na ventilateur mechanice oyo ebundisaka maladi soki ezali mpo mayele wana epekisaka kopanzana ya biloko ya aerosol soki tokokanisi yango na cannula ya zolo oyo ezali kobima mingi. Ba cas ya makasi ezalaka mingi na mikolo ya kala (baoyo baleki mibu 60, mpe mingimingi baoyo baza na mibu koleka 80).']

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: Bikolo mingi ya dévelopé bizangi ba mbeto ekoka na lopitalo mpóna moto moko-moko, yango nde etie ndelo na systemi ya sante mpóna koyamba na bombango nomba ya bacas ya COVID-19 ya songe ekoka mpo bakota lopitalo.
translated: ['Mikili mingi ya bozwi eza na bambeto mingi te na lopitalo mpo na moto mokomoko, yango nde etyaka ndelo na systeme ya kolongono ya nzoto mpo na kobundisa komata ya mbalakaka ya motango ya bato bazobela COVID-19 oyo eza makasi mpenza mpo na kosenga bakota lopitalo.']

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: Liyekoli moko na Chine emonaki ete na 5% ya bato bayambaki na ba unité ya soin intensif, 2.3% bazalaki ose ya bosaliseli ya masini ya mopepe, pe 1.4% bakufaki.
translated: ['Bolukiluki moko na Chine emonaki ete 5% bakotaki na ba unité ya soins intensifs, 2.3% bazalaki na mposa ya lisalisi ya masini mpo na kopesa mopepe ya mopepe, mpe 1.4% bakufaki.']

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: Na Chine, ngambo ya 30% ya bato bakotaka lopitalo mpóna COVID-19 basukelaka koyambama na USI.
translated: ['Na Chine, pene ya 30% ya bato oyo bazali na lopitalo mpo na COVID-19 bakoti bango sukasuka na ICU.']

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: Bopési mopepe na masini ekomi compliqué mingi mpóna pasi ya syndrome ya songe ya kopema (ARDS) ezo kola na COVID-19 pe bopesi oxygene ezo koma penza pasi mingi .
translated: ['Mopepe ya mopepe na masini ekokoma mindondo mingi ndenge maladi ya songe ya kopema (ARDS) ezokoma na COVID-19 mpe oxygene ezokoma mpasi mingi.']

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: Ba ventilateur óyo eza na mode eko kocontrolé pression na PEEP ya likolo ezo lingama mpóna ko maximisé bopesi ya oxygene elongo na bokitisi ya likama ya bozoki ya lipili ewutaka na mopepe pe panzi ya tolo.
translated: ['Baventilateur oyo ekoki kozala na ba modes ya kolandela pression mpe PEEP ya likolo eza na ntina mpo na kobimisa mingi oxygène mpe ezokitisa likama ya kozoka ya poumon oyo euti na ventilateur mpe pneumothorax.']

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: PEEP ya makasi eko kozanga na baventilateur ya kala.
translated: ['PEEP ya likolo ekoki kozala te na baventilateur ya kala.']

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: Boluki na batraitement eko kosalisa ebandaki na Janvier 2020, pe bakisi ya antivirusi ebele ezo mekama na cliniki.
translated: ['Bolukiluki na ndenge bakoki kosalisa maladi ebandaki na sanza ya liboso 2020, mpe bakisi mingi ya antivirusi ezali na komeka ya cliniki.']

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: Remdesivir ezo monana na elaka mingi koleka nionso.
translated: ['Emonani ete Remdesivir nde epesaka elikya mingi.']

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: Ata ko bakisi ya sika eko kozwa ti 2021 mpóna kokomelisa, ebele ya bakisi bazali kotesité esi endimami mpóna kosalela na makono mosusu to ekomi mosika mpóna batesite.
translated: ['Ata soki bakisi ya sika ekoki kozwa tii na 2021 mpo na kosala, bakisi mingi oyo bazali kosala ekzame esi endimami mpo na kosalela yango mosusu to esi ebandi kosala ba ekzame ya makasi.']

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: Bakisi ya antivirusi eko komekama na nzoto ya bato baza na bokono makasi.
translated: ['Nkisi ya antivirusi eko komeka yango na bato oyo bazali na bokono makasi.']

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: OMS azo tinda bato ya bolingi bakota na momekano mpóna bolamo na kimia ya bisaleli ya bakísi ezo bongisama. FDA asi apesi ndíngisa ya mikolo mokuse na plasma ya babiki likolo ya lisalisi ya momekano na bacas óyo emonani bomoi ya moto eza somo to elingi solo kokatana noki-noki.
translated: ['OMS elobaki ete bato ya bolingo malamu basangana na komeka bokasi mpe libateli ya bankisi oyo bakoki kozwa. FDA epesi ndingisa ya ntango mokuse na plazma ya kobika lokola nkisi ya komeka na makambo oyo bomoi ya moto eza makasi to eza na likama mbala moko.']

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: Ezwi naino boyekoli ya cliniki elingami te mpóna kolakisa ete ezali ya kimia pe malamu mpóna kosukisa bokono.
translated: ['Esali te bolukiluki ya cliniki oyo esengeli mpo na komonisa ete eza malamu mpe ekosalisa mpo na maladi wana.']

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: Na Février 2020, Chine abimisaki app ya mobile mpóna koluka kosilisa pandemie.
translated: ['Na sanza ya mibale 2020, Chine afungolaki application moko ya mobile mpo na kobundisa maladi oyo.']

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: Basaleli basengami batia kombo pe numero ya ID nabango.
translated: ['Bato oyo basalelaka yango basɛngaka bango bátya nkombo mpe nimero ya ID na bango.']

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: App eza na mambi ya koyeba ‘contacki ya ngambo’ na bosaleli ya badonnée ya bokengeli ebongo nde likama eko koya mpóna kpokoso.
translated: ["App eza na makoki ya komona 'bokutani ya pene' na kosalela bansango ya bokengeli mpe yango wana ekoki kozala likama ya kozwa maladi."]

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: Mosaleli moko-moko akoki pe kovérifié etat ya basaleli mosusu misato.
translated: ['Moto nyonso akoki mpe kotala soki basaleli mosusu misato bazali ndenge nini.']

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: Soki likama ezo ya ekoki komonana, app ekotinda kaka moto amitia na quarantaine te kasi lisusu ekoyebisa bakonzi ya santé ya esika.Badonnée minene ya bososoli na fonimobile, tekinologi ya boyebeli elongi, trackage ya ba fonimobile, na mayele ya bonganga bizali kosalamela mpóna kotracké bato ya kpokoso bazo sala contacki na Korea ya Sudi, Taiwan pe Singapore.
translated: ['Soki bamoni likama oyo ekoki kobima, application ezolendisa kaka te komitya na quarantaine, ekoyebisa mpe bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto ya mboka. Bolukiluki ya bansango ya minene na bansango ya telefone ya maboko, mayele ya koyeba elongi, kolandela batelefone ya maboko mpe mayele ya kosala makambo esalelamaka mpo na kolandela bato oyo baza na maladi mpe bato oyo basololaki na bango na Corée ya sude, Taiwan mpe Singapour.']

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: Na Mars 2020, loyalo ya Israeli apesaki ndíngisa na ba agence ya kimia ba tracké badonnée ya bafoni mobile ya bato bakaniselaki bazali na coronavirusi.
translated: ['Na sanza ya misato 2020, gouvernema ya Israele esalisaki ba agence ya libateli na kolandela bansango ya telefone ya maboko ya bato oyo basengeli kozala na coronavirisi.']

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: Mezile wana ezwamakii mpo etia bokasi na quarantaine pe ebatela bato baye bako kozala na contacki na bacitoyen bazali na kpokoso.
translated: ['Mobeko wana ezwamaki mpona kotosisa konfinema mpe kobatela bato oyo bakoki kokutana na bato ya mboka oyo baza na maladi.']

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Lisusu na Mars 2020, Deutsche Telekom akabolaka esika ya badonnée ya bafoni esangana na agence ya federasio ya Alemania, Institut Robert Koch, mpóna kokundola pe kopekisa bopalangani ya virusi.
translated: ['Lisusu na sanza ya misato 2020, Deutsche Telekom akabolaki bansango ya bisika nyonso oyo basangisi na telefone na lisanga ya gouvernema federal ya Allemagne, Institut Robert Koch, mpo na kosala bolukiluki mpe kokanga virisi nzela epanzana te.']

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: Russie abimisaki tekinologi ya boyebeli elongi mpóna koyeba babuki ya quarantaine.
translated: ['Russie etindaki mayele ya koyeba elongi mpo na komona bato oyo babukaka quarantaine.']

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: Commissaire ya santé regionale ya Italie Giulio Gallera alobaki azwaki liyebisi na ba operateur ya bafoni mobile ete "40% ya bato bazo koba nabango kokendeke bisika".
translated: ['Commissaire ya kolongono ya nzoto ya etuka ya Italie Giulio Gallera alobaki bayebisi ye na bato oyo basalelaka batelefone ya maboko ete "40% ya bato bazali kokoba kotambola ata bongo".']

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: Loyalo ya Alemania asalaki na suka posa moko bangonga 48 ya hackathoni na participant koleka 42.000.
translated: ['Gouvernema ya Allemagne esalaki hackathon ya bangonga 48 na wikende na bato koleka 42,000 oyo basanganaki na yango.']

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: Lisusu prezida ya Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, asalaki bobengi ya mokili mobimba mpóna koluka mayele ya likolo mpóna kosukisa bopalangani ya coronavirusi.
translated: ['Lisusu prezida ya Estonie, Kersti Kaljulaid, asalaki libyangi ya mokili mobimba mpo na mayele ya kosala makambo mpo na kobundisa kopalangana ya coronavirisi.']

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: Bato moko-moko bako koyoka pasi ya kobungisa elikia na quarantaine, bopekisa ya mibembo, ba effet secondaire ya traitement to kobanga mpóna kpokoso yango.
translated: ['Bato moko bakoki koyoka mpasi na quarantaine, kopekisa mibembo, ba effet secondaire ya traitement to kobanga maladi yango moko.']

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: BBC alandi Rory O'Connor na koloba, "bobakisi bokabwani na bato, bofandi moto-na-moto yemoko, kobanga-banga na nzoto pasi, stressi pe kozanga bozwi ezali mbula kake ezo sala mabe na mito ya bato na bolamo nabango."
translated: ['BBC etangaki Rory O\'Connor na maloba oyo, "Komitangola mingi na bato, kozala yo moko, mitungisi ya kolongono ya nzoto, mitungisi mpe kokita ya nkita eza mopepe ya kokoka mpona kobebisa kolongono ya makanisi mpe bolamu ya bato."']

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: Kobela eko kozwa nzela ya pete na basymptome moke eko kozala kaka lokola bapasi mike-mike ya nzela ya kopema, lokola malili ma bato banso.
translated: ['Maladi eko kozwa nzela ya pete na bilembo moke to ata moke te, ekokani na maladi mosusu ya likolo ya mpema oyo emonanaka mingi na ndakisa malili ya bato nyonso.']

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: Ba cas ya pete mingi-mingi esilaka nango sima ya baposo mibale, kasi baye bazalaka na mabela ya pasi mingi ewumelaka banda poso misato ti motoba po esila.
translated: ['Mbala mingi bato ya maladi ya pete babikaka nsima ya mposo mibale, kasi bato oyo baza na maladi ya makasi to ya makasi bakoki kozwa mposo misato to motoba mpo babika.']

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: Basi ya zemi bako kozala na likama ya makasi mpóna infection ya songe ya COVID-19 ose ya badonnée ya bavirusi óyo ekokana, lokola SRAS pe MERS, kasi badonnée mpóna COVID-19 eza kozanga. Na bato mosusu, COVID-19 eko ko affecté balipili pe panzi.
translated: ['Basi ya zemi bakoki kozala na likama mingi ya kozwa maladi makasi ya COVID-19 na kotalela bansango euti na bavirisi mosusu ya ndenge wana, lokola SARS mpe MERS, kasi bansango ya COVID-19 ezangi. Na bato mosusu, COVID-19 ekoki kobebisa bapoumon oyo epesaka pneumonia.']

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: Na baye baza affecté mabe mingi, COVID-19 eko kokoma na bombango syndrome ya songe ya kobela ya pema (ARDS) epesaka kopola ya bopemi, shoki scepitiki to kobeba ya ba organe ebele.
translated: ['Na ba oyo bazali na mpasi makasi, COVID-19 eko kokoma noki na syndrome ya songe ya pasi ya pema (ARDS) epesaka kopola ya kopema, choque septique to kobeba ya ba organe mingi.']

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: Mikakatano ekanganaka na COVID-19 etie nakati sepsis, bokangami ya makila mabe pe bobebi na motema, bangei pe libale.
translated: ['Mikakatano miuti na COVID-19 etie nakati sepsis, kokangama ya mabe mpe kobeba ya motema, bangei mpe libale.']

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: Bokangani ya mabe ya makila, mingi-mingi bomati na ngonga na prothrombine, esi esosolamaki na 6% ya bato baye bandimamaki na lopitalo mpóna COVID-19, kasi kosala ya mabe ya ngei emonani na 4% ya bato ya lisanga.
translated: ['Mbeba ya makila, mingimingi kobakisama ya ngonga ya prothrombine, elobelami na 6% ya bato oyo bakotaki lopitalo mpo na COVID-19, kasi mosala ya mabe ya bangeyi ezali komonana na 4% ya etuluku oyo.']

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: Mokuse ya 20-30% ya bato bazali na COVID-19 balakisi komata ya ba enzyme na ngei (batransaminase).
translated: ['Pene ya 20-30% ya bato oyo bazali wana na COVID-19 bazali komonisa komata ya ba enzyme ya foie (batransaminase).']

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: Na bolandi ya lapolo yango kaka, ngonga ya kati banda ebandeli ti bobimi ya basymptome pe liwa ezalaki mikolo zomi, mitano nayango eza na bokoti lopitalo.
translated: ['Kaka lapolo yango emonisi ete ngonga ya kati banda bilembo ya maladi ebandaki mpe liwa ezalaki mikolo zomi, mpe mitano balekisaki na lopitalo.']

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: Bongo, bato babeli batindamaki na USI bazalaki na ngonga ya kati ya mikolo sambo banda bokoti lopitalo ti liwa.
translated: ['Kasi, bato ya maladi oyo batindaki bango na ICU bazalaki na ngonga ya katikati ya mikolo nsambo banda bakotaki lopitalo mpe liwa.']

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: Na boyekoli ya bacas ya yambo, ngonga ya kati banda bobimi ya basymtome ya liboso ti liwa ezalaki mikolo 14, na molongo etonda banda motoba ti 41 ya mikolo.
translated: ['Na bolukiluki ya bato oyo bazobela noki, ngonga ya kati banda na kolakisa bilembo ya ebandeli kino liwa ezalaki mikolo 14, mpe mikolo motoba kino 41 mobimba.']

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: Na boyekoli esalami na Commission Nationale ya Santé (NHC) ya Chine, bato-mibali bazalaki na lotango ya bawá ya 2.8% bôngó bato-bâsi bazalaki na 1.7%.
translated: ['Na bolukiluki moko esalemaki na Commission Nationale ya Sante (NHC) ya Chine, mibali bazalaki na 2.8% ya liwa kasi basi bazalaki na 1,7% ya bato bakufi.']

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: Ba exame ya histopathologie ya ba echantillon ya lipili ya mutu ya kokufa elakisi bopanzani ya alveole na ba exudate ya fibromyxoide ya cellula ya mapili nionso mibale.
translated: ['Ba ekzame ya histopathologie ya ba echantillon ya lipili ya nsima ya koboma emonisi mbeba ya alveole diffuse na ba exudate ya fibromyxoide cellula na bapoumon nyonso mibale.']

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: Bambongwana na cytopathiki ya virusi emonanaki na kati ya bapneumocyte.
translated: ['Mbongwana ya cytopathique ya virisi emonanaki na kati ya bapneumocytes.']

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Foto ya lipili ekokani na pasi ya syndrome ya songe ya pema (ARDS).
translated: ['Elilingi ya lipili ekokani na mpasi makasi ya kopema (ARDS).']

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: Na pourcent 11.8% ya bato bakufa basalelaki lapolo na Commission Nationale ya Santé ya Chine, mbeba ya motema emonanaki na banivo emata ya troponine to bokangami ya motema.
translated: ['Na 11,8% ya bato oyo bakufaki na Commission Nationale ya Sante ya Chine, maladi ya motema emonanaki na komata ya troponin to bokangami ya motema.']

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: Na bolandi ya badonnée ya Mars óyo ewutaki na Etats-Unis, 89% ya baye bakotisamaki na lopitalo bazalaki na kobéla liboso. Ba resource ya monganga na ba condisio socio economiki ya engunda eko ko affecté taux ya liwa.
translated: ['Na kotalela bansango ya sanza ya misato euti na Etats-Unis, 89% ya bato oyo bakotaki lopitalo bazalaki na maladi oyo bazalaki na yango liboso. Kozala na biloko ya monganga mpe ya sosioloji ya etuka moko ekoki mpe kobebisa motango ya bato oyo bakufaka.']

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: Ba estimasio ya lotango ya bato bazalaki kokufa mpóna bokono ekesani na ntina ya mbongwana ya bingunda, kasi pe na ntina ya pasi ya methodologie.
translated: ['Ba estimasio ya bato bakufi na maladi wana ekeseni mpo na bokeseni wana ya bituka, kasi mpe mpo na mpasi ya methodologie.']

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: Botangi yase ya bacas ya pete eko kosala ete taux ya liwa ekoma surestimé.
translated: ['Kozanga kotanga makambo ya mike ekoki kosala ete motango ya bato oyo bazali kokufa eleka ndelo.']

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: Kási, lokola liwa ya bato ewutaki na kobéla bato bazwaki kala, óyo eko koloba ete lotango ya liwa ya mikol’oyo ezali sousetimé.
translated: ['Kasi, likambo oyo ete liwa euti na bato oyo bazwaki maladi wana kala ekoki kolimbola ete bato oyo bazali kokufa sikoyo bazali kozwa yango na motuya moke.']

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: Bameli ya likaya baza na libaku ya 1.4 ya kobéla pasi ya basymtome ya makasi ya COVID-19 pe ngambo 2.4 ya bambala koleka mpóna bosaleli ya soin intensif to kokufa soki bacomparé bango na bato bamelaka likaya te. Kobanga ebimi na bapasi ya mikolo ekolanda bokono.
translated: ['Bameli makaya bazalaki na bachance mbala 1,4 ya kozala na bilembo makasi ya COVID-19 mpe pene ya 2.4 ya bachance ya kosenga lisalisi ya makasi to kokufa soki tokokanisi yango na bato oyo bamelaka likaya te. Kobanga ebimaki mpo na sequelae ya ntango molai ya maladi wana.']
