sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: Mokonzi ya Lopitalo ya Hong Kong amonaki bokiti ya 20% ti 30% na makasi ya lipili na bato babikaki na bokono yango, pe ba scanné ya lipili ezo lakisa kobeba ya ba organe.
translated: ['Bakonzi ya lopitalo ya Hong Kong bamonaki kokita ya 20% kino na 30% ya makoki ya poumon na bato mosusu oyo babikaki na maladi wana, mpe ba scanner ya poumon emonisaki ete binama ya nzoto ebebaki.']

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: Yangó ekoki pe komema lisúsu syndrome ya sima ya intensifi kolanda bobiki.
translated: ['Ekoki mpe komema syndrome ya sima ya intensif nsima ya kobela makasi nsima ya kobika.']

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: Na Mars 2020, eyebanaki te soki kpokoso eleki eko kopesa immunité ya malamu pe ya ntango molai na bato babikaki na bokono yango.
translated: ['Na sanza ya misato 2020, eyebanaki te soki maladi ya kala epesaka immunité ya malamu mpe ya ntango molai na bato oyo babiki na maladi wana.']

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: Immunité ezo monana lokola eko kosalama, ose ya bizaleli ya bacoronavirusi mosusu, kasi bacas ya bato babíka na COVID-19 balandamaki na tesite ya positif mpóna coronavirusi na dati ya sima esalameli lapolo.
translated: ['Immunité ezo monana lokola ekoki kozala, na kotalela bizaleli ya bacoronavirusi mosusu, kasi ba cas oyo kobikisama uta na COVID-19 elandanaki na ba ekzame ya malamu mpóna coronavirusi na dati mosusu, esi esalami.']

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: Ba cas ya boye ezo ndimama ete eza bokiti na ngambo mabe ya bokono ezo sila te kasi kpokoso ya sika te.
translated: ['Bakanisi ete makambo oyo ezokoma makasi na maladi oyo eumelaka na esika ya kozwa lisusu maladi.']

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: virusi óyo ezo kaniselama ya mokili pe ebimeli na niama, na bosopani ya infection.
translated: ['Bakanisaka ete virisi yango ezali ya mokili mpe euti na banyama, na nzela ya maladi oyo esopanaki.']

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Esika ewuti penza eyebani te, kasi nde na Decemba 2019 bopalangani ya kpokoso ezali toloba nionso kokabolama na moto apesi na moto.
translated: ['Ebandeli ya solo eyebani te, kasi na sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019 kopalangana ya maladi ezalaki pene ya nyonso mpo moto apesi yango na moto.']

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: Liyekoli ya ba cas 41 ya yambo ya COVID-19 endimamaka, ezalaki publié na Janvier 2020 na The Lancet, elobi ete dati basymtome ebandaki liboso ezalaki 1 Decemba 2019.
translated: ['Liyekoli ya bato 41 ya liboso oyo bazalaki na COVID-19 endimamaki, babimisaki yango na sanza ya liboso 2020 na The Lancet, emonisaki dati ya liboso oyo bilembo ebandaki na mokolo ya 1 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019.']

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: Bapublicasio officielle ya OMS epesi lapolo ete basymtome ya yambo ebandaki na 8 Decemba 2019.
translated: ['Mikanda ya Leta oyo euti na OMS elobaki ete bilembo ya maladi ebandaki noki mpenza na mokolo ya 8 sanza ya zomi na mibale 2019.']

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: Bamezile ebele ezo salamela mingi mpóna lotango ya bato bóni bazo kufa.
translated: ['Ba mekeli mingi esalelamaka mingi mpona koyeba motango ya bato bakufi.']

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: Matango maye mazo kesana na bisika mingi mpe na bolandi ntango pe ezo landa monene ya lotango ya batesite, bolamo ya systemi ya santé, ba mpóna ya traitement, ntango ya banda bopalangani ya yambo, pe ya ba characteristiki ya populasio lokola âge, sexe, pe santé mobimba ya moto.
translated: ['Mitango oyo ekesanaka na bisika mpe na ntango mpe elandaka motango ya ba ekzame, lolenge ya systeme ya kolongono ya nzoto, ndenge ya kosalisa bato, ntango banda maladi ya ebandeli ebimaki mpe bizaleli ya bato na ndakisa mbula, sexe mpe kolongono ya nzoto mobimba.']

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: Na mibu ya suka ya 2019, OMS apesaki na mabela ba code ya bombango ICD-10 ya ba code U07.1 mpóna bawá bawuti na lab-confirmé ya kpokoso ya SARS-CoV-2 pe U07.2 mpóna bawá bawuti na cliniki to diagnostiki ya epidemiologie COVID-19 kozanga ba confirmé yango na lab kpokoso ya SARS-CoV-2. Ratio ya bawá na bacas ezo lakisa lotango ya bawá kokabola na lotango ya bacas basala diagnositiki kati ya intervale ya ntango epesamaki.
translated: ['Na nsuka ya 2019, OMS epesaki ICD-10 bakode ya maladi ya mbalakaka U07.1 mpo na bato oyo bakufaki na maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 oyo laboratoire emonaki mpe U07.2 mpo na bato oyo bakufaki na cliniki to epidemioologie oyo bamonaki na COVID-19 kozanga maladi ya SARS-CoV-2 oyo laboratoire endimi. Ratio ya liwa na moto ezali komonisa motango ya bato bakufi oyo bakabolami na motango ya bato oyo bazwaki maladi na eleko moko boye.']

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: Na bolandi ba statistiki ya Johns Hopkins University, ratio ya mokili mobimba ya bawá na ba cas ya mabela ezali 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) uta mokolo ya 17 Avril 2020.
translated: ['Na kotalela bastatistik ya Johns Hopkins University, ratio ya mokili mobimba ya liwa na moto ya maladi ezali 6,9% (153,822/2,240,191) na mokolo ya 17 sanza ya minei 2020.']

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: Lotango ezo kesana engunda na engunda. Bamezile mosusu etie nakati taux ya bato bazo kufa (CFR), mutu ezo lakisa pourcentage ya bato bazali diagnositiké óyo bazo kufa na bokono, na taux ya koboma ya kpokoso (IFR), mutu ezo lakisa pourcentage ya bato bazwi kpokoso (bazala diagnostiké to diagnostiké te) óyo bazo kufa na bokono.
translated: ['Motángo yango ekeseni na kotalela etúká. Meko mosusu eza na ndakisa taux ya liwa ya bato ya maladi (CFR), oyo ezomonisa pourcentage ya bato oyo bazwaki maladi oyo bakufaka na maladi, mpe taux ya liwa ya maladi (IFR), oyo ezomonisa pourcentage ya bato oyo baza na maladi (oyo bamonaki yango mpe oyo bamonaki te) oyo bakufaka na maladi moko.']

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: Bastatistiki óyo ekangami na ntango te, ezo landa nde populasio specifiki uta bozwi ya infection ti suka ya cas.
translated: ['Bastatistiki oyo ezali te ntango oyo ekangami mpe elandaka te motango ya sikisiki uta na maladi na nzela ya ekateli ya likambo.']

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: Atako bato banso te bazwi kpokoso bazo kolisa ba anticorps, kozala na ba anticorps eko kopesa nsango etali bato boni bakokaki kozwa kpokoso.
translated: ['Ata soki bato nyonso te oyo baza na maladi bazali na ba anticorps, kozala ya ba anticorps ekoki kopesa bansango etali bato boni bazwaki yango.']

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: Na esika ya epicentre ya bopalangani ya bokono na Italie, Castiglione d'Adda, mboka moke ya bato 4600, 80 (1.7%) bawuti kokufa.
translated: ["Na esika oyo maladi ebimaki na Italie, Castiglione d'Adda, mboka moke ya bato 4600, 80 (1,7%) esi ekufa."]

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: Na Gangelt, bokono epalanganaki uta bafeti ya Carnavale, pe ekotelaki bana bilenge, ebendaki lotango kamwa moke ya bawei pe nyonso te bato bakufaki na COVID-19 bazalaki classifié ndenge wana .
translated: ['Na Gangelt, maladi epalanganaki na bafeti ya Carnavale, mpe epanzanaki na bilenge, ebomaki bato mwa moke, mpe mbala mosusu bato nyonso oyo bakufaki na COVID-19 te nde balobaki yango na ndenge ya Leta mpo na yango.']

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: Na kobakisa, systemi ya Santé ya ba Allemania ezalaki na pasi elekaki ndelo te.
translated: ['Lisusu, ebongiseli ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Allemagne etondi na makambo mingi te.']

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: Na Netherlanda, ngambo ya 3% bakoki kozala na ba anticorps, lolenge ba evalué bango na bapesi ya makila.
translated: ['Na Pays-Bas, pene ya 3% bakoki kozala na ba anticorps, ndenge batalelaka yango na bato oyo bapesaka makila.']

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 (0.004% ya bato nyonso) bazali kondimama bakufeli na bokono ya COVID-19.
translated: ['69 (0.004% ya bato nyonso) basili kondimama ete bakufi na COVID-19.']

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: Mabé ya pandemie na lotango ya kobomela bato ekeseni kati ya mibali na bâsi.
translated: ['Bopusi ya pandemie pe taux ya liwa na yango ekeseni mpona mibali na basi.']

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: Taux ya koboma bato babali eleki óyo ya bato bâsi ose ya boyekoli esalami na Chine pe Italie.
translated: ['Liwa eza mingi na mibali na bolukiluki oyo esalemaki na Chine mpe na Italie.']

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: Likáma ya emati mpóna mibali na mibu 50, bongo bokabwani kati ya mibali na bâsi ezo kangama na ba 90.
translated: ['Likama ya likolo mpona mibali eza na mibu 50, bokeseni kati na mibali na basi oyo bakangi kaka na mibu 90.']

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: Na Chine, lotango ya liwa ezalaki 2.8 pourcent mpóna mibali pe 1.7 pourcent mpóna bâsi.
translated: ['Na Chine, bato oyo bakufaki bazalaki 2,8 pourcent mpo na mibali mpe 1,7 pourcent mpo na basi.']

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: Ntina mpóna bokeseni kati ya bâsi na mibali eyebani penza te, kasi eko kozala genetiki na bafacteur ya bizaleli.
translated: ['Bantina ya sikisiki ya bokeseni wana ya kosangisa nzoto eyebani te, kasi makambo ya gene mpe ya bizaleli ekoki kozala ntina.']

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: Bokeseni ya immunologie likolo ya sexe, bosaleli moke ya cigareti na bâsi na mibali na bokolisi ya ba condisio ya bokangani mpóna koboma lokola hypertension ya mibu ya bilenge koleka bâsi eko komatisa lotango likolo na bawá na mibali.
translated: ['Bokeseni ya immunologie oyo euti na sexe, komela likaya moke na basi mpe mibali oyo bazali kobela maladi ya co-morbid na ndakisa hypertension na bolenge koleka basi ekokaki kosala ete mibali bakufa mingi.']

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: Na Europa, 57% ya bato bazwaki kpokoso bazalaki mibali pe 72% ya baye bakufaki na COVID-19 bazalaki mibali.
translated: ['Na Europa, 57% ya bato oyo bazalaki na maladi bazalaki mibali mpe 72% ya bato oyo bakufaki na COVID-19 bazalaki mibali.']

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: Na ntango ti Avril 2020, loyalo ya E.U. azalaki naye kosala lotango na badonnée ya bâsi to mibali ya COVID-19 te.
translated: ['Na sanza ya minei 2020, gouvernema ya US ezolandela te bansango etali kosangisa nzoto ya bato oyo baza na maladi ya COVID-19.']

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: Bokundoli elakisi ete bokono ya bavirusi lokola Ebola, HIV, grippe pe SRAS etungisa mibali na basi na bokeseni.
translated: ['Bolukiluki emonisi ete maladi ya virisi lokola Ebola, HIV, grippe mpe SARS ezwaka mibali mpe basi na ndenge moko te.']

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: Pourcentage emata ya basali ya sante, mingi-mingi ba infirmier, bazali bâsi, ebongo nde baza na lotango ya likama emata mpóna kozala pembeni ya virusi.
translated: ['Pourcentage ya mingi ya basali ya kolongono, mingimingi ba infirmier, baza basi, mpe baza na chance mingi ya kokutana na virisi.']

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: Organizasio Mondiale mpóna Santé atatolaki na 11 Février 2020 ete kombo ya bokonzi ya bokono yango ekozala "COVID-19".
translated: ['Organisation Mondiale ya Sante elobaki na mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale 2020 ete kombo ya bokonzi ya maladi wana ekozala "COVID-19".']

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: Mokonzi ya OMS Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus alimboli ete CO eza mpóna corona, VI mpóna virusi, D mpóna bokono, pe 19 mobu bopalangani eyebani mbala ya yambo: 31 Decemba 2019.
translated: ['Mokonzi ya OMS Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus alimbolaki ete CO eza na corona, VI mpona virisi, D mpona maladi, mpe 19 mpona ntango oyo maladi eyebanaki mpo na mbala ya liboso: 31 Decemba 2019.']

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Kómbó epónama mpóna koboya bolakisi ya mosapi na esika specifiki ya geographi (ndakisa, Chine), esipeci ya niama to lisanga ya bato, na molongo ya mambi matindami na mikili nionso mpóna bopesi kombo bakaniseli ekopekisa stigima. virusi óyo ebendaka COVID-19 ebengami syndrome ya kanda ya songe ya pema coronavirusi 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: ['Baponaki nkombo wana mpo na koboya kolobela esika moko boye ya geographie (na ndakisa Chine), lolenge ya banyama to etuluku ya bato, na kolanda batoli ya mikili mingi mpo na kopesa nkombo na mokano ya kopekisa stigmatisation. Virisi oyo epesaka COVID-19 ebengami maladi makasi ya mpema coronavirisi 2 (SARS-CoV-2).']

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: OMS na kobakisa azo salela "le COVID-19 virusi" pe "le virusi responsable de COVID-19" na bopesi nsango na bato .
translated: ['OMS na kobakisa esalelaka "virisi ya COVID-19" mpe "virisi oyo ezali na mokumba ya COVID-19" na kosolola na bato nyonso.']

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: Nionso mibale bokono na virusi ezo bengama mingi-mingi kaka "coronavirusi".
translated: ['Nionso mibale bokono pe virusi ezo bengama mingi na kombo ya "coronavirusi".']

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: Na ntango ya bopalangani ya yambo na Wuhan, Chine, virusi na bokono ezalaki nyonso mibale kobengama "coronavirusi" pe "Wuhan coronavirusi".
translated: ['Na ntango ya bopalangani ya yambo na Wuhan, Chine, virusi na bokono ezalaki mbala mingi kobengama "coronavirusi" pe "Wuhan coronavirusi".']

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: Na Janvier 2020, OMS atindaki bazwa 2019-nCov pe 2019-nCoV bokono ya songe ya pasi ya pema lokola bakombo ya bozeli mpóna virusi pe bokono na bolandi lisungi ya 2015 esika ya boponi bakombo ya bokono pe virusi.
translated: ['Na sanza ya liboso 2020, OMS asengaki ete 2019-nCov mpe 2019-nCoV ezwa maladi makasi ya mpema lokola bankombo ya ntango mokuse mpo na virisi mpe maladi na kolanda toli ya 2015 ya koboya kosalela bisika na bankombo ya maladi mpe virisi.']

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: Ba nkombo ya bokonzi COVID-19 pe SRAS-CoV-2 ebimaki mokolo ya 11 Février 2020.
translated: ['Bankombo ya bokonzi COVID-19 na SARS-CoV-2 ebimaki mokolo ya 11 sanza ya mibale 2020.']

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: Ose ya ndelo na ba standard ya molongo ya bobimisi bisaleli monganga, basali mosusu ya biloko ya digitale bazali ko imprimé materiel ya lopitalo lokola batige ya zolo pe ba ndambo ya ventilateur.
translated: ['Mpo na bandelo ya makoki na bisika ya malamu ya kopesa biloko, bakompanyi mosusu ya internet ezali konyata biloko ya kolongono ya nzoto na ndakisa biloko ya zolo mpe biloko ya ventilateur.']

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: Na ndakisa moko, ntango lopitalo moko ya Italie ezalaki na posa ya valve ya ventilateur noki-noki, bongo mosali na yango akokaki te kotinda yango na ngonga elingamaki, kompani moko ya esika esalelaki ingénierie inverse pe e imprimaki ba valve 100 balukaki na butu moko.
translated: ['Na ndakisa moko, ntango lopitalo moko ya Italie esengaki noki valve ya ventilateur, mpe motekisi akokaki te kokokisa yango na ngonga oyo esengamaki, startup moko ya mboka oyo babongisaki lisusu mpe bakomaki ba valve 100 oyo esengami na butu moko.']

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: Sima ya bopalangani ya yambo ya COVID-19, ba theorie ya complot pe nsango ya lokutá ebimaki na likambo etali esika ya ebandeli, echelle, prevensio, traitement pe makambo mosusu ya bokono epalanganaki mbángo na Interneti.
translated: ['Nsima ya kobima ya liboso ya COVID-19, makanisi ya bato ya mayele mabe, nsango ya lokuta mpe bansango ya lokuta ebimaki na oyo etali ebandeli, scale, kopekisa, kobikisa yango mpe makambo mosusu ya maladi wana mpe epanzanaki noki na internet.']

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: Bato bamonani ete bazali na mambi ma kopalangasa virusi na baniama mosusu.
translated: ['Emonani ete bato baza na makoki ya kopanza virisi yango na banyama mosusu.']

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: Liyekoli yango elongaki te mpóna komona elembo ya mbotama ya virusi na bangulu, mabata, pe basusu.
translated: ['Bolukiluki elongaki te na komona bilembeteli ya kobotama ya virisi na bangulu, mabata, mpe basoso.']

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: Bakisi to vaccin ta moko te esi endimami mpóna ko traité bokono yango.
translated: ['Bakisi to vaccin moko te endimami mpóna kotraité bokono yango.']

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: Bokundoli ya bato ya mikili mingi yase na likambo ya bavaccin na bakísi etali COVID-19 ebandi kosalama ose ya ba organizasio ya loyalo, mangomba ya bato ya mayele pe bakundoli ya industrie.
translated: ['Bolukiluki ya mikili mingi na oyo etali bavaccin mpe bakisi na COVID-19 ezali kosalema na bibongiseli ya gouvernema, bituluku ya bato ya mayele mpe bato ya bolukiluki ya industrie.']

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: Na Mars, Organisio Mondiale ya Santé ebandaki óyo babengi "Essai ya SOLIDARITE" mpóna koyekola ba effet ya traitement ya b antivirusi composé óyo epesi elikia ya makasi ya lisalisi.
translated: ["Na sanza ya misato, Organisation Mondial ya Sante ebandaki ''Komeka ya SOLIDARI'' mpo na kotalela bopusi ya nkisi ya biloko minei ya antivirusi oyo eza na elaka ya makasi koleka."]

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: Vaccin esalami naino te, kasi ba agence ebele bazo tia molende mpóna kokolisa bavaccin ekoki kondimama.
translated: ['Vaccin ezali te, kasi ba agence ndenge na ndenge ezali kosala na molende nyonso ba candidat ya vaccin.']

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: Mosala esalamaki liboso mpóna SRAS-CoV ezo salamela na ntína ete SRAS-CoV na SRAS-CoV-2 nionso mibale ezo salela moyambi ACE2 mpóna kokota na bacellula ya moto.
translated: ['Mosala esalamaki liboso na SARS-CoV ezali kosalelama mpo SARS-CoV mpe SARS-CoV-2 nyonso mibale ezali kosalela moyambi ACE2 mpo na kokota na bacellule ya bato.']

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: Bastrategie ya vaccinasio ezali misato bazo lukela.
translated: ['Ezali na mayele misato ya mangwele oyo bazali kolandela.']

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: Ya yambo, bakundoli batie likanisi na botongi ya vaccin ya virusi mobimba.
translated: ['Ya liboso, bato basalaka bolukiluki baza na mokano ya kosala vaccin ya virisi mobimba.']

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: Bosáleli ya virusi ya boye, ezala ya koningana to ya kokufa, eluki ko bimisa noki eyano ya Immunité ya nzoto ya moto ya kpokoso ya sika na COVID-19.
translated: ['Kosalela virisi ya ndenge wana, ezala kosala eloko te to ekufa, mokano na yango eza ya kobimisa noki mikrobe oyo ebundisaka maladi na nzoto ya moto na kpokoso ya sika na COVID-19.']

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: Strategie ya mibale, vaccin ya sous-unité, ezo luka ebimisa vaccin óyo ekosensitisé systemi ya Immunité na basous-unité ya solo ya virusi.
translated: ['Strategie ya mibale, vaccin ya sous-unité, mokano na yango eza ya kosala vaccin oyo ekoyeba systeme immunitaire na ba sous-unité misusu ya virisi.']

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: Na cas ya SRAS-CoV-2, bokundoli ya boye etie miso na baproteine ya spicule-S óyo esalisaka virusi ekota nakati ya moyambi ya enzyme ACE2 .
translated: ['Na cas ya SRAS-CoV-2, bolukiluki ya ndenge wana etie likebi na proteine Sspike oyo esalisaka virisi na kokota na moyambi ya enzyme ACE2.']

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: Strategie ya misato ezali óyo ya bavaccin ya acide nucleiki (DNA to bavaccin RNA, tekiniki ya sika mpóna kobongisa vaccinasio).
translated: ['Strategie ya misato eza oyo ya bavaccin ya aside nucleiki (DNA to bavaccin RNA, mayele ya sika ya kosala vaccination).']

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: Ba vaccin bazo experimenté na bosaleli ya ba strategie yango esengeli ezala tesité mpóna securité pe bolamo ya bosaleli. Na16 Mars 2020, momekano ya yambo ya vaccin na cliniki ebandaki na bato minei ya bolingi na Seattle.
translated: ['Ba vaccin ya komeka na mayele nyonso wana esengeli komeka yango mpona koyeba soki ezali malamu mpe ezali makasi. Na mokolo ya 16 sanza ya misato 2020, komeka ya liboso ya vaccin ebandaki na bato minei ya bolingo malamu na Seattle.']

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: Vaccin eza na kati nango code genetiki ya bokono te basali kopi uta na virusi mutu epesaka bokono. Bobakisi ya bokasi ezo dépendre na anticorps esi ekaniselami na esika ya etumba eko kozala mpóna bokolisi ya vaccin ya SRAS-COV-2, kasi óyo eza naino likambo ya koswanela.
translated: ['Vaccin eza na code génétique ya mabe te oyo bakode na yango euti na virisi oyo epesaka maladi. Enhancement ya dependance ya ba anticorps emonani lokola mokakatano oyo ekoki kosalema mpona kosala vaccin mpona SARS-COV-2, kasi yango ebimisaka ntembe.']

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: Mimekano ya cliniki eza kosalema eza koleka 300 na sanza ya Avril 2020.
translated: ['Baekzame ya makasi koleka 300 ezali kosalema na sanza ya minei 2020.']

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: Mimekano sambo mizali koyekola batraitement óyo esi endimami mpóna malaria, tia nakati minei eza koyekola hydroxychloroquine to chloroquine.
translated: ['Baekzame nsambo ezalaki kotalela bankisi oyo esi endimami mpo na malaria, ata mpe boyekoli minei ya hydroxychloroquine to chloroquine.']

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Bakisi ya antivirusi babongeseli ntina mosusu esali ngambo ya nyonso ya mayekoli ya ba Chinois, na ba phase III libwa ya mimekano na remdesivir ezo salama na bikolo ebele biye bikopesa lapolo na suka Avril.
translated: ['Bakisi ya antivirusi oyo ebongisami lisusu esali bolukiluki mingi ya Chine, na phase III libwa ya komeka remdesivir na mikili mingi esengeli kopesa lapolo na suka ya sanza ya minei.']

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: Botalololi ya dynaimiki ya bokolisi na cliniki ya vaccin mpóna COVID-19 na kisi ekoki kondimama esi ebelemi na Avril 2020.Bakisi ya antivirusi ebele óyo esi esalama ezali koyekolama mpóna traitement ya COVID-19, tia nakati remdesivir, chloroquine pe hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir pe lopinavir/ritonavir esangana na interferon beta.
translated: ['Botaleli ya dynamic ya bokolisi ya cliniki mpóna vaccin ya COVID-19 pe ba candidates ya bakisi ezalaki, na Avril 2020.Bakisi ya antivirusi ebele esi esi esalamaka mpóna traitement ya COVID-19, tia mpe remdesivir, chloroquine na hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir na lopinavir/ritonavir elongo na interferon beta.']

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: Elembo ebandaki komonana mpóna bolamu ya remdesivir, na Mars 2020.
translated: ['Ezali na bilembeteli ya tentative mpona bolamu na yango na remdesivir, na sanza ya misato 2020.']

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: Bobakisi ya bolamu ya cliniki emonanaki na bato ya bokono bazwaki traitement ya boyóki mawa remdesivir.
translated: ['Kobonga ya cliniki emonanaki na bato ya maladi oyo bazwaki nkisi ya remdesivir oyo basalelaka motema mawa.']

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: Mimekano ya cliniki Phase III mizali kosalema na E.U., Chine pe Italie. Chloroquine, óyo basalelaki liboso mpóna kotraité malaria, eyekolamaki na Chine na Février 2020, na mabimi ma yambo.
translated: ['Phase III ya komeka ezali kosalema na États-Unis, Chine mpe Italie.Chloroquine, oyo bazalaki kosalela liboso mpo na kobikisa malaria, bayekolaki yango na Chine na sanza ya mibale 2020, mpe ba resultat ya ebandeli.']

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: Kási, mabéngi mazali ete bato ya mayele batalolola mabimi ma makundoli.
translated: ['Kasi, bato mosusu bazali kosɛnga ete baninga bátalela bolukiluki yango.']

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: Bakónzi ya Santé ya Korea pe Chine bazo tinda basalela chloroquine.
translated: ['Bakonzi ya kolongono ya nzoto ya Corée mpe ya Chine balobi basalela chloroquine.']

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: Kási, Institut ya Virologie ya Wuhan, ntango bazo tinda doze ya gamma moko mokolo-na-mokolo, bayebisi ete mibale ya doze yango ezali mabe mingi penza pe ekoki koboma.
translated: ['Kasi, Institut ya Virologie ya Wuhan, ntango bazolendisa dose ya grame moko ya mokolo na mokolo, elobi ete dose ya doze wana mbala mibale eza likama makasi mpe ekoki koboma.']

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: Na 28 Mars2020, FDA abimisaki ndíngisa ya bosaleli ya bombango mpóna hydroxychloroquine pe chloroquine na bobombi sekelé ya minganga miye mizali kotraité babeli ya COVID-19.Edition 7 ya bato ya Chine ebakisaki lisusu interferon, ribavirin to umifenovir mpóna koboma COVID-19.
translated: ['Na mokolo ya 28 sanza ya misato 2020, FDA abimisaki ndingisa ya kosalela hydroxychloroquine mpe chloroquine na ndenge minganga oyo bazalaki kosalisa bato oyo bazali na COVID-19 bapesi ndingisa ya kosalela yango. Malako ya ebimeli ya 7 ya Chine ezali mpe na interferon, ribavirin to umifenovir mpo na kosalela mpo na kobundisa COVID-19.']

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: Badonnée ya yambo ezo lakisa ete ba doze ya likolo ya ribavirin ezali na ntina monene mpóna kobeta SRAS-CoV-2 in vitro.
translated: ['Bansango ya ebandeli emonisi ete doze ya makasi ya ribavirin eza ntina mpo na kokanga SARS-CoV-2 nzela ya koningana.']

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Nitazoxanide esi etindami mpóna boyekolii in vivo ekolanda sima ya bolakisi concentrasio ya moke ya inhibisio ya SRAS-CoV-2. Mayekoli malakisi ete bokotisi ya specule ya proteine ya ebandeli na bosaleli ya protéase ya transmembrane serine 2 (TMPRSS2) ezali na ntina monene penza mpóna bokoti ya SRAS-CoV-2 na nzela ya interacsio na moyambi ya ACE2.
translated: ['Nitazoxanide etindami mpóna etid mosusu na vivo nsima ya komonisa bokangami moke ya SARS-CoV-2.Bolukiluki emonisi ete proteine ya nsonge ya ebandeli priming na protease ya transmembrane serine 2 (TMPRSS2) eza ntina mingi mpo na kokota ya SARS-CoV-2 na nzela ya boyokani na ACE2 oyo ezwaka yango.']

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Mayekoli ya chloroquine na hydroxychloroquine na to kozanga azithromycine ezali na bandelo ya makasi óyo eye kosala ete lisanga ya bato ya bakisi babóya koyamba ba thérapie kozanga liyekoli ya bolandi. Oseltamivir ebetaka nango SRAS-CoV-2 in vitro te pe eza na mosala te óyo eyebani na traitement ya COVID-19.
translated: ['Bolukiluki ya chloroquine mpe hydroxychloroquine oyo eza na azithromycin to oyo eza te eza na bandelo ya minene oyo epekisaki minganga na kondima bankisi wana kozanga koyekola yango lisusu. Oseltamivir ekangaka te SARS-CoV-2 ya vitro mpe eyebani te na mosala ya kobikisa COVID-19.']

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: Tempete ya cytokine eko kozala pasi mabe ya etape ya suka ya COVID-19 ya makasi.
translated: ['Mopepe ya cytokine ekoki kozala mpasi na eteni ya nsima ya COVID-19 ya makasi.']

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: Elembo ezo monana ete hydroxychloroquine eko kozala na ba propriété ya kopekisa tempete cytokine.Tocilizumab esi ekotisami na masungi ya traitement na Comission Nationale ya Santé ya Chine sima ya bosilisi ya liyekoli ya moke.
translated: ['Eza na bilembeteli emonisi ete hydroxychloroquine ekoki kozala na biloko ya kobundisa mopepe ya cytokine. Tocilizumab etyamaki na malako ya kosalisa maladi na Commission Nationale ya Sante ya Chine nsima ya kosilisa bolukiluki ya moke.']

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: Bazali kosala sik’óyo phase 2 ya tesite non-randomisé na niveau ya ekolo mobimba na Italie sima ya bolakisi bambuma malamu na bato bazali na bokono ya makasi.
translated: ['Eza na phase 2 ya kosala ekzame ya nonrandomisé na nivo ya ekolo mobimba na Italie nsima ya kolakisa ba resultat ya malamu na bato oyo baza na maladi ya makasi.']

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: Bosangisi yango na tesite ya makila ya serum ferritin mpóna ko yebela, esalami mpóna kopekisa bokoli, yango mutu ekaniselami kozala esika liwa ewutaka mpóna kamwa ndámbo ya bato bazwi kpokoso.
translated: ['Soki tosangisi yango na ekzame ya makila ya serum ferritin mpo na koyeba mipɛpɛ makasi ya cytokine, ezali mpo na kobundisa bokoli ya ndenge wana, oyo bakanisi ete ezali ntina ya liwa na bato mosusu oyo bazwi likama.']

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: Moyambi ya tembe interleukin-6 endimamaka na FDA ose ya malandeli ya mayekoli masalamaka liboso mpóna traitement ya syndrome ya botiki steroide cytokine refractaire esalama na ntina ekesana, cellula ya therapi CAR T, na 2017.
translated: ['Ba antagoniste ya interleukin-6 receptor endimamaki na FDA na kotalela boyekoli ya makambo ya retrospective mpo na kobikisa syndrome ya kobima ya cytokine steroide refractaire oyo euti na ntina mosusu, therapi ya baselile CAR T, na 2017.']

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: Na mokolo ya lelo, elembo ya randomisé pe controlé ezali te mpóna bondimi ete tocilizumab eza kisi ya solo na CRS.
translated: ['Kino na mokolo ya lelo, eza te na bilembeteli ya randomisé, oyo etambwisami ete tocilizumab eza nkisi ya makasi mpona CRS.']

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: Bolekisi ya ba anticorps bapurifiaki pe bacocentraki óyo ewuti na systeme immune ya bato babikaki na bokono ya COVID-19 na nzoto ya baye bazali na mposa na yango ezo landama bokundoli mpo ezala methodi ezanga vaccin na immunizasio passifi.
translated: ['Kotinda ba anticorps oyo epetolami mpe elendisami na systeme immune ya bato oyo babikaki na COVID-19 na bato oyo baza na mposa na yango, bazali koluka koyeba soki ezali methodi ya mangwele te ya immunition passifi.']

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: Esaleli ya boye bamekaki yango kasi ebotaki mbuma te.
translated: ['Bamekaki mayele oyo mpona SARS na ba resultat ya mbalakaka te.']

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Neutralizasio ya virusi ezali nzela bazo kanisela ekozala mosala óyo therapi ya ba anticorps passifi ekokoka komediaté bobateli ya tembe na SRAS-CoV-2.
translated: ['Neutralisation ya virusi eza mechanisme oyo tozalaki kozela mpo na yango therapi ya ba anticorps passifi eko mediate defense ya SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: Banzela mosusu kasi, ndakisa cytotoxicité pe/to phagocytose ya cellula dependant na anticorps eko kosala.
translated: ['Ba mechanisme misusu kasi, na ndakisa cytotoxicité pe/to phagocytose ya cellula dependant na anticorps, ekoki kosalema.']

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: Ba ndenge mosusu ya therapi passive ya anticorps, ndakisa, bosaleli ya ba anticorps monocloniki basali na masini, ezali kokolisama.
translated: ['Ba ndenge mosusu ya therapi passive ya anticorps, na ndakisa, na kosalela ba anticorps monoclonal oyo basali, ezali kokola.']

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: Mobombisi ya serum ya babeli bazo bika na bokono, mutu ezalaka na ndambo ya makila ya mayi ewuti na bato babiki pe eza na ba anticorps specifiki na virusi yango, ekoki ebákisama mpóna bokaboli yango na bombango.
translated: ['Kobimisa serum ya bato bazobika na maladi, oyo eza na eteni ya makila ya mai oyo euti na bato oyo babiki mpe eza na ba anticorps specifiki na virisi oyo, ekoki kobakisama mpo na kosalela yango noki.']

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: Mabela ya coronavirusi, liboke ya basyndrome óyo ekangana kamwa mingi
translated: ['Maladi ya coronavirisi, etuluku moko ya ba syndrome oyo ekokani mpenza']

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: Li Wenliang, monganga ya Lopitalo Centrale ya Wuhan, ye mutu azwaki kpokoso ya COVID-19 na suka akufaki sima ya bomatisi boyebi ya bopalangani ya virusi yango.
translated: ['Li Wenliang, monganga na Lopitalo Centrale ya Wuhan, oyo na nsima azwaki maladi ya COVID-19 mpe akufaki nsima ya kobenda likebi ya bato na kopalangana ya virisi.']
